GSP28durdhpru:6: [1] ūṃ namaḥ sarvajñāya -- BEHN / nāsti AP.
GSP28durdhpru:7: samyagjñānapūrvikā sarvapuruṣārthasiddhir iti tad vyutpādyate I-1
GSP28durdhpru:14: [1b][[2]sūtrabhidharma]vinayāḥ sugatasya vāco bādhā vinā dbhutatayā satataṃ jayanti /
GSP28durdhpru:17: ābhānti darpaṇa iva pratibimbitāni tattvāni yatra sakalasya padārtharāśeḥ //
GSP28durdhpru:18: śrīdharmakīrtyabhimukhāni jagaddhitāni dharmottarasya vipulāni padāny amūni /
GSP28durdhpru:19: samyakprakāśya sukṛtaṃ samupārjayāmi tenāpi duḥkhajaladher jagad uddharāmi //
GSP28durdhpru:24: nyāyabinduṭīkāṃ cikīrṣur eṣa dharmottaro bhagavatpūjāpuṇyayoḥ sādhyasādhanabhāvam atīndrayam īdṛśi viṣaye gatyantaravirahād abhyupeyaprāmāṇyād āgamād avagamya,
GSP28durdhpru:31: dṛṣṭaśiṣṭācāro 'py anupālito bhaviṣyatīty abhisandhāya vāgvijayākhyānadvārāṃ bhagavataḥ pūjāṃ stutimayīm ārabhate /
GSP28durdhpru:32: syād etat -- pūjāyāḥ puṇyopajananamātraprayoja[5][nasya sampādakat]vād āripsitārambhāt prāk kāyamayīm eveṣṭadevatāpūjām āracyya,
GSP28durdhpru:34: athocyate -- tatpūrvikāyām api pravṛttau `stutipūjaiva pravṛttipuraḥsarī kiṃ na kṛtā' iti codyam āpadyeta /
GSP28durdhpru:35: tathā cāśokavanikācodyasadṛśam idam iti nānuvādyam api viduṣām iti /
GSP28durdhpru:37: evaṃ hi [kāyapūjāyāracane stuti]padāni prayuñjānasyā 'tadvyākhyānabhūtasyāsya ślokasyāprakṛtasya karaṇaṃ nāpadyeta /
GSP28durdhpru:41: atrocyate -- syād evaitad yadi svārtham uddiśya stutir īdṛśī pūjā vidhīyate /
GSP28durdhpru:42: kiṃ tarhi? śrotṛjanā[rtham uddiśyāpi] bhagavato guṇakīrttane kṛte śrotṛbhir antataḥ kāvyaguṇajijñāsayāpi ślokao 'vaśyaṃ jñātavyaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:43: tajjñānāt tathāgataguṇās tāvat kālaṃ tāvac chotṛsantānam adhyāsate /
GSP28durdhpru:44: tatra ye tāvad bhagavati prāgatiprasannamanasas teṣām evaṃvidhaguṇātiśayaśālini `sthāna evāsmākaṃ manaḥ prasannam' iti niścinvatāṃ sthe[6][mānam āsādayate cittam /
GSP28durdhpru:45: ] ye ca madhyasthās teṣām `evaṃbhūtaguṇaratnālaṅkṛte mahato mahīyasi cittam āvarjayitum ucitaṃ svahitāvahitaiḥ,
GSP28durdhpru:46: tad vayam iyantaṃ kālaṃ pramādyanta evodāsmahe sma' iti nirvidyamānānāṃ cittaṃ pratiṣṭhate /
GSP28durdhpru:47: ye 'py anatiprasannās teṣām api -- `evaṃvidhaguṇaniketane kim asmābhir akasmād vidviṣyate'
GSP28durdhpru:48: iti mananān manāgāvarjanaṃ mādhyasthyaṃ vā[7][syād ity atiprasannamadhyastha]yoḥ
GSP28durdhpru:51: mādhyasthye tu bhagavadvidveṣopacayopaneyanarakeṣv anatipatanaṃ vidveṣopaśamād bhavati /
GSP28durdhpru:52: asatyāṃ tu stutimayapūjāyām itthaṃ trividhaśrotṛjanaprayojanaṃ yat tan na kṛtaṃ syāt -- iti svaparārtho[2a]ddeśena stutimayī pūjā vidhīyata iti sthitam /
GSP28durdhpru:55: [7] pratau duṣkhāni ity evaṃ varttate -- saṃ-
GSP28durdhpru:56: tatrānena ślokena bhagavān svārthasampadā parārthsampadupāyasampadā parārthsampadā ca stūyate /
GSP28durdhpru:58: tathā hi cirakālābhyāsasātmyīkṛtamahākṛpasya bhavataḥ parārthasampat pradhānaṃ prayojanam,
GSP28durdhpru:60: ānuṣaṅgikaṃ tathāgatattvam apīti sā tāvad avaśyābhidheyā /
GSP28durdhpru:63: sā copāyasampadam antareṇāsambhavinīti tad abhidhānam apy āvaśyakam /
GSP28durdhpru:64: iyañ cānadhigatasvārthasampado na sidhyatīti tad abhidhānam api niyatam āpatitam /
GSP28durdhpru:66: “tīrṇaḥ svayaṃ yāti jagat samagraṃ mārgopadeśe 'dhikṛto hi nāthaḥ /” iti /
GSP28durdhpru:67: tatra svārthasampannasya parārthasampādanopāyasampat tatsādhyā ca parārthasampādanasampad iti prathamaṃ jātityādinā sugatasyety antena svārthasampattir uktā /
GSP28durdhpru:70: iti tadanuvāca ity anena parārthopāyasampad uktā /
GSP28durdhpru:72: idañ cānuṣṭheyam' ityādirūpeṇa dharmadeśanaiva hi bhagavato jagaddhitāvagamanalakṣaṇaparārthasampādanopāyasampad
GSP28durdhpru:74: tad anantaraṃ tadupāyasampattisādhyā parārthasampad anyena padenoktā /
GSP28durdhpru:79: utkarṣaś ca sajātīyāpekṣayeti sāmarthyād īśvarādivacanebhyaḥ prakṛṣṭā bhavantīty arthaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:84: teṣāṃ tu tadvaiparītyād iti buddhisiddhaṃ kṛtvā kevalam etad atroktam /
GSP28durdhpru:85: viniściyaṭīkāyāṃ punar anena `yuktiprabhāve'tyādi hetubhāvena viśeṣaṇam upāttam /
GSP28durdhpru:86: kasya tā ity ākāṅkṣāyām āha -- sugatasya iti /
GSP28durdhpru:94: atha vā gatyarthānāṃ jñānārthatvād api praśastaṃ gataḥ jñātavān ity arthaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:101: punarāvṛttiśabdavācyayor janmadoṣayor ātmadarśanabījopaghātena bhagavatā samūlaghātaṃ nihatatvāt /
GSP28durdhpru:105: niḥśeṣaṃ yāvad gantavyaṃ tāvad gataḥ prāptaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:109: tasya sugatasya kimbhutasyety āha -- vijetuḥ abhibhavituḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:111: vijayaś ca jagadapekṣayā paramapadaprāptyā tasya prakṛṣṭatvaṃ draṣṭavyam /
GSP28durdhpru:114: na punā rājavijaya iva rājāntarāpekṣayā kāyāditiraskāro 'bhibhavo 'vaseyaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:120: jātir eva vyasanam ity antarnītaniyamaḥ samāsaḥ kartavyaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:121: tṛṣyann eva hi prāṇī tat tad ācarati yena saṃsāre saṃsarati /
GSP28durdhpru:122: tatas tayaivāsau itastata utpādadvāreṇa vyastaḥ kṣipto bhavatīti saiva vyasanaṃ yuktam /
GSP28durdhpru:123: atha vā jātau utpattau nikāyaviśiṣṭāyāṃ vyasanam āsaktiḥ `vidyādharo 'haṃ bhūyāsaṃ',
GSP28durdhpru:132: evañ ca prabandhaprasūtiśrutisahitaṃ hetupadam upādadānaḥ paramatanirākaraṇañ cābhipraiti /
GSP28durdhpru:136: [8] pratau duṣkhāni ity evaṃ varttate -- saṃ-
GSP28durdhpru:137: tātparyārthaḥ -- jadad evānanyasattvaneyaṃ svayam eva tathā tat tad ācarati yena tathā saṃsāre saṃsarati /
GSP28durdhpru:143: itarathā jātivyasanāśrayasyeti tadanyaviśeṣaṇasahitam eva brūyād iti /
GSP28durdhpru:149: ata evāsau tataḥ prakṛṣṭo bhavati vijetā tasya /
GSP28durdhpru:150: atha vā rāgādyarāter iti jagato viśeṣaṇam /
GSP28durdhpru:151: rāgādayo 'rātayaḥ pratipakṣā nityam upaghātakā yasyeti kṛtvā /
GSP28durdhpru:152: tadā tu tadvijetā bhavān sugatatvād eva boddhavyaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:153: jagato ye rāgādayas teṣām arāte ityādivyākhyānaṃ tu kliṣṭatvāt noktam /
GSP28durdhpru:154: kiṃviśiṣṭā vāc ity āha -- mana ityādi /
GSP28durdhpru:156: tac ca manaso vikalpavijñānasya kayācid vyapekṣayā dharma iva bhinnaḥ kathyate /
GSP28durdhpru:157: vastutas tu kliṣṭam eva jñānam avidyā /
GSP28durdhpru:158: yad vā kliṣṭaṃ mana eva tama iva tamaḥ pūrvavat /
GSP28durdhpru:159: kecit tu manastama iti śabdasamudāyam ajñānārthavācakam ācakṣate /
GSP28durdhpru:160: tasya tānavaṃ tanutvaṃ mandībhavanam ity arthāt /
GSP28durdhpru:162: tānavagraḥaṇena cedam ācaṣṭe -- na bhavato vācaḥ sarvathā jagadajñānam upaghnanti,
GSP28durdhpru:164: kin tu tiyantaṃ kālam ālocyamānāḥ samudācārato mohasya māndyāpādanena taṃ tanūkurvantīti /
GSP28durdhpru:165: atha vā anyathā vyākhyāyate -- tā vācas tamo jayanti abhibhavanti[9] ...................... ............... [3a]....................................mohapracāram ādadhānāḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:169: yad vā manasi tamo yasya sa manastamā mūḍha uktaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:178: kevalam idam ālocyatām -- tathāgatam abhistuvatā dharmottareṇāsyaiva vijayo mukhyavṛttyā kiṃ na kathitaḥ?
GSP28durdhpru:185: yad vā yasya vāca eva tathā jayanti tasya vijayo daṇḍāj jayanyāyenātiśayena pratipāditaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:189: atha vāgamikānāṃ matena nirupadhiśeṣe nirvāṇadhātau parinirvṛto bhagavān /
GSP28durdhpru:190: parinirvṛtasyāsya pravacanam ayam eva vapur vidyata iti āgamiko vāgvijayam eva pratipādayate smeti /
GSP28durdhpru:192: tasyā yat prayojanaṃ puruṣārthasiddharūpaṃ tad ucyate /
GSP28durdhpru:193: na ca samyagjñānavyutpatteḥ samyagjñānaparijñānaṃ prayojanaṃ na puruṣārthasiddhir iti śakyam abhidhātum /
GSP28durdhpru:196: sā katham ātmana eva prayojanaṃ bhaved ity abhiprāyeṇa vyākhyātavantau vinītadevaśāntabhadrau /
GSP28durdhpru:197: tad vyākhyānam avamanyamāno 'bhidheya prayojanam ucyate iti vyācaṣṭe /
GSP28durdhpru:198: avajñāne cāyam āśayaḥ -- asyedaṃ prayojanam iti khalv anvyavyatirekābhyām avadhāryate /
GSP28durdhpru:201: samyagjñānavyutpattim antareṇāpi gopālāṅganādīnāṃ bhavantī sati samyagjñāni(-ne)
GSP28durdhpru:202: , satyām api tadvyutpattau asti samyagjñāṇe manīṣiṇām abhavantī na tadvyutpatter anvayavyatirekāv anuvidhatte /
GSP28durdhpru:203: kiṃ tarhi? samyagjñānasyeti tasyaiva payojanaṃ bhavitum arhatīti /
GSP28durdhpru:204: samyagjñānetyādinā vākyena karaṇena prakaraṇābhidheyasya samyagjñānalakṣaṇasya prayojanaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ puruṣārthasiddhilakṣaṇam ucyate vārttikakṛtā karttrety arthāt /
GSP28durdhpru:205: nanu ca yatrābhidhāvyāpāraḥ samāpyate sa vākyārthaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:209: yady api śabdābhidhāvyāpārāpekṣayā tat samyagjñānaṃ vyutpādyate śiṣya iti śiṣyasamyagjñānaviṣayā vyutpattikriyā prādhānyād vākyārthaḥ,
GSP28durdhpru:211: tathā hi tadvyuptattim evāsau kim ati kāryate?
GSP28durdhpru:213: yatra punar abhidhāviṣaya evārthaḥ sambhavī na tu tātparyārtho [3b][14].../
GSP28durdhpru:214: s tatra sa eva vākyārthaḥ kalpyate /
GSP28durdhpru:215: dvitayasambhave tu yat paraṃ vākyaṃ tathā ca tasyārtha ity ārthena nyāyenābhidheyasya prayojanaṃ puruṣāthasiddhir vākyārthatvenocyata iti vyākhyāyata iti /
GSP28durdhpru:219: kecit punar idaṃ dharmottarīyaṃ vākyam anyathā vyācakṣate /
GSP28durdhpru:220: nātra payojanaśabdena phalam abhipretaṃ kiṃ tu prayujyate pravarttyate 'neneti,
GSP28durdhpru:223: abhidheyasya hi samyagjñānasya puruṣārthasiddhihetutvena prayuktaḥ puruṣaḥ pravarttata iti /
GSP28durdhpru:225: ata eva -- atra cetyādivākye sarvapuruṣārthasiddhihetutvaṃ prayojanaṃ pravarttakam uktam iti spaṣṭīkaraṇaṃ ghaṭata iti /
GSP28durdhpru:227: tathā hi atra ca prakaraṇābhidheyasya samyagjñānasya puruṣārthasiddhhihetutvaṃ prayojanam
GSP28durdhpru:228: uktam iti vakṣyamāṇena vyaktīkṛtatvād ihāpi abhidheyasya prayojanam iti ṣaṣṭītatpuruṣo 'vaśyakāryaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:230: tad dhi puruṣārthasiddhihetutvaṃ nābhidheyasya samyagjñānasya pravarttakam api tu puruṣasya /
GSP28durdhpru:235: na hi yajñadattaputro bhṛtyatvādinā rupeṇa devadattasambandhī bhavan devadattaputra iti ṣaṣṭīsamāsasya viṣayo bhavitum arhati /
GSP28durdhpru:236: atha bhāvapradhānatvān nirdeśasya prayojanaṃ prayojakatvam ity athaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:237: tac cāśritasya prayojakatayā abhavati sambandhīti samarthavidhiḥ kalpyate /
GSP28durdhpru:238: nanu yadi samyagjñānagataṃ puruṣārthasiddhihetutvaṃ prayojanaṃ prayojakatvaṃ tarhi samyagjñāṇaṃ prayojanam ity āpannam /
GSP28durdhpru:239: yato na prayojanatvam eva prayojanaṃ bhavitum arthati /
GSP28durdhpru:240: na ca samyagjñānena prayuktaḥ puruṣaḥ samyagjñāne pravarttate,
GSP28durdhpru:244: na ca vṛddhaiḥ prayojakaḥ saty api prayojayitṛtve prayojaka iti samyagjñānavyutpatteḥ prayojanam ucyeta /
GSP28durdhpru:245: anyathā samyagjñānaṃ vyutpadyamānānām ātmānaṃ karttuṃ pravarttamāna ācāryaḥ prayojaka iti samyajñāṇayutpatteḥ prayojanam ucyeta /
GSP28durdhpru:246: yo 'pi kaṭaṃ kurvantaṃ karttuṃ prayuṅkte so 'pi tat prayojanam ucyetety evaṃvādī na laukiko na praīkṣaka ity upekṣaṇīya eva /
GSP28durdhpru:247: api ca kim etad anyathā nopapadyata eva yenaivaṃ mṛtvā śīrtvopapādyeta /
GSP28durdhpru:249: prayojakatvam iti nirdeśe ca dharmottaraḥ kiṃ gauravaṃ paśyati yenaivam avācakam ācakṣīta?
GSP28durdhpru:251: kiṃ ca yad īpsañ jihāsan vā puruṣaḥ pravarttate tad upādānaparityāgābhyāṃ pravarttito bhavati /
GSP28durdhpru:252: yathāha akṣapādaḥ -- yam artham adhikṛtya pravarttate tat prayojanam[NSū 1,1,28]iti /
GSP28durdhpru:254: na ca samyagjñānasya bhinnaṃ sad api puruṣārthasiddhihetutvam īpsan jihāsan vā pravarttate /
GSP28durdhpru:255: kiṃ tarhi? hitāhitaprāptiparihārāv uddiśyeti tāv eva prayojane yukte /
GSP28durdhpru:256: kiñcid ajihāsor anupāditsor arthanirīha[4a]sya saty api puruṣārthasiddhihetutve apravarttanāt /
GSP28durdhpru:257: smaraṇād abhilāṣeṇa vyavahāraḥ pravarttate ity alaṃ śabdamātrasamarthanadṛṣṭer arthatattvānavagāhino vacane 'ndhādareṇa /
GSP28durdhpru:261: na hi puruṣārthasiddhihteutvena prayuktaḥ puruṣaḥ samyagjñānalakṣaṇe abhidheye pravarttate kiṃ tu prakaraṇe pravarttate -- granthaśravaṇalakṣaṇāṃ pravṛttim anutiṣṭhati /
GSP28durdhpru:263: evam apy asau śabde 'bhidheye ca samudāye pravṛtto bhavati /
GSP28durdhpru:265: atha punar ayam artho 'sya prakaraṇasyābhidheye 'rthād abhidhānābhidheyasamudāye prayojanaṃ pravarttakam iti /
GSP28durdhpru:266: tathā ca prakaraṇe pravarttakam ity asaṅgatam uktaṃ syāt /
GSP28durdhpru:267: yadi coktayā vyutpattyā prayojanaśabdena prayojakaṃ tathābhūtam asya bubodhayiṣitaṃ bhavet tadā samyagjñānapūrviketyādinā abhidheyaprayojanam ucyata ity uktaṃ syāt /
GSP28durdhpru:268: mukhyaś ca sambandhī puruṣaḥ puruṣasyeti darśitaḥ syāt /
GSP28durdhpru:269: na caivam, tasmāt prayojanaśabdena phalam evāsyābhipretam atrottaratrāpi /
GSP28durdhpru:270: athocyate / phalārthī cet pratipattā phala eva kiṃ na pravarttate?
GSP28durdhpru:273: anyathā visaṃvādanam ātmīyam āśaṅkamāna iti kā kṣatiḥ?
GSP28durdhpru:274: phalapakṣe tu puruṣapravṛtty upayogi cāsyābhidheyam iti tad darśitaṃ bhavati /
GSP28durdhpru:276: dvividhaṃ hi prakaraṇaśarīram -- śabdaḥ, arthaś ca /
GSP28durdhpru:280: abhidheyaṃ tu yadi niṣprayojanaṃ syāt tadā tatpratipattaye śabdasandarbho 'pi nārambhaṇīyaḥ syāt /
GSP28durdhpru:284: tat katham etad vyākhyāyata iti cet /
GSP28durdhpru:286: kevalaṃ na puruṣārthasiddhihetutvaṃ samyagjñānasyātmana eva prayojakaṃ kiṃ tu puruṣasya /
GSP28durdhpru:288: abhidheye prayojanam iti vigrahe ca bhūyān doṣo darśitaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:289: tasmāt tathābhūtavyutpattināpi prayojanaśabdenātra na tathābhūtaṃ prayojakaṃ cāvādyam,
GSP28durdhpru:290: api tu phalam eveti sarvam avadātam /
GSP28durdhpru:291: nanu ca prakaraṇe śrotṝn pravivarttayiṣur ayam abhidheyaprayojanam abhidhatte tad anenāsyaiva tad ākhyātum ucitam /
GSP28durdhpru:292: tac ca yathāsvam abhidheyapratyāyanalakṣaṇam ity āśaṅkyāha -- dvividhaṃ hi ityādi /
GSP28durdhpru:293: hir yāsmād dviprakāraṃ prakaraṇasya śarīraṃ svabhāvaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:294: tad uktaṃ kāvyālaṅkāre “śabdārthau sahitau kāvyaṃ“[15][kā 1,16] iti /
GSP28durdhpru:301: etad uktaṃ bhavati -- śabdārthayor avacchedyāvacchedakatvena sthitayoḥ prakaraṇatvaṃ
GSP28durdhpru:303: yady evaṃ śarīratvāviśeṣāt abhidheyasyevābhidhānātmano 'pi tat kiṃ nocyate?
GSP28durdhpru:304: kiṃ ca, na niṣkṛṣṭarūpe 'bhidheye puruṣaḥ pravarttate kiṃ tu grantha eva śravaṇalakṣanāṃ pravṛttim ācarati abhidheyajñānāya /
GSP28durdhpru:305: tad asyaiva prayojanaṃ vācyam iti pūrvapakṣadvitayaṃ paśyann āha -- tatreti nirdhā[4b]raṇe caitat /
GSP28durdhpru:306: nānyad iti puruṣapravṛtty upayogi ayam asyāśayaḥ -- na hi śabdasya svārthapratyāyanalakṣaṇaṃ phalam astīti śabdasandarbha ārabhyate śrūyate
GSP28durdhpru:310: tarhi abhidheyasyāpi tat kim ucyata ity āha -- abhidheyaṃ tu ityādi /
GSP28durdhpru:312: apiśabdo nārambhaṇīya ity asmāt paro draṣṭavyaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:313: tad ayam arthaḥ -- tatpratipattaye śabdānāṃ sandarbho nārambhaṇīyo 'pi syāt,
GSP28durdhpru:316: yathā kākadantaprayojanābhāvāt na tatparīkṣā ārambhaṇīyā prekṣāvatā /
GSP28durdhpru:317: tasmād asya prakaraṇasyārambhaṇīyatvaṃ darśayatā abhidheyaprayojanam anenocyate /
GSP28durdhpru:319: tasmāt tatpratipattaye idam ārabhyata ity ayam atra vākyārthaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:320: atra ca prakaraṇābhidheyasya samyagjñānasya sarvapuruṣārthasiddhihetutvam prayojanam uktam /
GSP28durdhpru:322: yathaitad darśitaṃ tadvat sarvaṃ draṣṭvyam iti yathāśabdārthaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:325: parīkṣaṇaṃ vā parīkṣā vimṛṣyāvadhāraṇaṃ tādarthyāt śāstram api tathā /
GSP28durdhpru:327: vacanena tv anena kiṃ kriyata ity āha -- tasmād ityādi /
GSP28durdhpru:328: yasmān niṣprayonanābhidheyaṃ nārabhyate tasmād ārambhaṇīyatvaṃ darśayatā ārambhayogyam evedaṃ mayārabhyata iti prakāśayatā,
GSP28durdhpru:329: ārambhaṇīyate ca darśite śravaṇīyatvam api nimittasāmyād darśitaṃ bhavatīti te pravarttitā bhavanti /
GSP28durdhpru:330: nanu ca samyagjñānapūrvikā sarvapuruṣārthasiddhir ity anenaikadeśenābhidheyaprayojanam uktam,
GSP28durdhpru:332: tat katham anena “vākyenocyate” ity ucyate? ucyate /
GSP28durdhpru:333: vākyaṃ hi nāmaikasminn arthe prādhānyena pratipādye guṇaguṇibhāvam anubhavatām arthadvāreṇānyonyāpekṣiṇāṃ sambaddhānāṃ padānāṃ samūha ucyate
GSP28durdhpru:334: tatra yadi sarveṣāṃ padārthānāṃ prādhānyaṃ syāt tadā parasparānupakārāt sambandha eva padānāṃ na syād iti vākyarūpataiva hīyeteti sūktam aneneti
GSP28durdhpru:335: abhidheyaprayojanābhidhānam evāsya samyagjñānetyādipadasamūhātmakasya yathā tathā yasmād ityādinā kaṇṭhoktaṃ karoti /
GSP28durdhpru:337: etac ca tad vyutpādyata ity asya sāmarthyāvasthitārthakathanaṃ draṣṭavyam /
GSP28durdhpru:339: idamā ca buddhisiddhatvena tad evāṅgulīvyapadeśayogyam iva darśayati /
GSP28durdhpru:342: ata eva cārthena nyāyena puruṣārthasidder vākyārthatvam /
GSP28durdhpru:343: śābdyā tu vṛttyā śiṣyasamyagjñānaviṣayā vyuptattikriyā vākyārtha iti darśitam /
GSP28durdhpru:344: nanu samyagjñānetyādinā vākyena samyagjñānasya purṣārthasiddhau hetubhāvaḥ paraṃ pradarśito na punar idaṃ tasya prayojanam iti darśitam /
GSP28durdhpru:347: tāvatāpi na jñāyate kasya kiṃ tad abhidheyaṃ kiṃ ca tasya prayojanam ity āśaṅkyāha -- atra cetyādi /
GSP28durdhpru:348: atha samyagjñānasya puruṣārthasiddhihetutvaṃ prayojanam ity avadyam /
GSP28durdhpru:350: tathā hi puruṣārthasiddhim evācāryīyaṃ samyagjñānetyādivacanaṃ prayojanam anujānāti na tu puruṣārthasi[5a]ddhihetutvam /
GSP28durdhpru:351: avayavārthavyākhyāne tasya tām eva prayojanatayā vyaktīkaraṣyati /
GSP28durdhpru:352: na ca hetutvaṃ hator bhinnam iṣyate yujyate vā /
GSP28durdhpru:355: asmiṃś cārtha ucyamāne sambandhaprayojanābhidheyāni uktāni bhavanti /
GSP28durdhpru:360: na ca rājaśāsanaṃ sāmānyaṃ kiñcid asti yena bhāvapradhānaḥ prayojanaśabdaḥ kalpyeta /
GSP28durdhpru:362: satyam / na puruṣārthasiddhihetutvaṃ samyajñānasya prayojanam abhipretam /
GSP28durdhpru:366: tato yasmāt prakaraṇābhidheyasya samyagjñānasya puruṣārthasiddhihetutvam uktam,
GSP28durdhpru:367: tasymāt prayojanam uktam iti dvir āvartanīyam /
GSP28durdhpru:369: samyagjñānasya tāṃ prati hetutvoktau ca sā prayojanam ukteti kiṃ sākṣād vācakena padena kriyata iti bhāvaḥ etāvataiva tāvad idaṃ sādhīyate /
GSP28durdhpru:371: sarvā puruṣārthasiddhir yato hetutvāt tat sarvapuruṣārthasiddhi,
GSP28durdhpru:372: tathāvidhaṃ hetutvaṃ yatra prayojanaṃ tat tathā /
GSP28durdhpru:375: kasya tādṛśam ity apekṣāyām idam uktam -- prakaraṇābhidheyasya samyagjñānasyeti kecit pratipadyante /
GSP28durdhpru:377: [16]āditve prayojanam asyāstīti matvarthīyamataṃ vidhāya pradhānavan nirdeśaṃ vivakṣitvā prayojanavattvam iti pratijānate /
GSP28durdhpru:378: evaṃ cārtahṃ samarthayanti -- yata eva puruṣārthasiddhiḥ samyagjñānasādhyā tata eva sā prayojanam /
GSP28durdhpru:379: tasyāpi yad eva tām prati hetutvaṃ tad eva prayojanavattvam iti /
GSP28durdhpru:382: eka tu yataḥ samyagjñāne sati puruṣārthasiddhihetutvaṃ vyavasthāpyate,
GSP28durdhpru:383: tataḥ pramāṇaphalavad vyavasthāpy avyavasthāpanabhāvam āśriyedam uktaṃ tato na kiñcid avadyam iti mayante /
GSP28durdhpru:384: apare tu caśabdaṃ bhinnakramaṃ kṛtvā puruṣārthasiddhihetutvam uktam,
GSP28durdhpru:386: itare tu puruṣārthasiddhihetuśabdena kāraṇe kāryam upacarya puruṣārthasiddhim evābhidadhati /
GSP28durdhpru:388: kecit tu nibandhakṛtaḥ kathañcid apīdaṃ samarthayitum anīśānāḥ sahitaśabdapātāt pramādapāṭhā eveti varṇayanti /
GSP28durdhpru:390: syād etat / yathā pravṛtty aṅgatayā abhidheyaprayojanam ucyate,
GSP28durdhpru:391: tadvat sambadhādikam api kiṃ nocyata ity āha -- asmiṃś ceti /
GSP28durdhpru:394: tathā hi prurṣārthopayogi samyagjñānaṃ vyutpādayitavyam anena prakareṇeti bruvatā samyagjñānam asya śabdasandarbhasya abhidheyam,
GSP28durdhpru:396: prakaraṇam ca idam apāyo vyutpādanasya ity uktam bhavati /
GSP28durdhpru:398: na tv idam ekaṃ vākyaṃ sambandham,
GSP28durdhpru:401: ekaṃ tu vadat trayaṃ sāmarthyāt darśayati / tatra
GSP28durdhpru:402: kathaṃ punar anyasyoktānyad uktaṃ bhavatīty āha -- tathā hi iti /
GSP28durdhpru:403: nipātasamudāyaś cāyaṃ yasmād ity asyārthe sarvatra varttate /
GSP28durdhpru:406: evaṃ sati kiṃ siddham ity āha -- tasmād iti /
GSP28durdhpru:414: tathā sambandhādīny api kiṃ nocyanta ity āha -- na tv iti /
GSP28durdhpru:416: ayam āśayaḥ -- yadi sarve padārthāḥ prādhānyam aśnuvīran,
GSP28durdhpru:418: tato vākyam ekārtham abhidheyatayā upādātuṃ kalpyate nānekam /
GSP28durdhpru:422: na sākṣāt samartham iti tarhi na vācyam iti /
GSP28durdhpru:433: tathā ca kasya kiṃ vādakaṃ padam ity āśaṅky āha -- tatra ityādi -- teśu abhidheyādiṣū /
GSP28durdhpru:437: prayojanaṃ ca atra vaktuḥ prakaraṇakaraṇavyāpārasya cintyate,
GSP28durdhpru:439: tathā hi -- sarve prekṣāvantaḥ pravṛttiprayojanam anviṣya pravartante /
GSP28durdhpru:440: tataśa ca ācāryeṇa prakaraṇaṃ kim arthaṃ kṛtam,
GSP28durdhpru:441: śrotṛbhiś ca kim artham śruyata iti saṃśaye vyutpādanaṃ prayojanābhidhīyate /
GSP28durdhpru:442: samyagjñānaṃ vyutpadyamānānām ātmānaṃ vyutpādakaṃ kartuṃ prakaraṇam idam kṛtam /
GSP28durdhpru:443: śiṣyaiś ca ācāryaprayuktām ātmano vyutpattim icchadbhiḥ prakaraṇam idaṃ śruyata iti prakaraṇakaraṇaśravaṇayoḥ prayojanaṃ vyutpādanam /
GSP28durdhpru:445: yato vyutpādyata ity atra lakāraḥ prayojyakarmaṇi vihito na prayojyakriyākarmaṇīti /
GSP28durdhpru:446: vākye 'pi loke padyate gamyate 'nenārtha iti vyutpattyā padaprayogo dṛśyate /
GSP28durdhpru:447: tato vyutpādyata iti prayojanapadam ity āha /
GSP28durdhpru:449: yad vā vyutpādyata ity atreti draṣṭavyam /
GSP28durdhpru:452: kathaṃ ca tad anyatocyata ity āha -- prayojanaṃ cātra iti /
GSP28durdhpru:454: tad ayam arthaḥ -- noktaṃ prayojanam iti cintyate kiṃ tu guṇabhūtārthaprayojakapadasya vyutpādyata ity asya prayojanam /
GSP28durdhpru:455: tadvyutpattiḥ kriyata iti ṇicaḥ kiṃ prayojanam iti praśne tasya prayojanaṃ cintyata iti yāvat /
GSP28durdhpru:457: nanu kasmād iyam āśaṅkā -- `vaktrā kimarthaṃ krityate,
GSP28durdhpru:459: tau khalv evam eva pravartteyātām ity āśaṅkyāha -- tathā hīti yasmāt /
GSP28durdhpru:460: atha katham ubhayor vyutpādanaṃ prayojanam ucyatge?
GSP28durdhpru:461: yady ato vyutpadyate tasya vyutpattiḥ prayojanam /
GSP28durdhpru:462: yas tu vyutpādayati tasya vyutpādanam iti /
GSP28durdhpru:464: prayojakavyāpāravatī hi vyutpattiḥ prayojanam iṣṭety ubhayor vyutpādanam eva prajyojanam /
GSP28durdhpru:466: kathaṃ nāma madvyāpāravaśena śrotṛsantānavarttinī vyutpattir bhūyād iti ācāryaḥ pravarttate /
GSP28durdhpru:467: ata eva svaprayojakavyāpārādhiṣṭḥitā śrotṛsantānavārttinī vyutpattḥ karttuḥ prayojanam /
GSP28durdhpru:471: ata evācāryavyāpārādhiṣṭḥitā vyatpattiḥ śrotur api prayojanam /
GSP28durdhpru:476: prekṣāvatā hi samyagjñānāv avyutpādanāya prakaraṇam idam ārabdhavatā ayam eva upāyo na anyaḥ iti darśita eva upāyopeyabhāvaḥ prakaraṇaprayojanayoḥ sambandha iti /
GSP28durdhpru:477: bhavati / tato vyutpādanaṃ prayojakavyāpāravaśavarttinī vyuptattir dvoyor api prayojanam
GSP28durdhpru:478: iti itiśabdaṃ hetupadaṃ kṛtopasaṃharann āha -- prakaraṇakaraṇaśravaṇayoḥ prayojanaṃ vyutpādanam iti /
GSP28durdhpru:479: nanu ca ṇici kṛte vyutpādanaṃ katham ubhayoḥ prayojanam,
GSP28durdhpru:482: samyagjñānavyutpattau kathañcin nimittamātrāt dadhibhojanāder ācāryasyāsādhāraṇakāraṇatāpratipattiḥ prayojanam /
GSP28durdhpru:483: ayam arthaḥ -- asti paryojakavyāpārapradarśane samyagjñānavyutpattāv upayogitvamātreṇa svāsthyādinā sāmyam ācāryasya darśitaṃ syāt /
GSP28durdhpru:485: sa kathāṃ nāma pratīyeteti ṇicā nirdeśaḥ kṛta iti /
GSP28durdhpru:486: atha bhojanādes tadvyutpattau sākṣād vyāpārā 'sambhavād ācāryavyāpāraḥ pratipatsyata iti cet /
GSP28durdhpru:488: evaṃ hi vyākhyātṝṇām idaṃ pratipādanakauśalaṃ syān na karttur iti nyāyyo ṇicā nirdeśaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:489: nanūktam -- abhidhānasya prayojanaṃ na nirūpyata iti /
GSP28durdhpru:490: tat kim idānīṃ tad eva vyājāntareṇa nirūpyate? satyam /
GSP28durdhpru:491: kevalaṃ vākyārthatvena na nirūpyata ity abhisandhinā` `tan na nirūpyate' ity uktam /
GSP28durdhpru:493: samyagjñānaṃ vyutpadyamānām ity asādhur ayaṃ śabdaḥ -- `vyutpattyarthasya pader akarmatvād' iti bhāgavṛttikāraḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:495: jñānārthasya padeḥ sakarmakasya `vyutpannaḥ saṅketaḥ' ityādau bahuśaḥ prayogadarśanāt /
GSP28durdhpru:498: tpannasaṃkentam asti tena sa cen mata[PV II 143]iti /
GSP28durdhpru:500: sambandhas tarhi kasya padasyārtha ity āha -- sambandheityādi /
GSP28durdhpru:504: kathaṃ sāmarthyād ity āha -- prekṣāvatā iti /
GSP28durdhpru:512: anarthāśaṅkopasthāpitānyayoganirāse tu karttavye sāmarthyagamyam avadhāraṇāntaraṃ kāryam /
GSP28durdhpru:514: nānya iti ca nānya evety avaseyam /
GSP28durdhpru:516: nanu ca prakaraṇaśravaṇāt prāg uktāny api abhidheyādīni pramāṇābhāvāt prekṣāvadbhir na grahyante /
GSP28durdhpru:518: satyam / aśruyate prakaraṇe kathitāny api na niścīyante /
GSP28durdhpru:519: ukteṣu tv apramānakeśv apy abhidheyādiśu saṃśaya utpadyate /
GSP28durdhpru:522: evaṃrūpasya sambandho vyutpādyata iti prayojanābhidhānād eva darśatam / tad uktam --
GSP28durdhpru:528: abhidheyādiprakāśanadvāreṇādivākyaṃ pravarttakam iti asahamāna āha -- nanu ca iti /
GSP28durdhpru:531: śravaṇānantaraṃ teṣāṃ prākśabdāśrayeṇa pravarttamānam anumānam anyad vā śabdasyārthanāntarīyatāyāṃ pravarttayitum arhati /
GSP28durdhpru:534: ācāryasya cāptabhāvo durbodho yenāptopadeśatayā śabdo 'rthatathātvaṃ pratyāyayed iti /
GSP28durdhpru:539: yadi satyam idaṃ kimarthaṃ tarhi [6b] te kathyanta iti? ukteṣu iti /
GSP28durdhpru:541: anenaitad āha -- sādhakabādhakapramāṇābhāve yena rte vyāhārāt pratiniyatādhikaraṇo yauktaḥ saṃayo bhavitum arhatīti /
GSP28durdhpru:544: anyathā kiṃ sapramāṇakeṣv api saṃśayo jāyate yenāpiśrutiḥ samgacchet /
GSP28durdhpru:546: pravṛttiś cen nāsti kiṃ saṃśayenotpāditenāpīty āha -- śaṃśayāc ca iti /
GSP28durdhpru:548: atha ye tāvan madāḥ śraddhayā vā ''cāryam upasannās te tadvacanād arthaṃ niścityaiva pravarttamānā na saṃśayāt pravarttante /
GSP28durdhpru:549: ye 'pi tadviparītāḥ saṃśerate teṣām api na śaṃśayāt pravṛttiḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:550: pravṛttau vā prekṣāvattvahānir ity āśaṅkyāha -- arthasaṃśayo 'pīti /
GSP28durdhpru:552: śakyaniścaye hi niścayam antareṇa pravarttamānāḥ prekṣāvattāyā hīyeran /
GSP28durdhpru:555: yadi ca yuktyā dvitīyākārānupraveśena saṃśayānasya na kvacit pravṛttiḥ,
GSP28durdhpru:556: tarhi na kasyacid vacanāt kvacit pravarttitavyam iti bhūyān vyavahāro vilupyeta /
GSP28durdhpru:564: anarthasaṃśayo 'pi nivṛttyaṅgam ata eva śāstrakāreṇa eva pūrvam sambandhādīni yujyante vaktum /
GSP28durdhpru:565: vyākhyātṝṇāṃ hi vacanaṃ krīḍādyartham anyathā api sambhāvyate /
GSP28durdhpru:566: śāstrakṛtāṃ tu prakaraṇaprārambhe na viparītābhidheyādyabhidhāne prayojanam utpaśyāmo na api pravṛttim /
GSP28durdhpru:568: anukteṣu tu pratipatṛbhir niṣprayojanam abhidheyaṃ sambhāvyeta asya prakaraṇasya kākadantaparīkṣāyā iva,
GSP28durdhpru:571: ato vā prakaraṇāt laghutara upāyaḥ prayojanasya,
GSP28durdhpru:575: yady avaśyaṃ vaktavyānyabhidheyādīni tarhi vyākhyātāra eva tāni vakṣyanti /
GSP28durdhpru:576: tat kiṃ śāstrakṛto vyāhāreṇetiy āha -- śāstrakāreṇaiva na vyākhyātṛbhiḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:578: abhidheyādyanabhidhāne tu pravṛtter evāsambhavāt kathaṃ sambhavino vyākhyātāro yenāśaṅkya teṣāṃ vyāhāram ayaṃ nirasyatīti /
GSP28durdhpru:580: na sarvathā 'bhidheyādiprakāśanaṃ kenacin na karttavyam eveti codyaṃ pravṛttam,
GSP28durdhpru:581: kin tv ādivākyaṃ tadarthaṃ na karttavyam ity abhisandhinā /
GSP28durdhpru:582: tatra ye tāvat sākṣād ācāryopasannās teṣāṃ tadvacanād eva tatpratītau pravṛttijñānayoḥ sambhavāt sambhavi vyākhyātṛtvam /
GSP28durdhpru:583: tebhyo 'pi tad upasannānām iti kim avadyam?
GSP28durdhpru:584: nanu ca na śāstrakṛdvacanam api prasahya pravarttayati,
GSP28durdhpru:586: tac ca vyākhyātṛvacane 'pi sambhavatīti kim ucyate śāstrakāreṇaivety ata āha -- vyākhyātṝṇāṃ hi iti /
GSP28durdhpru:588: śāstrakāreṣv apīdaṃ samānam ity āha -- śāstrakṛtām iti /
GSP28durdhpru:590: viparītaṃ ca tad abhidheyādyabhidhānaṃ ceti vigraḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:591: atha vā viparītaṃ ca tadasatyatvād abhidheyañ cābhidheyatayā prakāśanāt /
GSP28durdhpru:594: anenaitad āha -- teṣām api tathābhidhāne kim asmākaṃ bādhakaṃ pramāṇaṃ?
GSP28durdhpru:595: kevalam eṣāṃ mahīyasāśayena śāstraṃ praṇetum icchatāṃ parārthapravṛttānāṃ naitat sambhāvayāma iti /
GSP28durdhpru:597: etac ca prayojanādyabhidhānaniyatasannidher yathābhūtārthacintāvidhānaviṣayasya kālasya nirdeśo na tu prakaraṇasya [7a] madhe 'vasāne vā tat sambhavati saprayojanaṃ ceti /
GSP28durdhpru:599: etāsu ca anarthasambhāvanāsv ekasyām apy anarthasambhāvanāyāṃ na prekṣāvantaḥ pravartante /
GSP28durdhpru:600: atha yady evaṃvidhā pravṛttiḥ śāstrakṛtāṃ dṛśyate,
GSP28durdhpru:601: tvayāpy asya kiṃ na sambhāvyata ity āha -- nāpi iti /
GSP28durdhpru:603: tad evotpaśāma iti sambhadhyamānam iha paśyāma ity asyārthe sambaddha(-bandha)vyam /
GSP28durdhpru:605: anenaitad āha -- tathāpi sambhāvayāmo yadi teṣām īdṛśī paśyāmo na tv evam iti /
GSP28durdhpru:606: ato hetos teṣv abhidheyādiṣu yad vā teṣu śāstrakāreṣu vaktṛṣu satsu tadukteṣv abhidheyādiṣv iti prakaraṇāt saṃśayo 'rthonmukha iti draṣṭavyam
GSP28durdhpru:607: nanu saty apy arthasaṃśaye 'rthatvābhāve pravṛttir nāsti /
GSP28durdhpru:608: tannimittā tu sā saṃśayamātrād api bhavati /
GSP28durdhpru:609: tanmātrañ ca sādhakabādhakavirahād apy arthe siddham /
GSP28durdhpru:610: tat kiṃ tadutpādārthena vākyenety āha -- anukteṣu -- iti /
GSP28durdhpru:612: nirgataṃ prayojanaṃ yasmān niṣkāntaṃ vā prayojanāt /
GSP28durdhpru:614: te ca na kvacit puruṣārtha upayujyante /
GSP28durdhpru:619: tasyā ratnaṃ ratiṃ tanotīti viśiṣṭaṃ vastu /
GSP28durdhpru:623: sator vā saprayojanaśakyānuṣṭhānatvayor asya prayojanam anabhimatam evāstikānāṃ sambhāyeta /
GSP28durdhpru:624: mātur vivāhasya kramaḥ paripāṭir upadiśyate yena pārasīkaśāstreṇa tadvat /
GSP28durdhpru:625: pārasīkaśāstreṇa hi mṛte pitari mātā prathamam agrajena putreṇa pariṇetavyā,
GSP28durdhpru:627: ato vā prakaraṇāl laghur alpagranthaḥ prayojanasya samyagjñānavyutpattilakṣaṇasya /
GSP28durdhpru:630: sambhāvanā ca sarvā varṇitā 'narthonmukhā pratipattiḥ yuktyā dvitīyākārānupraveśāc ca saṃśayapadābhilāpyā pratyetavyā,
GSP28durdhpru:632: tathāvidhā 'narthasambhāvanāyāś ca bījam idam asatyādivākye -- yady asya prayojanādikaṃ bhaved bahubhir anyair ivānenāpy ādāv uktaṃ bhavet /
GSP28durdhpru:634: kāmam amūr anarthasambhāvanā bhavantu kā no hānir ity āha -- etāsv iti /
GSP28durdhpru:636: prayojanādyanabhidhāna iva yady abhidhāne 'pi bhavanti tās tadā kim abhidheyādibhir abhihitair apīty āha -- abhidheyādiṣu iti /
GSP28durdhpru:639: atha katham anayor arthānarthasambhāvanayor virodho yataḥ sambhāvanā saṃśaya ucyate /
GSP28durdhpru:642: abhidheyādiṣu tu ukteṣv arthasambhāvanā anarthasambhāvanāviruddhā utpadyate /
GSP28durdhpru:643: tayā prekṣāvantaḥ pravartante iti prekṣāvatām pravṛttyaṅgam arthasambhāvanā kartuṃ sambandhādīny abhidhīyanta iti sthitam /
GSP28durdhpru:644: śāvalambana ity anyonyasyām anyākāro 'stīti kutaḥ sahānavasthānam /
GSP28durdhpru:650: yuktes tv anathākārānupraveśa ity ubhayor apy anyonyavaiparītyenānubhavād katham avirodhaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:656: turīyāṃ tu paramavivekaśālina ācāryasya prakaraṇārambhasāmarthyān nirasyate /
GSP28durdhpru:657: tathā hi na samāne 'py upāyāntare sambhavati mahato mahān ayaṃ prekṣāpūrvakārī prakaraṇam īdṛśam ārabhate,
GSP28durdhpru:659: atha syāt -- samasamayasambhavī deśāntaravartī ca kaścad etadagrato laghūpayāntarakākaḥ(-taragranthaḥ?) syāt /
GSP28durdhpru:662: prekṣāpūrvakāritvād eva tathābhūtāt tenāsmin nāryāvarte 'nyatra vā loke nedānīntanenaitadarthaṃ prakaraṇaṃ praṇītam iti bahudhā 'nusarttavyam
GSP28durdhpru:663: anusṛtya dṛṣṭvā tal laghur upāya iti ca niścityedaṃ praṇetum ucitaṃ nānyatheti /
GSP28durdhpru:664: sarvatraiva prakaraṇe saty ādivākye laghūpāyāntaranirāse gatir iyam eva /
GSP28durdhpru:665: na hi anyatrāpy abhidheyatatprayojanādiprakāśanam antareṇa laghūpāyāntaranirāsābhidhānam astīti kiṃ nānumanyate?
GSP28durdhpru:666: yady evam itarāsām apy anarthasambhāvanānām evam evāstu nirāsas tat kim ādivākyena? naitat /
GSP28durdhpru:667: na hi sūcīpraveśa ity eva mūṣa(mūsa)
GSP28durdhpru:669: tathā hi -- asaty ādivākye prekṣāpūrvakāriprayuktatvam eva prakaraṇasya na śakyate kalpayitum,
GSP28durdhpru:671: dṛśyante hi prekṣāpūrvakāriṇaḥ prakaraṇādau sarvatra prayojanādyabhidhāyakam ādivākyaṃ
GSP28durdhpru:674: tasmān nāyaṃ prakaraṇakāraḥ prekṣāpūrvakārīti saṅkalpād u(-n no)
GSP28durdhpru:677: sā cen nāsti kiṃ tayotpannayāpīty āha tayā -- iti /
GSP28durdhpru:678: yady arthasambhāvanā prakaraṇe puruṣasya pravarttayitrī tarhi kim abhidheyādy abhidhīyata ity āha -- iti -- iti /
GSP28durdhpru:679: yasmād arthasambhāvanayā pravarttante itis tasmād arthasambhāvanāṃ karttum /
GSP28durdhpru:681: aṅgādiśabdānām asati bahuvrīhau paraliṅgāgrahaṇāt svaliṅgena nirdeśaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:685: loke ca pūrvam upadarśitam arthaṃ prāpayan saṃvādaka ucyate. tadvaj jñānam api [svayaṃ][18]pradarśitam
GSP28durdhpru:686: arthaṃ prāpayat saṃvādakam ucyate. pradarśite cārthe pravartakatvam eva prāpakatvam,
GSP28durdhpru:690: evam anena prabandhena samyagjñānetyādivākyasya samudāyārtha vyākhyāyāvayavārtham idānīṃ avisamvādakam ityādinā vyācaṣte /
GSP28durdhpru:697: agṛhītaprāpaṇād vā samyagjñānatve jalajñānam apy upadarśitamarīcikāḥ prāpayatīti na kiñcit samyajānaṃ na syād iti /
GSP28durdhpru:698: siddhāntavādy apy amīṣāṃ pakṣāṇām anabhyupagamena nirāsaṃ manyamānaḥ -- avisaṃvādakatvaṃ samyaktvaṃ vivakṣitam iti [8a] darśayati /
GSP28durdhpru:701: tatpratiṣedhasya vidhirūpatvāt samvādaka evāvatiṣṭḥata iti saṃvādakārtho 'visaṃvādakaśabdaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:702: tad ayam arthaḥ -- avisaṃvādakaṃ pravṛttiviṣayavastuprāpakṃ smyagjñānam iti /
GSP28durdhpru:707: tat kutas tatra saṃvādakaśabda ity āha -- loke ca /
GSP28durdhpru:710: ayam āśayo yathā loke satyādiśabdapravṛttinimittasyopadarśitārthaprāpaṇasya puruṣe sambhavāt saṃvādakaśabdaḥ pravarttate,
GSP28durdhpru:712: athocyate nopadarśitārthaprāpaṇanimittakaḥ puruṣe saṃvāda[ka]śabdaḥ kin tu pratijñātārthaprāpaṇamittakaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:717: kvacid adhyavasāyenā[19] ............pi kvacid vastupratibhāsapūrvakeṇa kvacid anyathā vṛtteneti viśeṣaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:721: [19] pāṭḥo 'tra paścād vardhito dṛśyate kin tu sūkṣmatvāt na paṭḥyate /
GSP28durdhpru:722: prāpayan iti[20]lakṣaṇahetvor iti hetau śaturvidhānāt prāpaṇād ity arthaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:728: api tv arthe puruṣaṃ pravartayat prāpayaty artham. pravartakatvam api pravṛttiviṣayapradarśakatvam eva. na hi puruṣaṃ haṭhāt pravartayituṃ śaknoti
GSP28durdhpru:729: nanūpadarśitārthaprāpakaṃ saṃvādakam iti bruvatā jñānasyaikasyopadarśakatvaprāpakatve pratijñāte /
GSP28durdhpru:730: pravṛttim antareṇa prāpter anupapatter arthataḥ pravarttakatvam api /
GSP28durdhpru:733: anyat pravarrttayati yad anantaraṃ pravṛttim ācarati,
GSP28durdhpru:734: anyac ca prāpayati yataḥ prāptyābhisambadhyate puruṣa ity āśaṅkyāha -- pradarśite ca -- iti /
GSP28durdhpru:736: pravarttakatvam eva prāpakatvaṃ bruvato 'yam abhiprāyaḥ -- yady apy arthaṃ sākṣātkṛtyānurūpaṃ niścayaṃ janayat pradarśakaṃ kiñcit,
GSP28durdhpru:737: aparaṃ pradarśayad vā bāhyāyāḥ pravṛtteḥ kāraṇāṃ bhavat pravarttakam,
GSP28durdhpru:738: itarat pravarttanadvāreṇa bāhyāyāḥ prāpter nimittaṃ bhavat prāpakaṃ vyapadiśyate,
GSP28durdhpru:739: tathāpi sa eva bāhyapravṛttikāraṇabhāvaḥ pravarttayitṛtvādiprayojakavyāpārarūpo jñānasya
GSP28durdhpru:740: puruṣapreraṇenārthajananena ca pravarttanaprāpaṇayor asambhavena pradarśanād anyo
GSP28durdhpru:741: nopayujyata iti vastutaḥ sarvasyaiva jñānasya niścayānugatasyādhigamān nāparau pravarrtanaprāpaṇavyāpārau /
GSP28durdhpru:742: ata eva tatrādyam eva jñānaṃ pramāṇaṃ vyavasthāpyate /
GSP28durdhpru:745: ata evaite pradarśakapravarttakaprāpakaśabdāḥ kṛtakatvānityatvādivan na paryāyā iti /
GSP28durdhpru:746: syān matam -- kiṃ punaḥ prayojanaṃ yena pravarttanāt nā'paraḥ prāpaṇavyāpāro jñānasya,
GSP28durdhpru:747: adhigamāc ca nānyat pravarttana prayatnena sādhyate?
GSP28durdhpru:749: tadā gṛhītagrāhitaiva tan niṣetsya[8b]tīti kiṃ tadarthena prayāseneti? atrocyate /
GSP28durdhpru:750: yadi pravarttayitṛtvaṃ prāpayitṛtvaṃ ca pradarśakatvāt paramārthato 'nyat syāt,
GSP28durdhpru:751: tadā gṛhītagrāhitaiva na śakyate pratipādayitum iti kena prāmāṇyaṃ niṣedhyeta?
GSP28durdhpru:752: tathā hi -- na taj jñānaṃ gṛhītaṃ gṛhṇāti,
GSP28durdhpru:755: tathākāriṇoś ca bhinnopayogatvāt prāmāṇyaṃ katham apākriyate?
GSP28durdhpru:756: yadā tu pravarttanān nāparaḥ prāpaṇavyāpāro jñānasya pradarśanāc ca nānyat pravarttanam,
GSP28durdhpru:757: prathamenaiva ca pratyakṣānumānakṣaṇenārthakriyāsamartho vastusantānaḥ pravṛttiviṣayīkarttuṃ niśacayāt śakyate,
GSP28durdhpru:758: tadottareṣāṃ tatsantānabhāvinām abhinnayogakṣematayā prāmāṇyam apāsyata iti /
GSP28durdhpru:759: etena tad api pratyuktaṃ yat kenacid abhyadhāyi dharmottare -- “yady upadarśakatvam
GSP28durdhpru:760: eva prāpakatvaṃ tarhi yad uktaṃ upadarśitam arthaṃ prāpayat saṃvādakam iti tasyāyam
GSP28durdhpru:763: tathā hi yadi paramārthato 'rthābheda ucyate tadā na kiñcid avadyam /
GSP28durdhpru:766: kṛtakatvam anityatvaṃ pratipādayatīty api na vaktavyam,
GSP28durdhpru:768: atha śabdapravṛttyapekṣayā 'rthābheda ucyate tadā 'sāv asiddho vyāvṛttibhedasya darśitatvāt /
GSP28durdhpru:769: tenāyam arthaḥ -- upadarśitaṃ sākṣātkṛtya janitānurūpaniścayam arthaṃ pravarttanadvāreṇa bāhyāyāḥ prāpteḥ sākṣād yojyatayā vā nimittatāṃ gacchat saṃvādakam iti /
GSP28durdhpru:770: vāstavas tu pravarttakaprāpakayoḥ prameyādhigatilakṣaṇāt pradarśanavyāpārād anyo vyāpāro nāstīti na pravarttayitṛtvaṃ pāpayitṛtvaṃ ca prayojakavyāpāro 'nayor bhinnaḥ” iti /
GSP28durdhpru:772: ata eva ca arthādhigatir eva pramānaphalam. adhigate cārthe pravartitaḥ puruṣaḥ prāpitaś
GSP28durdhpru:773: cārthaḥ. tathā ca sati arthādhigamāt samāptaḥ pramāṇavyāpāraḥ. ata eva cānadhigataviṣayaṃ
GSP28durdhpru:774: pramāṇam. yena eva hi jñānena prathamam adhigato 'rthaḥ,
GSP28durdhpru:775: tena eva pravartitaḥ puruṣaḥ prāpitaś ca arthaḥ. tatra eva ca atha kim anyena jñānena adhikaṃ kāryam?
GSP28durdhpru:777: syān matam -- yady adhigatir evottareśām api phalaṃ syāt tadopayogāntarābhāvād bhaved aprāmāṇyaṃ yāvatā pravarttakasya pravṛttiḥ phalam,
GSP28durdhpru:778: prāpakasya prāptir iti phalabhedaniṣpatter bhinno vyāpāra ity āha -- ata eva -- iti /
GSP28durdhpru:780: yataś ca na prasahya preraṇena pravarttanam,
GSP28durdhpru:781: ata evāsmād eva kāraṇād arthasyādhigatiḥ paricchittiḥ phalam,
GSP28durdhpru:785: na cādhigatāv api pravṛttiprāptyor abhāve sa parisamāpyata ity āha -- adhigate ca -- iti /
GSP28durdhpru:787: yasmād yenārthaḥ samyagjñānena darśitas tatra tenāpravarttito 'pi puruṣaḥ pravṛttiyogyopadarśanāt,
GSP28durdhpru:788: tadgatasya ca vyāpārāntarasyābhāvāt pravarttita ity ucyate /
GSP28durdhpru:790: jñānena tāvat pravṛttiyogyaḥ kṛta iti yāvat /
GSP28durdhpru:791: astu puruṣas tathā pravarttito 'rthas tu na prāpitaḥ,
GSP28durdhpru:792: tathā ca vyāpārāntaram anyāśrīnam astīty āha -- prāpita iti /
GSP28durdhpru:794: artho 'py asāv aprāpto 'pi śakyaprāptiko darśita iti prāpita ucyate /
GSP28durdhpru:795: ata eva prāpaṇaśaktir eva jñāṇasya prāmāṇyam /
GSP28durdhpru:797: yato [9a] yena pravarttate tad api prāpaṇayojyam eva /
GSP28durdhpru:798: śaktiniścayas tv arthakriyānirbhāsasya sarvasyānumānasya ca svata eva /
GSP28durdhpru:799: pravarttakādhyakṣasya ca kasyacit svata eva yad abhyāsena parito nirastavibhramāśaṅkam,
GSP28durdhpru:800: yan nidrādyanupaplutaṃ sad āsannadeśam anāśaṅkya vyañjakādhīnā 'nyathābhivyakti ca vastu gṛhṇāti /
GSP28durdhpru:802: kasyacit tu parato 'rthakriyānirbhāsātmakāt svataḥ pramāṇād anyato vā yataḥ kutaścin nāntarīyakārthadarśanān madhyakālavarttibhrāntiśaṅkāpanodena niścīyata iti /
GSP28durdhpru:804: sa tu yuktarūpaḥ pravṛttiyogyīkaraṇāt pravarttitaḥ prāpyārthopadarśanāt prāpito 'rtham ity ekavākyatayopadarśanāt /
GSP28durdhpru:805: evam uttaratrā'py eṣa eva pāṭho 'vadāta iti /
GSP28durdhpru:806: tathā ca sati tasmiṃś ca prakāre sati /
GSP28durdhpru:808: tasamād adhigamasya phalatvaṃ yuktam iti bhāvaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:811: ato 'smāt kāraṇād anadhigato jñānāntareṇāparicchinno viṣayo 'rtho yasya tat pramāṇaṃ bhavati /
GSP28durdhpru:812: nanu adhigataviṣayam udīcīnaṃ jñānaṃ tatrārthe kiñcid adhikam ādadhānaṃ pramāṇaṃ
GSP28durdhpru:813: bhaviṣyati. na hi viṣayabhedād eva pramāṇabhedo 'pi tūpayogabhedād apīty āha -- yenaivaiti.
GSP28durdhpru:814: hir yasmāt. pūrvād yogyatayā pravarttitaḥ prāpita iti coktaṃ tatraiva pūrvajñānād
GSP28durdhpru:815: adhigate kim adhikam atiriktaṃ kāryaṃ karttavyam?
GSP28durdhpru:818: sa pratyakṣeṇa pravṛttiviṣayīkṛtaḥ. yasmāt yasminn arthe pratyakṣasya sākṣātkāritvavyāpāro vikalpena anugamyate,
GSP28durdhpru:820: tasmāt dṛṣṭatayā jñātaḥ pratyakṣadarśitaḥ. anumānaṃ tu liṅgadarśanān niścinvat pravṛttiviṣayaṃ darśayati.
GSP28durdhpru:821: na kiñcit / ādyenaiva karttavyasya kṛtatvād iti bhāvaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:822: ato 'smād hetor adhigataviṣayaṃ[21] tadadhigantṛsajātīyaṃ vijātīyaṃ vā na pramāṇam /
GSP28durdhpru:823: tena pramāṇasamplavo nāma nāsty eveti prakāśitam /
GSP28durdhpru:826: nanu ca prabandhenānena pravṛttiviṣayopadarśakaṃ samyagjñānam iti darśītam /
GSP28durdhpru:828: tatra yadi samānam anayoḥ pravṛttiviṣayopadarśanaṃ tad idaṃ pratyakṣaṃ satpramāṇaṃ,
GSP28durdhpru:829: idam anumānaṃ sad iti bhedo na syāt /
GSP28durdhpru:830: atas tad anayor asamānaviṣayatvam eva kathitavyam /
GSP28durdhpru:831: evaṃ ca kasya kathaṃ tad iti vaktavyam ity āha -- tatra iti /
GSP28durdhpru:832: tayoḥ pratyakṣānumānayor madhye dṛṣṭatvena jñāto niścitaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:833: yadi jñāta ity eva kriyate tadā 'numeyo 'pi niścitaḥ san pratyakṣeṇa pravṛttiviṣayīkṛtaḥ prasajyeteti dṛṣṭatveneti kṛtaṃ /
GSP28durdhpru:834: atha yo dṛṣṭa iti kiṃ nocyate? nocyate /
GSP28durdhpru:835: kṣaṇiktatvāder api dṛṣṭatvena pratyakṣaviṣayatvād anumānāvatārābhāvaprasaṅgād iti /
GSP28durdhpru:836: nanu na pratyakṣasya niścayanād prahaṇam api tu pratibhāsāt /
GSP28durdhpru:837: tat kim ucyate jñāto niścita ity āśaṅkyāha -- yasmād iti /
GSP28durdhpru:842: evaṃ bruvataś cāyam abhiprāyḥ -- sāṃvyavahārikasya pramāṇasyedaṃ lakṣa[9b]ṇam ucyate /
GSP28durdhpru:843: tato vastuvṛttyā prakāśamānam apy anurūpavikalpenāviṣayīkṛtaṃ sad apratibhāsamānaṃ nātiśete,
GSP28durdhpru:845: evaṃ tad grāhakam api tathāvidhavikalpenānanugamyamānavyāpāraṃ vyavahārayitum aparyāptaṃ sat tṛṇasyāpi kubjīkaraṇe 'samartham agrāhakaṃ nātivarttate
GSP28durdhpru:846: tena yad uktaṃ pradaṛśakatvam ekatvam eva pravarttakatvādīti,
GSP28durdhpru:847: yac coktam -- adhigatir eva phalam iti tad anurūpaniścayānugatavyāpāram anurūpaniścayānugatāv iti draṣṭavyam /
GSP28durdhpru:848: evaṃ yatra yatrocyate pratyakṣaṃ vastūpadarśakaṃ vastugrāhakam ityādinā śabdena tatra sarvatrānurūpaniścayānugatavyāpāram eva boddhavyam /
GSP28durdhpru:849: athaivaṃ sati vikalpasyāpi prāmāṇyaṃ prasajyeteti cet /
GSP28durdhpru:850: etat svayam eva dharmottareṇāśaṅkya nirākariṣyata iti nehocyate /
GSP28durdhpru:851: yadi pratyakṣam evaṃ pravṛttiviṣayam upadarśayati anumānam apy evaṃ tadā
GSP28durdhpru:853: tathā ca pratyakṣaṃ pratibhāsamānaṃ[22] niyatam arthaṃ darśayati. anumānaṃ ca liṅgasambaddhaṃ niyatam arthaṃ darśayati. ata eva niyatasya arthasya pradarśake. tena te pramāṇe,
GSP28durdhpru:858: prāptuṃ śakyam artham ādarśayat prāpakam. prāpakatvāc ca pramāṇam.
GSP28durdhpru:862: pratyakṣaṃ na svayaṃ niścinvat pravṛttiviṣayaṃ darśayati kin tu niścāyayat /
GSP28durdhpru:863: anumānaṃ tu svayam eva niścinvad iti /
GSP28durdhpru:864: katham aprtibhāsamānaṃ niścetum īṣṭe tad ity āha -- liṅgadarśanād iti /
GSP28durdhpru:866: darśanaṃ ca svarūpagrahaṇapūrvakaṃ `sarvatredaṃ sādhyāvinābhūtam iti' jñānam,
GSP28durdhpru:867: `sarvatra sādhyāvinābhūtam iti' smaraṇapuraḥsaraṃ vā kvacit svarūpagrahaṇam iha vivakṣitam /
GSP28durdhpru:868: nanu ca pratyakṣānumānajñānavad anyasyāpi jñānasya yathā pravṛttiviṣayapradarśanaṃ tathā kiṃ na pradarśyate?
GSP28durdhpru:872: tarhi pratyakṣānumānyor api tathātvena prāmāṇyaṃ na syād ity āgūrya jñānāntarād[:
GSP28durdhpru:873: -antarada] bhedam anyayor darśayann āha -- tathā ca -- iti /
GSP28durdhpru:875: pravṛttiviṣayapradarśanaprakāre[23] ..................m anyadā liṅgadarśanāt svayaṃ niścayena pravṛttiviṣayapradarśanaprakāre /
GSP28durdhpru:876: pratyakṣaṃ jñānaṃ pratibhāsamānaṃ svarūpeṇa prakāśamānaṃ niyatam arthakriyākṣame bhāvarūpa eva vyavasthitaṃ darśayati /
GSP28durdhpru:877: tena nānarthaṃ nāpy aniyataṃ darśayatīty ākūtam /
GSP28durdhpru:879: caḥ pratyakṣeṇa samam anumānaṃ niyatapradarśakatvena samuccinoti /
GSP28durdhpru:881: tad ayam arthaḥ -- yasmāl liṅgaṃ vijātīyavyāvṛtte 'rthe 'rthakriyākāriṇi tādātmyena
GSP28durdhpru:882: tadutpattyā vā sambanddham āyattaṃ tasmāt tatprabhavam apy anumānaṃ niyataṃ darśayati adhyavasyatīti /
GSP28durdhpru:883: tenānumānam api nānarthaṃ nyāpy aniyataṃ bhāvātmany abhāvātmani vā darśayatīti prakāśitam /
GSP28durdhpru:884: iyāṃs tu viśeṣo 'numānaṃ sambandhagrahaṇakāladṛṣṭasādhāraṇaṃ rūpam āśrityodayamānaṃ
GSP28durdhpru:885: svalakṣaṇam adhyavasyad api na santānāntarāsādhāraṇam adhyavastyatīti pravṛttiviṣāpekṣam
GSP28durdhpru:887: pratykṣaṃ tu pravṛttiviṣayāpekṣam apy asādhāraṇāviṣayam eva /
GSP28durdhpru:893: aumānaṃ tu parokṣārthasyāsākṣātkaraṇāt kathaṃ niyataṃ darśayati?
GSP28durdhpru:896: taṃ sāmastyaniṣedhavādinaṃ pratyupasaṃharann āha -- ata iti /
GSP28durdhpru:898: parokṣasyāntarā sākṣād anavabhāse 'pi tatsambaddhatayā cānumānaṃ kāryasvabhāvajam ekāntaniyataṃ bhāvam,
GSP28durdhpru:900: ato 'smād hetor ete dve api tathārūpe /
GSP28durdhpru:903: niyatam arthaṃ pradarśayato 'ta ete niyatārthopadarśake ity arthaḥ syāt /
GSP28durdhpru:904: etc ca parisphuṭasyaiva sphuṭīkaraṇam anarthakam āpadyeteti
GSP28durdhpru:906: ābhyāṃ pramāṇābhyām anyena ca darśito 'rthaḥ kaścid atyantaviparyastaḥ,
GSP28durdhpru:907: yathā marīcikāsu jalam. sa ca asattvāt pāptum aśakyaḥ. kaścid aniyato bhāvābhāvayoḥ,
GSP28durdhpru:908: yathā saṃśayārthaḥ. na ca bhāvābhāvābhyāṃ yukto 'rtho jagaty asti. tataḥ prāptum aśakyas tādṛśaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:909: sarveṇa ca aliṅgena vikalpena niyāmakam adṛṣṭvā pravṛttena bhāvābhāvayor aniyata
GSP28durdhpru:911: pramāṇe tu katham ity āha -- tena -- iti /
GSP28durdhpru:914: saty api tasmin kathaṃ tat syād iti bhāvaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:915: anayoḥ prvṛttiviṣayapradarśanaprakāropadarśane tadanyasya jñāṇasya ca tadapradarśane yad buddhistham āsīt,
GSP28durdhpru:917: nānyad vijñānaṃ pramāṇam iti vacanavipariṇāmena sambandhaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:918: yady evaṃ jñānatvāviśeṣād amū api pramāṇe mā bhūtām ity āha -- prāptum iti /
GSP28durdhpru:919: ādarśayad iti hetau śatur vidhānād dhetupadam etat /
GSP28durdhpru:920: tenāyam arthaḥ -- yataḥ prāptuṃ śakyam artham ādarśayati tena prayakṣādikaṃ prāpakam iti /
GSP28durdhpru:922: pramāṇaṃ tu kasmād ity āha -- prāpakatvād ca -- iti /
GSP28durdhpru:924: nanu ābhyāmanye nāpi darśito 'rthaḥ śakyaprāpaṇa eva tatas tadupadarśakam api kiṃ na prāpakaṃ prāpakatvāc ca kiṃ na pramāṇam ity āha -- pramāṇābhyām iti /
GSP28durdhpru:927: tathāvidho 'pi kiṃ na prāpyeta ity āha -- sa ca iti /
GSP28durdhpru:931: tadupadarśakaṃ ca pramāṇaṃ bhaviṣyatīty ata āha -- kaścid iti /
GSP28durdhpru:933: `sthāṇur vā puruṣo vā' iti hi pratyayaḥ sthāṇum ullikhya puruṣo vety ālambayaṃs tadabhāvam ullikhati /
GSP28durdhpru:935: bhāvāvyabhivāriṇaṃ ca sthāṇum avasyann abhāve nāpy abhāva(ve)
GSP28durdhpru:936: niyataṃ sthāṇuṃ puruṣaṃ vā darśayatīti bhāvābhāvayor aniyataṃ darśayati /
GSP28durdhpru:937: yata evāyam ekāntaniyataṃ darśayitum anīśāno dolāyate,
GSP28durdhpru:938: tata eva saṃśaya ity upapadyata iti /
GSP28durdhpru:940: ayaṃ tu kasmān na prāpyata ity āha -- na ca iti /
GSP28durdhpru:942: nanu bhavatu saṃśayaviparyayayor aprāmāṇyaṃ [10b] kiṃ naś cchinnam?
GSP28durdhpru:943: etad atiriktaṃ pratyakṣānumānābhyām anyat pramāṇaṃ bhaviṣyatīty āśaṅkyāha -- sarveṇa ca -- ityādi /
GSP28durdhpru:947: eva artho darśayitavyaḥ. sa ca prāptum aśakyaḥ. tasmād aśakyaprāpaṇam atyantaviparītaṃ bhāvābhāvāniyataṃ ca arthaṃ darśayad apramāṇam anyaj
GSP28durdhpru:948: arthakriyārthibhiś ca arthakriyāsamarthavastuprāptinimittaṃ jñānam mṛgyate. yac ca tair mṛgyate,
GSP28durdhpru:949: tad eva śastre vicāryate. tato 'rthakriyāsamarthavastupradarśakaṃ samyagjñānam.
GSP28durdhpru:950: anumānasyāpi tathātvaṃ syād ity āha -- aliṅgena -- iti /
GSP28durdhpru:951: nāsya liṅgam utpādakatvena vidyata ity aliṅgam /
GSP28durdhpru:952: yady aliṅgena sarveṇa tat karaṇīyaṃ tadā pratyakṣapṛṣṭḥabhāvino 'pi vikalpasya tadā ''yātam ity āha -- niyāmakaṃ iti /
GSP28durdhpru:953: viṣayādhīno hi niyatārthaparigraho jñānasyety artho niyāmakaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:955: nanu kiṃ pratyakṣapṛṣṭḥabhāvy api niyāmakam arthaṃ dṛṣṭvā pravarttate,
GSP28durdhpru:956: yena tādrūpyavirahād anyeṣāṃ vikalpānāṃ tathātvam āśaṅkyate /
GSP28durdhpru:960: tathā ca sati pratyakṣapṛṣṭhabhāvī vikalpo niyāmakaṃ dṛṣṭvaiva pratyakṣeṇa pratyayena pravarttyata iti tathātvena parihṛto bhavati /
GSP28durdhpru:961: itare tv aliṅgavikalpā yena pravarttyante jāyante na tena sākṣān niyāmako dṛṣṭa iti teṣāṃ tathātvānuṣaṅgaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:962: anye tu anumānanivṛttyartham aliṅgeti yojayitvā kathaṃ punar avasāyātmakenāpy aliṅgena
GSP28durdhpru:963: tenaivaṃ karaṇīyam ity āśaṅkya niyāmakam adṛṣṭvety asya tu hetubhāvena viśeṣaṇatvān
GSP28durdhpru:966: yady api śabdādijanmāno vikalpā nobhayapakṣasaṃsparśena dolāyante,
GSP28durdhpru:967: tathāpi te niyāmakānāśrayeṇa pravarttamānā na yaukti(-kta)
GSP28durdhpru:970: sarvasya tasya samudācarator viruddhayor ākārayor abhāve 'pi yuktyā dvitīyākārānupraveśāt saṃśayarūpatvena bhāvābhāvāniyatārthopadarśakatvam iti /
GSP28durdhpru:971: eke tu niyāmakaṃ vikalpayitavyaṃ vastunāntarīyakaṃ vastv adṛṣṭvā pravṛtteneti yojayanti /
GSP28durdhpru:977: aniyatārthapradarśakam api tatprāpakaṃ syād ity āha -- sa ca iti /
GSP28durdhpru:979: aśakya ity asyānantaraṃ sa avadhāraṇārtho draṣṭavyaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:980: so 'niyato 'rtho na prāptuṃ śakyo 'śakyatvād iti bhāvaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:981: nanu ca tādṛśaṃ sarvaṃ mā bhūt prāpakam,
GSP28durdhpru:982: pramāṇaṃ tu kasmān na bhavatīty āśaṅkya pūrvoktam evopasaṃharati tasmād iti /
GSP28durdhpru:988: kaścid aniyata ityāder yathākrāmam upasaṃhāraḥ -- anyaj jñānam iti nānyaj jñānam ity asya /
GSP28durdhpru:991: tad eva prāpaṇīyam. arthādhigamātmakaṃ hi prāpakam ity uktam.
GSP28durdhpru:992: syād etat -- śakyaprāptikārthopadarśakam eva samyagjñānaṃ [11a] nānyad iti nirnimittam idam /
GSP28durdhpru:993: tathā cānyad api kiṃ na parīkṣyata ityāha -- arthakriyārthabhiḥ -- iti /
GSP28durdhpru:998: etair arthakriyāyāṃ śaktasya vastunaḥ prāpter yan nimittaṃ tan mṛgyate 'nviṣyate /
GSP28durdhpru:999: arthakriyārthitvād eva ca tad anveṣaṇam eṣām avaseyam /
GSP28durdhpru:1000: taiś ca prekṣāvadbhir iti prakaraṇād draṣṭavyam /
GSP28durdhpru:1001: itarathārthakriyārthibhir apy prekṣāvadbhir mithyājñānam api nibhālyata iti tatparīkṣā 'py āpatet /
GSP28durdhpru:1002: yadi nāma tais tan mṛgyaṃ tathāpi tad itarad api jñānaṃ kiṃ na parīkṣyata ity āha yac ca -- iti /
GSP28durdhpru:1005: īdṛśaṃ tat samyagjñānaṃ pravarttakaṃ yad anusaranti bhavanta iti vibhajya pratipādyate /
GSP28durdhpru:1006: ayam asyāśayaḥ -- na vyasanitayā ''cāryeṇā jñānaṃ vicāryate /
GSP28durdhpru:1008: te tathābhūtam eva jñānaṃ mṛgayante nānyad iti tad eva vicāryata iti /
GSP28durdhpru:1009: tad eveti ca mukhyavṛttyabhiprāyeṇoktam na tu mithyājñānaṃ śāstre 'smin na vicāryate eva /
GSP28durdhpru:1010: prasaṅgāt tu tasyāpi kalpanāprabhṛtau vicārasambhavād iti /
GSP28durdhpru:1011: nanu śakyaprāpaṇārthopadarśakam eva samyagjñānārthopadarśakam eva samyagjñānaṃ kuto vyavasthāpyate praśne kim idam aprakṛtam ucyata ityāha -- tata iti /
GSP28durdhpru:1015: tato 'rthakriyāsamarthasya vastunaḥ vastunaḥ pradarśakaṃ samyagjñānaṃ nānyad iti arthāt /
GSP28durdhpru:1017: tat punar anyad upadarśya anyat prāpayad api kiṃ na samyagjñānaṃ tat pramāṇaṃ vyavahriyate?
GSP28durdhpru:1023: khādijñānam apy aṃśe saṃvādāt pramāṇam iti yat kaiścid iṣṭiṃ tad api samyagjñānavyavacchedyam iti darśayati /
GSP28durdhpru:1029: na ca tena śuklaśaṅkhavastu marīcivastu vā jñātam /
GSP28durdhpru:1030: yathā tu jñānāntarād eva tathāvidhārthaprāptir na tatas tathā anenaiva prāmāṇyaparīkṣāyāṃ nirloṭhitam iti nehocyate /
GSP28durdhpru:1034: bhinnakālaṃ ca. viruddhadharmasaṃsargād dhi adyad vastu. deśakālākārabhedaś ca viruddhadharmasaṃsargaḥ.
GSP28durdhpru:1035: tasmāt anyākāravad vastu grāhi na ākārāntaravati vastuni pramāṇam,
GSP28durdhpru:1036: yathā pītaśaṅkhagrāhi śukle śaṅkhe. deśāntarasthagrāhi ca na deśāntarasthe pramāṇam,
GSP28durdhpru:1037: yathā kuñcikāvivaradeśasthāyāṃ maṇiprabhāyāṃ maṇigrāhi jñānaṃ na apavarakasthe maṇau. kālāntarayuktagrāhi ca na kālāntaravati vastuni pramāṇam,
GSP28durdhpru:1038: yathā ardharātre madhyāhnakālavastugrāhi svapnajñānaṃ na ardharātrakāle vastuni pramāṇam.
GSP28durdhpru:1039: tad eva tena prāpaṇīyam iti kuta evad ity āha -- arthādhigameti /
GSP28durdhpru:1041: uktam iti pradarśanādīnāṃ vastuto 'bhedaṃ pratipādya ato evārthādhigatir eva pramāṇphalam iti anena prakāśitatvāt,
GSP28durdhpru:1046: kathaṃ punar adhigatir eva phalam ity anena tathātvam asyoktam?
GSP28durdhpru:1049: atha vā prāptuṃ śakyam artham ādarśayat prāpakam ity anenaivam uktam /
GSP28durdhpru:1050: tathā hi tādṛśam artham ādarśayad iti paricchindad ity arthaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:1051: paricchedaś ca prāpakatvān na bhidyata iti /
GSP28durdhpru:1053: yat tu tad eva prāpya vastu śaṅkhādikaṃ pītarūpatayā pradarśayati tatkatham asamyagjñānam ity āha -- tatra iti /
GSP28durdhpru:1055: pradarśatād rūpād bhinnākārādi sad vastv anyad ity anyatvaṃ vidheyam /
GSP28durdhpru:1057: tad evedam ity adhyavasāyād ity āha -- viruddheti /
GSP28durdhpru:1063: bhavatv evaṃ tathāpy ākārādibhinnagrāhijñānam ākārānntarādiyogini vastuni kiṃ na pramāṇam ity āha -- tasmād iti /
GSP28durdhpru:1064: yasmāt samyagjñānena yad eva hi darśitaṃ tad eva prāpaṇīyam,
GSP28durdhpru:1066: kim iva kva na pramāṇam ity āha -- yatheti /
GSP28durdhpru:1068: kiṃvan na pramāṇam ity āha -- yatheti /
GSP28durdhpru:1072: bhinnakālagrāhiṇaḥ kā vyavasthā ity āha -- kālāntareti /
GSP28durdhpru:1073: upadarśanakālād anyena kālena vyāvahārikeṇā yuktaṃ sambaddhaṃ tadgrāhi bhinnakālavastugrāhīti yāvat /
GSP28durdhpru:1074: caḥ pūrvavat pūrveṇa sahedam aprāmāṇyena samuccinoti /
GSP28durdhpru:1076: ayam asyārthaḥ -- adharātre nidrāṇasya madhyāhnakālapratibhāsam anubhavato vaṇijyāgatasutavastudarśanahṛṣitaromṇa
GSP28durdhpru:1077: eva jhaṭiti bodhe kākatālīyanyāyena ca saty api putropalambhe tajjñāṇaṃ na pramāṇam /
GSP28durdhpru:1078: tat khalu paramārthenārdharātrakālasambanddhaṃ madhyāhnakālākalitaṃ ca pratītam iti madhyāhnakālatvenāvabhāsanād eva ca madhyāhṇakālaṃ tad vastūktam
GSP28durdhpru:1080: nanu ca deśaniyatam ākāraniyataṃ ca prāpayituṃ śakyam,
GSP28durdhpru:1082: tatkālaṃ na śakyaṃ prāpayitum. na ucyate -- yasminn eva kāle paricchidyate,
GSP28durdhpru:1083: tasminn eva kāle prāpayitavyam iti. anyo hi darśanakālaḥ,
GSP28durdhpru:1084: anyaś ca prāptikālaḥ. kiṃ tu -- yatkālaṃ paricchinnam,
GSP28durdhpru:1085: tad eva tena prāpaṇīyam. abhedādhyavasāyāc ca santānagatam ekatvaṃ draṣṭavyam iti.
GSP28durdhpru:1086: ardharātraḥ kāla āgamanakālo yasya tasmin na pramāṇam /
GSP28durdhpru:1087: atha vā yo 'rdharātre supto 'hno madhyam udgate savitari putram āgataṃ dṛṣṭavā prabhātāyāṃ rātrau sampanne madhyandine tasminn eva ca deśe tam eva suta(-taṃ)
GSP28durdhpru:1089: tasya taj jñānaṃ saṃvādamātrabhāg api na pramāṇam,
GSP28durdhpru:1095: tadā tv ardharātraḥ paramārthataḥ pratibhāsakālo yasya madhyāhnakālayuktavastuna iti yojyam /
GSP28durdhpru:1096: etena suptasya kenacit paṭhyamānaṃ granthaṃ śṛṇvato jñānam asatyārthaṃ vyākhyātam avaseyam /
GSP28durdhpru:1097: yasmād deśakālabhinnātmānaṃ śrotāraṃ granthaṃ ca śrotavyaṃ paśyati nidropahataḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:1099: yaddeśakālau ca stas tathā na gṛhṇātīti /
GSP28durdhpru:1100: anayaiva ca diśā vājisvapno 'pi vyākhyāto draṣtavyaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:1101: yatas tatrāpi ghoṭakasvapne yatkāladarśanavi[12a]ṣayā bhāvā dṛśyante na tathā santi,
GSP28durdhpru:1102: yatkālāś ca santi tatkālā na dṛśyante /
GSP28durdhpru:1105: tasmāt svapne keṣāñcid anubhūtānāṃ atyantam abhāvād arthakriyāyā nāsti sattvam /
GSP28durdhpru:1106: kecit tu arthakriyākāritayā abhimatāh saty asvapne viṣayā dṛṣṭakālabhedavyabhicāriṇo na santy eveti prakaraṇārthaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:1107: idam īdṛgviśiṣṭaṃ svapnajñānam udāharato dharmottarasyāyam āśayaḥ -- evaṃvidhasya
GSP28durdhpru:1108: svapnajñāṇasya sadarthatvābhimānaḥ keṣāñcit satyasvapnavādinām astīti tad abhimānaśamanāyedaṃ mayodāharaṇīkṛtam /
GSP28durdhpru:1109: na tv asmād anyasya svapnajñānasya kaśicd viśeṣaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:1111: idānīṃ `paricchidyamānasya yatkālaṃ paricchedanaṃ tatkālam eva prāpyamāṇasya prāpaṇaṃ abhimatam' -- evaṃ bruvata iti matvā 'syārthasyānupapattiṃ codyati -- nanu ca -- iti /
GSP28durdhpru:1112: deśe niyatam ākāre niyataṃ ca śakyaṃ prāpayitum ity abhidadhāno 'nayor avipratipattim āha /
GSP28durdhpru:1113: idaṃ tu na sambhāvyata ity āha -- yatkālaṃ tu -- iti /
GSP28durdhpru:1115: yaḥ kālo sya paricchedanasya tad yathā bhavati tathā paricchinnam /
GSP28durdhpru:1116: sa kālo yasya prāpaṇasya tad yathā bhavati /
GSP28durdhpru:1118: yasmin kāle paricchinnam tasmin kāle na śakyate prāpayitum ity arthaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:1119: evaṃ ca bruvatā 'nena kālāntaragrāhīti yad uktaṃ tad ayuktam iti darśitam /
GSP28durdhpru:1124: samyagjñānam pūrvaṃ kāraṇaṃ yasyāḥ sā tathā uktā /
GSP28durdhpru:1125: kāryāt pūrvaṃ bhavat kāraṇaṃ pūrvam uktam /
GSP28durdhpru:1129: tat kiṃ tvayaivaṃ nocyata iti pārśvasthaṃ praty asyaivābhiprāyaṃ prakāśayati -- anyo hi -- iti /
GSP28durdhpru:1131: yady evaṃ nocyate tarhi kiṃ nāmocyata ity āha -- kin tu -- iti /
GSP28durdhpru:1134: na hi yad eva paricchinnam ity asti yenaivam ucyate /
GSP28durdhpru:1135: yatkālaṃ tu prariccchinnaṃ tatkālam iti tu yuktaṃ vaktum,
GSP28durdhpru:1139: yatkālam ity anena hi takālam iti prāptam,
GSP28durdhpru:1140: tad eveti tacchabdena vastuviṣayo yacchabda ākṛṣyate /
GSP28durdhpru:1141: tato 'yam arthaḥ -- yatkālaṃ paricchinnaṃ yad vastu takālaṃ tad eva vastu prāpanīyam iti /
GSP28durdhpru:1147: tathā hi pūrvapakṣāvasthāyāṃ yatkālaṃ tatkālaṃ iti cātra bahuvrīhiṇā paricchedanalakṣaṇā prāpaṇalakṣaṇā ca kriyā 'bhidhīyate /
GSP28durdhpru:1149: yad vastu yena kālena sambaddhaṃ paricchinnaṃ tad eva tena kālena sambaddhaṃ svarūpeṇa prāpaṇīyaṃ tadā 'nyadā vā /
GSP28durdhpru:1150: paricchedasya yādṛśaḥ kālas tasmin kāle yad vidyamānaṃ tad eva prāpaṇīyam iti yāvat /
GSP28durdhpru:1151: tataś ca paricchedakā[12b]lā 'sato yad grāhakaṃ tan na pramāṇam ity avatiṣṭhate /
GSP28durdhpru:1152: nocyate yasmin kāla ityādinā ca yad etad uktaṃ tad bāhyaprāpaṇābhiprāyeṇa draṣṭavyam /
GSP28durdhpru:1153: paramārthatas tu jñānasya pradarśanād anyaḥ prānapaṇāvyāpāro nāstīti yasminn eva kāle paricchidyate 'rthas tasminn eva kāle prāpyata iti /
GSP28durdhpru:1154: etac cānantaram evānenaiva vistareṇa pratipāditam iti svavacanavyāghāto 'nyathā 'sya syād iti /
GSP28durdhpru:1155: nanv evam api paricchedakālavarttinaḥ prāpaṇaṃ na sambhavaty eva /
GSP28durdhpru:1157: tathā copadarśitārthaprāpakatvaṃ nāma kasyacid api jñānasya nāstīty asambhavitaiva samyagjñānatvalakṣanasya syād ity āśaṅkyāha -- abhedeti /
GSP28durdhpru:1160: ayam asya bhāvaḥ -- sāṃvyavahārikasyeha pramāṇasya lakṣaṇām ucyate /
GSP28durdhpru:1162: tatra yady api vastusthityā paricchinnaprāpyayor nānātvaṃ tathāpi vyavaharttāro nirantarāparāparotpatter
GSP28durdhpru:1163: avidyāvaśāc ca hetuphalarūpaṃ kṣaṇapracayaṃ tad evedam ity ekatvenādhimuñcanti tataḥ
GSP28durdhpru:1166: tad anena prabandhena samayagjñanapadaṃ vyākhyāyādhunā pūrvaśabdaṃ vyācikhyāsus tena sādharmasya vigraham āha -- samyagjñānam iti /
GSP28durdhpru:1171: tad iha parīkṣyate. tac ca pūrvamātram. na tu sākṣātkāraṇam. samyagjñāne hi sati pūrvadṛṣṭasmaraṇam,
GSP28durdhpru:1174: pravṛtteś ca prāptiḥ. tato na sākṣāthetuḥ.
GSP28durdhpru:1176: tathā ca samyagjñānakāraṇiketi vaktum ucitaṃ tatkim evam uktam ity āha -- kāryād iti /
GSP28durdhpru:1177: anena vyavasthāvācī sann eva pūrvaśabdaḥ kāraṇe varttata iti darśayati /
GSP28durdhpru:1178: bhavad iti `lakṣaṇahetvoḥ kriyāyāḥ' [pāṇini 3.2.126] iti hetau śatur vidhānāt hetupadam etat /
GSP28durdhpru:1179: yady evaṃ kāraṇaśabda eva kriyatām ity āha -- kāraṇeti /
GSP28durdhpru:1183: na ca mukhye sambhavati amukhye pratyayo yujyate /
GSP28durdhpru:1184: tato yad eva jñānam avyavadhānena puruṣārthasiddher nibandhanam,
GSP28durdhpru:1185: tad eva kāraṇaśabdena pratīyeteti. yadi pūrvagrahaṇe 'py evaṃ pratyayas tadā ko viśeṣa ity āha -- pūrvaśabda iti /
GSP28durdhpru:1186: tuḥ kāraṇaśabdād viśeṣam asyāha -- pūrvamātram iti sākṣātkāraṇam itaraś ca /
GSP28durdhpru:1189: sarvasyaiva puruṣārthasiddhiṃ prati sākṣātkāraṇatvād ity āha -- dvividhaṃ ca -- iti /
GSP28durdhpru:1191: kathaṃ dvaividhyam ity āha -- arthakriyeti. nirbhāsate 'sminn iti nirbhāsaḥ. arthakriyāyā nirbhāso yasmāt tat tathā. yataḥ sādhanajñānād anantaraṃ dāhādipratibhāsajñāṇam utpadyate,
GSP28durdhpru:1193: kecit tu kṣaṇena kāryakāraṇāvyavahārasyārvāgdarśanena karttum aśakyatvād dāhādipratibhāsam eva jñānam evaṃ bruvate /
GSP28durdhpru:1198: anyoḥ kiṃ parīkṣyata ity āha tayoḥ -- iti /
GSP28durdhpru:1199: pravarttakam api sākṣātkāraṇaṃ tat ko 'nyatra vidveṣo yenedam eva vicāryate?
GSP28durdhpru:1200: kiṃ vā pūrvaśabdenety āha -- tac ca iti. co yasmāt.
GSP28durdhpru:1201: ayam āśayaḥ -- yataḥ pravarttante tat sarvam arthaprāpter vyavahitaṃ kāraṇam /
GSP28durdhpru:1202: ataś ca sambhavat pratibandhaṃ tat pravṛttyaṅgatvāt pūrvamātram,
GSP28durdhpru:1205: amum eva draḍhyann āha -- na tu -- iti /
GSP28durdhpru:1207: kuta etad ity āha -- samyagjñāna iti /
GSP28durdhpru:1212: tataḥ pravṛttiḥ pravarttakajñānopadarśitam arthaṃ prāptukāmā vyāpārasahāyā buddhiḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:1214: yasmāt smaraṇādinā vyavadhānaṃ tataḥ tasmāt na sākṣāṭ hetuḥ prāpter upāyaḥ puruṣārthasidder iti prakaraṇāt /
GSP28durdhpru:1217: tathā api tan na parīkṣaṇīyam. yatra eva hi prekṣāvanto 'rthinaḥ sāśaṅkāḥ,
GSP28durdhpru:1218: tat parīkṣyate. arthakriyānirbhāse ca jñāne sati siddhaḥ puruṣārthaḥ. tena tatra
GSP28durdhpru:1219: na sāśaṅkā arthinaḥ. atas tan na parīkṣaṇīyam. tasmāt parīkṣārham asākṣātkāraṇaṃ
GSP28durdhpru:1220: samyagjñānam ādarśayituṃ kāraṇaśabdaṃ parityajya pūrvagrahaṇaṃ kṛtam.
GSP28durdhpru:1224: yadi paramparayā 'pi prāptihetuḥ parīkṣyate tarhi sākṣāt hetur atitarāṃ parīkṣaṇīya ity āha -- arthakriyānirbhāsam iti /
GSP28durdhpru:1226: yada prāptihetur iti pāṭhas tadā arthakriyānirbhāsam ity asyāntyavyākhyānapakṣe bhinnā santoṣādiprāptir lokādhyavasāyasiddhā yā tasyā hetuḥ
GSP28durdhpru:1230: kasmāt tat na parīkṣyata ity āha -- yatraiva hi -- iti /
GSP28durdhpru:1234: evaṃ bruvataś cāyam āśayaḥ -- na vyasanam etac chāstrakṛto yena jñānam aprīkṣamāṇaḥ svāsthyam alabhamānaḥ parīkṣate /
GSP28durdhpru:1237: tato yatraiva te tathāpravṛttayas tad eva parīkṣyata iti /
GSP28durdhpru:1238: arthakriyānirbhāse 'pi te tathāvṛttaya ity āha -- arthakriyeti /
GSP28durdhpru:1244: vyākhyānadvaye 'pi arthakriyānirbhāsaśabdavācyadvaye sthite dvayam etat śaṅkāyāḥ kāraṇam -- anantaraphalādarśanam,
GSP28durdhpru:1246: tadabhābe tu kathaṃ śaṅkerann iti bhāvaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:1247: mā bhūvaṃs tatra sāśaṅkās tat kiṃ siddham ity āha-- ata iti /
GSP28durdhpru:1248: yadi vyavahitaṃ pravarttakaṃ puruṣārthasiddher na kāraṇaṃ tarhi katham uktam -- `kāryāt pūrvaṃ bhavat kāraṇaṃ pūrvam uktam' iti?
GSP28durdhpru:1249: asākṣātkāraṇe cākāraṇe kāraṇa[13b]viśeṣaṇaṃ sākṣād iti nirarthakam ity āśaṅkyāha -- tasmād iti /
GSP28durdhpru:1250: yasmāt sākṣātkāraṇam āśaṅkānāspadaṃ sad aparīkṣaṇīyaṃ tasmād yad asākṣātkāraṇam ata
GSP28durdhpru:1251: eva ca parīkṣārhaṃ parīkṣkṣāyogyaṃ pravarttakaṃ samyagjñānam ādarśayitum ādarśayiṣyāmi
GSP28durdhpru:1252: -- iti kāraṇaśabdaṃ vihāya pūrvagahaṇaṃ kṛtam ācāryeṇety arthāt /
GSP28durdhpru:1253: etad uktaṃ bhavati -- yo 'yaṃ kāraṇaśabdo vyavahite kāraṇakāraṇe varttate nāyaṃ tatrābhidhāyakatvena varttate karotīti kāraṇam iti vyutpatteḥ
GSP28durdhpru:1256: puruṣasya arthaḥ puruṣārthaḥ. arthyata ity arthaḥ kāmyata iti yāvat. heyo 'rtha upādeyo vā. heyo hy artho hāntum iṣyate,
GSP28durdhpru:1257: upādeyo 'pi upādātum. na ca heyopādeyābhyām anyo rāśir asti. upekṣaṇīyo hy anupādeyatvāt heya eva. tasya siddhiḥ hānam upādānaṃ ca. hetunibandhanā hi siddhir utpattir ucyate,
GSP28durdhpru:1258: jñānanibandhanā tu siddhir anuṣṭhānam. heyasya ca hānam anuṣṭhānam,
GSP28durdhpru:1259: upādeyasya ca upādānam. tato heyopadeyayor hānopādānalakṣaṇānuṣṭhitiḥ siddhir ity ucyate.
GSP28durdhpru:1260: syād etat -- saty api kāraṇagrahaṇe vicārārham eva samyagjñāṇaṃ pratipatsyate /
GSP28durdhpru:1264: tena pradhānānurodhāt tacchabdo varṇitayā nītyā mukhyasya kāraṇasya samyagjñānasya
GSP28durdhpru:1267: yathā mañcāḥ krośantīty atra pradhānānurodhāt mañcaśabdaḥ krośanakriyākarttṛtvānupapatteṛ mukhyam arthaṃ tyaktvā lakṣaṇayā tātsthyabhūtayā pratyāsattyā puruṣeṣu varttata iti /
GSP28durdhpru:1269: kevalam evaṃ sati vyākhyātṝṇām idaṃ kauśalaṃ syān na śāstrakṛta iti sarvam anavadyam /
GSP28durdhpru:1270: idānīṃ puruṣārthasiddipadaṃ vivariṣuḥ puruṣaśabdena sārdham arthaśabdasya vigraham,
GSP28durdhpru:1272: arthyata ity ācakṣāṇo[25]`artha yācñāyām' ity ato ṇijantāt karmaṇyacaṃ darśayati /
GSP28durdhpru:1273: arthyata ity asyārthaṃ spaṣṭayati -- kāmyata iṣyata ity anena yāvān evārthaṃ uktas tāvān evārthyata ity anenāpīti iti yāvad ity asyārthaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:1276: {Nach Ausgabe in Böthlingk ist es in 10,357}
GSP28durdhpru:1277: ko 'sāv arthaṃ ity āha -- heya iti /
GSP28durdhpru:1280: na tarhi heyo 'rtha ity āha -- heya iti /
GSP28durdhpru:1282: heyo hātuṃ tyaktum iṣyate tasmād arthaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:1284: atra yady api svīkaraṇecchā nāsti tathāpi parihārecchā tāvad astīti /
GSP28durdhpru:1285: yadi hātum iṣyamāṇo 'rthaḥ katham upādeyo 'rtha ity āha -- upādeyo 'pīṣyate kevalam upādātum /
GSP28durdhpru:1286: na kevalaṃ heya iṣyate ity apiśabdaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:1287: nanu ca na heyopādeyāv artho 'pi tv anyo 'pi /
GSP28durdhpru:1288: tataḥ so 'pi kasmān na pradarśyata ity āha -- na ceti /
GSP28durdhpru:1291: yatra na pravṛttir yataś ca na nirvṛttiḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:1292: tat katham anubhavasiddhasyāpahnva ity āha -- upekṣaṇīya iti / hir yasmāt /
GSP28durdhpru:1294: tattra yady anupādeyatvād dheyas tadā 'heyatvād upādeyaḥ kiṃ na bhavati” iti /
GSP28durdhpru:1295: sādhūktaṃ tena bhadantena kevalaṃ heyaśabdārthavicāre mano na
GSP28durdhpru:1297: sarvā cāsau puruṣārthasiddhiś ceti. sarvaśabda iha dravyakārtsnye vṛttaḥ,
GSP28durdhpru:1298: na tu prakārakārtsnye. tato na ayam arthaḥ -- dviprakārā api siddhiḥ samyagjñānanibandhanā eva iti. api tv ayam arthaḥ -- yā kācit siddhiḥ,
GSP28durdhpru:1299: sā sarvā kṛtsnā eva asau samyagjñānanibandhanā iti. mithyājñānād dhi kākatālīyāpi nāsty arthasiddhiḥ. tathā hi -- yadi pradarśitam artham prāpayaty evam tato bhavaty arthasiddhiḥ.
GSP28durdhpru:1306: tena ahiviṣakaṇṭakādīnām api hānaṃ tatrā [14a] 'pravṛttir eva /
GSP28durdhpru:1308: tathā ca yadi tasya svīkāro bhavet,
GSP28durdhpru:1310: na ca tat svīkriyata iti vyaktam ayaṃ hetur asiddhas tasya /
GSP28durdhpru:1313: athānubhavasiddhasya tṛtīyarāśer upekṣaṇiyasyāsvīkaraṇamātrād dheyena sārdham aikyapratipādanam ayuktam iti cet /
GSP28durdhpru:1315: na hi vayam api prasiddhyor heyopekṣaṇiyayor arthayor ekasvabhāvatām ātiṣṭhāmahe /
GSP28durdhpru:1316: kin tu kriyānimittena heyaśabdenaikābhidhānam tathā 'svīkaraṇārthena hānaśabdenopekṣāyā abhidhānam iti kim avadyam?
GSP28durdhpru:1318: adhunā siddhiśabdasyārthapadena vigrahaṃ bruvann artham āha -- tasya -- iti /
GSP28durdhpru:1320: yathaudanasya siddhir iti. tat katham evaṃ varṇyata ity āha -- hetunibadhaneti. hetuḥ kāraṇaṃ nibaddhyate 'sminn iti nibandhanaṃ pratibandhaviṣayaḥ
GSP28durdhpru:1321: hetur nibandhanam asyā iti vigṛhya hetupratibaddhety artho vaktavyaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:1322: yadi janakanibandhanā siddhir īḍṛśī tarhi jñānanibandhanā kīdṛśī bhaviṣyatīty āha -- jñāneti /
GSP28durdhpru:1323: tuḥ pūrvasyāḥ siddher asyā bhedaṃ darśayati /
GSP28durdhpru:1324: evaṃ ca vyācakṣāṇa arthapadavyākhyāne “arthaḥ prayojanaṃ dāhādi“,
GSP28durdhpru:1325: siddhipadavyākhyāne ca “tasya dāhāder niṣpattiḥ” iti yad vinītadevaśāntabhadrau vyācakṣātāṃ tad dvayam apy apāsyati /
GSP28durdhpru:1326: yataḥ svahetor eva vahnyāder dāhāder niṣpattir na tu jñānāt tasya tadakārakatvād iti /
GSP28durdhpru:1328: tarhi hānam upādānaṃ siddhir ity āha -- heyasya ca -- iti. co hetau,
GSP28durdhpru:1329: avadhāraṇe vā hānam ity asmāt paro draṭavyaḥ. dvitīyaś cakāraḥ samuccayārthaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:1330: kim evaṃ sati siddham ity āha -- tata iti /
GSP28durdhpru:1331: yato jñānanibandhanā siddhir īdṛśī tatas tasmāt kāraṇāt /
GSP28durdhpru:1332: puruṣārthasiddhiśabdānāṃ vigraham arthaṃ vyākhyāya samprati sarvaśabdaṃ vyākhyātuṃ vigraham āha -- sarvā ca -- iti /
GSP28durdhpru:1333: evaṃ ca vigṛhṇan yad vinītadevena vyākhyātam -- “sarvaś cāsau laukiko lokottaraś cāsannadeśo dūradeśaś ca puruṣārthaś ceti,
GSP28durdhpru:1337: pradarśitaṃ ca prāpayat samyagjñānam eva. pradarśitaṃ ca aprāpayat mithyājñānam. aprāpakaṃ ca katham arthasiddhinibandhanaṃ syāt. tasmād yan
GSP28durdhpru:1338: na tato arthasiddhiḥ. yataś ca arthasiddhiḥ,
GSP28durdhpru:1339: tat samyagjñānam eva. ata eva samyagjñānam yatnato vyutpādanīyam. yatas tad eva puruṣārthasiddhinibandhanam,
GSP28durdhpru:1340: vyākhyāyamāne sarvaśabdena puruṣārthasiddher aviśeṣaṇād mithyājñānāt kākatālīyārthasiddhir nivāritā syāt /
GSP28durdhpru:1345: sarveṣāṃ vā puruṣāṇām arthas tasya siddhiḥ” iti vyācaṣṭe,
GSP28durdhpru:1347: nanu sarvaśabdasya prakārakātsnaryavṛtter api darśanān na jñāyate kiṃ vṛttir atrābhipreta ity āha -- sarvaśabda iti. dravyasya niḥśeṣatāyāṃ vṛttaḥ pravṛtto vācakabhāvena /
GSP28durdhpru:1349: dravyaśabdena cedaṃ tad iti vyapadeśayogyaṃ grahītavyam /
GSP28durdhpru:1350: na tu vaiśeṣikasiddhāntaprasiddhaṃ pṛthivyādi / tad uktam --
GSP28durdhpru:1352: dravyam ity ucyate so 'rtho bhedyatva vivakṣitaḥ” iti
GSP28durdhpru:1355: tathāvṛtter asya grahaṇād anyavṛttitayā prasiddhasyāpi pratiṣedhaṃ kaṇṭhoktaṃ karoti /
GSP28durdhpru:1359: prakārakārtsnyavṛtter agrahaṇe ko guṇa ity āha -- tata iti /
GSP28durdhpru:1361: tathāpi katham ayam artho bhavatīti cet /
GSP28durdhpru:1362: bhavati hi prakārakārtsnyavacane sarvaśabde saty ayam arthaḥ -- na so 'sti puruṣārthasiddheḥ prakāraḥ phalalakṣaṇo vā yo na samyagjñānanibandhana iti /
GSP28durdhpru:1363: sati caivaṃ dviprakārā 'pi siddhiḥ samyagjñānapūrvikety ayam artho bhavati /
GSP28durdhpru:1364: nanu cāsminn apy arthe prakāradvitayasya saṃgṛhītatvāt kim asaṃgṛhītaṃ nāma yenāyam artho yatnena mahatā hīyata iti?
GSP28durdhpru:1365: kathaṃ na hīyatāṃ kasyāścit tatprakārāntaḥpatitāyā hānavyakte[26].....................na hi ṣaḍ api rasaprakārān bhuñjānaḥ kaścin madhurāmlādirasavyaktīḥ sarvā eva bhuṅkte /
GSP28durdhpru:1366: na ca tathā 'kurvan sarvarasabhoktā na bhavatīti /
GSP28durdhpru:1369: yady ayaṃ nārthaḥ kas tarhīty āha -- api tu -- iti /
GSP28durdhpru:1370: nipātasamudāyo 'yaṃ kin tvat yasyārthe sarvatra varttate /
GSP28durdhpru:1371: nanu kṛtsnaivāsau samyagjñānanibandhanety ucyamāne mithyājñānāt kākatālīyā 'py arthasiddhir nāstīti darśitaṃ syāt /
GSP28durdhpru:1373: yato yady api mithyājñānān niyamavatī nāsty arthasiddhīh,
GSP28durdhpru:1375: yathā kaścit dahanoparivarttiṃ maśakavarttiṃ dhūmam avasāyāgnim anumāya yadi pravṛttyā 'gnim āsādayati /
GSP28durdhpru:1379: samyagjñānasya tu niyamenārthasiddhinibandhanahetutvāt samyagjānam eva yatnato vyutpādyate /
GSP28durdhpru:1380: na tv etāvatā mithyajñānān nāsty evārthasiddhiḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:1383: na tu tatprakārāntaḥpātinyāḥ kasyāścit siddhivyakter mithyājñānasādhyatvam /
GSP28durdhpru:1384: na ca hānopādānavyaktayaḥ pratyekaṃ prakāraśabadavācyāḥ prakārānantyaprasaṅgāt /
GSP28durdhpru:1385: tasmāt sarvaśabadaḥ prakārkārtsnyavṛttir eva prahītavyaḥ -- iti purveṣāṃ matam āśaṅkyāha -- mithyeti /
GSP28durdhpru:1389: tad api prāpayaty evety āha -- pradarśitam iti / co yasmāt /
GSP28durdhpru:1391: tataḥ samyagñānam evety avadhāraṇam ayuktam ity āha -- pradaṛśitam iti /
GSP28durdhpru:1392: co 'vadhāraṇe aprāpayad ity ataḥ paro draṣṭavyaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:1396: mithyājñāṇasya hīdam eva tattvaṃ yat pradarśitāprāpatvaṃ nāma /
GSP28durdhpru:1397: prāpake tu mithyājānavyapadeśaḥ samāropitaḥ syād iti bhāvaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:1399: tad arthasiddhes tu bibandhanaṃ kiṃna syād ity āha aprāpakam iti /
GSP28durdhpru:1402: yasmād upadarśitāprāpakam eva mithyāñāṇam tasmād yat kiñcn mithyāñāṇaṃ tataḥ sarata eva nārthasiddhiḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:1403: yaḥ punar akasmād vahner upari maśakavarttiṃ dhūmam avasāya vahnim asvasyati,
GSP28durdhpru:1404: so 'py anumākālāt pūrvaṃ yāvan maśakavarttyādibhyo vyāvṛttaṃ vahnikāryaṃ niyataṃ dhūmarūpaṃ nirūpya vivecitaṃ tadānīm anumānakāle nānusarati,
GSP28durdhpru:1408: saty adhūmadarśane 'pi sandigdhavahnikāryatvāt kathaṃ niḥśaṅko nāma sacetanaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:1410: anyasmāt tv ekāṃśāvagraho 'py anivartitaśaṅkāhetuḥ saṃśaya eva /
GSP28durdhpru:1411: saṃśayaś ca bhāvābhāvāniyatasyārthasyāśakyaprāpaṇasya darśako nārthasiddher nibandhanam /
GSP28durdhpru:1412: jñāṇātarād eva tu sā prāptir ity asyābhiprāyaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:1413: evam anyatrāpi mithyājñāne yathā prāmāṇyaṃ na yujyate,
GSP28durdhpru:1414: yathā ca jñānāntarād eva sā prāptis tathā dharamottareṇaiva viniścayaṭīkāyāṃ vipañcitam iti neha pratanyte /
GSP28durdhpru:1415: kutaścid arthasiddhir api syād ity āha -- yataś ca -- iti /
GSP28durdhpru:1417: arthasiddhinibandhanaṃ mithyājñānam ācāryasyāpi nābhimatam iti sāmarthyād darśayati /
GSP28durdhpru:1424: ata evety enena yad eva hetutvenāpekṣitaṃ tad eva yata ityādinā sukhapratipattyarthaṃ kaṇṭhoktaṃ karoti /
GSP28durdhpru:1425: ayam āśayaḥ -- yady ācāryo mithyājñānād apy arthasiddhiṃ bhavitrīm abhipreyātm tadā na samyagjñānam eva prastāreṇa vyutpādayet /
GSP28durdhpru:1428: nanu samyagjñānapūrvikaivety avadhāraṇe sati mithyājñānād arthasiddhir nāstīti labhyate. na copāttam avadhāraṇam,
GSP28durdhpru:1429: tat katham ayam artho labhyata ity āha -- tata iti /
GSP28durdhpru:1432: tato yāvad brūyāt -- yā kācit puruṣārthasiddhiḥ,
GSP28durdhpru:1434: tāvad uktaṃ sarvā sā samyagjñānapūrvikā iti. itiśabdas tasmād ity asminn arthe. yattadoś
GSP28durdhpru:1435: ca nityam abhisambandhaḥ. tad ayam arthaḥ -- yasmāt samyagjñānapūrvikā sarvapuruṣārthasiddhiḥ,
GSP28durdhpru:1437: yady api ca samāse guṇībhūtam samyagjñānam,
GSP28durdhpru:1438: tathā api iha prakaraṇe vyutpādayitavyatvāt pradhānam. tatas tasya eva tatśabdena sambandhaḥ.
GSP28durdhpru:1440: vṛttau sati sarvā kṛtsnā puruṣārthasiddhiḥ samyagjñānapūrvikā,
GSP28durdhpru:1441: na tu kācid vyaktir asti yā na tatpūrvikety ayam artho labhyate,
GSP28durdhpru:1442: tataḥ kāraṇāt pūruṣārthasiddhiḥ samyagjñānanibandhanaiveti sāvadhāraṇaṃ vākyam /
GSP28durdhpru:1443: yat parimāṇam abhidheyaṃ brūyād vaktuṃ śaknoti,
GSP28durdhpru:1444: tāvat parimāṇam uktam sarvā samyagjñānapūrvikety anena /
GSP28durdhpru:1446: kva punar yatśabdo 'sti yena vakṣyamāṇārthasaṅgatir ity āha -- yad iti /
GSP28durdhpru:1447: co [15b] vyaktam etad ity asminn arthe /
GSP28durdhpru:1448: śabdayoḥ sākṣād anyonyāpekṣābhāvāt yattadarthayor iti draṣṭavyam /
GSP28durdhpru:1450: evaṃ sati kīdṛśo 'rtho vyavatiṣṭhata ity āha -- tad iti /
GSP28durdhpru:1452: tat kathaṃ tasyāpradhānasya pradhānapratyavamarśinā tacchabde parāmarśaḥ syād ity āha -- yady api ceti /
GSP28durdhpru:1453: yady api ceti nipātasamudāyo viśeṣābhidhānārthābhyupagame varttate /
GSP28durdhpru:1456: vyutpādayitavyatvāt pradhānam ity abhidadhato 'yam āśayaḥ -- dvedhā hi prādhānyaṃ śabdato 'rthataś ca /
GSP28durdhpru:1457: tatra śābdena nyāyenāsaty api prādhānye samyagjñānasya vyutpādayitavyatayā buddhyantareṇopasthāpitasya
GSP28durdhpru:1458: svatantrasyā''rthena nyāyena prādhānyaṃ ko 'pahastayed iti tacchabdena tasya parāmarśo
GSP28durdhpru:1459: na viruddhyata ity evaṃ vyācakṣāṇo vinītadevavyākhyāṃ tiraskaroti /
GSP28durdhpru:1460: evaṃ hy asau vyācaṣṭe -- “tad iti napuṃsakaliṅgena nirdeśāt samyagjñānaṃ parāmṛśyata” iti /
GSP28durdhpru:1461: samyagjñānasyāprādhānyena parāmarśānupapattau talliṅgaprahaṇasyaivāyogāt katham asiddhena sādhyatām ity āśayaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:1464: caturvidhā ca atra vipratipattiḥ saṃkhyālakṣaṇagocaraphalaviṣayā. tatra saṃkhyāvipratipattim nirākartum āha --
GSP28durdhpru:1466: dvividham iti -- dvau vidhau prakārāv asya iti dvividham. saṃkhyāpradarśanadvāreṇa ca vyaktibhedo darśito bhavati.
GSP28durdhpru:1467: tacchabdena sambandhanaṃ sambandhaḥ svīkāra iti yāvat /
GSP28durdhpru:1468: tato 'yam arthaḥ -- tat samyagjñānaṃ karamabhūtaṃ vipratipattinirākaraṇena pratipādyate bodhyate śiṣyajana ity arthāt /
GSP28durdhpru:1469: ata eva tad iti dvitīyāntam etad iti sopapattikam āha /
GSP28durdhpru:1472: vipratipattinirākaraṇena pratipādyata iti bruvatā lakṣaṇaṃ na virudhyate /
GSP28durdhpru:1478: nanu vārttikādinaiva samyagjñānasya vyutpādanāt katham asya na vaiyarthyam iti cet saṃkṣiptarucīn prajñān adhikṛtyedaṃ prakaraṇaṃ praṇītam ity adoṣaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:1479: atha kā 'tra vipratipattiḥ yannirākaraṇenedaṃ pratipādyata ity āha -- caturvidheti /
GSP28durdhpru:1486: tathā hi saṃkhyāvipratipattis tāvat pratyakṣam evaikaṃ pramāṇam iti lokāyatikānām /
GSP28durdhpru:1488: ārṣasya jñānasya pratibhāpranāmnaḥ kadācid iha laukikānām utpadyamānasya pratyakṣānumānayor ekatrāpy antarbhāvāpradarśanāt pratyakṣānumānārṣāṇy eveti cirantanavaiśeṣikāṇām /
GSP28durdhpru:1492: lakṣaṇavipratipattir api -- savikalpakam eva pratyakṣam iti vaiyākaraṇabārhaspatyādīnām /
GSP28durdhpru:1494: pītaśaṅkhādijñānaṃ bhrāntam api pratyakṣam ity aṃśavādavādinām /
GSP28durdhpru:1499: viṣayavipratipattir api -- sāmānyaviṣaye pratyakṣānumāne iti naiyāyikamīmāsakādīnām /
GSP28durdhpru:1503: tatra tāsu madhye saṃtkhyā tv ajātyā nirdhāryate /
GSP28durdhpru:1504: tato nirdhāraṇe yuktaṃ dvau vidhau prakārāv asyeti vigṛhṇan vidhaśabdo 'py asti prakāravācīti darśayati /
GSP28durdhpru:1507: dve eva samyagjñānavyaktī iti. vyaktibhede ca pradarśite prativyaktiniyataṃ samyagjñānalakṣaṇam
GSP28durdhpru:1509: ekam na śakyaṃ vaktum. tato lakṣaṇakathanāṅgam eva saṃkhyābhedakathanam. apradarśite
GSP28durdhpru:1510: tu vyaktibhedātmake saṃkhyābhede lakṣaṇabhedasya darśayitum aśakyatvāt. lakṣaṇanirdeśāṅgatvād
GSP28durdhpru:1517: anekārthatvāt tasya prakāravācino 'pi prayogasya “catasṛṣu caiveṃvidhāsu tattvaṃ parisamāpyate” [nyāyabhā- pṛ- 2] ityādāv anena prāyaśo dṛṣṭatvāt
GSP28durdhpru:1518: nanu kathaṃ nāma pramāṇād eva pravartteya nāpramāṇād iti pravarttitumanāḥ pramāṇasya lakṣaṇam eva jijñāsate,
GSP28durdhpru:1519: na saṅkhyām. tato lakṣaṇam eva vyutpādyaṃ na saṅkhyā. tac ca lakṣanaṃ yady ekasyaivāsti,
GSP28durdhpru:1520: tad ekam eva pramāṇam. atha bahūnām,
GSP28durdhpru:1521: tadā pramāṇabāhulyam anivāryam eva. atha tal lakṣaṇaṃ naikasyaivāsti nāpi bahūnām,
GSP28durdhpru:1522: tarhi lakṣaṇavyutpattau sāmarthyāt saṃkhyāvipratipattir nirākṛtā bhavatīti kiṃ pṛthak saṃkhyāvipratipattinirākaraṇenetiy āha -- saṃkhyeti. co yasmādarthe. dvāram upāyaḥ.
GSP28durdhpru:1523: kenākāreṇa darśito bhavatīty āha -- dve iti. itinā vyaktibhedasya svarūpam āha. vyaktibhedenaiva
GSP28durdhpru:1524: darśitena kiṃ prayojanam ity āha -- vyaktibhede ceti. co yasmādarthe. yady adarśite
GSP28durdhpru:1526: tathāpi kiṃ darśitenety anvayamātrād apratipatter vyatirekam api darśayitum āha --
GSP28durdhpru:1527: apradarśita iti. tuḥ pradarśanapakṣād apradarśanapakṣasya bhedam āha. sakalavyaktyanuyāyīti
GSP28durdhpru:1529: aśakyatvāt. lakṣaṇam ucyamānaṃ sakalavyaktyanuyāyi tad ekaṃ vaktavyam /
GSP28durdhpru:1532: nanu kim ucyate -- sakalavyaktyanuyāyi vaktum aśakyam iti yāvatā 'visaṃvādijñānaṃ
GSP28durdhpru:1533: pramāṇam ity asti lakṣaṇam ekaṃ suvacam apīti. satyam. kevalaṃ jñānānāṃ yat prātisvikaṃ
GSP28durdhpru:1535: tad upalakṣaṇaṃ nāstīty abhiprāyād adoṣaḥ. yad vā vipratipattinirākaraṇapravaṇaṃ yatsādhāraṇaṃ lakṣaṇam,
GSP28durdhpru:1537: na tena vipratipattir nirākṛtā bhavati. anyatrāpi parair avisaṃvāditvasyeṣṭatvād
GSP28durdhpru:1538: ity anenābhiprāyeṇoktam -- na śakyam ekaṃ vaktum iti viśeṣapratiṣedhasāmarthyāt śeṣavidhisiddhau
GSP28durdhpru:1539: ca tathābhūtasya sādhāraṇasya sambhavād eva sakalaśabdo 'yam upayuktakārtsnye pravartta[16b]nīyaḥ.
GSP28durdhpru:1541: pradarśitavyaktibhedātmakadvividhānaumānānuyāyi trirūpaliṅgajatvaṃ śakyaṃ vaktum iti. yadi nāmaivam,
GSP28durdhpru:1542: tataḥ kim ity āha -- tata iti. yato 'pradarśite na śakyam ekaṃ tathāvidhaṃ darśayitum,
GSP28durdhpru:1543: tatas tasmāt. lakṣaṇakathanāṅgam iti prativyaktiniyatalakṣaṇakathanāṅgam ity avaseyam.
GSP28durdhpru:1545: kiṃ punas tad dvaividhyam ity āha --
GSP28durdhpru:1547: atha tathāvidhaṃ lakṣaṇam ekaṃ vaktuṃ na śakyatāṃ nāma /
GSP28durdhpru:1548: kim ataḥ? kevalam adarśite 'pi saṃkhyābhede lakṣaṇabhedo darśayituṃ śakyatām /
GSP28durdhpru:1549: tat kasmāt tatkathanāṅgaṃ saṃkhyābhedakathanam ity āśaṅkyānvayamukhenoktam arthaṃ draḍhayituṃ vyatirekamukheṇāha -- lakṣaṇeti /
GSP28durdhpru:1551: kadā darśayitum aśakyatvaṃ yata evaṃ bhavatīty ākāṅkṣāyām -- apradarśita iti paścād yojanīyam /
GSP28durdhpru:1554: nanu ca na saṃkhyābheda eva vyaktibhedaḥ,
GSP28durdhpru:1555: tat kathaṃ vyaktibhedātmka ity ucyata iti cet. vastutaḥ saṃkhyeyād anyasyāḥ saṃkhyāyā vāstavyā abhāvena saṃkhyāsaṃkhyeyayor ekatvavivakṣayā caivam ucyate /
