GSP28durdhpru:1558: saṃkhyāsamkhyeyayor ekatvavivakṣayaiva ca saṃkhyeyavipratipattir eva nirākṛteti /
GSP28durdhpru:1560: bhedas tadātmā tathāvidhaḥ kalpanāśilpinirmito yasya saṃkhyābhedasya sa tathoktaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:1561: paramārthato bhinne hi vastuni saṃkhyābhedaḥ kalpyata iti vāstavarūpānuvādam idam uktam iti kim avadyam?
GSP28durdhpru:1563: tad uktam -- pravṛttikāmānām upayogitvāl lakṣaṇam eva vaktuṃ yuktaṃ tad etat tv anyathā na śakyam ākhyātum iti saṃkhyābhedapradarśanam iti /
GSP28durdhpru:1564: nanv asaty api dvividham iti saṃkhyābhedapradarśane tat samyagjñānaṃ cety ukte 'pi vyaktibhedo darśito bhavaty eva /
GSP28durdhpru:1565: sati caivaṃ lakṣaṇābhdedākhyānam api sukaram iti kṛtaṃ dvividhaśabdeneti cet /
GSP28durdhpru:1566: siddhe satīdaṃ vacanaṃ dvividham eveti niyamārtham iti brūmaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:1567: itaratheha tāvad etāvadvyuptādyatayā prastutam anyatra punar anyad apy asti vyutpattyaṃ samyagjñānam ity āśaṅkāhatya na nirākṛtā syād iti /
GSP28durdhpru:1568: yat punar uktam -- tarhi lakṣaṇavyutpattyaiva saṃkhyāviprtipattir nirākṛtā bhavatīti tad atyantam asaṅgatam /
GSP28durdhpru:1572: na coktam iti tathā kartum īṣṭe /
GSP28durdhpru:1573: yatas tad īdṛśaṃ pratyakṣam anumāṇaṃ cety etat kartuṃ śaknoti /
GSP28durdhpru:1574: na tv ābhyām anyan na samyagjñāṇam iti /
GSP28durdhpru:1576: tad api tathāvidhaṃ sādhāraṇaṃ vaktum aśaktyam iti kena tathā kriyatām?
GSP28durdhpru:1577: na ca tenoktenāpi tādṛśī vipratipattir nirākriyata ity uktam /
GSP28durdhpru:1578: athāpi syāt -- dvividham ity ukte 'pi katha[17a]m ābhyām anyasyāsamyagjñānatvavi(-tvādhi)
GSP28durdhpru:1580: ye tāvad ācāryapramāṇakā vyutpatsavas te tadvacanamātreṇaiva vivakṣitam arthaṃ bodhyante /
GSP28durdhpru:1581: ye te yuktyanusāriṇas tebhyo 'pi prakaraṇāntareṣūpapattir udāhṛtā /
GSP28durdhpru:1582: prajñajanādhikāreṇa cāsya prakaraṇasya prārambhāt svayam eva tair upapattir ukteti na saṃkhyāvacanam anupādeyam iti /
GSP28durdhpru:1584: ādau tu kasmād ucyata ity āha -- lakṣaṇa iti /
GSP28durdhpru:1586: yathākathañcid dvaividhyasambhave pṛcchati -- kiṃ punar iti /
GSP28durdhpru:1589: pratyakṣam iti pratigatam āśritam akṣam. atyādayaḥ krāntādyarthe dvitīyayā[Vā 4 ad
GSP28durdhpru:1590: Pāṇ 2.2.18]iti samāsaḥ. prāptāpannālaṅgatisamāseṣu paraval liṅgapratiśedhād abhideyaval
GSP28durdhpru:1591: liṅge sati sarvaliṅgaḥ pratyakṣaśabdaḥ siddhaḥ.[29]akṣāśritatvaṃ ca vyutpattinimittaṃ śabdasya,
GSP28durdhpru:1592: na tu pravṛttinimittam. anena tv akṣāśritatvena ekārthasamavetam arthasākṣātkāritvam
GSP28durdhpru:1593: lakṣyate. tad eva śabdasya pravṛttinimittam. tataś ca yatkiñcid arthasya sākṣātkāri
GSP28durdhpru:1596: [29] nanu cāsyāṃ vyutpattau indriyajñānasyaiva pratyakṣaśabavācyatā syād na yogijñānāder ity āha -- ṭi- ___________________________________________
GSP28durdhpru:1599: kena ca sūtreṇety āśaṅkya sukhapratipattyarthaṃ vipratipattinirākaraṇārthaṃ cāha pratigataṃ ityādi /
GSP28durdhpru:1602: evaṃ ca vigṛhṇan[29*]akṣam akṣaṃ prati varttataA iti vyutpattiprakāreṇāvyayībhāvaṃ nirasyati /
GSP28durdhpru:1605: kena sūtreṇāyam ity āha -- atyādaya iti /
GSP28durdhpru:1606: āhopuruṣikayāyam prakāras tvayā darśito na tv asya kaścid guṇo 'stīty āha -- sarvalinga iti /
GSP28durdhpru:1607: avyayībhāvapakṣe pratyakṣo vṛkṣaḥ pratyakṣā mṛgāś ceti na syāt /
GSP28durdhpru:1608: pratyakṣasyeti śrutiś ca na syād ity abhiprāyaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:1609: kathaṃ punaḥ sarvaliṅgatā 'syety āha -- abhidheyavad iti /
GSP28durdhpru:1612: tat tathā. tasmiṃś ca saty ayaṃ pratyakṣaśabdaḥ sarvaliṅgaḥ.
GSP28durdhpru:1615: nanu ca paraval liṅgaṃ dvandvatatpuruṣayoḥ[Pāṇ 2.4.26]iti samastena pratyakṣaśabdena pratiśabdo(-bdā)
GSP28durdhpru:1616: pekṣayā parasthānasthitasyākṣaśabdasya liṅgaparigrahāt katham asyābhidheyaval liṅgatety āha -- prāpteti.
GSP28durdhpru:1618: na tāvat prāptāpannālaṅgatisamāsena teṣāṃ svarūpagrahaṇāt tatra. atra ca tadabhāvāt. gatisamāsād iti cet,
GSP28durdhpru:1620: upasargāḥ kriyāyoge[Pāṇ 1.4.59]ity ataḥ kriyāyoge varttamāne gatiś ca[Pāṇ 1.4.60]ity anena kriyāyoga eva gatisaṃjñāvidhānāt. na cāyaṃ pratiśabdaḥ
GSP28durdhpru:1621: na ca gamanakriyāyogo 'trāstīti vācyam. pratiśabdasyaiva tatrārthe varttamānā(-natvā)
GSP28durdhpru:1623: gatigrahaṇena tatra yeṣāṃ gatisaṃjñā dṛṣṭā teṣāṃ arhaṇāt /
GSP28durdhpru:1624: pratyādīnāṃ sā dṛṣṭeti teṣām api tathātvena saṅgraha iti /
GSP28durdhpru:1625: yady evaṃ samāsas tarhi katham ācāryadignāgena akṣam akṣaṃ prati varttata iti prayakṣam[NMu]ity uktam?
GSP28durdhpru:1628: yadi tv akṣāśritatvam eva pravṛttinimittam syād indriyavijñānam eva pratyakṣam ucyeta,
GSP28durdhpru:1630: yathā gacchati gauḥ iti gamanakriyāyām vyutpādito 'pi gośabdo gamanakriyopalakṣitam ekārthasamavetaṃ gotvaṃ pravṛttinimittīkaroti /
GSP28durdhpru:1631: tathā ca gacchaty agacchati ca gavi gośabdaḥ siddho bhavati /
GSP28durdhpru:1635: gṛhīte pakṣadharme smṛte ca sādhyasādhanasambandhe 'numānaṃ pravartata iti paścātkālabhāvy ucyate /
GSP28durdhpru:1636: atha pratigatam āśritam akṣam ity asyām api vyutpattau mānasasvasaṃvedanayogipratyakṣāṇāṃ na syāt pratyakṣaśabdavācyatety āha -- akṣāśritatvam iti /
GSP28durdhpru:1641: kiṃ tarhi pravṛttinimittam ity āha -- anena -- iti /
GSP28durdhpru:1642: tunā vyutpattinimittād asya bhedaṃ da[17b]rśayati. yattador nityam abhisambandhāt
GSP28durdhpru:1643: yad akṣāśritatvenārthasākṣātkāritvam arthāparokṣīkaraṇam upalakṣyate tad eva tu pratyakṣaśabdasya pravṛttinimittam /
GSP28durdhpru:1644: kathaṃ punar anyenāsambaddhenānyasyopalakṣaṇam? mā bhūd i(a)
GSP28durdhpru:1645: tiprasaktir ity āha -- ekārthasamavetam iti hetubhāvena viśeṣaṇāt /
GSP28durdhpru:1646: yata ekārthasamavetaṃ tato lakṣyata ity arthaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:1647: ekasminn arthe jñānalakṣaṇe 'rthasākṣātkāritvam akṣāśritatvena samaṃ samavetam /
GSP28durdhpru:1648: yady api paramārthataḥ samavāyasamavāyinau na staḥ,
GSP28durdhpru:1649: tathāpi tadvyāvṛttinibandhanayos tathābhūtavastvāśrayeṇa kalpitayor akṣāśritatvārthasākṣātkāritvayor ekārthasamavāyasya ca kalpitasya sambhavād evam abhidhāne ko virodhaḥ?
GSP28durdhpru:1650: paraprasiddhyā vā evam uktam iti kā kṣatiḥ?
GSP28durdhpru:1651: evam api kathaṃ pūrvadoṣātivṛttir iya āha -- tataś ceti /
GSP28durdhpru:1653: caśabda eva tasmād idam ucyata ity arthaṃ dyotayati /
GSP28durdhpru:1654: akṣāśritatve pravṛttinimitte ko doṣa iti pārśvasthasyāśrutacodakavākyasya vacanam āśaṅkyāha -- yadi-- iti /
GSP28durdhpru:1656: athābhidhīyate -- yad arthasākṣātkaraṇam akṣāśritatvena samavetaṃ tad evānenopalakṣāṇīyam iti tadavasthe(-stho)
GSP28durdhpru:1658: akṣajatvasyopalakṣaṇatvenāprādhānyād arthasākṣākāritvam upalakṣyamāṇaṃ pradhānam upalakṣyaiva nivṛtter adoṣa eva /
GSP28durdhpru:1659: yathā kākebhyo dadhi rakṣyatām ity atra /
GSP28durdhpru:1664: tac copalakṣitam iti tad anyato 'pi dadhirakṣocyate /
GSP28durdhpru:1665: arthasākṣātkāritve 'pi samānam iti kathaṃ na mānasādeḥ pratyakṣaśabdābhilāpyatvam iti /
GSP28durdhpru:1666: kiṃ dṛṣṭam idaṃ yad anyatra vyutpādito 'pi śabdo 'nyatra tatpravṛttiviṣayīkarotītyāha -- yatheti /
GSP28durdhpru:1668: kevalam apir avadhāraṇe gotvam(m ity a)
GSP28durdhpru:1674: yathā arthāvinābhāvitvād arthaṃ prāpayat pratyakṣaṃ pramāṇam,
GSP28durdhpru:1675: tadvad arthāvinābhāvitvād anumānam api paricchinnam arthaṃ prāpayat pramāṇam iti /
GSP28durdhpru:1677: tatra iti saptamy arthe vartamāno nirdhāraṇe vartate /
GSP28durdhpru:1678: tato 'yam vākyārthaḥ -- tatra tayor pratyakṣānumānayor iti samudāyanirdeśaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:1681: tatra pratyakṣam anudya kalpanāpoḍhatvam abhrāntatvaṃ ca vidhīyate /
GSP28durdhpru:1682: yat tat bavatām asmākaṃ artheṣu sākṣātkāri jñānaṃ prasiddhaṃ tat kalpanāpoḍhābhrāntatvayuktaṃ draṣṭavyam /
GSP28durdhpru:1685: na tu saty api nimittāntare yathoddeśam eva vyākhyānaṃ yuktam iti /
GSP28durdhpru:1686: pratyakṣapadaṃ vyākhyāyādhunā 'numānapadaṃ vyācikhyāsuḥ mānaśabdasya tāvad artham ācaṣṭe mīyata iti /
GSP28durdhpru:1687: evaṃ vyutpāditenānea śabdena kiṃ pratipādyata iti? karaṇeti /
GSP28durdhpru:1692: yady evaṃ kathaṃ tarhi kvacit “trirūpālliṅgād yad anumeye jñānaṃ tad anumānam” iti?
GSP28durdhpru:1693: sārūpyopalakṣitaṃ jñānam eva tathā 'bhidhāsyata iti ko virodhaḥ?
GSP28durdhpru:1695: anumānaṃ tu katham ity āha -- paścād iti /
GSP28durdhpru:1696: anena paścād arthavṛttenānuśabdasya mānaśabdena saha “gatiprādaya” ity anena tatpuruṣasmāsaṃ darśayati /
GSP28durdhpru:1697: na ca mānasya paścād iti [18a] vivakṣtiam,
GSP28durdhpru:1699: atra hi mānam eva pakṣadharmagrahaṇādeḥ paścādbhāvi vivakṣitam /
GSP28durdhpru:1702: kin tv anu mānasyeti ṣaṣṭhī ca na śrūyeta /
GSP28durdhpru:1704: “ṣaṣthy atasarthapratyayena” [pāṇini -- 2.3.30] ity anena paścāt śabdayoge ṣaṣṭhīyam /
GSP28durdhpru:1705: katham etad dvayasya paścādbhāvy anumānam ity āha -- gṛhīta iti /
GSP28durdhpru:1710: na caivaṃ prāpaṇe prāmāṇyāvahe kaścid viśeṣaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:1712: evaṃ bruvataḥ pratyakṣam apy adhyavasitam eva santānaṃ prāpayat pramāṇam /
GSP28durdhpru:1713: idam api tatheti katham asya na tathātvam iti bhāvaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:1715: pratyakṣasyāpi yad arthāvinābhāvitvaṃ tat tadutpattinimittakam eva /
GSP28durdhpru:1716: tac cānumānsyāpi samānam iti arthāvyabhicāreṇāpi nimittinā samānena bhāvyam iti /
GSP28durdhpru:1718: na ca etan mantavyam -- kalpanāpoḍhābhrāntatvam ced aprasiddham,
GSP28durdhpru:1719: kim anyat pratyakṣaya jñānasya rūpam avaśiṣyate yat pratyakṣaśabdavācyaṃ sad anūdyeteti /
GSP28durdhpru:1720: yasmād indriyānvayavyatirekānuvidhāyyartheṣu sākṣātkārijñānaṃ pratyakṣaśabdavācyaṃ sarveṣāṃ prasiddham,
GSP28durdhpru:1724: anena “pratyakṣam ekaṃ pramānam” iti bruvāṇaś cārvākaḥ,
GSP28durdhpru:1726: kaniṣṭhaṃ ca tatpramāṇam” ity ācakṣāṇo mīmāṃsakaś ca nirastaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:1728: yatra tv arthaviśeṣe varttate sa kathyata eva /
GSP28durdhpru:1730: kevalam indriyajñānādipratyakṣānuyāyitvāt pratyakṣatvākhyā jātir yā vyavahārasiddhā tayeti draṣṭavyam /
GSP28durdhpru:1731: tatrety ayam evaṃ vyavasthite satīti vākyopanyāse /
GSP28durdhpru:1732: evaṃ cānuvādavidhikrameṇa yad anyad anyena vyākhyātam “pratyakṣam iti saṃjñā kalpanāpoḍhatvādi saṃjñy eva /
GSP28durdhpru:1733: tena saṃjñāsaṃjñisambandhaḥ pratipādyate” iti tad vipratipattinirākaraṇe prastute 'prastutam /
GSP28durdhpru:1735: yad apy apareṇa vyākhyātaṃ “pradeśāntaraprasiddhayoḥ kalpanāpoḍhtvābhrāntatvayor anuvādena pratyakṣatvaṃ vidhīyate” iti tad api na caturasram iti pratipādayate /
GSP28durdhpru:1736: yataḥ prasiddhe lakṣyalakṣaṇabhāve lakṣaṇānuvādena lakṣyaṃ vidheyam,
GSP28durdhpru:1737: aprasiddhe tu lakṣaṇavākyena lakṣaṇam eva vidheyam,
GSP28durdhpru:1739: anyoś ca pakṣayor yāvān samarthanadūṣaṇaprakāras tāvān anenaiva viniścayaṭīkāyāṃ svayaṃ vivecita iti nehocyate /
GSP28durdhpru:1742: anena pūrva prasiddhasya paścāc chabdenābhidhānam anuvāda iti darśayati /
GSP28durdhpru:1743: tad evaṃ draṣṭavyam iti vidadhāno 'jñātasya śabdena jñāpanaṃ vidhir iti darśayati /
GSP28durdhpru:1749: tathā hi prathamaṃ yat tad indriyānvayavyatirekānuvidhāyitayā pratyakṣaṃ prasiddham iti pratipādyate /
GSP28durdhpru:1750: tadanu yadīdam indriyāśritaṃ jñānaṃ bhavatāṃ pratyakṣaṃ prasiddhaṃ tatrāpi pratyakṣaśa[18b]bdapravṛttāv arthasākṣātkāritvam eva nimittaṃ jānīte iti pratipādate /
GSP28durdhpru:1752: yat kalpanayā 'poḍhaṃ rahitaṃ tat kalpanāyā apoḍham apagataṃ bhavatīty arthābhedaṃ matvā kalpanāyā apoḍham iti karttari niṣṭhām āha /
GSP28durdhpru:1753: na tu kalpanāpoḍham iti karttari niṣṭhaiva /
GSP28durdhpru:1754: evaṃ hi tayā rahitam ity ācāryavivaraṇavirodhaḥ syāt /
GSP28durdhpru:1758: tatra yan na bhrāmyati tad abhrāntam /
GSP28durdhpru:1759: nanu kim ekasmin jñāne jñānāntarasambhavo 'sti yenāyaṃ pratiṣedhaḥ śobheta?
GSP28durdhpru:1760: kalpanājñāne 'pi ca kalpanāntaraṃ nāstīti tad api kalpanāpoḍhaṃ prasajyeteti vacanāvakāśaṃ paśyan kalpanāsvabhāvene[30]tyādinā 'sya vivikṣitam arthaṃ sphuṭyati /
GSP28durdhpru:1762: [30] dharmottare sarvatra pratiṣu `kalpanāsvabhāvarahitam' ity eva pāṭho labhyate na tu `kalpanāsvabhāvena rahitam' iti /
GSP28durdhpru:1763: evañ ca bruvan kalpanā'poḍham ity atrācārye lakṣaṇavākye bhāvapradhāno 'yaṃ kalpanāśabdaḥ,
GSP28durdhpru:1764: tena kalpanātvena rahitam ity artha iti darśayati /
GSP28durdhpru:1766: ubhayathā 'pi `kalpanāsvabhāvarahitam ity arthaḥ' ity asya sphuṭīkaraṇasya ghaṭanāt /
GSP28durdhpru:1768: evaṃ ca śabdārthaṃ sphuṭayatā 'nena yad ācāryadignāgīyapratyakṣalakṣaṇadūṣaṇāvasare -- “kalpanā nāmajātyādiyojanā /
GSP28durdhpru:1770: jātyādinā ca na vyapadiśyate viṣayabhedānuvidhāyi yaj jñānaṃ tatpratyakṣam” [nyāyavā- pṛ- 41] ity arthaṃ parikalpya “atha pratyakṣaśabdena ko 'rtho 'bhiddīyate /
GSP28durdhpru:1772: atha na pratyakṣm avācakas tarhi pratyakṣaśabdaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:1777: kalpenāpoḍhaśabdenāpi yadi tad ucyate kathaṃ na vyāghātaḥ?
GSP28durdhpru:1780: na cābhidheyam iti ko 'nyo bhadantād katum arhati” [nyāyavā- pṛ- 41] ityādi yad avādīd uddyotakaras tat sarvaṃ kalpanāpoḍhaśabdārthā'parijñānavilasitaṃ tasya tapasvin iti sūcitam
GSP28durdhpru:1783: yogācāramatam api sagṛhītaṃ bhavatī“ti pūrvayākhyānam avamanyamāno 'bhrāntaśadasyārtham āha -- abhrāntam iti /
GSP28durdhpru:1784: abhrāntam arthakriyākṣame 'viparyasyas taṃ yat tad ucyate /
GSP28durdhpru:1785: na tv avisaṃvādakam iha grahītavyam iti buddhisthaṃ paścād vyaktīkartavyam /
GSP28durdhpru:1786: anartho 'pi vastutayā 'dhyavasīyata ity arthakriyākṣama iti viśeṣeṣaṇam /
GSP28durdhpru:1793: sa upādhir viśeṣaṇam yasya varṇasya vastuśabdavācyasya śuklādiparamāṇusaṃghātasya tathotpannasya sa tathā /
GSP28durdhpru:1794: sanniveśaviśiṣṭasyaiva varṇasyānvayavyatirekābhyām arthakriyāyām upayogadarśanād etad āha /
GSP28durdhpru:1795: sa evātmā svabhāvo yasyeti tat tathā /
GSP28durdhpru:1799: na bhrāmyati na viparyasyati -- anyathāgrāhi na bhavati /
GSP28durdhpru:1800: syāt etat -- paramāṇvartha eva bhavanmate bāhyaṃ vastu /
GSP28durdhpru:1804: tat kathaṃ kiñcid abhrāntaṃ nāmeti? atrocyate /
GSP28durdhpru:1806: rahitatvān nirantaratvena pratibhāsa eva deśavitānāvabhāsātmā sthaulyaṃ nāparaṃ kiñcit /
GSP28durdhpru:1807: tatra tathābhūtaparamāṇusamudāyaniṣṭhaṃ nirvikalpakaṃ vijñānaṃ kathaṃ bhrāntaṃ syāt?
GSP28durdhpru:1808: yady ekaikaṃ paramāṇum anekadeśāvaṣṭambhena gṛhṇīyān na punar anekam anekadeśāvaṣṭambhena gṛhṇat /
GSP28durdhpru:1809: ito 'pi viparyasyed yadi bhinnadeśān paramāṇūn ekadeśān gṛṇīyāt /
GSP28durdhpru:1812: ekadeśagrahaṇe hi piṇḍo bhāseta aṇumātrako na tu vitatadeśaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:1815: tad ayam arthaḥ -- ekajñānagrāhyās tathāvidhā bahavaḥ paramāṇavaḥ sthūla iti /
GSP28durdhpru:1816: eko 'yaṃ sthūla iti tu tathābhūtapratibhāsāśrayeṇa vyavasthāpyamānatvāt pratibhāsadharma ity ucyate /
GSP28durdhpru:1818: pratyekam aparisamāpter ity alam iha vistreṇa /
GSP28durdhpru:1819: nanu caivam apy anyonyam asaṃsṛṣṭasvabhāvān pramāṇūn saṃsṛṣṭān gṛhṇad vijñānaṃ katham ivāviparyastaṃ nāmeti /
GSP28durdhpru:1827: tatra yadi nānārūpatvam asaṃsṛṣṭatvam iṣṭaṃ tadā na kaścit saṃsṛṣṭagraho nāma sambhāvati yato 'saṃsṛṣṭā eva paramāṇavaḥ sarvadā gṛhyante /
GSP28durdhpru:1832: atha nānādeśatvam asṃsṛṣṭatvam abhipretaṃ tad api natarām saṃsṛṣṭagraho yato nānādeśā nīlā paramāṇavo nānādeśā eva ca gṛhyante /
GSP28durdhpru:1833: ekadeśatvabhāsane hi piṇḍo bhāsetāṇumātraka ity uktam /
GSP28durdhpru:1834: atha rūpeṇaiva vijātīyena vyavahitatvam asaṃsṛṣṭatvaṃ vivakṣitam;
GSP28durdhpru:1835: tadā tu tad asambhavād eva na tad viparītagrahaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:1836: yato rūpāntaravyavadhānarahitā eva nirantarā nīlāḥ paramāṇāvaḥ,
GSP28durdhpru:1837: bhāsante ca tathābhūtā iti kathaṃ vibhramaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:1839: atha cchāyālokaparamāṇur utpadyamānaḥ kena pratibaddho yato notpadyate /
GSP28durdhpru:1840: na ca śakyaṃ vaktum -- madhye paramāṇvor nāsti paramāṇvantarasyāvakāśa iti /
GSP28durdhpru:1841: yato niravayavaḥ paramāṇuḥ sarvatra sāvakāśa iti /
GSP28durdhpru:1843: kevalaṃ nāvakāśābhāvāt tad anutpattir api tu hetvabhāvāt /
GSP28durdhpru:1847: tadā saṃsṛṣṭān paramāṇūn gṛhṇāti vijñānam iti indriyāntaragrāhyaśūnyān gṛhṇātīty uktaṃ bhavati /
GSP28durdhpru:1849: tathā hi yadi nāmendriyāntaragrāhyasparśādir na gṛhyate tathāpi nīlarūpaṃ tāvat svadeśasvabhāvasthitaṃ gṛhyata eva /
GSP28durdhpru:1850: na ca bhinnendriyagrāhyaśūnyānāṃ svarūpaṃ gṛhyamāṇaṃ viparītaṃ gṛhītaṃ bhavati /
GSP28durdhpru:1861: tataś cākāśam antaram ity anyavastv antaraṃ na kiñcid
GSP28durdhpru:1866: tathā nirantarāḥ paramāṇava ity uktaṃ bhavati /
GSP28durdhpru:1867: tato nirantarāś ca paramāṇavo nirantarā eva bhāsante /
GSP28durdhpru:1870: yat khalv atyantam asat śaśaviṣāṇaprakhyaṃ tat kathaṃ bhāseta?
GSP28durdhpru:1871: nanv ākāśātmano 'py antarasyābhāve rūpasaṃsargaḥ paramāṇūnāṃ prasajyeta /
GSP28durdhpru:1873: nāsmābhir ucyate rūpam ekaṃ paramāṇūnāṃ deśo naika iti /
GSP28durdhpru:1874: api tu bhinnarūpadeśā utpannā madhyavarttivijātīyarūparahitās tathaiva bhāsanta iti tat kathaṃ rūpasaṃsargaprasaṅgaḥ?
GSP28durdhpru:1876: tataś cātad deśaṃ taddeśatayā gṛhṇad vijñāṇaṃ katham abhrāntaṃ nāmeti?
GSP28durdhpru:1878: yadā deśaḥ pratibhāsate tadā tasmin deśe pratibhāsamāne yaḥ pratibhāsate 'rthaḥ sa deśaviśiṣṭa ucyate /
GSP28durdhpru:1879: yadi ca rasādiś cakṣurvijñāṇe pratibhāseta tadā taddeśavyāpini nīle gṛhyamāṇe syād bhrāntaṃ vijñānam /
GSP28durdhpru:1883: nīlam eva hi bhāsamānaṃ deśaḥ nāparo deśaḥ kaścid ābhāsate /
GSP28durdhpru:1888: tato deśakālākārāṇām ekasyāpy aparityāgān nīlābhāsaṃ vijñānam abhrāntam eva /
GSP28durdhpru:1889: sarvaṃ caitad grāhyatattvaṃ viniścaye dharmottareṇaiva nistareṇa nirūpitam iti neha pratanyate /
GSP28durdhpru:1890: nanv evam abhrāntatve yogācāramatam asaṅgṛhītaṃ syāt /
GSP28durdhpru:1892: tat kathaṃ pūrvavyākhyānāvajñā na kriyata iti cet /
GSP28durdhpru:1896: na ca sarvaṃ vijñānavāde yojayi[20a]tuṃ śakyam /
GSP28durdhpru:1900: dvicandrādinirāsaḥ katham iti cet samyagjñānaṃ sad evam ity abhiprāyād adoṣaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:1906: kalpanā'poḍhagranaṇaṃ tu anumānanirāsārtham iti” yat pūrvakair vyakhyātaṃ tad vyaktam evāpahastayann āha -- etac ca -- iti /
GSP28durdhpru:1911: nanu kim ucyate na tv anumānanivṛttyartham iti?
GSP28durdhpru:1916: tato nānumānanivṛttyartham iti nānumānanivṛttyartham eveti sāvadhāraṇaṃ niṣidhyate /
GSP28durdhpru:1917: yadi tu vipratipattinirācikīrṣayā kriyamāṇam anumānaṃ vyavacchinatti na tadartham eva dvayam iti /
GSP28durdhpru:1918: nanu nedaṃ lakṣaṇadvayam anumānavyavacchedārthaṃ pūrvakair vyākhyātam /
GSP28durdhpru:1924: tatra asaty abhrāntagrahaṇe gacchadvṛkṣadarśanādi pratyakṣam kalpanāpoḍhatvāt syāt /
GSP28durdhpru:1925: tato hi pravṛttena vṛkṣamātram avāpyate iti saṃvādakatvāt samyagjñānam,
GSP28durdhpru:1926: kalpanāpoḍhatvāc ca pratyakṣaṃ iti syād āśaṅkā /
GSP28durdhpru:1931: ato gacchadvṛkṣadarśanādi mithyājñānam iti uktaṃ bhavati /
GSP28durdhpru:1932: `yataḥ kalapnāpoḍhagraṇenaivānumānaṃ nirvarttitam' ity ucyata iti cet /
GSP28durdhpru:1934: kevalaṃ yady abhrāntagrahaṇaṃ vyavacchedārtham eva tadānumānavyavacchedārtham eva yujyate /
GSP28durdhpru:1937: tathā hi dvididhaṃ samyagjñānam iti prastutya lakṣaṇam idaṃ vidhīyamānaṃ tad adhikāreṇaiva vihitaṃ bhavati /
GSP28durdhpru:1938: nanv evaṃ sati kalpanāpoḍhagraṇenaiva nivṛtte abhrāntagrahaṇam atiricyate /
GSP28durdhpru:1940: na tu dvicandrādijñānanivṛttyartham idaṃ yujyata iti dharmottarasyāśayaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:1941: yady etad artham abhrāntagrahaṇaṃ na bhavati tarhi kim anenety āha -- tatra -- iti /
GSP28durdhpru:1942: nanu gacchadvṛkṣadarśaṇādeḥ kalpanāpoḍhasyāpi visaṃvādakatvena samyagjñānatvābhāvād eva vyavacchede siddhe kim etad arthenābhrāntapadenety āha -- tato hi -- iti /
GSP28durdhpru:1947: na hi yad eva samyagjñānam tad eva pratyakṣam ity āśaṅkya pūrvoktam eva prasaṅgenāha -- kalpanā -- iti /
GSP28durdhpru:1953: yadi saty api syāt tadā kim anenety āha -- tannivṛttyartham iti śaṅkānivṛttyarthamātram /
GSP28durdhpru:1954: anena etad darśati -- yady api paramārthataḥ samyagjñānādhikārād evamādijñānaṃ vyavacchedyate /
GSP28durdhpru:1955: tathāpy aṃśasaṃvādavādinām āhatya vipratipattinirākaraṇārthaṃ ka[20b]rttavyam evābhrāntagrahaṇam iti /
GSP28durdhpru:1957: yenaitad vipratipattinirākaraṇārthaṃ bhavatīty āśaṅkāyāṃ dūrasthitam api gacchadvṛkṣadarśanādi mithyājñānam ity uktaṃ bhavatīti yojanīyam /
GSP28durdhpru:1960: kuto mithyājñāṇaṃ tad uktam ity apekṣāyāṃ prathamam uktaṃ tad iti yojanīyam /
GSP28durdhpru:1961: hir yasmāt tato 'yam arthaḥ -- yasmāt tad gacchadvṛkṣadarśanādibhrāntatvāt na pratyakṣam,
GSP28durdhpru:1964: anumānarūpatve tv anirvarttate katham asya tathātvam ity āśaṅkāyāṃ yojyam,
GSP28durdhpru:1969: tathāpi kathaṃ mithyājñānam ity āśaṅkāyāṃ vācyam /
GSP28durdhpru:1973: nanv anumānādirūpanirākaraṇe yady abhrāntagrahaṇasya vyāpāro bhavet,
GSP28durdhpru:1975: yathā svayam upapattyaivānumānādibhāvo vyudastas tat katham abhrānta
GSP28durdhpru:1977: yadi mithyājñānaṃ kathaṃ tato vṛkṣāvāptir iti cet,
GSP28durdhpru:1983: yaddeśaś ca avāpyate sa na dṛṣṭa iti na tasmāt kaścid artho 'vāpyate /
GSP28durdhpru:1986: tathā abhrāntagrahaṇena apy anumāne nivartate kalpanāpoḍhagrahaṇaṃ vipratipattinirākaraṇārtham /
GSP28durdhpru:1987: grahaṇena tan mityājñānam ity uktaṃ bhavatīy ucyate /
GSP28durdhpru:1989: kin tv anumānādirūpatānirākaraṇahetunā dattasāhāyakena satā 'bhrantagrahaṇena tan mithyājñānam ity uktaṃ bhavatīty uktam iti boddhyavyam /
GSP28durdhpru:1991: tat kim anumānādirūpatānirākraṇam aprakṛtaṃ kṛtam iti cet /
GSP28durdhpru:1992: apratyakṣatvapradarśane prasaṅgena kṛtam iti kā kṣatiḥ?
GSP28durdhpru:1994: kevalaṃ tata iti gacchadvṛkṣadarśanarūpān mithyājñānāt paricchinno dṛṣṭaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:1995: vṛkṣa iti vṛkṣatvena prathanād ucyate na tv asau tathā 'vabhāsamāno vṛkṣa eva /
GSP28durdhpru:1999: nanu tato 'pi pravṛttasyāsti cchāyādyarthakriyākārirūpasya pādapasya prāptis tatkatham apahnūyata iti?
GSP28durdhpru:2002: tatra mithyājñānam arthinaḥ pravṛttimātrahetur na tu vṛkṣaprāpakam iti saṃkṣepārthaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:2003: yadi mithyājñānatvapratipādanārtham abhrāntagrahaṇaṃ na tarhi vipratipattinirākaraṇārtham ity āha -- evam iti /
GSP28durdhpru:2006: etādṛśam api pratyakṣam iti virudhāyāḥ pratipatter nirāsārtham abhrāntagraṇām iti /
GSP28durdhpru:2009: uktaṃ ca dvayam etat tannirāsārtham ity āśaṅkyāha -- tatheti /
GSP28durdhpru:2011: vipratipattinirākaraṇārtham iti pratyakṣapṛṣṭhabhāvino 'pi vikalpasya vyāvahārikalokādhyavasāyenābhrāntasya yat pratyakṣatvaṃ kaiścid iṣṭam,
GSP28durdhpru:2013: tatrāsati kalpanāpoḍhgrahaṇe ghaṭo 'yam ityādijñānaṃ pratyakṣam abhrāntatvāt syāt /
GSP28durdhpru:2014: tato hi pravṛttena ghaṭādir arthaḥ prāpyata iti saṃvādakatvān samyagjñānam abhrāntatvāc ca pratyakṣaṃ syādā[d ity ā]śaṅkā /
GSP28durdhpru:2019: abhrāntam hi anumānaṃ svapratibhāse 'narthe 'rthādhyavasāyena pravṛttatvāt [PVin II 2,8] /
GSP28durdhpru:2020: pratyakṣam tu grāhye rūpe na viparyastam /
GSP28durdhpru:2021: na tv avisaṃvādakam abhrāntam iha grahītayam /
GSP28durdhpru:2022: yato samyagjñānam eva pratyakṣam, na anyat /
GSP28durdhpru:2023: tatra samyagjñānatvād eva avisaṃvādakatve labdhe punar avisaṃvādakagrahaṇam niṣprayojanam eva /
GSP28durdhpru:2024: evaṃ hi vākyārthaḥ syāt -- pratyakṣākhyam yad avisaṃvādakaṃ jñānaṃ tat kalpanāpoḍham avisaṃvādakaṃ ca iti /
GSP28durdhpru:2026: tasmād grāhye 'rthakriyākṣame vasturūpe yad aviparyastam tad abhrāntam iha veditavyam /
GSP28durdhpru:2027: kīdṛśī punaḥ kalpanā iha gṛhyate ity āha --
GSP28durdhpru:2031: abhilāpena saṃsargaḥ abhilāpasaṃsargaḥ ekasmin jñāne 'bhidheyākārasya abhidhānākāreṇa saha grāhyākāratayā
GSP28durdhpru:2035: ato ghaṭo 'yam ityādijñānam asamyagjñānaṃ bhavatīti pūrvavad vacanīyaṃ yojanīyaṃ ca /
GSP28durdhpru:2037: yadi nāma visaṃvādakatvalakṣaṇam asamyagjñānatvaṃ nāsti tathāpi gṛhītārthagrāhiṇo 'syāpūrvādhigamābhāvāt karaṇārthābhāvarūpam asamyagjñāntvaṃ smaraṇāder iva kiṃ nānumanyate?
GSP28durdhpru:2039: idam anyatra vistareṇa nirastam ity āstāṃ tāvad iheti /
GSP28durdhpru:2040: svapratibhāsa ityāder granthasya tu satyam arthaṃ viṣayavipratipattinirākaraṇavākyavivaraṇaṃ vivecayiṣyanto vivecayiṣyāmaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:2041: samprati yad doṣadarśanāt pūrveṣāṃ vyākhyānam avamanyānyathā 'yam abhrāntārthaṃ vyācaṣṭe
GSP28durdhpru:2042: taṃ kaṇṭhoktam karttuṃ teṣām abhimatam abhrāntārthaṃ pūrvaṃ sāmarthyān niṣiddham
GSP28durdhpru:2043: api sākṣān niṣedhann āha -- na tu -- iti /
GSP28durdhpru:2045: yata ityādi veditavyam ity antaṃ subodham /
GSP28durdhpru:2048: atha grāhyagrāhakabhāvena pravarttamānaṃ jñānaṃ kalpanā tadā sarvam asarvajñajñāṇaṃ
GSP28durdhpru:2049: tathā pravṛttam iti kim avaśiṣyate yad avikalpakaṃ syād ity abhipretya kalpanāyāḥ
GSP28durdhpru:2056: tato yadā ekasmiñ jñāne 'bhidheyābhidhānayor ākārau saṃniviṣṭau bhavatas tadā saṃsṛṣṭe abhidhānābhidheye bhavataḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:2057: abhilāpasaṃsargāya yogyo abhidheyākārābhāso yasyāṃ pratītau sā tathā ukatā /
GSP28durdhpru:2060: kācit tv abhilāpena asaṃsṛṣṭā api abhilāpasaṃsargayogyābhāsā bhavati /
GSP28durdhpru:2062: tatra abhilāpasaṃsṛṣṭābhāsā kalpanā ity uktāv avyutpannasaṅketasya kalpanā na saṃgṛhyeta /
GSP28durdhpru:2064: yady apy abhilāpasaṃsṛṣṭābhāsā na bhavati tadaharjātasya bālakasya kalpanā,
GSP28durdhpru:2066: yā ca abhilāpasaṃsṛṣṭā sā api yogyā /
GSP28durdhpru:2068: kālena dṛṣṭena rūpeṇaikyam āpādito 'ntarjalpākāras tathā pratibhāsamāno vācyaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:2069: saṃsargapadena sārdham asya vigrahaṃ prāha -- abhilāpena -- iti /
GSP28durdhpru:2074: kathaṃ punar vācyavācakayoḥ saṃsargaḥ sambhavatītyāha -- ekasimin iti /
GSP28durdhpru:2075: grāhyākāratayā milanam ity ekajñānagrāhyākāratayā 'vasthānam iti vācyam /
GSP28durdhpru:2076: arthākāraś ced vācakaśabdākāreṇa sahaikajñānārūḍho bhavati tadā vācyavācakayoḥ saṃsarga iti yāvat /
GSP28durdhpru:2079: yena tad grāhi vijñānaṃ savikalpakaṃ syād ityāśaṅkyopasaṃhāravyājenāha -- tata iti /
GSP28durdhpru:2080: yadākārau saṃniniviṣṭau pratibhāsitau bhavatas tadā saṃsṛṣṭe tathātayā sambaddhe bhavataḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:2081: ekasmin jñāne viśeṣyaviśeṣaṇatvenākārapratibhāsa evānayor vācyavācakatvagrahaṇam iti bhāvaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:2082: abhilāpasaṃsargāya yogya ity arthakathanam idaṃ [21b] kṛtam /
GSP28durdhpru:2083: samāsas tv abhilāpasaṃsargasya yogya iti karttavyaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:2085: yady evam abhilāpasaṃsṛṣṭapratibhāsety evāstu kiṃ yogyagrahaṇenety upālambhaṃ paśyan yathā 'sya sāphalyaṃ tathā darśayitum upakramate -- tatreti
GSP28durdhpru:2089: `idam asya vācyam idam asya vācakam' ity ubhayāṃśāvalambijñānaṃ
GSP28durdhpru:2091: asaty abhilāpasaṃsarge kuto yogyatā avasitir iti ced /
GSP28durdhpru:2094: grāhyo hy artho vijñānaṃ janayan niyatapratibhāsaṃ kuryāt /
GSP28durdhpru:2095: yathā rūpaṃ cakṣurvijñānaṃ janayad niyatapratibhāsaṃ janayati /
GSP28durdhpru:2099: vyutpanno jñātaḥ saṃketo yena sa vyutpannasaṃketaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:2100: tasya yadi sarvaiva tādṛśī tadā kācid iti na vācyam,
GSP28durdhpru:2101: yogyagrahaṇean ca na kiñcid ity āha -- kācid iti /
GSP28durdhpru:2105: yady abhilāpasaṃsṛṣṭābhāseti kṛte 'pi tathābhūtāyāḥ pratīteḥ saṅgrahaḥ,
GSP28durdhpru:2107: tayor madhye 'vyuptannasaṃketasya yā sā na saṅgṛhyate /
GSP28durdhpru:2109: arthapradarśanatvād asyābhilāpasaṃsṛṣṭābhāsā pratītiḥ kalpanety uktau vacane satīty arthaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:2112: yadi saty api yogyagrahaṇe tadasaṃgrahas tathāpi kiṃ tenety āha -- yogyeti /
GSP28durdhpru:2117: kathaṃ punar yogyagrahaṇena tasyāḥ saṅgraha ity āha -- yady apīti /
GSP28durdhpru:2120: ahni vā jāta utpanna iti tathā /
GSP28durdhpru:2122: yady evaṃ vyutpannasaṅketasya sā kathaṃ saṅgṛhyata ity āha -- yā ceti /
GSP28durdhpru:2124: yadi sā tatsaṃsargayogyā na syāt kathaṃ tatsaṃsargam anubhaved iti bhāvaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:2129: tat kathaṃ yogyatā kalpyatām ity abhisandhinā asatītyādinā pūrvapakṣam utthāpayati /
GSP28durdhpru:2130: evaṃ codayitvā 'numānataḥ sā siddhyatīti manvānaḥ sādhanam āha -- aniyateti /
GSP28durdhpru:2132: prakaraṇāpanne sādhye hetau cābhihite sukaraḥ sādhanaprayoga iti prayogaṃ na jagau /
GSP28durdhpru:2134: prayogas tv evam iha karttavyaḥ -- yo 'niyatapratibhāso vikalpaḥ,
GSP28durdhpru:2136: bālasya vikalpa eva kutaḥ siddho yenedam uttarāṇi caitadaṅgāni sādhanāni nā[22a]śrayāsiddhāni syur iti?
GSP28durdhpru:2139: tat punar anumānam anena sujñātatvān nopanyastam iti veditavyam /
GSP28durdhpru:2140: evaṃ tad draṣṭavyam -- yā niyamavatī pravṛttiḥ kvacit prāṇinaḥ,
GSP28durdhpru:2143: niyamavatī ca taditaraparihāreṇa stanādau pravṛttir bālakasyeti kāryahetuḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:2144: sā ca tādṛśī pravṛttiḥ pratyakṣādhigateti svasiddhau na pramāṇāntaraṃ
GSP28durdhpru:2146: kutaḥ punar etadvikalpo rthān na utpadyata ity arthasannidhinirapekṣatvāt /
GSP28durdhpru:2147: bālo 'pi hi yāvad dṛśyamānaṃ stanaṃ sa eva ayam iti pūrvadṛṣṭatvena na pratyavamṛśati tāvan na uparatarudito
GSP28durdhpru:2149: na punar anena bālo 'pi hītyādinā vikalpasādhanam upanyastam iti mantavyam,
GSP28durdhpru:2152: nanu ca parokṣatvāt tasyāniyatapratibhāsatvasandehe sandigdhāsiddho 'yaṃ hetur iti /
GSP28durdhpru:2155: pratibhāsasya jñānākārasya niyamaḥ -- arthākāra evāyaṃ śabdākāra eva vā,
GSP28durdhpru:2156: rūpākāra evāyaṃ rasākāra eva vetyātmako vā tasya hetur janakaḥ tasmād /
GSP28durdhpru:2158: bhavanaṃ bhāva utpādas tanniṣedhād abhāvo 'nutpāda eva /
GSP28durdhpru:2159: pratibhāsaniyamahetor abhāvād -- avidyamānatvād iti vyākhāne tu yathāśruti vyadhikaraṇāsiddho hetuḥ syāt /
GSP28durdhpru:2160: anyathā hetuvacane tu kriyamāṇe tatrārthe hetur anabhihita eva syāt /
GSP28durdhpru:2162: kutaḥ punar etad vikalpo 'rthān notpadyate iti ca pūrvapakṣaḥ sūtthāno na syāt /
GSP28durdhpru:2163: mṛtvā śīrtvā yathā kathañcit sarvasyāsya samarthane ca vaktur akauśalaṃ syād iti /
GSP28durdhpru:2164: nanu pratibhāsaniyamahetur yaḥ kaścana sa ca tatra bhaviṣyati /
GSP28durdhpru:2166: vaktavyas tadā 'sau yataḥ sakāśād anutpādāt tathātvaṃ jñātavyam ity āha -- grāhya iti /
GSP28durdhpru:2167: yady artha ity eva kriyate tadendiryam apy artho jñānaṃ janayatīti tasyāpy ākāraniyāmakatvaṃ syāt /
GSP28durdhpru:2178: niyatapratibhāsam iti śabdākāraparihāreṇārthākāradhāryeva rasākāraparihāreṇa rūpākāradhāryeva ceti /
GSP28durdhpru:2180: tato niyatapratibhāso bhaviṣyatīty āśaṅkya pūrvoktam eva prasaṅgena smārayati -- vikalpeti /
GSP28durdhpru:2182: evaṃ tu prayogaḥ kāryaḥ -- yad arthān notpadyate jñānaṃ tanniyatapratibhāsaṃ na bhavati /
GSP28durdhpru:2185: notpadyate cā[22b]rthād bālakasya vikalpa iti vyāpakānupalabdhiḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:2186: nanu bālavikalpasya parokṣatvāt tat utpattir anupattir vā na śakyate niścetum /
GSP28durdhpru:2187: ato 'yaṃ sandigdhāsiddho hetur ity abhipretya codayati kuta iti sāmānyahetoḥ praśnaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:2190: tena na kutaściddhetor idam ity arthaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:2192: evaṃ tu prayogaḥ karaṇīyaḥ -- yaj jñānaṃ svotpattāv arthasannidhinirapekṣaṃ tad arthān notpadyate /
GSP28durdhpru:2195: asiddhim asyāḥ parihattu bhūmikāṃ racayann āha -- bālo 'pi hi -- ityādi /
GSP28durdhpru:2198: pūrvadṛṣṭāparadṛṣṭaṃ ca artham ekīkurvad vijñānam asannihitaviṣayam,
GSP28durdhpru:2207: tena yo mayā pūrvaṃ kṣutpratighātahetutvena pratipannaḥ sa evā'yam iti pratyavamarṣasya rūpam ācaṣṭe /
GSP28durdhpru:2210: uparataṃ ruditaṃ yasmāt sa tathā san nāyarpati /
GSP28durdhpru:2211: sarvair eva svasantatāv evamādivyavahārasya dṛṣṭadṛśyamānayor ekīkaraṇakāraṇātvenāvagatvād evam ucyate /
GSP28durdhpru:2212: tasyaiva cānyatra loṣṭādau ḍhaukite 'pi tathā 'darśanāc ca /
GSP28durdhpru:2213: nanu bālasya karaṇānām apāṭavāt saṃketāgrahaṇāc ca nāntarjalpākāro 'pi śabdaḥ sambhavati /
GSP28durdhpru:2215: tat katham evaṃ yāvan na pratyavamṛśati -- ity ucyate? ucyate /
GSP28durdhpru:2216: anyaiva hi bhaṅgyā asti sā kācid dṛṣṭadṛśyamānayor ekīkaraṇāvasthā yā tatra nimittam iti pratipādyate /
GSP28durdhpru:2217: sā ca śabdena pratipādyamānā abhyastenāmunā śabdena pratipādyate /
GSP28durdhpru:2218: na punar evam evāsau pratyavamṛśatīty ucyate /
GSP28durdhpru:2219: nanu dvitīyādidarśanakāle bhavatu pūrvadṛṣṭāparadṛṣṭayor ekīkaraṇena mukhārpaṇam,
GSP28durdhpru:2221: na khalu stanam adrādṣīd asau yena dṛṣṭena dṛśyamānam ekīkṛtyārpayet /
GSP28durdhpru:2224: na cādimān saṃsāra iti kā kṣatiḥ?
GSP28durdhpru:2228: mā ca bhūt sarvathā paścād vyutpatsyamānena viśiṣṭena śabdena saṃsṛṣṭārthapratibhāsaḥ,
GSP28durdhpru:2229: na bhavati tasya vikalpapratyaya ity ucyate /
GSP28durdhpru:2233: co 'vadhāraṇe kurvad ity asmāt paro draṣṭāvyaḥ/
GSP28durdhpru:2235: tenāyam arthaḥ -- yasmāt pūrvadṛṣṭam ekīkaroty eva tasmād asannihitaviṣayam iti /
GSP28durdhpru:2236: tathā kurvad api katham asnnihitaviṣayam ity āha -- pūrvadṛṣṭatvasya[32] -- iti /
GSP28durdhpru:2238: nivṛtte ca pūrvadarśane pūrvadarśanaviṣayatvaṃ vastuno nāsti /
GSP28durdhpru:2239: tad uttarakālabhāvinā jñānena pūrvajñānaviṣa[23a]yatvam asannihitam eva vatuno dṛśyata iti /
GSP28durdhpru:2241: arthasannidhinirapekṣaṃ tu kathaṃ siddham ity āha -- asannihiteti /
GSP28durdhpru:2245: īdṛśas tu prayogo jñātavyaḥ -- yad asannihitaviṣayaṃ jñānaṃ tad arthasannidhinirapekṣam,
GSP28durdhpru:2247: pūrvadṛṣṭatvena pratyabhijñānāc ca bālavijñānam asannihitaviṣayam iti svabhāvaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:2250: kin tv atra pradīpānusārī pāṭho gṛhītaḥ / -- saṃ-
GSP28durdhpru:2251: samprati śiṣyāṇāṃ sukhapratipattyarthaṃ yathottarottarasya hetoḥ siddhau pūrvapūrvasya hetoḥ siddhir bhavati tathā darśayati -- anapekṣaṃ ca -- iti /
GSP28durdhpru:2256: ata eva svalakṣaṇasya api vācyavācakabhāvam abhyupagamya etad avikalpakatvam ucyate /
GSP28durdhpru:2257: yady api hi svalakṣaṇam eva vācyaṃ vācakaṃ ca bhāvet tathā apy abhilāpasaṃsṛṣṭārthavijñānaṃ savikalpakam /
GSP28durdhpru:2258: na ca indriyavijñānam arthena niyamitapratibhāsatvād abhilāpasaṃsargayogyapratibhāsaṃ bhavati iti nirvikalpakam /
GSP28durdhpru:2259: śrotrajñānaṃ tarhi śabdasvalakṣaṇagrāhi śabdasvalakṣaṇaṃ ca kiṇcid vācyaṃ kiñcid vācakam ity abhilāpa
GSP28durdhpru:2263: saty api svalakṣaṇasya vācyavācakabhāve saṅketakāladṛṣṭatvena grahyamāṇaṃ
GSP28durdhpru:2264: nanu kim aniyatapratibhāsatve sādhye 'rthanirapekṣatvaṃ hetur yena tathā sad aniyatapratibhāsam ity ucyate /
GSP28durdhpru:2265: pratibhāsaniyamahetor iti ca madhyavarttī ca granthaḥ kathaṃ neyaḥ? ucyate /
GSP28durdhpru:2269: anapekṣam arthasannidhinirapekṣaṃ satpratibhāsaniyamaheto anutpannam iti pratibhāsaniyamahetor abhāvād ity asya sāmarthyād vākyabhedaṃ kṛtvā
GSP28durdhpru:2270: tataḥ pratibhāsaniyamahetor abhāvād anutpādād aniyatapratibhāsam iti yojanīyam /
GSP28durdhpru:2272: co vaktavyam ity etad ity asminn arthaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:2273: sarvam etad indriyajñāne 'pi praraḥ kadācid āśaṅkayed iti tannirāsārtham āha -- indriyeti /
GSP28durdhpru:2276: iha pūvavyākhyātṛbhiḥ “asāmarthyavaiyarthyābhyāṃ svalakṣaṇasya saṃketayitum aśakyatvād avācyavācakatvam /
GSP28durdhpru:2279: anyathā 'py avikalpatvasya susādhatvāt kim anyāpohānayanenāprakṛteneti manyāmāna āha -- ata eva -- iti /
GSP28durdhpru:2280: yasmād indiryajñānaṃ niyatapratibhāsam -- ata eva asmād eva hetoḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:2283: vācyagrahaṇe katham avikalpakam ity āha -- yady api hi -- iti /
GSP28durdhpru:2284: yady api hīti nipātasamudāyo `yadi nāma'śabdasyārthe varttate /
GSP28durdhpru:2287: evaṃ bruvato 'yaṃ bhāvaḥ -- koṣṭhaśuddhyā vācyam astu svalakṣaṇaṃ tathāpi tadindriyajñāṇaṃ kevalam eva svalakṣaṇam ātmany ādarśayati,
GSP28durdhpru:2288: na tu vācakam apīti katham abhilāpasaṃsṛṣṭārthapratibhāsatvaṃ vikalpakatvam ātmasāt kuryād iti?
GSP28durdhpru:2290: svalakṣaṇaṃ vācyaṃ vācakaṃ ca gṛhītaṃ syāt /
GSP28durdhpru:2291: na ca saṅketakālabhāvi darśanaviṣayatvaṃ vastunaḥ sampraty asti /
GSP28durdhpru:2292: yathā hi saṅketakālabhāvi darśanam adya viruddham,
GSP28durdhpru:2293: tadvad tadviṣayatvam apy arthasya adya na asti /
GSP28durdhpru:2294: tataḥ pūrvakāladṛṣṭatvam apaśyac chrotrajñānaṃ na vācakabhāvagrāhi vācyavācakabhāvagrāhi/
GSP28durdhpru:2295: anena eva nyāyena yogijñānam api sakalaśabdārthāvabhāsitve 'pi saṅketakālasṛṣṭatvāgrahaṇān nirvikalpakam /
GSP28durdhpru:2298: yat punar etaddvayapratibhāsīndriyajñānaṃ tad dvayapratibhāsād vikalpakaṃ prāptam ity abhipretya codayati -- śrotreti /
GSP28durdhpru:2300: sarvam indriyajñānam avikalpakam iti na kṣamyata etad ity arthaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:2304: śabdagrāhiṇo 'pi vācyāgrahaṇe kathaṃ tathātvam ity āha -- śabdeti [23b] /
GSP28durdhpru:2309: astu tathāpratibhāsaṃ kim ata ity āha -- tathā ceti /
GSP28durdhpru:2310: tathā ca sati tasmiṃś coktaprakāre sati /
GSP28durdhpru:2311: evaṃ caitad draṣṭavyam -- yadaikena taraptamapau saṃjñināv uccāryete tadaiva ca kathañcid anyena `ghaḥ' iti saṃjñoccāryate /
GSP28durdhpru:2312: tadā tad dvitayam ekena śrotrajñānena pratiyataḥ puṃsaḥ śrotradhīr vikalpikā prasajyeteti /
GSP28durdhpru:2313: kathaṃ tarhi naiṣa doṣa ity āha -- saty apīti /
GSP28durdhpru:2314: co yasmāt tad evedaṃ yan mayā saṃketakālatvena gṛhyamāṇaṃ tathā gṛhītaṃ bhavati /
GSP28durdhpru:2315: yady evam astu saṃketakāladṛṣṭatvena grahaṇam ity āha -- na ceti /
GSP28durdhpru:2321: tadbhāve nigaḍākarṣaṇanyāyena prāktanadarśanasyāpi sthitiḥ prasajyeteti bhāvaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:2322: mā grahīt saṃketakāladṛṣṭatvaṃ tayor gṛhyamāṇayoḥ śabdayos tathāpi kathaṃ na vācyavācakabhāvagrāhi tajjñānam ity āśaṅkyopasaṃharann āha -- tata iti /
GSP28durdhpru:2323: yataḥ samketakālatvena gṛhyamāṇaṃ vācyaṃ vācakaṃ ca gṛhītaṃ bhavati tataḥ kāraṇāt śrotravijñānaṃ na vācyavācakabhāvagrāhi /
GSP28durdhpru:2325: kim ataḥ? etat punar enaṃ tathaiva grahīṣyatīty āha -- pūrveti /
GSP28durdhpru:2327: syād etat -- saṃketadṛṭātvenāpi na grahīṣyate 'rthaḥ śabdo vā /
GSP28durdhpru:2328: atha ca viśiṣṭavācakavācakatvena viśiṣṭārthavācakatvena ca grahīṣyata iti /
GSP28durdhpru:2330: evaṃ hi bruvatedam abhipratam -- yena jñānena yo arthaḥ saṃketakālopalabdho yac chabdasaṃsargiṇā rūpeṇa naikīkriyate,
GSP28durdhpru:2332: tathā gojñānena saṃketakālopalabdhāśvaśabdasaṃsargiṇā 'śvarūpeṇa sahaikatvenāpratīyamāno gaur nāśvaśabdavācyo gṛhyate /
GSP28durdhpru:2333: śrotrajñānena saṃketakālopalabdha`gha'śabdasaṃsargiṇā ca rūpeṇa naikīkriyete ca tadā taraptamapāv iti vyāpakānupalabdhiḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:2337: tayā kalpanayā kalpanāsvabhāvena rahitaṃ śūnyaṃ sajjñānaṃ yad abhrāntaṃ tad pratyakṣam iti pareṇa sambandhaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:2339: na pratyekam iti darśayituṃ tayā rahitaṃ tat pratyakṣam iti lakṣaṇayoḥ parasparasāpekṣayoḥ pratyakṣaviṣayatvaṃ darśitam iti /
GSP28durdhpru:2342: yathā gośabdajñānena saṃketakālopalabdhāśvārthasaṃsargiṇāśvaśabdena sahaikatvenāpratīyamāno gośabdo nāśvārthavācako gṛhyate /
GSP28durdhpru:2343: śrotrajñānena saṃketadṛṣṭataraptamabarthasaṃsargiṇā rūpeṇa naikīkriyate ca tadā `gha'śabda iti saiva asiddhir anubhavena nirākṛtā /
GSP28durdhpru:2345: yadā tu pūrvadṛṣṭatvena graho 'sti tadā tajjñānam abhilāpasaṃsṛṣṭārthapratibhāsaṃ sad vikalparūpam eveti sarvam avadātam /
GSP28durdhpru:2346: śrotrajñāṇe yathā 'bhilāpasaṃsargayogyapratibhāsatvaṃ coditaṃ tathā yogijñāne 'pi codayituṃ śakyam iti tatrāpy amum eva parihāram atidiśann āha -- aneneti /
GSP28durdhpru:2347: yaj jñānaṃ saketakālaviṣayatvaṃ gṛhyamāṇasya na gṛhṇāti,
GSP28durdhpru:2348: na tad vācyavācakabhāvagrāhīty anena nyānena yuktyā yogijñānaṃ vakṣyamāṇalakṣaṇāṃ sakalaśabdārthāvabhāsitve saty api nirvikalpakam /
GSP28durdhpru:2350: asya tu sarvaśabdārthagrāhiṇaḥ kathaṃ tathātvam ity āha -- saṃketeti /
GSP28durdhpru:2351: tathā 'grahaṇam uktena nyāyena yoginaṃ praty api pūrvadarśanaviṣayatvasyāsattvād iti bhāvaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:2352: tayā rahitaṃ ity ācāryīyaṃ vivaraṇaṃ vyāca[24a]ṣṭe -- tayeti /
GSP28durdhpru:2354: tatas tasyāpi kalpanāpoḍhatvaṃ kiṃ na bhavati?
GSP28durdhpru:2355: atha kapanayā rahitam iti yan na vikalpyate ity ucyate,
GSP28durdhpru:2356: tad api kalpanāpoḍham ity anenaivākāreṇa vikalpyata iti katham etad ucyata iti paśyan kalpanayā rahitam ity asya vivakṣitam artham āha -- kalpanāsvabhāveneti
GSP28durdhpru:2358: yathā viṣāṇī kakudmān prānte vāladhir iti viṣāṇādimatā(-to)
GSP28durdhpru:2360: tadvat kalpanākhyena dharmiṇā dharmo 'bhilāpasaṃsargayogyapratibhāsatvākhyo nirdiṣṭa iti darśayati /
GSP28durdhpru:2361: ata eva cācāryadignāgīyapratyakṣalakṣaṇe kalpaṇāpoḍhatvākhye yad uddyotakaracodyam ihaiva pūrvam upadarśitaṃ tat khalu dharmakīrticodyasadṛśam iti sthitam /
GSP28durdhpru:2362: pareṇeti paradeśasthitena tad anāhitavibhramaṃ jñānaṃ pratyakṣam ity anena /
GSP28durdhpru:2363: abhrāntagrahaṇasyaiva tad vivaraṇaṃ iti abhrāntagrahaṇam iha /
GSP28durdhpru:2364: dūrasthitena sambandhakaraṇe kim prayojanam ity āha -- kalpanāpoḍheti /
GSP28durdhpru:2365: militayor anayos tallakṣaṇatvāt pratyakṣalakṣaṇam ity ekavacanena nirdeśaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:2367: kathaṃ parasparasāpekṣatety āha -- tayā rahitaṃ yad abhrāntaṃ tat pratyakṣam vyavahartavyam iti śeṣaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:2375: mandaṃ hi bhramyamāṇe 'lātādau na cakrabhrāntir utpadyate /
GSP28durdhpru:2379: gacchantyāṃ nāvi sthitasya gacchadvṛkṣādibhrāntir utpadyate iti yānagrahaṇam /
GSP28durdhpru:2382: vātādiṣu hi kṣobhaṃ gateṣu jvalitastambhādibhrāntir utpadyate etac ca adhyātmagataṃ vibhramakāraṇam /
GSP28durdhpru:2383: sarvair eva ca vibhramakāraṇair indriyaviṣayabāhyādhyātmikāśrayagatair indriyam eva vikartavyam /
GSP28durdhpru:2385: ete samkṣobhaparyantā ādayo yeṣāṃ te tathoktāḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:2391: tair anāhito vibhramo yasmiṃs tathāvidhaṃ jñānaṃ pratyakṣam /
GSP28durdhpru:2397: yady api mandaṃ bhramyamāṇasyālātasya vibhramakāraṇatvādarśanād āśubhramaṇaṃ labhyate,
GSP28durdhpru:2398: tathāpi śāśtrakṛtā svakīyavacanākauśalaparihārārtham āśugrahaṇaṃ kṛtam ity avaseyam /
GSP28durdhpru:2399: pūrvasmād etadbhedena katham uktam ity āha -- etad iti /
GSP28durdhpru:2402: mandaṃ hi gacchantyāṃ nāvi na gacchadvṛkṣādidarśanaṃ bhavatīty anubhvasiddham etat /
GSP28durdhpru:2404: etat kasmāt pṛthag uktam ity āha etac ceti /
GSP28durdhpru:2408: sa keṣām ity ākāṅkṣāyām āha -- vāteti /
GSP28durdhpru:2409: nāsau vibhramakāraṇam ity āśaṅkām apanudann āha -- vātādiṣu -- iti /
GSP28durdhpru:2411: kṣobhaṃ prakopaṃ gateṣu saṃkṣubdheṣv iti yāvat /
GSP28durdhpru:2413: nauyānādīnāṃ tu kathaṃ satsv api teṣu tadavasthatvād indriyasyety āha -- sarvair eveti /
GSP28durdhpru:2414: indiryagatasya timirāder indriyavikāratvena sammatasyāpy upādānaṃ dṛṣṭāntārtham /
GSP28durdhpru:2416: tathā anyair api tadvikurvadbhir eva vibhramahetubhir bhāvyam iti /
GSP28durdhpru:2417: kasmāt punar amībhir indriyavikāro 'vaśyakartavya ity āha -- avikṛta ityādi /
GSP28durdhpru:2422: tad eva lakṣaṇam ākhyāya yair indriyam eva draṣṭṛ kalpitaṃ mānasaprayakṣalakṣaṇe ca doṣa udbhāvitaḥ,
GSP28durdhpru:2425: teṣāṃ vipratipattinirākaraṇārtham prakārabhedaṃ pratyakṣasya darśayann āha --
GSP28durdhpru:2431: indriyajabhramakāraṇaṃ tad indriyaṃ vikaroty eva tathā timirādi /
GSP28durdhpru:2433: evaṃvidhasya jñānasya bhramarūpatvaṃ bādhavaśād avasitam indriyānvayavyatirekānuvidhānāc cendriyajatvam /
GSP28durdhpru:2436: eta ityādi vibhramahetavo gṛhyanta ity antaṃ subodham /
GSP28durdhpru:2441: tair anāhito vibhramo yasminn iti vigṛhṇaṃs tripadaṃ bahuvrīhiṃ darśayati /
GSP28durdhpru:2442: anāhitao vibhramo yasmiṃs tattatheti prasādhya teṣām anāhitavibhrama iti ṣaṣṭhītatapuruṣaḥ kāryaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:2444: yo hi tair anāhitavibhramaḥ sa teṣāṃ bhavatīti /
GSP28durdhpru:2447: sampraty ācāryasyāvāntarapratyakṣabhedavyutpādane nimittaṃ darśayann āha -- tad evam iti /
GSP28durdhpru:2448: nipātasamudāyaś cāyam uktena prakāreṇetiy asyārthe varttate /
GSP28durdhpru:2453: tataḥ cakṣuḥ paśyati rūpāṇi abhidha- 1.42] ityādi vādibhir indriyam eva draṣṭṛ kalpitam /
GSP28durdhpru:2454: yair mīmāṃsakair ācāryadignāgīye mānasapratyakṣalakṣaṇe gṛhītagrāhitvalakṣaṇo 'prāmāṇyanimitto doṣa udbhāvitaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:2457: yaiś ca mīmāṃsakaiḥ kumārilamatānusāribhir naiyāyikavaiśeṣikaiś ca svātmani kriyāvirodhena svasaṃvedanaṃ nābhyupagatam /
GSP28durdhpru:2458: yaiś ca cārvākamīmāṃsakair yogina eva na sambhavanti,
GSP28durdhpru:2459: kutas teṣāṃ jñānam iti vādibhir yogijñānaṃ ca nābhyupagatam iti vartate /
GSP28durdhpru:2461: teṣām amīṣāṃ tatra tatra yā vimatis tan nirākaraṇārthaṃ pratyakṣasyoktalakṣaṇasya prakāro viśeṣas tasya bhedaṃ nānātvam,
GSP28durdhpru:2464: tatraikaṃ tāvad indriyajñāṇam uktaṃ vyācakṣāṇa āha -- indiryasyeti /
GSP28durdhpru:2467: mānasapratyakṣe parair yo doṣa udbhāvitas taṃ nirākartuṃ mānasapratyakṣalakṣaṇam āha --
GSP28durdhpru:2470: indriyaṃ ca tajjñānaṃ ceti kṛtvā śakyam indriyajñānam iti vaktum,
GSP28durdhpru:2471: tat kathaṃ vipratipattir nirākṛtety āśaṅkām apākartum indriyajñānam ity atrācāryasyendriyasya jñānam iti ṣaṣṭhītatpuruṣo vivakṣita iti darśayati -- indiryasya jñānam iti /
GSP28durdhpru:2472: yad indiryeṇa janyate tad indriyasya bhavatīti bhāvaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:2473: nanu cendriyānumānam api kāryaprabhavaṃ bhavatīndriyasya jñānam /
GSP28durdhpru:2474: tatas tasyāpi pratyakṣatvaṃ prāpatam ity āha -- indriyāśritam iti /
GSP28durdhpru:2475: āśritaṃ janyatayā tasmin saty eva bhāvāt /
GSP28durdhpru:2477: yena tasya pratyakṣatvaṃ syād iti bhāvaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:2479: indiryasya jñānaṃ pratyakṣam iti kathayatā nendiryasya draṣṭṛtvam iti darśitam /
GSP28durdhpru:2481: nanu indriyajñānasya draṣṭṛtve tasyāpratighatvād vyavahitasyāpi grahaṇaṃ prasajyeteti tair ukto doṣaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:2482: sa kathaṃ parihṛto yena vipratipattir nirākṛteti cet /
GSP28durdhpru:2483: ayam āśayaḥ -- na jñānaṃ gatvā gatvā 'rthaṃ gṛhṇāti,
GSP28durdhpru:2485: kin tarhi? yadākāram utpadyate tad gṛhṇātīty ucyate /
GSP28durdhpru:2487: tat kathaṃ tasya tena graha iti sujñānam etad iti kim atropapattyābhihitayeti?
GSP28durdhpru:2491: evaṃ ca darśayatā vārttikakāreṇa yadvendriyaṃ pramāṇaṃ syāt tasya vārthena saṅgatir[ŚV
GSP28durdhpru:2492: 4.60]ityādi vacanāt tasyāpi yā pratyakṣapramāṇatā mīmāṃsakādibhir abhyupagatā sā nirastā veditavyā /
GSP28durdhpru:2499: yataś cāvyavadhānena pravṛttiḥ sa eva pravarttakatvāt pramāṇaṃ yuktam /
GSP28durdhpru:2504: pramā ca nīlasyeyaṃ na pītasyeti viśiṣṭenaivādhikaraṇenāvacchinnā pratīyata iti tatkaraṇaṃ bhavitum arhati /
GSP28durdhpru:2505: yata iyam avyavadhānā tādrūpyeṇa vyavasthāṃ labhate /
GSP28durdhpru:2507: svabhedena kriyābhedanibandhanaṃ ca karaṇaṃ tato jñānātmakam eva sārūpyam adhigatikriyābhedavyavasthāṅgaṃ pramāṇaṃ yujyata iti /
GSP28durdhpru:2514: sva ātmīyo viṣaya indiryajñānasya tasya anantaraḥ -- na vidyate 'ntaram asya iti /
GSP28durdhpru:2515: antaraṃ ca vyavadhānaṃ viśeṣaś ca ucyate /
GSP28durdhpru:2516: tataś ca antare pratiṣiddhe samānajātīyo dvitīyakṣaṇabhāvyupādeyakṣaṇa indriyavijñānaviṣayasya gṛhyate /
GSP28durdhpru:2517: sa sahakārī yasya indriyajñānasya tat tathoktam /
GSP28durdhpru:2518: dvividhaś ca sahakārī -- parasparopakārī ekakāryopakārī ca /
GSP28durdhpru:2519: iha ca kṣaṇike vastuny atiśayādhānāyogād ekakāryakāritvena sahakārī gṛhyate /
GSP28durdhpru:2520: nanu caturvidhapratyakṣābhidhāne nimittam uktam eva dharmottareṇa tat kathaṃ tad eva mānasetyādinā punar ācaṣṭe /
GSP28durdhpru:2521: athācāryasya catuṣṭayābhidhāne nimittaṃ yad āsīt buddhisthaṃ tat prāg uktam,
GSP28durdhpru:2522: tad eva tu yathāyogaṃ pratyakṣavyaktiviśeṣābhidhāne 'bhidhānīyam iti /
GSP28durdhpru:2523: tarhi yair indriyaṃ draṣṭṛ kalpitaṃ tannirākaraṇārtham āha -- indriyajñānam iti tathā 'nyatrāpi svasaṃvedanādau tattannimittam anena kinnoktam?
GSP28durdhpru:2524: tad atrāpi mānasaṃ vyākhyātum āheti vaktuṃ yuktam iti /
GSP28durdhpru:2527: evāsya lakṣaṇākhyāne nimittaṃ nānyad iti pratipādyitum uktam eva nimittam anūditam
GSP28durdhpru:2529: athendriyajñānasyāpi lakṣaṇa[25b]m anyeṣām iva kiṃ noktam? noktam /
GSP28durdhpru:2532: syān matam / abhimataṃ caturvidhaṃ pratyakṣaṃ darśayitavyam /
GSP28durdhpru:2533: tac caikadā vaktum aśakyatvāt krameṇa vacanīyam /
GSP28durdhpru:2534: kramaś caivaṃvidho 'stv anyādṛśo vā kim atrādareṇeti indriyajñāṇādir īdṛśaḥ kramaḥ kṛtaḥ,
GSP28durdhpru:2537: tathā hi sarvasya sarvavyavahārāṅgam indriyajñānam iti tadādito 'bhihitam /
GSP28durdhpru:2538: tenaivendriyajñānena tathābhūtena mānasaṃ janyata iti tadanu mānasaṃ vyākhyātam /
GSP28durdhpru:2539: tasya paścāt pratyātmavedyatayā 'stivena śakyaniścayatayā ca svasaṃvedanam uditam /
GSP28durdhpru:2540: tataḥ sarvajñajñānasya sāmagrīmātrapradarśanataya'ntimapuruṣārthatayā cānte yogijñānam upadarśitam iti /
GSP28durdhpru:2542: tac ca tat tathoktam ity etad antaṃ sugamam /
GSP28durdhpru:2543: nanv anukārakasya sahakāritve 'tiprasaṅgād upakāriṇā sahakāriṇā bhāvyam /
GSP28durdhpru:2544: samasamayayoś copakāryopakārakabhāvābhāvāt katham asau viṣayakṣaṇas tasya sahakārīty āśakyāha -- dvividhaś ceti /
GSP28durdhpru:2549: parasparopakāritayā ca sahakāritvam ekatvādhyavasāyādhīnaṃ santānagatam amukhyam /
GSP28durdhpru:2551: yadi dvaividhye 'pi prāktanasya grahaṇaṃ tadā tadavastho doṣa ity āha -- iheti /
GSP28durdhpru:2555: sahakārī hi gṛhyate viṣayakṣaṇa iti prakaraṇād avaseyam /
GSP28durdhpru:2558: viṣayavijñānābhyāṃ hi manovijñānam ekaṃ kriyate yatas tan anayoḥ parasparasahakāritvam /
GSP28durdhpru:2559: īdṛśena indriyavijñānena ālambanabhūtena api yogijñānaṃ janyate. tan nirāsārthaṃ samanantarapratyayagrahaṇaṃ kṛtam. samaś ca asau jñānatvena,
GSP28durdhpru:2561: sa ca asau pratyayaś ca hetutvāt samanantarapratyayaḥ,
GSP28durdhpru:2565: atha yadi vastunaḥ kṣanikatvenātiśayādhānāsambhavāt parasparopakāritvena na sahakārī gṛhyate dvividhaś ca sahakārīty anantaram uditam anena vyāhanyeta /
GSP28durdhpru:2566: hetubinduś ca virudhyeteti sarvam asamañjasam / na /
GSP28durdhpru:2568: tathā hi kṣanike vastunīti dhārayā 'pravāhiṇi sajātīyāprasavadharmiṇy antime mānasotpādakatayā 'bhimata indriyajñānanāmni nirodhonmukha ity abhipretam /
GSP28durdhpru:2569: na tv akṣaṇikavyāvṛttyā kṣaṇīkapadābhilāpye 'vastumātravyāvṛttyā ca vastumātra iti
GSP28durdhpru:2571: yadīdaṃ mānasopajananonmukham indriyajñānam ekajātīyapravāhavāhi syāt tadā santānopakāradvārakātiśayādhāyakatve viṣayo 'sya sahakārīti kalpeyeta
GSP28durdhpru:2572: kevalam idam apetasajātīyaprasavaśaktikaṃ santānavarttīti katham asya viṣayas tathā sahakārī kalpyeteti /
GSP28durdhpru:2573: nanu kiṃ tad ekaṃ yat kurvator etayos tathāsahakāritvam ucyata ity āha viṣayeti /
GSP28durdhpru:2575: yato yasmād ābhyām eva tad ekaṃ kiryate, tasmāt /
GSP28durdhpru:2576: tad ity ayaṃ tasmād ity asminn arthe /
GSP28durdhpru:2580: ālambyata iti ālambanabhūtaṃ rūpaṃ yasya tena grāhyasvabhāvena satā janyata ity arthaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:2582: evañ ca vyācakṣāṇena “samanantarapratyayagrahaṇam andhabadhirādyabhāvaprasaṅganirākaraṇārtham iti” yad anyena vyākhyātam -- tad apahastitam
GSP28durdhpru:2584: samaś cetyādinā samanantarapratyayaśabdasya vigraham arthaṃ cāha /
GSP28durdhpru:2587: yadi nāmaivaṃ vyutpattis tathāpi prāktanam eva vijñānam upādānabhūtam āgame tathā rūḍhaṃ nānyat /
GSP28durdhpru:2588: tad uktam abhidharmakoṣe -- “cittacaittā acaramā utpannāḥ samanantaraḥ” [2.6.2] iti /
GSP28durdhpru:2589: siddhāntaprasiddhayā cāmuyā saṃjñayā vyavaharatā ''cāryeṇa siddhāntaprasiddhatvam asya darśitam /
GSP28durdhpru:2591: tad anena ekasantānāntarbhūtayor eva indriyajñānamanovijñānayor janyajanakabhāve manovijñānaṃ pratyakṣam ity uktam bhavati /
GSP28durdhpru:2593: nanu kiṃ kṛtaṃ samantarapratyayagrahaṇena yena yogijñānasya tathātvena nirāsa ity āha -- tad iti /
GSP28durdhpru:2594: yasmāt samanantarapratyayarūpeṇendriyajñānena yaj janitaṃ tan mānasaṃ tat tasmāt
GSP28durdhpru:2598: āgame 'pi manaḥśabdenaitad evocyata iti pradarśanārthaṃ caivam abhidhānaṃ mantavyam /
GSP28durdhpru:2599: tathāpi kathaṃ yogijñānaṃ tathātvena nirastam ity āha -- tat iti /
GSP28durdhpru:2602: yadi punar indriyajñānena janitam ity etāvad ucyeta tadā ''lambanabhūtenāpi tenādau janyata iti nirastaṃ na syād iti bhāvaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:2603: syād etat -- yady etad arthaṃ samnanatarapratyayagrahaṇaṃ tarhi nitarāṃ na karttavyam /
GSP28durdhpru:2605: na hi tad indriyajñānaṃ yogijñāne karttavye svaviṣayānantaraviṣayakṣaṇasahakārīti /
GSP28durdhpru:2606: athocyate -- yadendriyajñānaṃ yogijñānaṃ janayati tadā svopādeyam api jñānaṃ janayaty eva /
GSP28durdhpru:2607: tataḥ svasantatipatitajanyakṣaṇāpekṣayā tad bhavati svaviṣayānantaraviṣayakṣaṇāsahakārīty asti tajjānitasya tasya mānasatvalakṣaṇam iti /
GSP28durdhpru:2609: yad eva hi janyatayā prakṛtaṃ tad apekṣam eva sahakāriṇaḥ sahakāritvaṃ cintanīyam /
GSP28durdhpru:2611: na ca tad eva yogijñānaṃ prati tat sahakāri tad indriyajñānaṃ yena tathātvam asyocyamānaṃ śobheta /
GSP28durdhpru:2612: atha tat sahakāri tadvastuvṛttyā tad indriyajñānaṃ /
GSP28durdhpru:2614: yady evaṃ kṛte 'pi samanantarapratyayagrahaṇe yogijñānaṃ nirasitum aśakyaṃ tathāpi
GSP28durdhpru:2615: yathā tad indriyajñānaṃ svopādeyajñānāpekṣaṃ svaviṣayānantaraviṣayasahakāri tathā
GSP28durdhpru:2617: tatas tathābhūtena tena janyamānasya yogijñānasya kathaṃ tathātvena nirāsaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:2619: hanta tat sahakāritvam api kim asya tadapekṣam asti?
GSP28durdhpru:2621: na tu vāstavaṃ rūpam upādeyaṃ phalābhāvena tasyānuvādyatā'nupapatteḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:2624: na ca rājaśāsanasamānaṃ kiñcid utpaśyāmo yena samanantarapratyayajanyatvam eva prakṛtajanyāpekṣam iha grāhyam,
GSP28durdhpru:2625: na tu svaviṣayānantaraviṣayakṣaṇasahakāritvam iti kalpanīyam iti /
GSP28durdhpru:2626: atrocyate / yadā -- yogī indriyajñāṇaṃ tatsahabhuvaṃ cārthakṣaṇaṃ ca kutaścit kāraṇād
GSP28durdhpru:2627: didṛkṣamāṇo yogijñānena tad dvayam api paśyati tadā tenendiryajñānena svaviṣayānantaraviṣayakṣaṇasahakāriṇā
GSP28durdhpru:2628: tad yogiñānaṃ janyata iti asati samanantaranprayayagraḥaṇe mānasapratyakṣaṃ samāsajyeta /
GSP28durdhpru:2630: evaṃvidham eva ca yogijñānam abhipratyetyedṛśenety ebhihitaṃ dharmottareṇeti sarvam avadātam /
GSP28durdhpru:2632: yadā ca indriyavijñānād anyo viṣayo manovijñānasya tadā gṛhitagrahaṇāt āsañjito 'prāmāṇyadoṣo nirastaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:2634: tadā indriyajñānena agṛhītasya viṣayāntarasya grahaṇād andhabadhirādyabhāvadoṣaprasaṅgo nirastaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:2635: samprati yathā gṛhītagrāhitvadvārako doṣaḥ parasya parihriyate tathā darśayann āha -- yadā ceti /
GSP28durdhpru:2636: co vyaktam etad ity asminn arthe /
GSP28durdhpru:2638: indriyajñāṇaviṣayād anyo 'sya viṣaya ity etad eva kuto yenāsau nirasto bhavati ity āśṅkyāha -- yadā ceti /
GSP28durdhpru:2641: indriyajñānasya viṣayo yas tasyopādeyabhūto yaḥ kṣaṇaḥ sa gṛhīta indryajñānasya mānasopajanane sahakārikāraṇatvena svīkṛtas tadetīhaiva cchedaḥ karttavyaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:2642: evaṃ bruvatedam ākūtam -- janakaviśeṣasya viṣayatvān mānasapratyakṣasya viṣayeṇa bhavatā janakenāvaśyabhāvyam /
GSP28durdhpru:2647: andhabadhirādyābhāvadoṣaprasagṅgas tu kathaṅkāraṃ nirākriyetety āśaṅkyāha -- indriyajñāneneti /
GSP28durdhpru:2649: tasmād hetor indriyajñānenāgṛthītaṃ mānasena gṛhyata iti darśayatā cānena yasyaivendriyam
GSP28durdhpru:2650: asti tasyaiva tenendriyajñānena sahabhūviṣayakṣaṇasahakāriṇā janitatvān mānasaṃ pratyakṣam /
GSP28durdhpru:2652: yasya punaḥ puṃso 'rthaviṣayam indriyajñāṇam eva sāsti tasya kathaṃ māṇasam utpadyate,
GSP28durdhpru:2653: gṛhṇīyād vā tam viṣyakṣaṇam iti darśitam /
GSP28durdhpru:2657: yadi nāmendriyajñāneneti labhyate tathāpi pratipattigauravaparihārārtham inderyagrahaṇam
GSP28durdhpru:2661: iha śāntabhadreṇa sautrāndikānāṃ mataṃ darśayatā “pūrvaṃ cakṣūrūpe cakṣurvijñānaṃ
GSP28durdhpru:2662: tatas tenendriyavijñānena sahajakṣaṇasakāriṇā tṛtīyasmin kṣaṇe mānsapratyakṣaṃ janyate” iti vyākhyātaṃ /
GSP28durdhpru:2664: etac ca manovijñānam uparatavyāpāre cakṣuṣi pratyakṣam iṣyate /
GSP28durdhpru:2665: vyāpāravati tu cakṣuṣi yad rūpajñānaṃ tat sarvaṃ cakṣurāśritam eva /
GSP28durdhpru:2671: etan manovijñānaṃ pramāṇaṃ pramāṇatvenopagatam uparatavyāpāra eva cakṣuṣi bhavatītīṣyata iti samudāyārtho draṣṭavaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:2672: yadi praṇihite nayane manojñānaṃ na janyate tarhi kiṃ nāma jāyata ity āha -- vyāpāreti /
GSP28durdhpru:2674: rūpajñānam iti vāstavānuvādo na punar anyajñānasambhavena tadvyavacchedārtham /
GSP28durdhpru:2675: yad vā rūpaśabdaḥ svabhāvavacanas tene yat svabhāvajñānam ity arthaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:2679: nanu vyāpāravaty api cakṣuṣi mānasotpattau na cakṣurāśritatvānupapattirādim asyaiva jñāṇasya cakṣurāśritatvopapatteḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:2681: kevalam a[yam] abhiprāyaḥ -- yad api tad ādyaṃ cakṣurvijñānaṃ tad api cakṣuranvayavyatireke '(kā)
GSP28durdhpru:2683: saty api tadanvayavyatikerkānuvidhāne yadi kasyacin mānasatvaṃ tadā cakṣuranvyavyatitekau
GSP28durdhpru:2684: cakṣurāśritatvavyavasthāyā anaṅgam ity ādye 'pi tadvyavasthā na syād iti sādhīyān prasaṅgaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:2685: syād etat -- kim etan mānasaṃ cakṣurvijñānenaiva rūpaviṣaye janyate kiṃ vā rasādijñānenāpi rasādiviṣaya iti?
GSP28durdhpru:2687: yadi rūpa eva tadā[34]“dvividhajñānavijñeyāh pañca bāhyavisayāḥ” ity āgamo viruddhyeta /
GSP28durdhpru:2688: atha samastarūpādiviṣayam iṣyate tadā śabdaviṣayatvena tasyāsambhavaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:2689: na hi rasādir iva tālvādijanmā śabdaḥ pravāhavāhī,
GSP28durdhpru:2690: yena śrotrendriyajñāṇena svāviṣayānantaraviṣayakṣaṇasahakāriṇā tatra mānasaṃ janyeteti /
GSP28durdhpru:2695: yat punar avādīd bhagavān -- “dvābhyāṃ bhikṣvo rūpaṃ gṛhyate,
GSP28durdhpru:2696: cakṣurvijñānena tadākṛṣṭena ca manaseti” tad rūpasya grahaṇaprasaṅgenoktam,
GSP28durdhpru:2697: na tu rūpam eva dvidhā gṛhyata iti vivakṣitam /
GSP28durdhpru:2700: nanūktaṃ na tasya śabdaviṣayatvena sambhavas tat katham evam abhyupagamaḥ?
GSP28durdhpru:2702: kevalaṃ yadābhihanyamānaṃ ghaṇṭāṭi raṇati tadā taduktaḥ(-tthaḥ)
GSP28durdhpru:2703: śabdaḥ kiyantaṃ kālaṃ santānena pravahatīti śrotrajñānena svaviṣayānantaraviṣayakṣaṇasahakāriṇā tadviṣayaṃ mānasaṃ janyate /
GSP28durdhpru:2708: iha pūrvaiḥ -- “bāhyārthālambanam evaṃvidhaṃ manovijñānam astīti kuto 'vaseyaṃ” ity
GSP28durdhpru:2709: āśaṅkya “tadabhāve tadbalotpannānāṃ vikalpānām abhāvād rūpādau viṣaye vyavahārābhāvaprasaṅgaḥ syād” ity uktam /
GSP28durdhpru:2713: na tv asya prasādhakam asti pramāṇam /
GSP28durdhpru:2714: evaṃjatīyakaṃ tad yadi syāt na kaścid doṣaḥ syād iti vaktuṃ lakṣaṇam ākhyātam asya iti /
GSP28durdhpru:2716: ” “santānabhedā[n na] bhaviṣyate” iti ca punar āśaṅkya “atrāpi santānabhedād eva vikalpo na prāpnoti,
GSP28durdhpru:2717: yata ihāpīndriyāśrayabhedād eva santānabhedo yugapat pravṛtteś ca /
GSP28durdhpru:2719: na ca santānasyaikye yugapat pravṛttir nyāyyā /
GSP28durdhpru:2720: tasmād rūpādivikalpābhāvo mā bhūd ity avaśyam avikalpakaṃ manovijñānam abhyupeyam /
GSP28durdhpru:2722: nirvikalpakaṃ manovijñānaṃ yadi nāsty eva tadā yogijñānābhāvaprasaṅgaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:2723: asty eva nirvikalpakaṃ manovijñānaṃ kin tv indriyajñānapṛṣṭabhāvi nāstīti cet /
GSP28durdhpru:2724: sati sambhave tasyāpy astitve ko virodhaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:2725: na hy atra bādhakaṃ pramāṇaṃ dṛśyate,
GSP28durdhpru:2728: tasmād astīndriyajñānapṛṣṭabhāvi manojñānaṃ nirvikalpakam” ity evamādyabhihitam /
GSP28durdhpru:2729: tad etat tadīyaṃ kadalīgarbhaniḥsāraṃ manyamānaḥ prāha -- etac ceti /
GSP28durdhpru:2732: etad eva vyatirekamukheṇa draḍhayati na tv asyeti /
GSP28durdhpru:2735: anubhavagamyam idaṃ yathā cakṣurādijñānam iti darśayitum aśakyatvān nāsya prasādhakaṃ
GSP28durdhpru:2737: nanu tair darśitam eva vikalpābhāvaprasaṅgaḥ syād ityādinā prasaṅgamukhena pramāṇaṃ vikalpodayād iti tat kim ucyate na tv asya prasādhakam asti pramāṇam iti /
GSP28durdhpru:2738: ayam asyāśayaḥ -- satyam uktam atārkikīyaṃ tu tat /
GSP28durdhpru:2739: tathā hi yat tāvad uktam indriyāśrayabhedād yugapat pravṛtteś ca santānabhedo 'sti /
GSP28durdhpru:2742: yadīndriyāśrayabhedād yugapat pravṛtteś ca santānabhedas tadbhede ca na kāryakāraṇabhāvaḥ,
GSP28durdhpru:2743: tadā svāpād utthitamātrasya puṃsaś cakṣurvijñānaṃ ..................................................................... notpadyeta /
GSP28durdhpru:2744: tat khalūpajāyamānaṃ manojñānād vā prācīnād utpadyeta,
GSP28durdhpru:2746: na tāvad indryajñāṇāt tasya pūrvam abhāvāt,
GSP28durdhpru:2750: athaivaṃ bhinnasantānair eva vikalpitair vikalpodayo 'sty eva na tu nirvikalpād vikalpodaya iti cet /
GSP28durdhpru:2751: santānabhede 'pi janyajanakabhāve nirvikalpād api vikalpodayasya ko niṣeddhā /
GSP28durdhpru:2752: na cendriyāśrayabhedād yugapat pravṛtteś ca santānabhedo yujyate /
GSP28durdhpru:2754: tasmāt prabhūtam alpaṃ vā sadṛśād eva kāraṇāj jāyate /
GSP28durdhpru:2756: yathāgnikaṇikāyāḥ [28a] prabhāpratānavatī pradīpaśikhā jāyamānā na santānabhedam ātmany āvahati /
GSP28durdhpru:2757: yat punar yogijñāṇasya tathātve 'pīdānīṃ manojñānaṃ nirvikalpakaṃ nābhyupeyate tad
GSP28durdhpru:2758: yādṛśāḥ sāmagryās tad udbhavo yadākārañ ca tat tat sāmagryabhāvāt tad ākārasya ca
GSP28durdhpru:2760: nanu ca yady asya prasādhakaṃ pramānṃ nāsti kimarthaṃ tarhi pratyakṣaprakaraṇa upanyāsa ity āśaṅkyāha -- evam iti /
GSP28durdhpru:2762: evam prakāralakṣaṇakathanasyaiva kim prayojanam iti cet /
GSP28durdhpru:2763: sūtrakārasya siddhāntaprasiddhamānasābhyupagame prasaktacodyanirākaraṇam -- yady asti mānasaṃ pratyakṣam evaṃ tasya lakṣaṇam iti /
GSP28durdhpru:2770: sarve ca te cittacaittāś ca sarvacittacaittāḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:2772: na anyā cittāvasthā ity etad āśaṅkā nivṛttyarthaṃ sarvagrahaṇam kṛtam /
GSP28durdhpru:2773: na asti sā kācit cittāvasthā yasyām ātmanaḥ saṃvedanaṃ na pratyakṣaṃ syāt /
GSP28durdhpru:2774: yena hi rūpeṇa ātmā vedyate tadrūpam ātmasamvedanaṃ pratyakṣam /
GSP28durdhpru:2775: vaibhāṣikaprakriyayā yadācāryeṇa cittacaittau bhedenoktau tayor artham āha -- cittam arthamātragrāhi vastumātra grāhi /
GSP28durdhpru:2777: caittā viśeṣāvasthāgrāhiṇo viśeṣāvasthāsvīkarttāro viśeṣāvasthākārā iti yāvat /
GSP28durdhpru:2779: ka evaṃ rūpā ity āha -- sukhādaya ity /
GSP28durdhpru:2781: vigṛhṇan pūrva cittāni ca caittāś ceti samasya paścāt sarvaśabdena samāsa iti darśayati /
GSP28durdhpru:2782: sukhetyādinā sarva grahaṇasya phalam āha -- sphuṭo vyakto 'nubhavaḥ prakāśo yasya tasyabhās tasmāt /
GSP28durdhpru:2786: nanu jñānasya saṃvedyātmaḥ kim anyad rūpāntaraṃ yat svasaṃvedanaṃ pratyakṣaṃ syād ity āśaṅkyāha -- yena hīti /
GSP28durdhpru:2788: atha yad anubhūyate tad anyenaiva yathā ghaṭādi /
GSP28durdhpru:2789: tat katham ātmanaivātmanaḥ saṃvedanam iti cet /
GSP28durdhpru:2791: asti jñānasya sā yogyatā jaḍavyāvṛttatā jyotīrūpatā yayā svaprakāśe prakāśāntaraṃ nāpekṣate /
GSP28durdhpru:2792: yathā pradīpaḥ prakāśasvābhāvyād ātmānaṃ svayam eva prakāśayte,
GSP28durdhpru:2797: atra ca prayogaḥ -- yad avyaktavyaktikaṃ na tad vyaktam yathā kiñcit kadācit kathañcid avyaktavyaktikam /
GSP28durdhpru:2798: avyaktavyaktikaś cāyaṃ ghaṭādiḥ jñānaparokṣatva iti vyāpakānupalabdhiprasaṅgaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:2799: jñānasya jñānāntareṇa vyaktau hetur ayam asiddha iti cen na,
GSP28durdhpru:2801: na ca bhavatām api mate sarvaṃ vijñānam ekārthasamavāyinā jñānena jñāyate /
GSP28durdhpru:2804: tat upekṣaṇīyam eva tāvad avyaktavyaktikatvād avyaktaṃ prasajyeta / na ceyam
GSP28durdhpru:2806: iha ca rūpādau vastuni dṛśyamāne āntaraḥ sukhādyākāras tulyakālaṃ saṃvedyate /
GSP28durdhpru:2807: na ca gṛhyamāṇākāro nīlādiḥ sātarūpo vedyate iti śakyaṃ vaktum /
GSP28durdhpru:2808: yato nīlādiḥ sātarūpeṇa anubhūyata iti na niścīyate /
GSP28durdhpru:2809: yadi hi sātarūpo 'yam nīlādir anubhūyata iti niścīyeta,
GSP28durdhpru:2811: yasmin rūpe pratyakṣasya sākṣātkāritvavyāpāro vikalpena anugamyate tat pratyakṣam /
GSP28durdhpru:2813: [28b] tathā hi yady avyaktavyaktikam api vyaktavyavahāraviṣayas tadā puruṣāntaravarttijñānavyaktikam api vastu svajñānodayakālavat tathaiva vyaktaṃ vyavahriyeta /
GSP28durdhpru:2815: tatsantāne jñānasyābhāvāt kathaṃ vastunas tathā vyavaḥāra iti cet /
GSP28durdhpru:2818: [35]...... tadā tad api puruṣāntarasya kin na tathā vyavahāragocara?
GSP28durdhpru:2822: [35] paṅktibāhyaṃ likhitaṃ samyak na paṭhyate -- saṃ-
GSP28durdhpru:2826: kevalam arthaśūyam etad ucyate ity āśaṅkyāha -- ihetyādi /
GSP28durdhpru:2830: na tu tato 'nyat sukhādirūpaṃ yena tasya vedanarūpatā vyavasthāpy etety āha -- na ceti /
GSP28durdhpru:2833: gṛhyamāṇa ākāro yasya grāhyasvabhāva ity arthaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:2837: kuta evaṃ vaktuṃ na śakyata ity āha -- yata iti /
GSP28durdhpru:2841: bhāvān naivaṃ śakyate vaktum ity ucyate ity āha -- yadīti /
GSP28durdhpru:2844: anena yad evānurūpavikalpena yathātvena niścīyate tad eva tathāvavyavahāragocaro yathā nīlādir ity ākūtam /
GSP28durdhpru:2848: tasmād sātānīlādyarthād anyad eva sātam anubhūyate nīlānubhavakāle /
GSP28durdhpru:2851: tac ca jñānarūpavedanam ātmanaḥ sākṣātkāri nirvikalapakam abhrāntaṃ ca /
GSP28durdhpru:2854: tat kim evam ucyate it āśaṅkya pūrvoktam eva smārayati -- yasminn iti /
GSP28durdhpru:2857: gṛhītaṃ nīlasya sātarūpatvaṃ vikalpenānugamyata evety āha -- na ceti /
GSP28durdhpru:2861: yasmād gṛhymāṇākāro nīlādir na tathā niścīyate,
GSP28durdhpru:2866: kathaṃ cātmavedanaṃ pratyakṣam ity āha -- tac ceti /
GSP28durdhpru:2868: jñānam evety avadhārayataḥ prakāśātmana eva jñānatvam anyathā prakāśāyogād ity abhiprāyaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:2871: na ca grāhyākārād anyad anubhūyamānaṃ sātaṃ grāhakākārād apy anyad upapadyate /
GSP28durdhpru:2874: na ca tad grāhyam ato grāhakam eva /
GSP28durdhpru:2876: tat punar ātmasaṃvedaṃ pratyakṣaṃ kuta ity āha -- tac ceti /
GSP28durdhpru:2880: yad vā jñānarūpaṃ ca tad vedanañ ceti tathā /
GSP28durdhpru:2886: bhavatu nirvikalpakaṃ dvicanedrādijñānavad bhaviṣyatīty āha -- abhrāntaṃ ceti /
GSP28durdhpru:2888: na hi tat svātmani atasmiṃs tad iti pravṛttam,
GSP28durdhpru:2890: bhavatāṃ nirvikalpakatvābhrāntatve tataḥ kiṃ siddham ity āha -- tata iti /
GSP28durdhpru:2896: syān matam -- ityam tasya vedanasya pratyakṣatve vikalpātmavedanasyāpi tattvaṃ syāt /
GSP28durdhpru:2899: vikalpo hi bāhyaṃ vikalpayati na tv ātmānam /
GSP28durdhpru:2902: prayogaḥ -- yad abhrāntatve satyavikapaṃ tat pratyakṣaṃ /
GSP28durdhpru:2904: abhrāntatve satyavikalpakaṃ cātmani vikalaparūpavedanam iti svabhāvaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:2905: yathā ca jñānātmani samyāsambhavo yathā vā samitaḥ śabdasaṃsṛṣṭo na gṛhyate tathā 'nyatra prapañcitam iti nehocyata iti //
GSP28durdhpru:2912: bhūtasya bhāvanā punaḥ punaś cetasi viniveśanam /
GSP28durdhpru:2914: prakarṣasya paryanto yadā sphuṭābhatvam īṣadasampūrṇaṃ bhavati /
GSP28durdhpru:2915: yāvad dhi sphuṭābhatvam aparipūrṇaṃ tāvat tasya prakarṣagamanam /
GSP28durdhpru:2916: bhūtaśabdasya vivakṣitam artham āha -- sadbhūta iti /
GSP28durdhpru:2917: artha iti bruvāṇo bhūtaś cāsāv arthaś ceti karmadhārayaṃ darśayati /
GSP28durdhpru:2918: nanu sukhādimayatvam apy arthasya sāṃkhyaparikalpitaṃ sadbhūtam ity āha -- pramāṇeneti /
GSP28durdhpru:2920: cakāraḥ sphuṭam etad ity arthaṃ dyotayati /
GSP28durdhpru:2921: kaḥ punar īdṛśo artho vivikṣita ity āha -- yatheti /
GSP28durdhpru:2922: anena bhūtārthaśabdenātra satyacatuṣṭayaṃ vivakṣitam iti darśitam /
GSP28durdhpru:2924: tathā 'nyasadbhūtārthaviṣayam api draṣṭavyam iti yathāśabdārtho 'py asti /
GSP28durdhpru:2926: ārāt pāpakebhyo dharmebhyo yātā ity āryāḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:2927: ata eva tāni satyatayā manyanta iti teṣāṃ satyāni /
GSP28durdhpru:2931: phalabhūtāḥ pañca sakleśas kandhā duḥkhākhyaṃ satyam ekam /
GSP28durdhpru:2932: ta eva hetubhūtās tṛṣṇāsahāyāḥ samudayākhyaṃ satyaṃ dvitīyam /
GSP28durdhpru:2934: tadavasthāprāptihetunairātmyādyākāraś cittaviśeṣo mārgākhyaṃ satyaṃ caturtham iti /
GSP28durdhpru:2935: bhāvanāśabdena vigrahaṃ tasya cārtham ācaṣṭe bhūtasyeti /
GSP28durdhpru:2937: lakṣyate ca bhūtaśabdasānnidhyāl lekhakena prathamapustake bhūśabdaḥ prakṣiptaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:2938: tasyeti tu vacanaṃ saṃkṣepeṇa vigrahaṃ darśayato dharmottarasya pāṭho 'nyathā yathābhūtaṃ vigrahaṃ darśayitukāmenārthapadopādāne kim akṣaragauravaṃ
GSP28durdhpru:2939: yena kevalabhūtaśabdopādāne pratipattigauravaṃ likhanākauśalañ cāviṣkṛtam iti /
GSP28durdhpru:2946: sampūrṇaṃ tu yadā tadā na asti prakarṣagatiḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:2948: tasmāt paryantād yaj jātaṃ bhāvyamānasya arthasya sannihitasya iva sphuṭatarākāragrāhi jñānaṃ yoginaḥ pratyakṣam /
GSP28durdhpru:2951: yādṛśo yogināṃ bhāvanākramo viniścaye “śrutamaye“tyādinābhihito yathā bhāvanāprakarṣaviśadābhatvayoḥ kāryakāraṇabhāvas tatraiva “kāmaśoke“tyādinā darśitas tathehāpi draṣṭavyaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:2952: yādṛśaś cākāras teṣāṃ satyānām anityatvādike bhāvanīyo yāvat kālāvadhikā ca bhāvanā 'nekajamaparamparānuyātā,
GSP28durdhpru:2953: yac ca nibandhanaṃ bhāvanāyāḥ karuṇā bodhisattvānām,
GSP28durdhpru:2954: tad anyeṣāṃ saṃsārodvegas tad api sarvaṃ yathā pramāṇavārttike nirṇītaṃ tathehāpy anugantavyam /
GSP28durdhpru:2955: iha tu yogijñāṇsya svrūpamātram upadarśayitum upakrāntam iti /
GSP28durdhpru:2956: prakarṣaśabdena saha vigrahaṃ tasya cāryaṃ vivakṣitam āha -- bhāvanāyā iti /
GSP28durdhpru:2958: sa ca yatsphuṭatvatadadhikasphuṭatvādinā rūpeṇa tajjñānasyodaya eva /
GSP28durdhpru:2959: paryantaśabdena vigrahaṃ tasya cārtham ācaṣṭe prakarṣasyeti /
GSP28durdhpru:2961: kadā ca tasyāvasānam ity āha -- yadeti /
GSP28durdhpru:2962: yasmin kāle sphuṭābhatvaṃ bhāvanārthaṃ viṣayasya jñānasyeti prakaraṇāt /
GSP28durdhpru:2963: idaṃ leśato 'sampūrṇaṃ bhavati yad a[na]ntaraṃ yogipratyakṣeṇa bhavitavyaṃ tasmin kāle prakarṣasya paryanto 'vasānaṃ jñātavyaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:2964: tatkālopalakṣitaṃ tathābhūtaṃ jñānaṃ paryanta ity arthaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:2965: nanu prakarṣasya paryantaḥ sa yujyate yasmin sati prakarṣo nivarttate /
GSP28durdhpru:2968: tat katham ucyate kathañ ca paryantajaṃ yogijñānam,
GSP28durdhpru:2969: na tu tad eva paryanta ityāśaṅkyāha -- yāvad iti / hir yasmāt /
GSP28durdhpru:2970: sampūrṇe tu prakarṣagamanaṃ nāstīti darśayati -- sampūrnam iti /
GSP28durdhpru:2976: parisamantād anta iti prādisamāsena niḥśeṣagamanam evocyate /
GSP28durdhpru:2977: tataḥ sa paryanta ucyate yad anantaraṃ prakarṣa(-kṛṣya)
GSP28durdhpru:2979: na tu yadarthaṃ yeṣāṃ prakarṣavatām udaya iti /
GSP28durdhpru:2986: r anyajñānaṃ sphuṭatarākāragrāhi pratyakṣaṃ tadvad bhāvyamānārthasphuṭatarākāragrāhi yajjñānaṃ tadyoginaḥ pratyakṣam /
GSP28durdhpru:2987: uktam eva bhāvanāprakarṣārthaṃ tatparyantārthaṃ tajjñānaṃ copasaṃhāravyājena sukhapratipattyarthaṃ punar darśayati tad iti /
GSP28durdhpru:2992: karatalāmalakavad bhāvyamānasya arthasya yad darśanaṃ tad yoginaḥ pratyakṣam /
GSP28durdhpru:2995: vikalpavijñānaṃ hi saṅketakāladṛṣṭatvena vastu gṛhṇac chabdasaṃsargayogyaṃ gṛhṇīyāt /
GSP28durdhpru:2997: yathā ca pūrvotpannaṃ vinaṣṭaṃ jñānaṃ sampratyasat tadvat pūrvavinaṣṭajñānaviṣayatvam api samprati na asti vastunaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:2998: tad asadrūpaṃ vastuno gṛhṇad asannihitārthagrāhivād asphuṭābham vikalpakam /
GSP28durdhpru:3002: to dvidhākarttum aśakyeneti prastāvād vyavahitam āvṛtaṃ tadiva /
GSP28durdhpru:3003: karasvarūpaṃ karatalaṃ sannihitasyevety anena yat pūrvam uktaṃ [30a] tasyāyam upasaṃhāraḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:3005: tat punaḥ kathaṃ pratykṣam ity āśaṅkām apākarttuṃ pratykṣalakṣaṇena yogam asya darśayann āha tad dhīti / hir yasmāt /
GSP28durdhpru:3007: nirvikalpakaṃ tu kathaṃ yena pratyakṣaṃ syād ity āha -- sphuṭābhatvād eveti /
GSP28durdhpru:3008: co nirvikalpakam ity ataḥ paraḥ sphuṭābhatvāpekṣaikaviṣayatvaṃ nirvikalpakatvasya samuccinoti /
GSP28durdhpru:3009: ayam asyāśayaḥ -- śabdākārasaṃsargo hi sphuṭābhatvavirodhīti yady asāv abhaviṣyat tadā sphuṭābham eva nābhaviṣyad iti /
GSP28durdhpru:3010: abhilāpasaṃsargayogyapratibhāsam eva sphuṭābahṃ bhavaiṣyati ko 'nayor virodha ity āśaṅkya vikalpetyādinā virodham eva darśyitum apakramate /
GSP28durdhpru:3012: vastv iti dṛśyamānaṃ yathā caitat tathā pūrvam eva viveditaṃ gṛṇīyād grahītum arhati /
GSP28durdhpru:3016: kim ata ity āha -- yathā ceti /
GSP28durdhpru:3018: bhavatv evaṃ tathāpi vādakākārasaṃsargino 'pi kathaṃ na sphuṭābhatvam ity āha -- tad iti /
GSP28durdhpru:3021: asphuṭābhaṃ tu kutas tad ity āha -- asannnihitārthagrāhitvād iti /
GSP28durdhpru:3023: pūrvavṛttadarśana viṣayatayā ca bhūtapūrvo bhāvo gṛhyamāno na sannihitarūpo bhāsate /
GSP28durdhpru:3026: asannihitaviṣayatvam eva tasya kuto 'vasīyata ity āha -- asadrūpam iti /
GSP28durdhpru:3028: asadrūpaṃ vastuno gṛhyamāṇasya gṛhṇad iti hetau śatur vidhānād asadrūpagrahaṇād ity arthaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:3032: anantaroktena krameṇa tatas tasmāt sphuṭābhatvād viśadābatvān nirvikalapakaṃ yogijñānam iti prakaraṇāt /
GSP28durdhpru:3033: prayogaḥ -- yat saṅketakāladṛṣṭatayā vastusaṃsparśi jñānaṃ na tat sphuṭābham / yathā cira--
GSP28durdhpru:3043: tad evaṃ pratyakṣasya kalpanāpoḍhatvābhrāntatvayuktasye prakārabhedaṃ pratipādya viṣayavipratipattim nirākartum āha --
GSP28durdhpru:3046: tasya caturvidhasya pratyakṣasya viṣayo boddhavyaḥ svalakṣaṇam /
GSP28durdhpru:3049: vastuno hy āsādhāraṇaṃ ca tattvam asti sāmānyaṃ ca /
GSP28durdhpru:3050: tatra yad asādhāraṇam tat pratyakṣasya grāhyam /
GSP28durdhpru:3055: na hi pūrvajñānaviṣayatvaṃ pūrvamsin nivṛtte vastuno 'sti /
GSP28durdhpru:3056: tad uttarakālabhāvinā jñājñānena pūrvajñānaviṣayatvam asannihitam eva vastunaḥ spṛśyate /
GSP28durdhpru:3060: asaty abhrātatve tu kathaṃ pratyakṣam ity āha -- pramāneti /
GSP28durdhpru:3064: caḥ [30b] saṃvādakam ity ataḥ paro nirvikalpatvena saha saṃvādakatvena saṃvādakatvaṃ saucchinoti,
GSP28durdhpru:3071: yad vā samādhigrahaṇasyopalakṣaṇatvāt prajñā ca vivekakaraṇaṣaśaktir draṣṭavyā /
GSP28durdhpru:3072: sa yasyāsti sa nityasamāhito vivekakaraṇatatparaś ca yogī /
GSP28durdhpru:3074: tad evam ityādy āheity etad antaṃ subodham /
GSP28durdhpru:3076: ka ity ākāṅkṣāyām āha -- svalakṣaṇam iti /
GSP28durdhpru:3077: svaśabdasya lakṣaṇaśabdasya cārtham ācakṣāṇo vigragam upalakṣayati -- svam ityādinā /
GSP28durdhpru:3079: yasya yat svaṃ tat tasyaiva nānyasyeti lakṣaṇayā svaśabdenā sādhāraṇam uktam /
GSP28durdhpru:3081: svaśabdayor artham abhidhāya tayoḥ samastaṃ padam āha -- svalakṣaṇaṃ iti /
GSP28durdhpru:3082: anena svam asādhāraṇaṃ ca tallakṣaṇaṃ svarūpaṃ cet karmadhāryo darśitaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:3084: dvividho hi viṣayaḥ pramāṇasya -- grāhyaś ca yadākāram utpadyate,
GSP28durdhpru:3088: adhyavaseyas tu pratyakṣabalotpannena niścayena santāna eva /
GSP28durdhpru:3091: tathā anumānam api svapratibhāse 'narthe 'rthādhyavasāyena pravṛtter anarthagrāhi /
GSP28durdhpru:3092: nanu sambhave vyabhicāre ca viśeṣaṇam arthavat /
GSP28durdhpru:3093: atra ca sarvasyaiva svarūpasyāsādhāraṇatvāt sambhava eva,
GSP28durdhpru:3095: evaṃ tu vaktavyam -- vasturūpaṃ tasya viṣaya ity āśaṅkayāha -- vastuna iti /
GSP28durdhpru:3100: sati caivaṃ dvairūpye kiṃ pūrvaṃ rūpam,
GSP28durdhpru:3101: atha paraṃ pratyakṣaya viṣaya iti sandehe -- yad asādhāraṇaṃ tat pratyakṣasya grāhyam ucyata iti śeṣaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:3102: grāhyam iti bruvan viṣayaśabdenācāryasya grāhyo viṣayo 'bhipreta iti darśayati /
GSP28durdhpru:3103: syād etat -- pravṛttiviṣaya eva pramāṇasya viṣayas tataḥ pravṛttiviṣayas tasya viṣaya iti vaktavyam /
GSP28durdhpru:3104: tat kiṃ grāhyam ity ucyata ity āha -- dvividha iti /
GSP28durdhpru:3109: bhedam upapādayati -- yadākāraṃ yatpratibhāsaṃ jñānam utpadyate /
GSP28durdhpru:3111: dvayor api svajñāne prakāśanam asty eveti draṣṭavyam /
GSP28durdhpru:3113: tato jñānād yatra pravarttata iti yāvat /
GSP28durdhpru:3115: nanu grāhyādhyavaseyaśabdayor eva bhedo na tv arthasya /
GSP28durdhpru:3116: yato yad eva prakāśate tad evādhyavasīyate,
GSP28durdhpru:3117: tat kiṃ evaṃ uyata ity āha -- anyo hīti /
GSP28durdhpru:3120: kasya kīdṛśo grāhya itaro vety āha -- pratyakṣasyeti /
GSP28durdhpru:3121: hir avadhāraṇe eka ity asmāt paro draṣṭavyaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:3124: atha kiṃ pratyakṣam avasāyātmakaṃ yena tasyāsāv avaseya ity āha -- pratyakṣeti /
GSP28durdhpru:3125: pratyakṣapṛṣṭhabhāvino niśacayasya pratyakṣagṛhīta eva pravṛttatayā 'natiśayādhānena yat tenādhyavasitaṃ tat pratyakṣeṇaivāvasitam iti bhāvaḥ
GSP28durdhpru:3126: nanu grāhyād anyaḥ prāpaṇīyo viṣayaḥ pratyakṣasyoktaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:3128: tad ayaṃ tṛtīyo viṣayaḥ prāpta ity āha -- santāna eveti /
GSP28durdhpru:3131: grāhya eva kasmān na tena prāpyata ity āha -- lakṣāṇāsyeti (ity āha -- kṣaṇasyeti) /
GSP28durdhpru:3132: yadākaraṃ pratyakṣam utpadyate tasya kṣaṇasyeti prastāvāt /
GSP28durdhpru:3133: evañ ca vivṛṇvato 'sya pramāṇasyety atra pratyakṣābhiprāyeṇa pramāṇaśabda indriyajāpratyakṣavivakṣayā draṣṭavyaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:3139: sa punar āropito 'rtho gṛhyamāṇaḥ svalakṣaṇatvena avasīyate yataḥ,
GSP28durdhpru:3142: tad atra pramāṇasya grāhyaṃ viṣayaṃ darśayatā pratyakṣasya svalakṣaṇaṃ viṣaya uktaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:3143: bruvatā tad api viṣayadvaividhyavad abhyupagam eva ity āśaṅkyāha -- tatheti /
GSP28durdhpru:3144: yena pratibhāsādhyavasāyalakṣaṇena prakāreṇa pratyakṣam anyagrāhy anyādhyavasāyi tathā tena prakāreṇeti tathāśadārthaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:3147: kin tv anumānam apy anyagrāhy anyādhyavasāyīty apiśabdenāha /
GSP28durdhpru:3148: ihaiva cchedaḥ karttavyo 'nyathā vyākhyānam asamañjasaṃ syāt /
GSP28durdhpru:3151: katham upapadyata ity āśaṅkyopapattim āha -- svapratibhāsa iti /
GSP28durdhpru:3156: athānarthe svapratibhāse 'rthādhyavasāyenānumānavikalpo 'nyo vā pravarttaka iti kim uktaṃ bhavati?
GSP28durdhpru:3157: svaprtibhāsasyāropyamāṇasya cārthasyāvasīyamānasya vivekaṃ na prtipadyata ity utkaṃ bhavati /
GSP28durdhpru:3163: tasyāpi tathā pravṛttitayā pūrvavikapapratibhāsāsaṃsparśād ity alam iha vistareṇa /
GSP28durdhpru:3164: yady evaṃ ko 'syādhyavasīyamānaḥ prāpaṇīyo viṣaya ity āha -- sa iti /
GSP28durdhpru:3167: artha iti artha ivārtho gṛhyamāṇaḥ pratīyamānas tasmin jñāne prakāśamāna iti yāvat /
GSP28durdhpru:3169: tad anenānumāsya grāhyādhyavaseyau bhedena sādhyarthyād abhidhāya sukhapratipattyarthaṃ tāv eva kaṇṭhokau karoti -- tata iti /
GSP28durdhpru:3170: yataḥ svalakṣaṇatvena tasyāvasāyas tataḥ [31b] svalakṣaṇam avasitaṃ pravṛttiviṣayo 'numānasya /
GSP28durdhpru:3171: svalakṣaṇam avasitam ity etad apy abhimānād abhidhīyate /
GSP28durdhpru:3173: tadviṣayatve tasya niraṃśatvāt kṣaṇikatvāder apy avasitāv anumānānavatāraprasaṅgāt /
GSP28durdhpru:3177: tuḥ prāpaṇiyād viṣayād grāhyaṃ bhedavantaṃ darśayati /
GSP28durdhpru:3178: tasmin jñāne prakāśamāne prakāśanād anartho grāhya uktaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:3179: syād etat -- yady avasitaṃ svalakṣaṇaṃ pravṛttiviṣayo 'numānasya tadā katham eṣa dharmottaro viniśacayaṭīkāyāṃ avadīt “avasitaś cākāro vikalpānāṃ grāhyaḥ” iti /
GSP28durdhpru:3180: evaṃ hi svalakṣaṇam eva grāhyaṃ samarthitaṃ syān nānartha iti /
GSP28durdhpru:3183: tathā hi praramārthato vikalpānām ārotpitam eva rūpam avaseyaṃ grāhyam tathāpi vyavaharttāra
GSP28durdhpru:3184: āropitam eva rūpam avṛkṣavyāvṛttam avasyanto bāhyasyāpi tathātvād bāhyaṃ vṛkṣam avasyāma ity abhimanyante,
GSP28durdhpru:3187: tad anurodhāt svalakṣaṇam avasitam ity ucyate /
GSP28durdhpru:3188: tasyaiva tv āropitasya paramārtho 'numeyasya pratibhāsamānaṃ kevalam ākāram āśritya grāhyatvam ucyate /
GSP28durdhpru:3189: tatas tatra vāstavāvasitarūpābhiprāyeṇa tathābhidhānāt ko virodhaḥ?
GSP28durdhpru:3191: yasmāt pramāṇasya dvididho viṣayo grāhyādhyavsasāyabhedena tat tasmāt /
GSP28durdhpru:3192: atra viṣayavipratipattinirākaraṇākāle grāhyaṃ viṣayaṃ darśayateti bruvan viṣayaśabdenācāryasya grāhyo viṣayo 'bhipreta iti sphuṭati /
GSP28durdhpru:3193: syād etat -- na vai grāhyaviṣayāpekṣaṃ pratyakṣasya prāmāṇyam upapadyate /
GSP28durdhpru:3199: na ca yena yasyāprāpaṇaṃ tasya tatra prāmāṇyam abhyupeyate,
GSP28durdhpru:3202: anumānsyāpi vahnyādyadhyavasāyitayā tathotpattir eva tatprāpaṇam ucyate /
GSP28durdhpru:3204: kasya nāma jñānasya savikalpasya nirvikalpakasya vā tattadākāratayotpattir nāsti yena tasya prāṇāṇyaṃ na syāt /
GSP28durdhpru:3205: tasmān na dvididho viṣayaḥ pramāṇasyābhidhānīyo 'pi tv eka eva pravṛttiviṣayākhyo viṣayaḥ khyāpanīya iti /
GSP28durdhpru:3211: ajñānasya ca prāmāṇyāsambhavena jñānāntarbhūtaṃ pramāṇaṃ viṣayadvaividhyavad eva bhavati /
GSP28durdhpru:3212: kevalaṃ na grāhyāpe[32a]kṣaṃ prāmāṇyam api tu pravṛttiviṣayāpekṣam iti pratipādyate /
GSP28durdhpru:3214: yad vā pramāṇaśabdena jñānam evātra vivakṣitam /
GSP28durdhpru:3215: yathā 'yaṃ viniścayaṭīkāyāṃ svārthāṇumānavyākhyānāvasare vyaktam āha -- “dvividho jñānānāṃ viṣayo grāhyaś cādhyavaseyaś ca” ityādi /
GSP28durdhpru:3218: yadi grāhyo viṣayo na kadācid api pratyakṣasya prāpaṇīyas tarhi tena darśitena kim prayojanaṃ yenocyate tad atra grāhyaṃ viṣayaṃ darśatā pratyakṣasya svalakṣaṇāṃ viṣaya ukta iti /
GSP28durdhpru:3221: yadi hi pratyakṣaṃ kṣaṇam eka gṛhṇāti tatrānīlavyāvṛttiniścayopajane santānaṃ niścāyayat pravṛttiviṣayaṃ pradarśayet tatsantānabhāvināñ ca jñānānām apramānāṇyam āpādayet,
GSP28durdhpru:3223: tathā hi santānollekhena niścayābhāve 'py anīlavyāvṛttis tāvad anāgatasarvakṣaṇasādhāraṇī pratyakṣeṇa gṛhītaniścitā /
GSP28durdhpru:3225: tathāniścaya eva ca santāne niścaya ucyate /
GSP28durdhpru:3226: ata eva ca tad ādyaṃ jñānaṃ tathā 'nuṣṭhānaṃ tatsantānabhāvīni parāñci jñānāny anīlavyāvṛttaṃ
GSP28durdhpru:3227: rūpaṃ gṛhītam eva gṛhṇanty anīlavyāvṛttiniścayaṃ ca kṛtam eva kurvanty anatiśayādhāyīni
GSP28durdhpru:3228: pracurāṇy api prāmāṇyāt pracyāvayat prāmāṇyam ātmasātkarotīti nyāyyaṃ grāhyapradarśanam
GSP28durdhpru:3230: ihācāryasya -- svam asādhāraṇaṃ santānāntarasādhāraṇaṃ yan na bhavati,
GSP28durdhpru:3231: yad arthakriyākṣamam eva sarvato vyāvṛttaṃ tattvaṃ tad eva svalakṣaṇam,
GSP28durdhpru:3235: kaḥ punar asau viṣayo jñānasya yaḥ svalakṣaṇaṃ pratipattavya ity āha --
GSP28durdhpru:3236: yasya arthasya saṃnidhānāsaṃnidhānābhyāṃ jñānapratibhāsabhedas tat svalakṣaṇam I-13
GSP28durdhpru:3242: tasmāt saṃnidhānāsaṃnidhānāc ca jñānapratibhāsasya grāhyākārasya bhedaḥ sphuṭatvāsphuṭatvābhyām /
GSP28durdhpru:3243: yo hi jñānaviṣayaḥ saṃnihitaḥ san sphuṭābhāsaṃ jñānasya karoti,
