GSP28durdhpru:3244: asaṃnihitas tu yogyadeśastha eva asphuṭaṃ karoti,
GSP28durdhpru:3246: sarvaṇy eva hi vastuni dūrād asphuṭāni dṛśyante,
GSP28durdhpru:3249: lakṣaṇaṃ tattvaṃ svalakṣaṇam iti vivṛṇvatā ca dharmottarena tad eva darśitam /
GSP28durdhpru:3250: kevalaṃ na vyaktīkṛtam atas tasya viṣayaḥ svalakṣaṇam iti śabdamātraśrāviṇo 'viditācāryābhiprāyasyāvibhāvitadharmottaravivaraṇārthasya
GSP28durdhpru:3251: yady asādhāraṇaṃ pararūpeṇāmiśraṃ rūpaṃ svalaṣaṇaṃ tadā 'gnitvam api gotvādisāmānyenāmiśraṃ
GSP28durdhpru:3252: svalakṣaṇaṃ prasajyeteti vyāptiṃ manyamānasyāyaṃ kaḥ punar ityādipraśnaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:3253: ka ity anena sāmānyākāreṇa viṣayaṃ pṛcchati /
GSP28durdhpru:3256: codakena viṣayaṃ sampṛṣṭa ācāryaḥ kasmād artham uttarīkarotīty āśaṅkyāha -- artheti /
GSP28durdhpru:3257: jñānasya pratyāsannatvāj jñānaviṣayo labdha ity abhipretya yasya jñānaviṣayasyeti vivṛṇoti /
GSP28durdhpru:3258: sannidhānāsannidhānaśabdau nikaṭadūrāvasthānārthau vyācakṣāṇo yad anyair ākhyātaṃ -- “asannidhānaṃ yogyadeśe sarvathā vastuno 'bhāvaḥ” iti tad apākaroti /
GSP28durdhpru:3259: ayañ cāsyābhiprāyo yatra vastu nāsti tatra jñānam eva na jāyate /
GSP28durdhpru:3260: na tu tatpratibhāsya bhedo nānātvam astīti /
GSP28durdhpru:3261: tasmād ityādinā sa[32b]nnidhānāsannidhānābhyām iti pañcamī dvivacanāntam etad iti darśayati /
GSP28durdhpru:3268: kvacit samudāyārthaṃ vyākhyāya paścāt padārthaṃ vivṛṇvate /
GSP28durdhpru:3269: kvacit padārthṃ vivṛtya paścāt smudāyārthaṃ vyācakṣata iti /
GSP28durdhpru:3272: dūrastho hi jñānam eva na janayati kim aṅga punar bhindyād ity abhiprāyaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:3282: dūrād asphuṭāni dṛśyanta iti vadataś cāyam āśayaḥ -- dūre hi vastu gṛhyamāṇaṃ pracurarajonīhārādisaṃsṛṣṭaṃ gṛhyate /
GSP28durdhpru:3286: tathā hi vikalpaviṣayo 'pi vahnir dṛśyātmaka eva avasīyata ity āha
GSP28durdhpru:3291: ya eva arthaḥ sannidhānāsannidhānābhyāṃ sphuṭam asphuṭaṃ ca pratibhāsaṃ karoti paramārthasan sa eva /
GSP28durdhpru:3298: yadi ya evārthaḥ sannidhānād asannidhāc ca jñānapratibhāsaṃ sphuṭatvāsphuṭatvābhyāṃ bhinati sa eva svalakṣaṇaṃ tarhi sparśarasau svalakṣaṇe na syātām /
GSP28durdhpru:3299: tau khalu asannihitau jñānam eva na janyataḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:3301: kiñ caitasmin svalakṣaṇe vijñāṇam asvalakṣaṇaṃ syāt /
GSP28durdhpru:3302: tasyā''stāṃ tāvad asannihitasyāsphuṭajñānajanakatvaṃ sannihitasyāpi sphuṭajñānajanakatvaṃ nāsti /
GSP28durdhpru:3303: na ca tasya dūrāntikavarttitvam asty adeśatvāt /
GSP28durdhpru:3304: tad īdṛśīṃ mahatīm avyāpitām anālocyedṛśaṃ svalakṣaṇaṃ praṇayann ācāryaḥ,
GSP28durdhpru:3305: dharmottaro 'py evaṃ prasabhaṃ vyācakṣāṇaḥ kathaṃ na pramādyatīti? na /
GSP28durdhpru:3309: kevalaṃ sannidhānāsannidhānābhyāṃ jñānapratibhāsabhedakatvena yad ekārthasamavetam asādhāraṇyaṃ vyatyantarāsanuyāyitvaṃ tad upalakṣitam /
GSP28durdhpru:3311: ata eva -- “asādhāraṇaviṣayaṃ svalakṣaṇaviṣayam” iti [hetu-ṭī-pṛ-25] bhaṭaṭārcaṭo vyācaṣṭe /
GSP28durdhpru:3312: ata evānumānasyaitad viparyayeṇa sādhāraṇaṃ rūpa viṣayo darśayiṣyate /
GSP28durdhpru:3314: tasya viṣayaḥ svalakṣaṇam ity abhihite 'pi svalakṣaṇaśabdasyānyathāpi nirvacanasambhavāt,
GSP28durdhpru:3315: nāyam abhimato 'rtho jñāyeta pratipattṛbhir iti tad abhimatārtha ittham upalakṣita iti ca dṛṣṭavyam //
GSP28durdhpru:3316: tasya viṣayaḥ svalakṣaṇam ity atra yadi tasyaiva viṣayaḥ svalaṣāṇam ity avadhāryate
GSP28durdhpru:3317: tadā yata eva kārakaraṇaṃ tato 'nyatrāvadhāraṇam iti svalakṣaṇasya pratyakṣe niyamāt
GSP28durdhpru:3320: tadā 'pi pratyakṣasya svalakṣaṇe niyatatvād [33a] aniyataṃ svalakṣaṇam anumānasyāpi viṣayaḥ syād ity ubhayāvadhāraṇāṃ kāryam /
GSP28durdhpru:3322: etad asahamānaḥ pūrvapakṣavādy āha -- kasmād iti /
GSP28durdhpru:3325: yad vā yasyārthasyety atra tatsvalakṣaṇam iti /
GSP28durdhpru:3326: tad eva pratyakṣaviṣayaḥ svalakṣaṇaṃ nānumānaviṣaya ity abhipretaṃ tad asahamāna evam āha /
GSP28durdhpru:3327: kasmāt pratyakṣaviṣāya eveti bruvato 'numānasyāpi viṣayaḥ kiṃ na svalakṣaṇam ity abhiprāyaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:3328: sa eva kiṃ na tathety āśaṅkya pūrvapakṣavādy evopapattim
GSP28durdhpru:3330: kasmāt punas tad eva paramārthasad ity āha --
GSP28durdhpru:3334: heyo hi hātum iṣyate upādeyaś ca upādātum /
GSP28durdhpru:3337: tad eva lakṣaṇaṃ rūpaṃ yasya vastunaḥ
GSP28durdhpru:3341: nanu `yasyārthasya sannidhānāsannidhānābhyāṃ jñānapratibhāsabhedas tat svalakṣaṇam' ity ukte kuto 'sya praśnasyāvakāśaḥ?
GSP28durdhpru:3342: na hi vikalpaviṣayasya sannidhānāsannidhānāc ca jñānapratibhāsabhedo 'sti yato 'syotthānaṃ syāt /
GSP28durdhpru:3344: kevalam ayam asyāśayaḥ -- yad etad bhavadbhir lakṣaṇaṃ svalakṣaṇasya pratītaṃ tad
GSP28durdhpru:3345: asya lakṣanaṃ eva na bhavati kin tu yad eva dṛśyatayā 'dhyavasīyate tad eva sva[lakṣaṇa]m
GSP28durdhpru:3347: sati caivam aumānavikalpaviṣayasyāpi tathātvam anivāritam eveti sūtthānaḥ praśnaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:3348: etat praśnaviṣarjanam ācāryīyaṃ darśayann āha -- tad eveti /
GSP28durdhpru:3349: atha syāt yadi[37]............. ty ucyamānaṃ śobheta yāvatedam eva na siddhaṃ tat kuto 'yaṃ praśnavisarjanaprakāra iti? ucyate /
GSP28durdhpru:3350: svalakṣaṇam iti svam asādhāraṇaṃ pāramārthikaḥ svabhāva ucyate /
GSP28durdhpru:3351: sa eva ca pāramārthikaḥ svabhāva ucyate,
GSP28durdhpru:3353: sa eva ca paramārthasann iti yuktam idam uttaraṃ tad eveti /
GSP28durdhpru:3357: tena rūpeṇa sad vidyamānam iti vigrahaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:3360: paramārthasad ity asyārtham ākhyāya tad evety etad vivṛṇoti ya eveti /
GSP28durdhpru:3363: svalakṣaṇaṃ caivam ātmakam ity abhprāyeṇa ya evārthaḥ sa evety āha /
GSP28durdhpru:3365: sa tu na tasya viṣayo 'nyāpi vā viṣayo bhaviṣyati /
GSP28durdhpru:3366: tathā ca vivakṣitārthāsiddhir ity āha sa ceti /
GSP28durdhpru:3368: tad eteti pratyakṣaviṣayatvena sthitaṃ vastv eva na tv anumānaviṣayo 'pīti /
GSP28durdhpru:3369: anena kasmāt punaḥ pratyakṣaviṣaya eva svalakṣaṇam ity etat praśnavisarjanasyopasaṃhāraḥ kṛto veditavyaḥ //
GSP28durdhpru:3372: idānīṃ svalakṣaṇasyaiva paramārthasattvam asahamāna āha -- kasmād iti /
GSP28durdhpru:3373: yam asyāśaḥ -- sa eva khalu paramārhtasann artho ya evārthtvenādhyavasīyate /
GSP28durdhpru:3374: anumānaviṣayo 'pi ca vahnis tathā 'dhyavasīyata iti so 'pi kasmān na paramā[33b]rthasann iti /
GSP28durdhpru:3375: atra -- arthetyādi yad uttaraṃ tad arthyata ityādinā vyācaṣte /
GSP28durdhpru:3377: heyaḥ katham arthyata ity āha -- heya iti /
GSP28durdhpru:3379: yadi hātum arthyamāno 'rtho na tarhy upādeyo 'rtha ity āha -- upādeya iti /
GSP28durdhpru:3382: evaṃ ca vyācakṣāṇaḥ sādhyo dāhādir eva mukhyavṛttyopādeyā heyo vā /
GSP28durdhpru:3387: tad ayam arthaḥ -- yasmād arthakriyāsamarthaṃ parmārthasad ucyate,
GSP28durdhpru:3390: tata eva hi pratyakṣaviṣayād arthakriyā prāpyate na vikalpaviṣayāt /
GSP28durdhpru:3391: ata eva yady api vikalpaviṣayo dṛśya iva avasīyate tathā api na sa dṛśya eva tato 'rthakriyāya abhāvāt,
GSP28durdhpru:3393: atas tad eva svalakṣaṇaṃ na vikalpaviṣayaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:3396: etasmāt svalakṣaṇād yad anyat ---- svalakṣaṇaṃ yo na bhavati jñānaviṣayaḥ ---- tat sāmānyalakṣaṇam,
GSP28durdhpru:3397: vikalpajñānena avasīyamāno hy arthaḥ sannidhānāsannidhānābhyāṃ jñānapratibhāsaṃ na bhinatti /
GSP28durdhpru:3398: tathā hi āropyamāṇo vahnir āropād asti /
GSP28durdhpru:3400: tasya samāropitasya sannidhānāsannidhānāc ca jñānapratibhāsasya na bhedaḥ sphuṭatvena asphuṭatvena vā /
GSP28durdhpru:3406: tam evopādātuṃ hātum vā tatsādhanasyopādānaṃ hānaṃ vā 'nyathā vā śakyata iti tatsādhanabhūto vahnyādir upādeyādir upapadyata iti darśayati /
GSP28durdhpru:3407: tasyām ityādi tasmād ity antaṃ subodham /
GSP28durdhpru:3408: paramārthasatas tattve pratipādye kim iti vastunas tādrūpyam ācāryeṇa darśitam ity āśaṅkām apākurvann āha -- vastuśabda iti /
GSP28durdhpru:3409: tad ayam artha ityādir na vikalpaviṣaya ity anto granthas tūktārthopasaṃhāraḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:3412: svalakṣaṇaśabdasya cānyaśabdayogāt pañcamyā bhavitavyam ity abhipretya etasmād ity āha /
GSP28durdhpru:3413: anyatvam abhivyanakti -- svalakṣaṇaṃ yo na bhavatīti /
GSP28durdhpru:3419: pratibhāsābhedakatvaṃ tasya kuto 'vasīyate sarvadā tasya sannihitarūpatvād asannihitarūpatvād eva vety āha -- tathā hīti /
GSP28durdhpru:3422: āstām āropāt tathābhūtas tathāpi tasya sannidhānāsannidhāna(ne)
GSP28durdhpru:3428: tac ca anumānyasya grāhyaṃ darśayitum āha --
GSP28durdhpru:3432: sāmānyalakṣaṇam anumānasya viṣayaṃ vyākhyātukāmena ayaṃ svalakṣaṇasvarūpākhyānagrantha āvartanīyaḥ syāt /
GSP28durdhpru:3433: tato lāghavārthaṃ pratyakṣapariccheda eva anumānaviṣaya uktaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:3439: vikalpaviṣayasyāpy asādhāraṇatvād asiddhaṃ vyakyantarasādhāraṇatvād asiddhaṃ vyaktyantarasādhāraṇatvam ity āha -- sakalaś cāsau tārṇapārṇādibhedabhinno vahniś ceti tathā /
GSP28durdhpru:3442: tad viṣayatve 'numānasya kathaṃ bāhye pravarttakatvaṃ tatprāpakatvañ ca,
GSP28durdhpru:3443: yataḥ pramāṇyam asya syād iti ced /
GSP28durdhpru:3445: vikalpāḥ khalv ete 'nādyavidyāvaśāt svapratibhāsam anagnivyāvṛtta avasyanto bāhyo 'py anagnivyāvṛtta iti tad adhyasānam eva bāhyo vahnir adhyavasita iti manyante /
GSP28durdhpru:3447: tator vivekāpratipatteḥ ata eva te vikalpā dṛśyavikalpyāv arthāv ekīkṛtya bāhye lokaṃ pravarttayanti /
GSP28durdhpru:3448: dṛśyavikapyaikīkaraṇam api teṣāṃ tathā pravṛttihetutayotpatter eva draṣṭavyam /
GSP28durdhpru:3451: tad āha nyāyavādī -- “bhrāntir api sambandhataḥ pramā” iti /
GSP28durdhpru:3452: eṣa cārthaḥ svapratibhāse 'narthe 'rthādhyavasāyena pravṛtter ity atrāpy apekṣaṇīyaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:3454: yata evaṃ tat tasmād ity upasaṃhāraḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:3459: evaṃ vyācakṣāṇo viṣayaśabdena grāhyo viṣayo 'bhipreto 'tra pramāṇavyāpāraviṣayo 'dhyavaseyaḥ svalakṣaṇasyaiva tad adhyavaseyatvena tathā vyavasthāpanād iti darśayati /
GSP28durdhpru:3461: prakāśamānaṃ ca rūpam āśritya grāhyatvam ucyata ity uktaprāyam /
GSP28durdhpru:3462: anumānasyāpi grāhyaviṣayadarśane 'yam abhiprāyo yadīdam anumānam anartham anagnivyāvṛttimātraṃ sāmānyarūpaṃ gṛhṇāti,
GSP28durdhpru:3465: tathākurvac ca vastuviṣayaṃ prāmāṇyam aśnuvīta nānyatheti / sa
GSP28durdhpru:3468: tad eva ca pratyakṣaṃ jñānaṃ pramāṇaphalam I-18
GSP28durdhpru:3469: tad eva iti / yad eva anantaram uktaṃ pratyakṣaṃ jñānaṃ tad eva pramānasya phalaṃ /
GSP28durdhpru:3473: sā eva rūpaṃ yasya pratyakṣajñānasya tad arthapratītirūpam /
GSP28durdhpru:3475: etad uktaṃ bhavati -- prāpakaṃ jñānam pramāṇam /
GSP28durdhpru:3476: prāpaṇaśaktiś ca na kevalād arthāvinābhavitvād bhavati /
GSP28durdhpru:3478: tasmāt prāpyād arthād utpattāv apy asya jñānasya asti kaścid avaśyakartavyaḥ prāpakavyāpāro yena kṛtena arthaḥ prāpito bhavati /
GSP28durdhpru:3481: uktaṃ ca purastāt pravṛttiviṣayapradarśanam eva prāpakasya prāpakavyāpāro nāma /
GSP28durdhpru:3482: tad eva ca pratyakṣam arthapratītirūpam arthapradarśanarūpam /
GSP28durdhpru:3487: atrāpi sāmānyalakṣaṇam evānumānasya viṣaya ity avadhāraṇīyaṃ na tv anumānasyaiveti pratyakṣapṛṣṭhabhāvino 'pi vikalpaviśeṣasya tadviṣayatvād anyathā liṅganiścayāyogād iti /
GSP28durdhpru:3488: samprati pratyakṣasya viṣayavipratipattinirākaraṇe prakṛte kim aprakṛtam anumānasya viṣayavipratipattinirākaraṇam ācaritam ity āśaṅkām apākarttuṃ sāmānyetyādinopakramate /
GSP28durdhpru:3489: etac cokta ity etad antaṃ sujñānam //
GSP28durdhpru:3490: viṣayetyādi phalam ity ed antaṃ suboddham /
GSP28durdhpru:3491: phalapradarśane cāyaṃ vārttikakārasyāśayaḥ -- pramākaraṇaṃ khalu loke pramāṇam ucyate /
GSP28durdhpru:3493: nanu yasmin viṣaye kriyāsādhanaṃ vyāpriyate[38]..... katham iti /
GSP28durdhpru:3494: kim anyat pramāṇam iti punar ihopekṣaitam anena /
GSP28durdhpru:3496: etac ca tasmād ity antaṃ sugamam /
GSP28durdhpru:3502: tat kim arthe pratītis tat phalaṃ mṛgyata ityāśaṅkyāha -- etad uktaṃ bhavatīti /
GSP28durdhpru:3505: sā ca śaktis tata utpatte eva /
GSP28durdhpru:3506: tathā ca kathaṃ pūrvapakṣātikrama ity āha -- prāpaṇaśaktiś ceti /
GSP28durdhpru:3509: vivakṣitena vinā bhavatīti vinābhāvī grahāditvāṇ ṇiniḥ,
GSP28durdhpru:3511: arthena vinā bhāvīti “tṛtīyā” [pā-2.1.30] iti yogavibhāgāt samāsaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:3513: kathaṃ punar na kevalād ity āha -- bījād iti /
GSP28durdhpru:3515: yady api santāna eva prāpyo na ca tasmāt tasyotpattis tathāpi viṣaye 'syaikatvam adhyavasāya prāpyād arthād uttpattāv apīty uktam /
GSP28durdhpru:3519: tathāpi na tatphalam ity āha -- sa eveti /
GSP28durdhpru:3520: ca sphuṭam etad ity asimnn arthe /
GSP28durdhpru:3523: tathā ca kathaṃ pratītiḥ phalam ity āha uktam iti /
GSP28durdhpru:3526: kenoktam etad iti cet pravarttakatvam api pravṛttiviṣayopadarśakatvam evetyādinā /
GSP28durdhpru:3527: āstām arthapratītir avaśyakarttavyā pramāṇasya tathāpi kathaṃ tad eva pratyakṣajñānaṃ
GSP28durdhpru:3528: phalaṃ tasyātadrūpatvād ityāśaṅkya yad arthapratītirūpatvaṃ prajñātaṃ tad upapādayann āha -- tadeveti /
GSP28durdhpru:3531: tat katham arthapratītyām ekaṃ tat pradarśyata ity āha -- arthapradarśanarūpam iti /
GSP28durdhpru:3533: yata evam ato 'smāt tad eva pratyakṣaṃ jñānam eva nārthāntaram ity arthāt /
GSP28durdhpru:3534: pramāṇād anyajñānam eva phalaṃ yadi syāt, kiṃ syāt?
GSP28durdhpru:3535: yena yatnena garīyasā pramāṇād abhedo 'sya sādhyata iti cet /
GSP28durdhpru:3538: pravṛttes tatpradhānatvāt” [pramāṇavā-1.4] ity atrājñāṇātmanas tāvat prāmāṇyam apahastitam /
GSP28durdhpru:3541: anyathā jñānatvam eva tasya na syāt /
GSP28durdhpru:3542: pramājanakatvena ca jñānatve cakṣurāder api jñānatvaṃ syāt /
GSP28durdhpru:3544: svasaṃvedanarūpatve vā grāhyākārasaṃvedanam evārthavedanam iti kahtaṃ bhinnaṃ phalam?
GSP28durdhpru:3546: jñānam evārthasya prakāśa iti ca sarvatantrasiddho 'yam arthaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:3548: satyāṃ ca tadātmatāyāṃ tad eva phalaṃ yujyate,
GSP28durdhpru:3550: api ca yadi jñānasya svayam artharūpaparicchedarūpatvenārthaparicchedakatvaṃ na syāt,
GSP28durdhpru:3552: tadā 'rthasya paricchitter aparokṣataiva vyavasthāpayituṃ na śakyeta /
GSP28durdhpru:3553: tathā hi tad ādyaṃ jñānam arthaṃ paricchinatty artham aparokṣayatīti ko 'rtho 'rthaviṣayāṃ paricchittiṃ janayatīti /
GSP28durdhpru:3554: sā 'pi yady artham aparokṣayati tadā 'parāṃ pratītiṃ janayatīti syāt /
GSP28durdhpru:3555: evam uttaratrāpy evam eveti paricchittīnām ānantyam,
GSP28durdhpru:3556: na tv arthasyāparokṣatety āyātam āndhyam aśeṣasya jagataḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:3557: atha tāsām ekā svayam arthaparicchedarūpā arthāparokṣatārūpopeyate;
GSP28durdhpru:3559: kin tarhi? svayam arthaparicchedātmatvam iti ādyasyāpi tathātvam anivāritam /
GSP28durdhpru:3560: tathā ca kathaṃ pramāṇād vyatiriktaṃ phalam iti?
GSP28durdhpru:3561: iha na kriyaiva karaṇaṃ loke tayor bhedenāvasthiteḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:3562: yā ceyaṃ jñānalakṣaṇā kriyā sā cet phalaṃ
GSP28durdhpru:3567: arthena saha yat sārūpyaṃ sādṛśyam asya jñānasya tat pramāṇam /
GSP28durdhpru:3568: iha yasmād viṣayād vijñānam udeti tadviṣayasadṛśaṃ tad bhavati /
GSP28durdhpru:3570: tac ca sārūpyaṃ sādṛśyam ākāra ity ābhāsa ity api vyapadiśyate /
GSP28durdhpru:3572: tathā ca sati tad eva jñānaṃ pramāṇaṃ tad eva ca pramāṇaphalam /
GSP28durdhpru:3573: na ca ekaṃ vastu sādhyaṃ sādhanaṃ ca upapadyate /
GSP28durdhpru:3574: tat kathaṃ sārūpyaṃ pramāṇam ity āha --
GSP28durdhpru:3577: kim anyat pramāṇaṃ bhaviṣyati ity āgūrya pūrvapakṣāvādī yadīty āha /
GSP28durdhpru:3580: tad eva pratyakṣaṃ jñānam evam iti (eveti)
GSP28durdhpru:3583: tarhi tasmin kāle kim pramāṇam iti yojyam /
GSP28durdhpru:3588: etac ca nīlasadṛśam ity antam subodham /
GSP28durdhpru:3589: kevalam evaṃ vadato 'yam āśayaḥ -- anekaprāgbhāvenodayamānam api vijñānam arthasyaivākāraṃ bibharti,
GSP28durdhpru:3592: yadi hi tadanyākāro viṣayaḥ syāt tadā taditarasyākāradhāri vijñānaṃ kadācij janyet /
GSP28durdhpru:3593: yathā śuktiḥ kathañcid rajatākārajñānaprabandhodaye 'pi taddeśopasṛṣṭasya svākārānukāri jñānaṃ janayati /
GSP28durdhpru:3594: na cābhrāntasya nīlajñānasya kadācid apy anyākāratvam asti /
GSP28durdhpru:3595: tasmād artho 'py evam ākāra iti niścīyate /
GSP28durdhpru:3597: nanu cānyatra viṣayābhāsaḥ pramāṇam uktas tathāviṣayākāraḥ,
GSP28durdhpru:3599: tat kathaṃ na vyāghāta ity āśaṅkyāha -- tac ceti /
GSP28durdhpru:3600: co yasmād avadhāraṇe vā ity apy anenāpi śabdena /
GSP28durdhpru:3603: kiṃ tarhi pramāṇam iti pṛcchatā yac cetasi nihitam āsīt tad idānīṃ nanu cetyādinā kaṇṭhoktaṃ karoti /
GSP28durdhpru:3604: etac ca pramāṇam ity etad antaṃ subodham /
GSP28durdhpru:3612: arthasya pratītirūpaṃ pratyakṣaṃ vijñānaṃ sārūpyavaśāt siddhyati pratītaṃ bhavati ity arthaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:3615: yebhyo hi cakṣurādibhyo vijñānam utpadyate na tadvaśāt tajjñānaṃ nīlasya saṃvedanaṃ śakyate 'vasthāpayitum[39] /
GSP28durdhpru:3616: nīlasadṛśaṃ tu anubhūyamānaṃ nīlasya saṃvedanam avasthāpyate /
GSP28durdhpru:3623: tata ekasya vastunaḥ kiñcid rūpaṃ pramāṇam kiñcit pramāṇaphalaṃ na virudhyate /
GSP28durdhpru:3624: etasmin pūrvapakṣe tadvaśād ityādy uttaram ācāryīyaṃ vivṛṇoti tad iti /
GSP28durdhpru:3627: yataḥ pramitir iyaṃ viśiṣṭenaiva karmaṇā 'vacchinnā pratīyate /
GSP28durdhpru:3630: pratītaṃ tannīlasyedaṃ jñānaṃ na pītasyetyādyākāreṇa niścitaṃ bhavtīty arthaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:3633: yata evaṃ tat tasmāt nīlasya pratītir nīlasyaivedaṃ jñānam ity avasīyate /
GSP28durdhpru:3634: nanu janakebhya eveyaṃ jñānasya vyavasthā bhaviṣyati /
GSP28durdhpru:3635: te hi jñāṇaṃ janayituṃ śaktāḥ kim aṅga niścāyituṃ na śaknuyuḥ?
GSP28durdhpru:3636: ataś ca na sārūpyādhīno 'yaṃ pratītiniyama ity āśaṅkyāha -- yebhya iti /
GSP28durdhpru:3642: tadaviśeṣe sa kathaṃ viśeṣavyavasthāyā aṅgaṃ bhaved iti /
GSP28durdhpru:3643: nīlasārūpye 'pi yady ayaṃ nyāyas tadā kathaṃ tasyāpi niyamakatvam ity āha -- nīleti /
GSP28durdhpru:3645: nīlasadṛśam anubhūyamānaṃ saṃvedanaṃ jñānaṃ nīlasya nīlasyaiveti vyavasthāpyate /
GSP28durdhpru:3646: ayam atra prakaraṇārthaḥ -- yadi jñānam arthasarūpaṃ na syāt kin tu nirākāraṃ bodhaikarūpaṃ tadā 'nubhavaikarūpatayā tad aviśiṣṭaṃ,
GSP28durdhpru:3647: paricchedyatayā karmasyānaprāpte nīlapītādāv iti nīlasyaivedaṃ saṃvedanam,
GSP28durdhpru:3649: [35b] arthagataś cākāro jñānādhīnapratipattitayā jñānasya viśiṣṭarūpatāsandehena sandigdhaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:3650: na ca tenaiva sandigdharūpeṇa tad eva sandigdhaṃ rūpaṃ niścetuṃ śakyam /
GSP28durdhpru:3651: jñānagataś ca viśeṣo 'rthakṛtaḥ sārūpyād anyo nopapadyate /
GSP28durdhpru:3652: sann api na tāvad idaṃ tayā 'sau nirdeṣṭuṃ śakyaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:3654: yadrūpaś ca yaś ca karmaniyamaniśayo jñānasya tasminn nirūpite kīdṛśī tadrūpatāvyavasthā? yathā
GSP28durdhpru:3658: vyavasthāpyavyavasthāpakabhāvo 'pi katham ekasya jñānasya iti cet /
GSP28durdhpru:3660: nīlasadṛśam anubhūya tad vijñānaṃ yato nīlasya grāhakam avasthāpyate niścayapratyayena,
GSP28durdhpru:3662: niścayapratyayena ca taj jñānaṃ nīlasaṃvedanam avasthāpyamānaṃ vyavasthāpyam /
GSP28durdhpru:3665: nīlādir anirūpite kṣaṇikatve tadrūpo na nirūpyata iti /
GSP28durdhpru:3666: tasmād yata iyam adhigatir avyavadhānāt tattvaṃ pralabhate tad evānyenāvyavadhīyamānavyāpāraṃ svabhedena bhedakaṃ pramākaraṇaṃ pramāṇam /
GSP28durdhpru:3669: eṣa ca vādo 'smābhir 10vistareṇa viśeṣākhyāne 'bhihita iti tato 'py apekṣitavya iti /
GSP28durdhpru:3670: nanu caivam apy ekasyaiva jñānasya sādhyatvaṃ sādhanatvañ ca katham upapadyate?
GSP28durdhpru:3671: na hi paraśur eva chidā bhavati /
GSP28durdhpru:3672: tataḥ pramāṇaphalayor abhedo nābhyupaitavya ity āśaṅkyāha -- na cetyādi /
GSP28durdhpru:3675: yady evam na bhavati kathaṃ nāmety āha -- api tu kin tu /
GSP28durdhpru:3677: vyavasthāpyate viśiṣṭenātmanā niyamyate 'neneti vyavasthānimittam vyavasthāpanam abhipretam /
GSP28durdhpru:3679: yadā tu vyavasthāpakabhāveneti pāṭho dṛśyate tadā karaṇe karttṛbhāvavivakṣayā tathā draṣṭavyam /
GSP28durdhpru:3681: tayor vyavasthāpyavyavasthāpanayor bhāvas tathā jñānābhidhānanimittaṃ rūpaṃ tena /
GSP28durdhpru:3683: yata evaṃ tatas tasmād ekasya vastunaḥ pratyakṣalakṣaṇasya jñānasya vastunaḥ kiñcid rūpaṃ vyāvṛttiparikalpitaṃ kṛtakatvādivat /
GSP28durdhpru:3685: grāhyākāro 'rthasārūpyākhya ātmanaḥ saṃvidam arthasaṃvidam ādarśayann arthe pramāṇam /
GSP28durdhpru:3687: vastutaḥ svavid apīyam arthasambandhinī vyavasīyamānā 'rthasaṃvittiḥ phalm iti /
GSP28durdhpru:3689: kiñ ca vyavasthāpyaṃ yenaitat syād ity āha -- vyavasthāpaneti /
GSP28durdhpru:3697: nīlasyedaṃ nānyasyety anenākāreṇa yan nīlasaṃvedanaṃ tad rūpam /
GSP28durdhpru:3699: na kevalam ekasya janyajanakabhāvo 'nupapanna ity apinā darśayati /
GSP28durdhpru:3701: yato yasmān nilasadṛśam anubhūyeti vāstavaṃ rūpam anūditam /
GSP28durdhpru:3703: api tu nīlam evānubhavāmīti nīlasya grākam avasthāpyate /
GSP28durdhpru:3706: na tu nirvikalpatvāt pratyakṣam eva nīlabodharūpatvena ātmanam avasthāpayitum śaknoti /
GSP28durdhpru:3707: niścayapratyayena avyavasthāpitaṃ sad api nīlabodharūpaṃ vijñānam asatkalpam eva /
GSP28durdhpru:3708: tasmān niścayena nīlabodharūpaṃ vyavasthāpitaṃ vijñānaṃ nīlabodhātmanā sad bhavati /
GSP28durdhpru:3709: tasmād adhyavasāyaṃ kurvad eva pratyakṣaṃ pramāṇaṃ bhavati /
GSP28durdhpru:3710: akṛte tv adhyavasāye nīlabodharūpatvenāvyavasthāpitaṃ bhavati vijñānam /
GSP28durdhpru:3712: ataḥ sādhakatamatvābhāvāt pramāṇam eva na syāj jñānam /
GSP28durdhpru:3715: na ca niścayo 'py ātmānaṃ tathā 'vasthāpayituṃ paryavāpnoti,
GSP28durdhpru:3717: tat kena tathā vyavasthāyata ity āha -- niścayapratyayeneti /
GSP28durdhpru:3720: tasmāt sārūpyam anubhūtaṃ svasaṃvedanena pratītaṃ vyavasthāpanahetur nīlasyedaṃ saṃvedanam,
GSP28durdhpru:3722: idaṃ ca vyavasthāpanahetur hi sārupyaṃ tasya jñāṇasyety asya samarthanam /
GSP28durdhpru:3723: yadi jñānasya tasya sārupyam evaṃ vyavasthāpanahetus tarhi kiṃ kīdṛśaṃ ca sad vyavasthāpyam ity āha -- niścayeti /
GSP28durdhpru:3726: yasyaiva nīlajñānasya sārūpyaṃ tathoktaṃ tad eva jñānaṃ vyavasthāpyaṃ nīlasyaivetyākāreṇa niyāmyam ity arthaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:3729: iti pāṭho 'ṣṭamapaṃktisambaddhatvena paṃktibāhyabhāge likhitaḥ pratau dṛśyate kin tu tasya kutra niveśa iti na jñāyate -- saṃ-
GSP28durdhpru:3730: kīdṛśaṃ sat tathā vyavasthāpyam ity āha -- nīleti /
GSP28durdhpru:3731: pītādisaṃvedanavyāvṛttyā nīlasyedaṃ saṃvedanaṃ jñānam ity avasthāpyamānaṃ niścīyamānam /
GSP28durdhpru:3733: nanu kiṃ jñānāt sārūpyaṃ vyatiricyate yena sārūpyaṃ tathoktam,
GSP28durdhpru:3734: jñānaṃ tv evam ucyata ity āśaṅkyopasaṃhāravyāhenāha -- tasmād iti /
GSP28durdhpru:3736: sārūpyaṃ ca jñānād anyaṃ nopapadyate tasmāt kāraṇāt /
GSP28durdhpru:3737: ayaṃ ca -- tata ekasya vastunaḥ kiñcid rūpam ityāder upapattyā prasādhitasyopasaṃhāraḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:3739: ekasyaiva jñānasya vyāvṛttikṛtaṃ bhedam āśrityāha vyavasthāpyavyasthāpanabhāvaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:3740: vāstavaṃ cābhedam upādāya pramāṇaphalayor abheda ucyate /
GSP28durdhpru:3742: samprati niścayapratyayeneti bruvatā yādṛśo niścayo vivakṣitas taṃ vyavasthāpaka ityādinopasaṃhāravyājena spaṣṭayati /
GSP28durdhpru:3746: yathā marīcīr dṛṣṭvā tadbalotpannena vikalpenāvasthāpyamānayor jalasārūpyajñānayor na tathābhāvaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:3748: janitena tv adhyavasāyena sārūpyavaśān nīlabodharūpe jñāne vyavasthāpyamāne sārūpyaṃ vyavasthāpanahetutvāt pramāṇaṃ siddhaṃ bhavati /
GSP28durdhpru:3749: yady evam adhyavasāyasahitam eva pratyakṣaṃ pramāṇam syāt na kevalam iti cet /
GSP28durdhpru:3753: darśanāñ ca arthasākṣātkaraṇākhyaṃ pratyakṣavyāpāraḥ utprekṣaṇaṃ tu vikalpavyāpāraḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:3755: yenābhiprāyeṇa niścayapratyayasya vyavasthāpakatvam uktaṃ tam abhivyanakti -- na tv iti /
GSP28durdhpru:3758: nanu paramārthato yadi taj jñānaṃ nīlam eva rūpatayā sarūpaṃ tadā tathāniścayo bhavatu vā mā vā /
GSP28durdhpru:3759: svayam evāvikalpakatve 'pi tena rūpeṇa sadvyayvahāragocaro bhaviṣyatīty āśṅkyāha -- niścayapratyayenetyādi /
GSP28durdhpru:3762: tenāvyavasthāpitam asatkalpam asat tulyam svaviṣaye vyavahārayitum aśaktatvāt[36b] /
GSP28durdhpru:3765: yamān niścayena tathā 'vyavasthāpitam asatā sadṛśaṃ abhavati tasmāt /
GSP28durdhpru:3766: nīlabodhātmanā nīlasyāyaṃ bodha ityākāreṇa sad bhavati sadvyavahārayogyaṃ bhavati /
GSP28durdhpru:3767: yamātsvasāmarthyotpannenānurūpeṇa niścayapratyayena vyavasthāpitaṃ tathā vahavati nānyathā tasmāt kāraṇād adhyavasāyam anurūpaṃ niścayaṃ kurvat
GSP28durdhpru:3769: amum evārthaṃ vyatirekamukhena draḍhyann āha -- akṛte tv iti /
GSP28durdhpru:3771: bhavatu tathā 'vyavasthāpitaṃ kim ata ity āha -- tathā ceti /
GSP28durdhpru:3773: tad aniṣpattāv api kiṃ na pramāṇam ity āha -- ata iti /
GSP28durdhpru:3778: sā cen na niṣpannā tarhi kim apekṣya sādhakatamatvam ātmasātkuryāt,
GSP28durdhpru:3780: nanu avasāyābhāve tāvad iyaṃ gatis tadbhāve 'pi yady eṣaiva gatis tadā na pratyakṣaṃ nāma pramāṇam ity āśaṅkyānvayamukhenedānīm āha -- janiteneti
GSP28durdhpru:3782: tena tathāvyavasthāpyamāne vyavasthāpakatve ca nimittam āha -- sārūpyavaśād iti /
GSP28durdhpru:3784: yadi pratyakṣaṃ kevalam asahāyaṃ pravarttayitum anīśanaṃ niyamena niścayam apekṣate tarhi tat sahitam eva pramāṇaṃ prasajyetety abhiprāyavān prāha -- yady evam iti /
GSP28durdhpru:3785: evam anantaroktaṃ yady abhyupagamyate tadaivaṃ syāt /
GSP28durdhpru:3788: evaṃ saty etan na bhavati / hetum āha --
GSP28durdhpru:3790: vikalpayanta utprekṣāmahe na tu paśyāma ity utprekṣātmakaṃ vikalpavyāpāram anubhavād adhyavasyanti /
GSP28durdhpru:3791: tasmāt svavyāpāraṃ tiraskṛtya pratyakṣavyāpāram ādarśayati yatra arthe pratyakṣapūrvako 'dhyavasāyas tatra pratyakṣaṃ kevalam eva pramāṇam iti
GSP28durdhpru:3794: [41] pramāṇam iti nyāyabinduṭīkāyāṃ prathamaḥ paricchedaḥ samāptaḥ //
GSP28durdhpru:3797: pramāṇam iti ācāryadharottaraviracitāyāṃ nyāyabinduṭīkāyāṃ prathamaḥ paricchedaḥ samāptaḥ //
GSP28durdhpru:3803: tataḥ svavyāpāraviśiṣṭārthādhyavasāne tasya kā kṣatir ity āśaṅkyāha -- darśanañ ceti /
GSP28durdhpru:3805: yady evaṃ kas tarhi vikalpavyāpāra ity āha -- utprekṣaṇam iti /
GSP28durdhpru:3806: etad eva tathā hītyādinā 'vasyantīty anena (-ty antena)
GSP28durdhpru:3808: bhavatv evaṃ tathāpi kathaṃ pratyakṣasya kevalasya prāmāṇyaṃ na tu vikalpasyāpīty āśaṅkyopasaṃhārāpadeśenāha -- tasmād iti /
GSP28durdhpru:3811: syāt khalu vikalpasyāpi prāṇaṇyaṃ yady asau svavyāpārayukta eva pratyakṣasya sāhāyyaṃ bhajate /
GSP28durdhpru:3814: sa ca darśanalakṣaṇo vyāpāraḥ pratyakṣeṇaiva sampādita iti katham ayam api piṣṭapeṣaṇakārī prāmāṇyaṃ pratilabheta /
GSP28durdhpru:3815: atha pratyakṣaṃ tāvat svaprāmāṇyavyavahārāya tam apekṣate /
GSP28durdhpru:3816: tataḥ so 'pi pramāṇam eveti matis tarhi pitā pitṛvyavahārāyāvaśyaṃ putram apekṣata iti putro 'pi pitā prasajyata iti kṛtam atārkikavacanavicāraṇayeti
GSP28durdhpru:3819: [DhPr p.87] II K A P I T E L
GSP28durdhpru:3821: evaṃ pratyakṣaṃ vyākhyāya anumānaṃ vyākhyātum āha --
GSP28durdhpru:3824: atha anumānalakṣaṇe vaktavye kim akasmāt prakārabhedaḥ kathyate /
GSP28durdhpru:3828: tayor atyantabhedāt na ekam lakṣaṇam asti /
GSP28durdhpru:3829: tatas tayoh pratiniyataṃ lakṣaṇam ākhyātuṃ prakārabhedaḥ kathyate /
GSP28durdhpru:3831: vyaktibhede ca kathite prativyaktiniyataṃ lakṣaṇaṃ śakyate vaktum /
GSP28durdhpru:3834: aśakyatāṃ ca prakārabhedakathanam antareṇa lakṣaṇanirdeśasya jñātvā prāk prakārabhedaḥ kathyata iti /
GSP28durdhpru:3837: yathoddeśam adhunā 'numānaṃ vyākhyātum avasaraprāptam ity abhisandhāyāha -- evam iti /
GSP28durdhpru:3839: prakāre dhāpratyayo 'yam iti darśayann āha -- dviprakāram iti /
GSP28durdhpru:3840: nanu cānumānasya lakṣaṇaṃ vaktukāmenāsya lakṣaṇam eva vaktavyam /
GSP28durdhpru:3841: tat kim idam aprastutābhidhānam āsthīyata iti pūrvapakṣam -- arthetyādinotthāpayati /
GSP28durdhpru:3847: yathā caturṇām api pratyakṣāṇāṃ jñānarūpatvād ekaṃ kalpanāpoḍhatvādisādhāraṇaṃ lakṣaṇaṃ sambhavati,
GSP28durdhpru:3848: tathā yadi syāt pratyakṣaval lakṣaṇam eva prathamam uktaṃ syād iti bhāvaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:3851: nanu prativyaktiniyataṃ lakṣaṇaṃ vyaktiviśeṣopadarśanaṃ vinā na śakyate darśayitum iti vyaktibheda eva kathayitavyaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:3852: tat kiṃ prakārabhedaḥ kathyata ity āha -- prakāreti /
GSP28durdhpru:3854: yadi tasmin darśite 'pi pratiniyatalakṣaṇākhyānaṃ na śakyaṃ tarhi kiṃ tena kathitenety āha -- vyaktīti /
GSP28durdhpru:3857: tena prati viśiṣṭā vyaktis tatra niyatam iti,
GSP28durdhpru:3859: kim punas tad dvaividhyam ity āha --
GSP28durdhpru:3866: yad vā niyataṃ viśiṣṭaṃ lakṣaṇāṃ na śakyaṃ vaktum /
GSP28durdhpru:3867: kva ca niyatam ity āśaṅkyoktaṃ -- prativyaktīti /
GSP28durdhpru:3871: etena yac codyate “lakṣaṇamātre kathite viśiṣṭalakṣaṇam anumānam ekam anekaṃ vā 'stu /
GSP28durdhpru:3872: kiṃ tasya prakārabhedakathanena” iti tat parihṛtam /
GSP28durdhpru:3873: yadi hi sādhāraṇaṃ lakṣaṇam abhipretyedam uyate tadā tan nāstīti kiṃ kathyeta /
GSP28durdhpru:3874: atha viśiṣṭaṃ lakṣaṇaṃ tad api vyaktibhedakathanam antareṇa vaktuṃ yadi śakyeta kiṃ na kathyta /
GSP28durdhpru:3876: ata evādāv eva tad abhidhānaṃ nyāyyam,
GSP28durdhpru:3877: na tu paścād iti darśayitum āha -- aśakyatām iti /
GSP28durdhpru:3881: syād etat -- svārthānumānam evaṃlakṣaṇaṃ parārthānumānam evaṃlakṣaṇam iti kiṃ viśiṣṭaṃ lakṣaṇaṃ na śakyate vaktum?
GSP28durdhpru:3882: evam api kim anumānadvaitaṃ nāveditaṃ bhavati yena sasaṃkhyeyā saṃkhyā -- anumānaṃ dvidhā svārthaṃ parārthaṃ cety ucyata iti?
GSP28durdhpru:3884: kevalaṃ niyamārtham etad vibhāgavacanam iti brūmaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:3885: anumānaṃ dvidhā -- dvidhaivaivam ātmakam iti kathaṃ nāma[37b] pratīyeteti /
GSP28durdhpru:3886: itaratheha tāvad etāvad eva vyutpādyatayā prastutam,
GSP28durdhpru:3887: anyatra punar anyad apy anumānaṃ vyutpādyam astīty āśaṅkā nāhatya nirākṛtā syād iti //
GSP28durdhpru:3888: pūrvavaccheṣavadādirūpeṇa anyathā 'pi dvaividhyasambhavāt saṃśayānaḥ pṛcchati -- kiṃ punar iti /
GSP28durdhpru:3897: yenānumānena karaṇabhūtenānumātā svayaṃ pratipadyate parokṣam artham iti śeṣaḥ,
GSP28durdhpru:3900: ayam āśayaḥ -- trirūpaliṅgasya jñānaṃ yasya santāna utpadyate tat tadartham eva /
GSP28durdhpru:3903: na tu kiñcij jñānaṃ kvacit puṃsi niyatam asti /
GSP28durdhpru:3905: yena svayaṃ pratipadyata iti bruvataś cāyam abhiprāyaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:3906: yady api pratipattir anumānajñānātmikā tathāpy ekasyāpi vyavasthāpyavyavasthāpanabhāvena kriyākaraṇabhedo darśita iti sārūpyabhāgaḥ karaṇam
GSP28durdhpru:3909: tatra svārthaṃ trirūpāl liṅgād yad anumeye jñānaṃ tad anumānam II-3
GSP28durdhpru:3910: tatra tayoḥ svārthaparārthānumānayor madhye svārthaṃ jñānaṃ kiṃ viśiṣṭam ity āha -- trirūpād iti /
GSP28durdhpru:3911: trīṇi rūpāṇi yasya vakṣyamāṇalakṣaṇāni tat trirūpam /
GSP28durdhpru:3913: parārtham ity asya vigraham āha -- parasmāy iti /
GSP28durdhpru:3916: asya ca parapratipattḥ prayojanam ity arthaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:3918: yena vākyena karaṇena paraṃ prati vācyaṃ pratipādyati parokṣam arthaṃ bodhayati tat trirūpalaiṅgākhyānaṃ vākyaṃ parārtham anumānam /
GSP28durdhpru:3919: atrāpy ayam asyābhiprāyaḥ -- yady api abhidhānarūpam apy anumānaṃ na niyataṃ puṃsi tathā 'pi tat parārtham eva /
GSP28durdhpru:3920: tathā hi yad yad uddiśya pravarttate tat tad artham ucyate /
GSP28durdhpru:3921: param uddiśya pravarttate ca śabdo nātmānam /
GSP28durdhpru:3923: prayoktṛsamīhāviṣyasyārthasya para eva prayojako yasmād iti /
GSP28durdhpru:3925: sākṣād anayor vyāpārabhedād iti ca draṣṭavyam /
GSP28durdhpru:3926: nanu ca parārthānumānotpādakavākyavad asti kiñcid vākyaṃ yat parapratyakṣopayogi /
GSP28durdhpru:3928: ataḥ parārthānumānavat parārthaṃ pratyakṣaṃ kiṃ na vyutpādyata iti?
GSP28durdhpru:3929: atrocdyate -- parokṣārthapratipatter yā sāmagrī -- liṅgasya pakṣadharmatā sādhyavyāptiś ca -- tadākhyānād vākyam upacārataḥ parārthānumānam ucyate /
GSP28durdhpru:3932: idaṃ punaḥ `ayaṃ kalabhaḥ' ityādivākyaṃ na pratyakṣotpatter yā sāmagrīndriyālokādi tadabhidhānāt tannimittaṃ bhavat tathā vyapadeśam aśnute yena vyutpādyatām apy aśnuvīta /
GSP28durdhpru:3934: yathā kathañcit parapratyakṣotpattāv aṅgabhāvamātreṇa tādrūpye netrotsave vastuni
GSP28durdhpru:3935: sannihite 'pi kathañcit parāṅmukhasya pareṇa yad abhimukhīkaraṇaṃ [38a]śirasas tad
GSP28durdhpru:3936: api vacanātmakaṃ parārthapratyakṣaṃ vyutpādayitur vyutpādyam āpadyeta /
GSP28durdhpru:3937: etac ca kaḥ svasthātmā manasi niveśayet /
GSP28durdhpru:3938: kiñ ca bhavatu tathāvidhaṃ vacanaṃ parārthaṃ pratyakṣam /
GSP28durdhpru:3940: tasyāpi vyutpādanārthasyāvyutpādanāt pramāda eva mahatī kṣtir iti cet /
GSP28durdhpru:3944: na tu kecit tathāvidhe vacane parārthapratyakṣopayogini vipratipadyante /
GSP28durdhpru:3946: parārthānumāne[42]............... vastu pratipadyamānā api taddharmavyāptivyatirekābhyāṃ nigadanto dṛṣṭāḥ,
GSP28durdhpru:3948: upanayasādhyatadāvṛttivacanānāñ ca prayogād iti tad vyutpādyate /
GSP28durdhpru:3949: yadi tu tatrāpi na vipratipadyeran pare tadā tad api naiva vyutpāditaṃ syād,
GSP28durdhpru:3953: iha yathaiva svayaṃ pratipannaḥ parokṣārthas tathaiva parasmai partipādyata iti svārthāṇumānapūrvakatvāt prarārthānumānasya prathamaṃ svārthānumānam uktam /
GSP28durdhpru:3954: yathoddeśam eva ca lakṣaṇapraṇeyam iti svārthānumānasyaivaṃ
GSP28durdhpru:3956: liṅgam / tasmāt trirūpāl liṅgāt yat jātaṃ jñānam iti /
GSP28durdhpru:3958: tat trirūpāt ca liṅgāt trirūpaliṅgālambhanam apy utpadyata iti viśinaṣṭi -- anumeya iti /
GSP28durdhpru:3960: trirūpāl liṅgāt yad utpannam anumeyālambhanam jñānam tat svārtham anumānam iti /
GSP28durdhpru:3963: pramāṇasya yat phalaṃ tasya vā vyavasthā sā atra anumāne 'pi pratyakṣa iva pratyakṣavat veditavyā /
GSP28durdhpru:3964: lakṣaṇaṃ tatretyādinā ''dita upadiṣṭam ācāryeṇa tad vyācaṣṭe tatreti /
GSP28durdhpru:3966: tasmāt trirūpāl liṅgād yaj jātam iti vyācakṣāṇo mūle trirūpāl liṅgād iti yā pañcamī
GSP28durdhpru:3967: sā gamyamānajanikriyāpekṣayā “janikarttuḥ prakṛtiḥ” [pāṇini 1.4.30] ity anena labdhāpādānasaṃjñakād
GSP28durdhpru:3970: trirūpāl liṅgād iti cācakṣāṇenācāryeṇaikadvipadavyudāsena ṣaṭpakṣīṃ pratikṣipya saptamapakṣaparigraheṇa liṅgasya lakṣaṇam abhipretaṃ prakāśitam iti /
GSP28durdhpru:3971: yathā caitat tathā bhaṭṭārcaṭanibandhanam arcaṭālokasaṃjñitaṃ vidhāsyanto vistareṇa spaṣṭayiṣyāmaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:3975: trirūpaliṅgālambanam iti dhūmaṃ dṛṣṭvā sarvatrāyaṃ vahnināntarīyaka iti jñānaṃ vācyam /
GSP28durdhpru:3976: tad dhi paramparayā trirūpāl liṅgāj jātam iti /
GSP28durdhpru:3979: kim punar viśiṣyata ity āha -- etac ceti /
GSP28durdhpru:3983: anumeyo dharmadharmisamudāyaḥ ālambyata ity ālambanaṃ yasyeti vigrahaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:3984: itir vākyārthaparisamāptau evam arthaḥ san nāpareṇa sambaddhyate -- evam uktena pakāreṇā lakṣaṇavipratipattiṃ nirākṛtyeti //
GSP28durdhpru:3985: nanu ca pramāṇasya phalam iti yady ācāryasya vivakṣitaṃ dharmottareṇa caivaṃ vyākhyāyate tadā pramāṇabhāgavyavasthāyāṃ kim uktam ācāryeṇa,
GSP28durdhpru:3986: dharmottareṇāpi `nīlasārūpyaṃ vyavasthāpanahetuḥ pramāṇam' ity upariṣṭāt [pṛ-91] kim iti darśayiṣyate iti cet /
GSP28durdhpru:3990: yathā hi nīlasarūpaṃ pratyakṣam anubhūyamānaṃ nīlabodharūpam avasthāpyate,
GSP28durdhpru:3993: tadvad anumānaṃ nīlākāram utpadyamānaṃ nīlabodharūpam avasthāpyate,
GSP28durdhpru:4002: trairūpyaṃ punar liṅgasya anumeye sattvam eva sapakṣa eva sattvam,
GSP28durdhpru:4003: asapakṣe ca asattvam eva niścitam II-5
GSP28durdhpru:4005: liṅgasya yat trairūpyaṃ yāni trīṇi rūpāṇi tat idam ucyate iti śeṣaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:4006: kiṃ punas tat trairūpyam ity āha -- anumeyaṃ vakṣyamāṇalakṣaṇam /
GSP28durdhpru:4007: tasmin liṅgasya sattvam eva niścitam -- ekaṃ rūpam /
GSP28durdhpru:4008: yady api ca atra niścitagrahaṇam na kṛtaṃ tathā api ante kṛtaṃ prakrāntayor dvayor api rūpayor apekṣaṇīyam /
GSP28durdhpru:4009: yato na yogyatayā liṅgaṃ parokṣajñānasya nimittam / yathā
GSP28durdhpru:4012: etac copalakṣaṇaṃ tena phalasya sādhanaṃ ca yat tasyāpi yā vyavasthā sā 'pi gṛhyate /
GSP28durdhpru:4015: ata eva niścayaḥ -- “na parmāṇaphalayor viṣayabhdedaḥ” iti /
GSP28durdhpru:4024: na tu viṣayavipratipattir ity āha -- evam iti /
GSP28durdhpru:4025: evam anantaroktena prakāreṇa ihānumānaparicchede nirākṛtā iti śeṣaḥ,
GSP28durdhpru:4026: vakṣyamāṇaṃ vā nīrākṛteti padaṃ vacanavipariṇāmena sambandhanīyam /
GSP28durdhpru:4029: prasaṅgena prastāv ena yāni trīṇi rūpāṇi tāny eva tathety āvedayati /
GSP28durdhpru:4030: tat idaṃ trairūpyam iti prakṛtatvāt śeṣo 'dhyāhāraḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:4034: kasmāt punas tad apekṣanīyam ity āha --yata iti /
GSP28durdhpru:4037: kasmān na tathety āha -- adṛṣṭād iti /
GSP28durdhpru:4040: liṅgaṃ na parokṣajñānanimittaṃ tarhi pakṣadharmatayā jñātam evāstu parokṣaprakāśanaṃ
GSP28durdhpru:4047: tasmāt parokṣārthanāntarīyakatayā niścayanam eva liṅgasya parokṣārthapratipādanavyāpāraḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:4049: ato 'nvayavyatirekapakṣadharmatvaniścayo liṅgavyāpārātmakatvād avaśyakartavya iti sarveṣu rūpeṣu niścitagrahaṇam apekṣaṇīyam /
GSP28durdhpru:4053: pakṣīkṛteṣu taruṣu patrasaṅkocalakṣaṇaḥ svāpa ekadeśe na siddhaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:4054: na hi sarve vṛkṣā rātrau patrasaṅkocabhājaḥ kin tu kecid eva /
GSP28durdhpru:4067: parokṣasya vahnyāder nāntarīyako 'vinābhāvītasya bhāvas tattā tayā niścayanam -- sarvatrāyam etad avinābhāvīti vikalpanam /
GSP28durdhpru:4070: evakāreṇa vyavacchinnam evānyasya tad vyāpārārarūpatvaṃ spaṣṭārthaṃ nāpara ity anenānūditam /
GSP28durdhpru:4071: yat punar atrāpy ayam etan nāntarīyaka iti jñāṇaṃ tad anumānajñānam iti jñeyam /
GSP28durdhpru:4073: ataḥ sattvenāniścitāl liṅgād aniścitasambandhāc cāpratipatteḥ kāraṇād anvayādiniściyo 'vaśyakarttavyaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:4074: tathāpi kathaṃ karttaya ity āśaṅkya vyatirekamukheṇoktam eva hetum anvyayamukhenāpi darśayann āha -- liṅgeti /
GSP28durdhpru:4075: liṅgavyāpārasya parokṣapratipādane gamakavyāpārasyātmā sa eva tatheti svārthikaḥ kan karttavyaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:4076: tasya bhāvas tasmād iti hetupadaṃ kṛṭvā 'yam upasaṃhāraḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:4078: sampraty ekaikasya rūpasya yad vyāvarttyaṃ tat krameṇa darśayitum āha -- tatreti /
GSP28durdhpru:4081: yathā tu prabhedo yathā vāntarbhāvas tathopariṣṭād vakṣyāmaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:4083: athāpi syāt svāpavat dhūmo 'py ayam ekadeśāsiddha eva /
GSP28durdhpru:4084: tathā hi parvatādir iha pakṣas tatra ca kvacid eva deśe siddho na sarvatra /
GSP28durdhpru:4086: athaivaṃvidho 'pi pakṣavyāpaka ucyate tarhi svāpena kim aparāddhaṃ yenāsāv evaiko na yukta iti /
GSP28durdhpru:4088: paścāt kṛtena evakāreṇa asādhāraṇo dharmo nirastaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:4089: yadi hi anumeya eva sattvam iti kuryāt śrāvaṇatvam eva hetuḥ syāt /
GSP28durdhpru:4092: tasminn eva sattvam niścitam iti dvitīyaṃ rūpam / iha api
GSP28durdhpru:4095: yaś cāsau parvatādis tatra na vahnir jijñāsitaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:4097: tatraikadeśasthadhūmadarśane 'py ekadeśavahnir jijñāsito jñāyata iti kiṃ sarvaparvatavyāpinā dhūmena kāryam?
GSP28durdhpru:4098: yadi punaḥ sarvatraiva vahnimattvaṃ jijñāsitaṃ syāt,
GSP28durdhpru:4102: atra punaḥ sarveṣām eva tarūṇāṃ caitanyaṃ jijñāsitam iti sakalapādapavyāpinaiva svāpena prayojanam /
GSP28durdhpru:4103: yathā vedasya sarvasyaiva pauruṣeyatve sādhye sakalāmnāyavyāpakenaiva vākyatvena paryojanam /
GSP28durdhpru:4106: eke tu -- lokādhyavasāyasiddhaṃ mahīdharāder ekatvam avalambyāyaṃ vyavahāraḥ,
GSP28durdhpru:4107: na ca sarveṣāṃ tarūṇāṃ tathaikatvaṃ loko 'dhyavasyati,
GSP28durdhpru:4110: athābhidhīyate -- yadi kaścit tintiṅkāprabhṛtīn eva pādapān pakṣayitvā svāpaṃ hetūkaroti,
GSP28durdhpru:4111: tadā 'yaṃ na pakṣaikadeśāsiddha iti kiṃ na sādhayec caitanyam iti /
GSP28durdhpru:4113: yadi sarvajanaprasiddha indriyavyāpāravirodhyavasthāviśeṣaḥ svāpo nidrāparanāmā hetur abhipretas tadā 'yaṃ teṣv api taruṣv asddha iti kathaṃ caitanyam anumāpayet?
GSP28durdhpru:4114: atha yena kenacid upādhinā svāpaśabdamātravācyo 'rtho hetuḥ;
GSP28durdhpru:4116: “ṣaṣṭhy atasarthapratyeyana” [pāṇini 2.3.30] ity anena paścācchabdayoge sattvavacanāt ṣaṣṭhī /
GSP28durdhpru:4120: pūrvāvadhāraṇe tu nāyaṃ nirākṛtaḥ syād iti darśayati yadīti /
GSP28durdhpru:4122: ayam asyāśayaḥ -- yady anumeya eva sattvaṃ yasyeti lakṣaṇaṃ syāt tadā sapakṣa eva sattvam iti vacanam atiricyamānaṃ lakṣaṇāntaraṃ bhaviṣyati
GSP28durdhpru:4125: sandigdhaś cāsāv asya hetutvena viśeṣaṇatvena cāsiddho 'niścitaśabdeti vigrahaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:4129: yathā 'nayor bhedo yathā cāntarbhāvas tathā parastāt pradarśayiṣyāmaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:4130: ihāśritatvādārthena nyāyena hetusattvasya viśeṣaṇarūpatvād anena sahoditi(ta)
GSP28durdhpru:4136: sa hi na sapakṣa eva vartate kin tu ubhayatra api /
GSP28durdhpru:4137: sattvagrahaṇāt pūrvāvadhāraṇavacanena sapakṣāvyāpisattākasya api prayatnānantarīyakasya hetutvaṃ kathitam /
GSP28durdhpru:4138: paścādavadhāraṇe tv ayam arthaḥ syāt -- sapakṣe sattvam eva yasya sa hetur iti prayatnānantarīyakatvaṃ na hetuḥ syāt /
GSP28durdhpru:4143: tasminn asattvam eva niścitam -- tṛtīyaṃ rūpam /
GSP28durdhpru:4147: prayatnānantarīyakatve sādhye hy anityatvaṃ vipakṣaikadeśe vidyudādau asti,
GSP28durdhpru:4150: asattvaśabdād dhi pūrvasminn avadhāraṇe 'yam arthaḥ syāt -- vipakṣa eva yo na asti sa hetuḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:4152: sādhāraṇaś cāsau sapkṣāsapakṣavṛttitvād anaikāntikaś caikasmin sādhye viparyaye vā 'vyavasthitaś ceti tathā nirasta iti varttate /
GSP28durdhpru:4154: prayatnānantarīyakatvam apy anityatvasiddhau samartho hetur iti darśayituṃ sakalasapakṣāvyāpi prayatnānantarīyakatvam udāhṛtam iti draṣṭavyam
GSP28durdhpru:4155: vastutas tu sarva eva kāryahetur dhūmādiḥ sapakṣaikadeśavṛttir boddhavyaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:4157: evaṃ sati prayatnānantarīyakatvam upalakṣaṇatvād asya dhūmādikam api na hetuḥ syāt /
GSP28durdhpru:4159: ihāśrayatvādārthena nyāyena sapakṣalakṣaṇasya dharmiṇo viśeṣyatvād anena sahodito
GSP28durdhpru:4160: nipātaḥ pakṣe vṛkṣe vṛttau labdhāyāṃ samuccīyamānāvadhāraṇatvād asapakṣalakṣaṇadharmyanatarayogasya
GSP28durdhpru:4162: tṛtīyaṃ rūpaṃ vyākhyātum āha -- asapakṣa iti /
GSP28durdhpru:4164: katham asya nirāsa ity āha -- viruddho hīti /
GSP28durdhpru:4167: kasmin sādhye kin tad īdṛśam ity āha -- prayatneti /
GSP28durdhpru:4171: na asti / tato na hetuḥ syāt /
GSP28durdhpru:4174: nanu ca sapakṣa eva sattvam ity ukte vipakṣe 'sattvam eva iti gamyata eva /
GSP28durdhpru:4175: tat kimarthaṃ punar ubhayor upādānaṃ kṛtam? ucyate /
GSP28durdhpru:4176: anvayo vyatireko vā [prayujyamānaḥ] niyamavān eva prayoktavyo na anyathā iti darśayituṃ dvayor apy upādānaṃ kṛtam /
GSP28durdhpru:4177: aniyate hi dvayor api prayoge 'yam arthaḥ syāt -- sapakṣe yo 'sti vipakṣe ca yo na asti sa hetur iti /
GSP28durdhpru:4178: tathā ca sati sa śyāmaḥ tatputratvāt dṛśyamānaputravad
GSP28durdhpru:4180: asapakṣa eveti kiṃ nāvadhāryata ity āha tathā ceti /
GSP28durdhpru:4187: tathā hi -- ya eva vipakṣe vīkṣito hetuḥ sa eva prameyatvādivad abhimataṃ na sādhayet /
GSP28durdhpru:4188: yaḥ punar mahatā 'pi prayatnena mṛgyamāṇo 'sapakṣe nopalakṣitaḥ sa katham aṅga sādhyaṃ na sādhayed iti?
GSP28durdhpru:4190: yato yo 'pi vipakṣe vīkṣito hetuḥ so 'pi iṣṭo duṣṭaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:4191: kathaṃ? sādhyaṃ vinā 'py upalabdher iti cet /
GSP28durdhpru:4192: nanu yadi nāmāsau sādhyam antareṇānyatra dṛṣṭas tathāpi vivādādhyāsite dharmiṇi sādhyaṃ kiṃ na sādhayati?
GSP28durdhpru:4193: na hi ayam atrāpi sādhyaṃ vinaiva varrtata iti prasādhakaṃ pramāṇam asti /
GSP28durdhpru:4194: na caikatra yena vinā yo dṛṣṭaḥ sarvatrāsau tena vinaiva varttate iti siddham /
GSP28durdhpru:4196: atha sādhyam antareṇa yo vṛttaḥ sādhye saty evāsau varttata iti niyamābhāvād vivādādhyāsite sandehahetur na samyag hetur bhavitum arhati /
GSP28durdhpru:4197: hanta tarhi vipakṣe tasya sādhyadharmiṇi sādhyavinākṛtāṃ vṛttiṃ sambhāvayad hetum aniściyahetūkarotīti āyātam /
GSP28durdhpru:4198: sati caivaṃ sādhyaviparyaye hetusattābādhakapramāṇādarśanam api -- yady ayaṃ ca dharmo bhaviṣyati,
GSP28durdhpru:4199: na ca tataḥ sādhyam ity evaṃ vidhāṃ vṛttim asya -- sambhāvayati tadā kim ayaṃ niścayahetur bhavitum arhati?
GSP28durdhpru:4200: tato vi[40a]pakṣe darśanaṃ vā tathā śaṅkābījam astu viparyaye vā bādhakapramāṇādarśanaṃ veti ko viśeṣaḥ?
GSP28durdhpru:4201: tathā cāha vārttikakāraḥ -- “na tu sapakṣavipakṣayoḥ sattvam asattvaṃ vā niśiyāpekṣam /
GSP28durdhpru:4203: so 'niścaye 'pi tulya iti tathāvidhodbhāvanam apy atra dūṣaṇam eva /
GSP28durdhpru:4204: tathā vipakṣapracārāśaṅkāvyavacchedena labhyaṃ gamakatvaṃ katham ātmasātkuryād” iti /
GSP28durdhpru:4206: vipakṣe 'sattvam eveti gamyata iti brubato 'yaṃ bhāvaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:4207: pakṣe vṛttau labdhāyāṃ sapakṣa eva sattvaṃ niścitam iti khalu samuccīyamānāvadhāraṇo 'yaṃ nirṇayaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:4208: ayaṃ cāsapakṣe 'sattve 'niścite sandigdhe vā na ghaṭata iti avaśyam asapakṣe 'sattvam eva
GSP28durdhpru:4211: tasmān niyamavator eva anvayavyatirekayoḥ prayogaḥ kartavyo yena pratibandho gamyeta sādhanasya sādhyena /
GSP28durdhpru:4212: niyamavatoś ca prayoge 'vaśyakartavye dvayor eka eva prayoktavyo na dvāv iti niyamavān eva anvayo vyatireko vā prayoktavya iti śikṣaṇārthaṃ dvayor upādānam iti /
GSP28durdhpru:4213: trairūpyakathanaprasaṅgena anumeyaḥ sapakṣo vipakṣaś ca uktaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:4218: evam upalakṣaṇatvād asyāsapakṣe cāsattvam eva niścitam ity anena sapakṣe vṛttimātraṃ labdham eva /
GSP28durdhpru:4219: tenaiva ca prayojanam iti kiṃ sapakṣa eva sattvam ity aneneti drṣṭavyam /
GSP28durdhpru:4221: sādhyenānvīyamānatvaṃ tayeva sādhye bhavitṛtvaṃ sādhanasya svagato dharmo 'nvayaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:4222: sādhyābhāve vyatiricyamānatvam abhavitṛtvaṃ hetoḥ savagato dharmo vyatirekaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:4223: sa cāsaś ca[44]prayujyamānaḥ śabdena pratipādyamāṇo niyamavān avyabhicāravān prayoktavyo 'nyathā parokṣapratīty aṅga noktaṃ syāt /
GSP28durdhpru:4225: yadā 'nvayavākye sādhye niyataṃ sādhanaṃ vyatirekavākye ca sādhanābhāve niyataḥ sādhyābhāvaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:4231: aniyamenāpi prayoge yady anvayavyatirekayos tādṛśoḥ pratītir asti tadā kiṃ niyamavat prayogeṇety āha -- aniyate hīti /
GSP28durdhpru:4233: āstāṃ tāvad ekasya prayoge dvayor apy ayam arthaḥ syād ity apiśabdaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:4236: kā kṣatir ity āha -- tathā ceti /
GSP28durdhpru:4237: kākatālīyanyāyena cāśyāmeṣu nikaṭavarttiṣu atatputreṣu etad draṣṭavyam /
GSP28durdhpru:4238: anyathā hy aniyato 'pi vyatireko 'tra nokta iti vacanāvakāśaḥ syāt /
GSP28durdhpru:4239: yata evaṃ tasmād yena niyamavatprayogeṇa partibandhaḥ pratibaddhatvam āyattatvam /
GSP28durdhpru:4242: yady evam ekasminn eva sādhanavākye niyamavān evānvayo vyatirekaś ca prayujyatām ity āha -- niyamavatoś ceti /
GSP28durdhpru:4244: ayam āśayaḥ -- anvayavākyenāpi tathāprayuktena sāmarthyād vyatirekasya,
GSP28durdhpru:4245: vyatirekavākyenāpi sāmarthyād anvayasya prakāśanāt kiṃ pratītapratyāyakena dvitīyavākyena kāryam iti?
GSP28durdhpru:4250: anena prayo[40b]gasamāsa eva darśito na rūpasamāsa iti darśitam /
GSP28durdhpru:4251: prayogadarśanābhyāsāt kaścit prayogabhaṅgyaiva svayam api parokṣam arthaṃ pratipadyata iti svārthe 'py anumāne nirṇītam idaṃ lakṣaṇakathanaprasaṅgena
GSP28durdhpru:4258: vyāptiniścayakāle tu dharmo anumeya iti darśayitum atragrahanam /
GSP28durdhpru:4259: jijñāsito jñātum iṣṭo viśeṣo dharmo yasya dharmiṇaḥ sa tathā uktaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:4263: samānaḥ sadṛśo yo 'rthaḥ pakṣeṇa sa pakṣa ukta upacārāt samānaśabdena viśiṣyate /
GSP28durdhpru:4266: nanu yadi dharmadharmisamudāyo mukhyo 'numeyo 'tra gṛhyate tadā na kasyacit sādhanasya taddharmatvaṃ grahītuṃ śakyeta /
GSP28durdhpru:4267: grahaṇe vā vyaktam eva vaiyarthyam ity abhiprāyavān pṛcchati -- tatra ka iti teṣu madhye /
GSP28durdhpru:4270: tasmiṃś tasmin kāle 'numeyaikadeśatvād upacārato draṣṭavyam / tad uktam --
GSP28durdhpru:4273: atha yad saha pakṣeṇa varttate iti sapakṣo 'bhipretas tadā 'rthāsaṅgatiḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:4274: athāpi samānaḥ pakṣeṇeti mataṃ tadā pakṣasamāna iti prāpnotīty abhipretya pṛcchati ka iti /
GSP28durdhpru:4281: nanu samānaś cāsau pakṣaś ceti kiṃ nābhipretam?
GSP28durdhpru:4282: tatra pakṣa evāsau dṛṣṭāntadharmī kathaṃ yena samānaśabdena viśiṣyata ity āha -- pakṣa iti /
GSP28durdhpru:4283: katham anyārthena tena śabdena sa tathocyatām ity āha -- upacārād iti /
GSP28durdhpru:4285: tatra so 'rthaḥ pakṣa uktaḥ iti yojyam /
GSP28durdhpru:4287: sa upacārād yaḥ pakṣa uktaḥ viśi(śe)
GSP28durdhpru:4289: yadi samānaśabdo viśeṣaṇam asya tarhi saśabdaśrutiḥ katham ity āha -- samānasyeti /
GSP28durdhpru:4290: samānasya samānaśabdasya sthāne saśabdādeśaś ca “samānasya” [pāṇini 6.3.84] iti yogavibhāgāt /
GSP28durdhpru:4291: samānaḥ pakṣo yasya sa tatheti bahuvrīhiḥ kim iti dharmottareṇa nāśrito yenaivam ātmā prayāsita iti cet /
GSP28durdhpru:4295: syāt etat -- kiṃ tat pakṣasapakṣayoḥ sāmānyaṃ yena samānaḥ sapakṣaḥ pakṣena ity āha -- sādhyadharmasāmānyena iti /
GSP28durdhpru:4301: sādhyadharmaś ca asau sāmānyaṃ ca iti sādhyadharmasāmānyena samānaḥ pakṣeṇa sapakṣa iti arthaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:4307: ācaritam / viniścaye hi navapakṣadharmapravedananirdeśaprakaraṇe[44*]sādhyadharmasāmānyena samānaḥ pakṣaḥ sapakṣas tad abhāvo 'sapakṣaC ity uktam /
GSP28durdhpru:4308: ato vārttikakārasyeva dṛṣṭāntadharmī pakṣo 'bhipreta upacārād ity atrāpy evam ayaṃ vyācaṣṭa ity adoṣaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:4311: yena sāmānyena pakṣeṇa samānaḥ sapakṣa ity āheti yojyam /
GSP28durdhpru:4314: nanu sādhyadharmaś cāsau sāmānyaṃ ceti karmadhārayagarbhaḥ karmadhāraya ity ābhipretaḥ,
GSP28durdhpru:4315: viśeṣaś ca sādhyata iti kathaṃ sāmānyaśabdena sādhyadharmaśabdasya samāsa ity āśaṅkyāha -- na cetyādi /
GSP28durdhpru:4319: yata evam ato 'symād dhetor hi sapakṣalakṣaṇakāle /
GSP28durdhpru:4320: sāmānyasya sādhyatām uktvā sādhyadharmaśabedena saha sāmānyaśabdasya vigrahaṃ darśayati -- sādhyeti /
GSP28durdhpru:4323: samāna evety avadhāraṇiyam na tu sāmānyenaiveti,
GSP28durdhpru:4324: anyenāpi vastutvādinā sādṛśyāt dṛṣṭāntadharmiṇaḥ sapakṣatvābhāvaprasaṅgād iti /
GSP28durdhpru:4325: yadi sapakṣād anyo 'sapakṣo evānyadharmayogād anya iti tatrāsapakṣe varttamāno hetuḥ sarva evānaikāntikatvād ahetuḥ prasajyeta /
GSP28durdhpru:4326: atha viruddhe naño vidhānāt sapakṣaviruddho 'sapakṣaḥ sahānavasthānalakṣaṇena virodhena viruddhas tadā 'gnilakṣaṇo hetur auṣṇyaṃ na gamayet
GSP28durdhpru:4328: tadā 'bhāve kasyacit sattvāsambhavāt sādhāraṇānaikāntiko na kaścit syād iti manasi niveśya pṛcchati -- ko 'sapakṣa iti /
GSP28durdhpru:4331: sapakṣo yo na bhavatīti sādhyadharmavān yo na bhavatīty arthaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:4333: yady evam, samāsaḥ kathaṃ iti cet /
GSP28durdhpru:4338: prayogasaṃkhyāniyamas tu bhāṣyakārīyo yathā 'nupapannas tathā cācāryeṇaiva viniścaye
GSP28durdhpru:4339: “duḥkhaṃ batāyaṃ tapasvī” ityādy upahāsapūrvakaṃ -- “yathā niketena pratipatteḥ”
GSP28durdhpru:4342: tato 'nyas tadviruddhas tadabhāvaś ca iti II-9
GSP28durdhpru:4345: tasya ca sapaksaya abhāvaḥ. sapakṣād anyatvaṃ tadviruddhatvaṃ ca na tāvat pratyetuṃ śakyam,
GSP28durdhpru:4346: yāvat sapakṣasvabhāvābhāvo na vijñātaḥ. tasmād anyatvaviruddhatvapratītisāmarthyāt[45] sapakṣābhāvarūpau pratītāv anyaviruddhau.
GSP28durdhpru:4349: evaṃ saty anyaviruddhayor asapakṣatvaṃ na syād ity asapakṣaśabdena tadabhāvatadanyatadviruddhanāṃ trayāṇām api saṅgrahaṃ darśayituṃ kaś cetyādinā praśnapūrvam upakra[ma]te /
GSP28durdhpru:4353: na hi sa eva brāhmaṇas tajjātiyogād,
GSP28durdhpru:4354: abrāhmaṇaś ca dharmāntarasamāveśāl loke pratīyata iti /
GSP28durdhpru:4362: kin tarhi? sarvaḥ pratiyogī niṣedhaḥ paryudataś ca,
GSP28durdhpru:4370: anyaviruddhayoś ca svarūpakathanena tadasapakṣatvapakṣokto doṣo nirasta iti sarvam avadātam /
GSP28durdhpru:4371: nanu ca sapakṣo yo na bhavatīti vacanena yasya sapakṣābhāvasvabhāvatvaṃ tasyaivāsapakṣatvaṃ [41b] pratipādyate /
GSP28durdhpru:4374: tat kathaṃ tayos tathātvam ity āśaṅkyāha -- sapakṣād iti /
GSP28durdhpru:4375: anyatvaṃ tato bhidyamānatvaṃ pṛthaktvam iti yāvat /
GSP28durdhpru:4376: tena ca viruddhatvaṃ tāvan na śakyaṃ jñātum,
GSP28durdhpru:4379: ayam āśayaḥ -- yadi tasyānyatvābhimatasya yato 'nyatvaṃ vyavaharttavyaṃ tadrūpatā cettasyāsiddhā sandigdhā vā bhavet tadā 'nyatvam eva na syāt,
GSP28durdhpru:4381: dhūmasyeva vā bāṣpādibhāvena sandihyamānasya na bāṣpāder anyatvaniścayaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:4382: yena ca viruddhaṃ yat tad rūpaṃ cet siddhaṃ sandgidhaṃ vā tādrūpyeṇa,
GSP28durdhpru:4388: yata evaṃ tato hetoḥ sākṣād avyavadhānena /
GSP28durdhpru:4389: anena yady eka evāsapakṣo vaktavyaḥ tadā tadabhāva eveti sūcitaṃ /
GSP28durdhpru:4395: trirūpāṇi ca trīṇy eva liṅgāni II-10
GSP28durdhpru:4396: uktena trairūpyeṇa trirūpāṇi ca trīṇy eva liṅgāni iti /
GSP28durdhpru:4398: trairūpyam ādau pṛṣṭaṃ trirūpāṇi ca liṅgāni pareṇa /
GSP28durdhpru:4404: anupalabdhiḥ svabhāvaḥ kāryaṃ ca iti II-11
GSP28durdhpru:4406: vidheyasya sādhyasya svabhāvaś ca trirūpaḥ, kārya ca /
GSP28durdhpru:4408: yato 'nyo niruddhaś coktayā nītyā sapakṣābhavarūpau tatas tasmāt /
GSP28durdhpru:4409: āstām ekasya dvayor vā trayāṇām apīty apiśabdaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:4411: trīṇi rūpāṇi lakṣaṇāni yeṣām iti vigrahaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:4413: triyrūpāṇīty anenābādhitaviṣayatvādirūpānatarayogena caturlakṣaṇatvaṃ ṣaḍlakṣaṇatvaṃ vā parābhimataṃ hetoḥ pratiṣedhati,
GSP28durdhpru:4415: pṛṣṭa iti pāṭhe tv ācārya iti śesaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:4416: yat trairūpyaṃ pṛṣṭo yad vā yat trairūpyaṃ pṛṣṭaṃ tat trairūpyam uktam uktena granthena /
GSP28durdhpru:4417: atha vā yad yasmāt trairūpyaṃ pṛṣṭa ācāryaḥ,
GSP28durdhpru:4418: pṛṣṭaṃ vā tat tasmāt trairūpyam uktam iti /
GSP28durdhpru:4419: cas trairūpyeṇa samaṃ trirūpāṇām uktakaramtāṃ samuccinoti /
GSP28durdhpru:4420: nanu na tāvat parasyaitad dvitayapraśnavākyaṃ śrutam /
GSP28durdhpru:4421: tat kathaṃ parasya dvedhā praṇaḥ saṃkīrttyata iti cet /
GSP28durdhpru:4423: trirūpāl liṅgād iti śrutavatā pūrvapakṣavādinā 'vaśyaṃ kiṃ tat trairūpyaṃ kiyac ca trirūpaṃ liṅgam ityākāṅkṣitavyam,
GSP28durdhpru:4425: etad eva katham avasīyata iti cet /
GSP28durdhpru:4426: trairūpyaṃ liṅgasyaivam ātmakam ity abhidhānād ācāryasya pūrvapakṣavādina evaṃrūpa praśno 'vasīyate /
GSP28durdhpru:4427: trirūpāṇi ca trīṇyevety abhidhānāc ca samkhyāpraśnaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:4433: kevalaṃ vidheyasyeti pūrvaṃ sāmarthyād anarthāntarasya vidheyasya,
GSP28durdhpru:4439: tatra anupalabdhir yathā na pradeśaviśeṣe kvacid ghaṭaḥ,
GSP28durdhpru:4443: yathā iyam anupalabdhis tathā anyā api /
GSP28durdhpru:4444: na tv iyam eva ity arthaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:4449: pratipattṛpratyakṣe kvacid eva pradeśa iti dharmī /
GSP28durdhpru:4457: atha yo yatra na asti sa kathaṃ tatra dṛśyaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:4459: yaś ca evaṃ sambhāvyate -- yady asāv atra bhaved dṛśya bhaved iti /
GSP28durdhpru:4465: ekaindriyajñānagrāhyaṃ locanādipraṇidhānābhimukhaṃ vastudvayam anyonyāpekeṣam ekajñānasaṃsargi kathyate / tayor hi
GSP28durdhpru:4469: tayā lakṣyata iti bruvatā lakṣyate 'neneti lakṣaṇam iti vyaktīkṛtam /
GSP28durdhpru:4472: kiṃ tenaikena sā janyate yenaivam ucyata ity āha sāmagryantarbhāvād iti /
GSP28durdhpru:4477: yady avidyamānaḥ samāropād dṛśya ucyate tadā bhinnendriyagrāhyam api tatrānekam asti /
GSP28durdhpru:4478: tasyāpi tarhi tathātvam āyātam ity āśaṅkyāha yaś caivam iti /
GSP28durdhpru:4480: sa tādṛśo dṛśyatayā samāropyo na sarva ity arthāt /
GSP28durdhpru:4488: tac cen nāsti kathaṃ taddarśanakāraṇasāmagryāvagatir ity āśayaḥ pṛcchati kadeti /
GSP28durdhpru:4490: ekasmiñ jñāne saṃsargaḥ pratibhāsaḥ sa yasyāsti /
GSP28durdhpru:4491: tac ca tadvastvantaraṃ ceti tathā tasyopalambho yadety uktam /
GSP28durdhpru:4495: tasmād ekajñānasaṃsargiṇi dṛśyamāne saty ekasminn itarat samagradarśanasāmagrīkaṃ yadi bhaved dṛṣyam eva bhaved iti sambhāvitaṃ dṛśyatvam āropyate
GSP28durdhpru:4497: tasmāt sa eva ghaṭaviviktapradeśas tadālambhanaṃ ca jñānam dṛśyānupalambhaniścayahetutvāt drśyānupalambha ucyate /
GSP28durdhpru:4498: yāvad dhi ekajñānasaṃsargi vastu na niścitam tajjñānaṃ ca na tāvad dṛśyānupalambhaniścayaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:4499: tato vastu anupalambha ucyate tajjñānaṃ ca /
GSP28durdhpru:4501: tato dṛśyaghaṭarahitaḥ pradeśaḥ tajjñānaṃ ca vacanasāmarthyād eva dṛśyānupalambharūpam uktaṃ draṣṭavyam /
GSP28durdhpru:4502: tatra yadi nirākāraṃ vijñānam iti sthitis tadaikaśabdo dvayādisaṃkhyānirāsārthaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:4503: yadā tu sākāram iti sthitis tadā pakṣadvayam -- ekam eva vānekākāram aśakyavivecanaṃ citraṃ jñānam,
GSP28durdhpru:4506: śeṣapakṣe tv ekacakṣurāyatanaprabhavatvād ekarūpālambanatvāc caikaśabdo gauṇaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:4507: nanu yadi tat pratiṣidhyamānam anena bhūtalādinā sahaikasmin jñāne pratibhāseta tadapekṣam idam ekajñānasaṃsargi kathyate /
GSP28durdhpru:4508: yāvatedam eva nāstīty āśaṅkya tathātvam eva tayor ekendriyetyādinā darśayati /
GSP28durdhpru:4509: locanādīnāṃ praṇidhānaṃ svajñānopajanane yogyībhavanaṃ tatrābhimukham anuguṇam /
GSP28durdhpru:4512: yadi nāma dvayaṃ tatrāvasthitaṃ tathāpy ekam eva tatrāvabhāsiṣyata ity āha -- tayor iti /
GSP28durdhpru:4515: yata eva tayor ghaṭādibhūtalādyor ekajñānasaṃsargaḥ sambhavī tasmāt /
GSP28durdhpru:4516: ekasmin bhūtalādike dṛśyamāne satītarad ghaṭādikaṃ paripūrṇadarśanasāmagrīkaṃ jñātavyam /
GSP28durdhpru:4517: tathāsad avidyamānam api samāropād dṛśyam ucyata iti darśayati /
GSP28durdhpru:4520: yasmāt tasyaikajñānasaṃsargiṇo bhūtalāder darśanāt tadanupalambho niścīyate tasmāt /
GSP28durdhpru:4521: nanu bhūtalādijñānaniścaya eva tadanupalambhaniścayahetutvād anupalambho 'stu bhūtalādikaṃ tu katham ity āha -- yāvad iti /
GSP28durdhpru:4524: bhūtalādyavacchinnañ ca jñānaṃ dṛśyasyānupalambham upalambhābhāvaṃ vyavaharttavyaikasvabhāvaṃ niścāyayatīti darśitam /
GSP28durdhpru:4531: upalabdhilakṣaṇaprāptiḥ upalabdhilakṣaṇaprāptavaṃ ghātasya upalambhapratyayāntarasākalyam iti. jñānasya ghaṭo 'pi janakaḥ,
GSP28durdhpru:4532: anye ca cakṣurādayaḥ. ghaṭād dṛśyād anye hetavaḥ pratyayāntarāṇi. teṣāṃ sākalyam
GSP28durdhpru:4533: sannidhiḥ. svabhāva eva viśiṣyate tadanyasmād iti viśeṣa viśiṣta ity arthaḥ. tad
GSP28durdhpru:4534: ayam viśiṣṭaḥ svabhāvaḥ pratyayāntarasākalyaṃ ca etat dvayam upalabdhilakṣanaprāptatvaṃ
GSP28durdhpru:4536: yady ekasmin jñāne yayoḥ saṃsargo 'sti tayor ekataropalambhas taditarānupalambhaniścayahetutvād
GSP28durdhpru:4537: anupalambhas tasmāc ca tasyābhāvavyahāras tadā nīlajñānānubhave pītajñānābhāvavyavahāro
GSP28durdhpru:4539: na hi bhavanmate jñānaṃ jñānāntareṇa vedyate,
GSP28durdhpru:4544: yadi hi tajjñānaṃ vidyamānaṃ syāt tadā nīlajñānavat saṃviditam eva bhavet /
GSP28durdhpru:4546: tasmān nāstīti vyavahriyata iti kim avadyam /
GSP28durdhpru:4547: syād etat / kiṃ punar jñātṛjñeyadharmopalabdhivyudāsena paryudāsavṛttinā nañā jñātṛjñeyadharmalakṣaṇā dvividhopalabdhiḥ pratipādyate ?
GSP28durdhpru:4548: na tūpalambhābhāvamātraṃ prasajyapratiṣedhāśrayeṇocyate yatheśvaraseno manyata ity āśaṅkyāha -- darśanatyādi /
GSP28durdhpru:4549: darśanam upalabdhis tasya nivṛttir abhāvas tuccharūpaḥ saiva tanmātraṃ vastvantarasaṃsargavirahaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:4550: tuḥ pūrvasmād anupalambhād vaidharmyam asya dyotayati /
GSP28durdhpru:4551: svayam aniścitatvād iti bruvatānupalambhāt tatpratipattāv anavasthādoṣaprasaṅgena tasya sādhakābhāvaḥ sūcitaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:4553: evañ ca vyācakṣāṇena idaṃ sūcitam -- tathāvidhānupalabdhiḥ pramāṇanivṛttāv apy arthābhāvābhāvād abhāvavyavahāre sādhye 'naikāntikīti /
GSP28durdhpru:4557: yathā yasyāptir yathārthadarśanādirūpāsti sa āpta ity ucyate /
GSP28durdhpru:4563: rūpaṃ codbhūtaṃ samākhyātaṃ tadā tvanmate 'mīṣām abhāvād upalabdhilakṣaṇaprāptir asambhavinīti manyamānaḥ pṛcchati kā punar iti /
GSP28durdhpru:4566: kiṃ tarhīyam ityabhiprāyeṇa yad upalabdhilakṣaṇetyādiprativacanaṃ tad upalabdhītyādinā vyākhyātum upakramate /
GSP28durdhpru:4568: ayaṃ cāsyāśayaḥ yasyopalabdhilakṣaṇaprāptis tasyāvaśyam upalabdhilakṣaṇaprāptatvam astīti /
GSP28durdhpru:4573: kiñ ca yadi pratiṣedhyo 'pi jñānasya hetuḥ syāt tadā tasmāt pratyayād anye pratyayāḥ pratyayāntarāṇy ucyanta ity āśaṅkyāha jñānasyeti /
GSP28durdhpru:4576: yaḥ svabhāvaḥ satsv anyeṣu upalambhapratyayeṣu san pratyakṣa eva bhavati sa svabhāvaviśeṣaḥ II-14
GSP28durdhpru:4578: upalambhasya yāni ghaṭād dṛśyād pratyayāntarāni teṣu satsu vidyamāneṣu yaḥ svabhāvaḥ san pratyakṣa eva bhavati sa svabhāvaviśeṣaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:4579: tad ayam atra arthaḥ -- ekapratipattrapekṣam idam pratyakṣalakṣaṇam /
GSP28durdhpru:4580: tathā ca sati draṣṭuṃ pravṛttasya ekasya draṣṭur dṛśyamāna ubhayavān bhāvaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:4581: adṛśyamānās tu deśakālasvabhāvaviprakṛṣṭāḥ svabhāvaviśeṣarahitāḥ pratyayāntarasākalyavantas tu /
GSP28durdhpru:4582: yair hi pratyayair sa draṣṭā paśyati te sannihitāḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:4583: ataś ca sannihitā yad draṣṭuṃ pravṛttaḥ saḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:4584: na kevalaṃ pratyayāntarasākalyam upalabdhilakṣaṇaprāptiḥ kin tv anyad apīty āha -- svabhāveti /
GSP28durdhpru:4587: jñānajananayogyatayā viśeṣaṇatve py asya rājadantādipāṭhād viśeṣaśabdasya pūrvanipātābhāvaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:4589: dvayam etan militam evopalabdhilakṣaṇaprāptiśabdavācyam upasaṃhāravyājena tad ityādinā darśayati /
GSP28durdhpru:4590: yataḥ pratyayāntarasākalyaṃ svabhāvaviśeṣaś copalabdhilakṣaṇaprāptir vivakṣitā tat tasmād upalabdhilakṣaṇaprāptiśabdavācyam upalabdhilakṣaṇaprāptatvaṃ ghaṭādeḥ pratiṣedhyasya //
GSP28durdhpru:4591: atha kiṃ sthavīyān svabhāvaḥ svabhāvaviśeṣa utasvit pararūpāmiśrasvalakṣaṇātmaka ity abhipretya pṛcchati kīdṛśa iti /
GSP28durdhpru:4593: nanu kim asya sambhavo 'sti yad uta pratyayāntarasākalye saty api svabhāvaḥ pratyakṣa eva bhavatīti /
GSP28durdhpru:4594: tathā hi saty api ghaṭasya tādṛśe svabhāve vidūravarttinaḥ puruṣasya locanādipraṇidhāne pi nāsau pratyakṣo bhavatīty āśaṅkyāha tad ayam iti
GSP28durdhpru:4595: yasmād dvayam etad upalabdhilakṣaṇaprāptim avocad ācāryas tat tasmād atra prastave 'yam artho vācyo 'bhimataḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:4597: ekaś cāsau vivakṣitaḥ pratipattā ceti tathā tadapekṣam idaṃ pratyakṣalakṣaṇam /
GSP28durdhpru:4598: yaḥ svabhāvaḥ satsv anyeṣūpalambhapratyayāntareṣu san pratyakṣa eva bhavatīty evaṃ rūpaṃ /
GSP28durdhpru:4599: ekaś ca pratipattā sa eva vācyo yo 'vyavadhānādideśo draṣṭuṃ pravṛttaś ca /
GSP28durdhpru:4600: tathāvidhe ca draṣṭari tathāvidho 'vaśyaṃ pratyakṣa eva bhavatīti /
GSP28durdhpru:4601: tathāpi kathaṃ pūrvapakṣātikrama ity āha tathā ceti tasmiṃś ca prakāre sati /
GSP28durdhpru:4605: draṣṭum apraṛttasya tu yogyadeśasthā api draṣṭuṃ te na śakyāḥ pratyayāntaravaikalyavantaḥ,
GSP28durdhpru:4608: tad evaṃ paśyataḥ kasyacin na pratyayāntaravikalo nāma,
GSP28durdhpru:4610: apaśyatas tu draṣṭuṃ śakyo yogyadeśasthaḥ pratyayāntaravikalaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:4612: adṛśyamānāpi svabhāvaviśeṣavantas tadā kiṃ svabhāvaviśeṣagrahaṇenety āha adṛśyamānā iti /
GSP28durdhpru:4619: ayam atra prakaraṇārthaḥ ekapratipattrapekṣayā yas tathāvidhaḥ svabhāvaḥ so 'pi yady upalabdhilakṣaṇaprāptilakṣaṇatvena nopādīyate,
GSP28durdhpru:4620: tadā teṣām api deśādiviprakarṣiṇāṃ pratyayāntarasākalyam upalabdhilakṣaṇaprāptir astīty upalabdhilakṣaṇaprāptānām anupalambhād abhāvavyavahāraḥ pravarttanīyaḥ syāt /
GSP28durdhpru:4622: tasmād viśiṣṭapratipattrapekṣam idaṃ svabhāvaviśeṣasya lakṣaṇam ity upalabdhilakṣaṇaprāptilakṣaṇaṃ sūktam iti /
GSP28durdhpru:4623: pratyayāntarasākalyavattvam eva teṣāṃ sādhayann āha yair iti /
GSP28durdhpru:4625: etad eva kutaḥ siddhyatīty āha ata iti /
GSP28durdhpru:4628: sannihitās te pratyayā yad yasmād draṣṭuṃ pravṛttas tadviviktaṃ draṣṭuṃ pravṛtto yata ity arthaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:4629: yad vā tad eva nirīkṣituṃ pravṛtto yata iti /
GSP28durdhpru:4632: draṣṭum apravṛttasya tu sa kīdṛśa ity āha draṣṭum apravṛttasyeti /
GSP28durdhpru:4633: tunā draṣṭuṃ pravṛttād apravṛttasya bhedam āha /
GSP28durdhpru:4634: yāvaty eva deśe sati tasmin pratyayāntare dṛśyante 'rthaḥ sa eva yogyo deśaḥ tatrasthāḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:4635: tasmād dṛśyād anye ye cakṣurādayo hetavas tāni pratyayāntarāṇi /
GSP28durdhpru:4638: ata eva draṣṭuṃ te na śakyāḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:4639: svabhāvaviśeṣas tu teṣām astīti darśayann āha svabhāveti /
GSP28durdhpru:4641: tathāvidhapuruṣāpekṣayā deśakālaviprakṛṣṭānāṃ tu kā vārttety āha dūreti /
GSP28durdhpru:4643: ye hi deśena viprakṛṣṭās te dūradeśā ye ca kālena te dūrakālā bhavantīti bhāvaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:4647: athavā ekapratipattrapekṣam idam ity anyathā vyākhyāyate -- ihopalabdhilakṣaṇaprāptasyety anena deśakālasvabhāvaviprakṛṣṭatayānupalabdhilakṣaṇaprāptāḥ kila vyāvartayitavyāḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:4648: na ca te 'py anupalabdhilakṣaṇaprāptāḥ śakyā vaktuṃ yato vyavacchidyeran tathāpi piśāco 'pi sajātīyair upalabhyate evaṃ deśaviprakṛṣṭo 'pi taddeśīyaiḥ
GSP28durdhpru:4649: tathā kālaviprakṛṣṭo 'pi tatkālikair iti vyāvarttyābhāvād upa--
GSP28durdhpru:4655: kīdṛśo hetuḥ sādhyasya svabhāva ity āha -- svasya ātmanaḥ sattā /
GSP28durdhpru:4657: tasmin sati bhavituṃ śīlaṃ yasya iti /
GSP28durdhpru:4658: yo hetor ātmanaḥ sattām apekṣya vidyamāno bhavati,
GSP28durdhpru:4659: na tu heutsattāyā vyatiriktaṃ kañcid dhetum apekṣate sa svasattāmātrabhāvī sādhyaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:4660: tasmin sādhye yo hetuḥ sa svabhāvaḥ tasya sādhyasya na anyaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:4662: yathā vṛkṣo ayaṃ śiṃśapātvād iti II-16
GSP28durdhpru:4668: yatra pracuraśiṃśape deśe 'viditaśiṃśapāvyavahāro jaḍo yadā kenacid uccāṃ śiṃśapāṃ
GSP28durdhpru:4669: upādarśya ucyate `ayaṃ vṛkṣaḥ' iti tadāsau jāḍyāc chiṃśapāyā uccatvam api vṛkṣavyavahārasya
GSP28durdhpru:4670: nimittam avasyati tadā yām eva anuccām paśyati śiṃśapāṃ tām eva avṛkṣam avasyati /
GSP28durdhpru:4672: labdhilakṣaṇaprāptasyeti viśeṣaṇam anarthakam ity āśaṅkyāha tad ayam atrārtha iti /
GSP28durdhpru:4673: tadā tu pratyakṣaśabdenopalabdhilakṣaṇaprāptatvaṃ vācyaṃ tasya lakṣaṇam idaṃ pūrvoktam iti yojyam /
GSP28durdhpru:4674: ekapratipattrapekṣam idaṃ pratyakṣalakṣaṇam upalabdhilakṣaṇam ity arthaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:4675: tathāpi kathaṃ codyātikrama ity āha tathā ceti /
GSP28durdhpru:4678: sāmānyavṛttir apy ayaṃ svabhāvaśabdaḥ sādhyadharmasya śrutatvāt tasyaiva svabhāve vartate ity abhiprāyeṇa sādhyasya svabhāva ity abhyavādīt
GSP28durdhpru:4679: hetoḥ svarūpasya cintanāt svaśabdena tasyaivātmā vivakṣitaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:4680: etad eva yo hetor ityādinā sphuṭayati /
GSP28durdhpru:4685: api tu śiṃśapātvamātraṃ nimittaṃ -- śiṃśapāgataśākhādimattvam nimittam ity arthaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:4687: kāryaṃ yathā vahnir atra dhūmād iti II-17
GSP28durdhpru:4691: kāryakāraṇabhāvo loke pratyakṣānupalambhanibandhanaḥ pratīta iti na svabhāvasyeva kāryasya lakṣaṇam uktam /
GSP28durdhpru:4693: udāhriyate pradarśyate svabhāvahetur anenety udāharaṇaṃ svabhāvahetupratipādakaṃ vākyam /
GSP28durdhpru:4694: idaṃ ca svabhāvahetor arthakathanaṃ na tu tatprayogopadarśanam /
GSP28durdhpru:4695: prayogas tu yaḥ śiṃśapātvavyavahārayogyaḥ sa vṛkṣatvavyavahārayogyaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:4698: nanu ca yaḥ śiṃśapā paśyati sa vṛkṣaṃ jānāty eva /
GSP28durdhpru:4699: tat katham atra sādhyasādhanabhāva ity āha tad ayam iti /
GSP28durdhpru:4702: na caitad yathāśruti saṅgacchate tat tasmāt vṛkṣo 'yaṃ vṛkṣavyavahārayogyo 'yaṃ śiṃśapātvāt
GSP28durdhpru:4703: śiṃśapāvyavahārayogyatvād ity ayam artho vācyaḥ vṛkṣo 'yaṃ śiṃśapātvād ity asya vākyasyeti prakaraṇāt /
GSP28durdhpru:4705: nanu yo viditavṛkṣavyavahāraḥ sa svayaṃ pratyakṣeṇaiva taṃ vyavahāraṃ pravartayiṣyati tat katham asyānumānasyāvatāra ity āha tatreti vākyopakṣepe
GSP28durdhpru:4707: anena ca prabandhena mūḍhaṃ praty etad vyavahārasādhanam anumānam iti darśitam /
GSP28durdhpru:4711: ādita eva tena śākhādimattvamātraṃ nimittaṃ na gṛhītam iti /
GSP28durdhpru:4714: tadāsau jāḍyād uccatvam api nimittam avasyatītīdam etasmin mūḍhe pratipattari yojanīyam /
GSP28durdhpru:4715: yaḥ prathamaṃ tāvat śiṃśapāgataṃ śākhādimattvamātram eva nimittam avasāya vṛkṣavyavahāraṃ
GSP28durdhpru:4716: prāvartayat paścāj jāḍyavaśāt tanmātraṃ nimittaṃ vismṛtyānyad eva vṛkṣavyavahārakāle
GSP28durdhpru:4717: uccatvam api nimittam āsīd iti vyāmuhya tadoccatvam api vṛkṣavyavahāranimittam avakalpayatīti /
GSP28durdhpru:4718: sa caivaṃbhūto jaḍaḥ śiṃśapāvyavahārayogyatvena hetunā prathamaṃ pravartitatanmātranimittavṛkṣavyavahārayā
GSP28durdhpru:4719: tadānīṃ tathāsmāritayā śiṃśapayā dṛṣṭāntena vṛkṣavyavahārayogyatāṃ bodhayituṃ śakyata eva /
GSP28durdhpru:4720: yaḥ punar ādita evāropitoccatvādinimittas taṃ prati hetūpanyāsa eva na yujyate /
GSP28durdhpru:4721: kiṃ tarhi? vṛkṣavyavahārasamayam evāsau grāhayitavya iti sarvam avadātam /
GSP28durdhpru:4723: nanu trirūpatvād ekam eva liṅgaḥ yuktaṃ /
GSP28durdhpru:4725: evaṃ sati svabhāvahetor ekasyānantaprakāratvāt trirūpam ayuktam ity āha --
GSP28durdhpru:4726: atra dvau vastusādhanau ekaḥ pratiṣedhahetuḥ II-18
GSP28durdhpru:4728: atra ity eṣu triṣu madhye dvau hetū vastusādhanau -- vidheḥ sādhanau gamakau /
GSP28durdhpru:4730: pratiṣedha iti ca abhāvo 'bhavavyavahāraś ca ukto draṣṭavyaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:4731: idānīṃ kāryahetuṃ vivarītum āha -- kāryam iti /
GSP28durdhpru:4732: hetoḥ prakṛtatvāt kāryam iti kāryahetum ity avaseyaṃ sukhapratipatty artham /
GSP28durdhpru:4738: vyāptivediny api puṃsi hetur anuvādyenaiva rūpeṇa nirdiśyamāna prathamānta eva nirdeśyaḥ atra dhūma iti /
GSP28durdhpru:4740: na ca tathāvidhaṃ praty api pratijñā anyathā ka enām asādhanāṅga brūyāt /
GSP28durdhpru:4742: īdṛśas tu prayogaḥ karaṇīyaḥ -- yatra dhūmas tatra sarvatra vahnir yathā mahānase,
GSP28durdhpru:4744: svabhāvānupalabdhyor iva kāryahetor api kasmāl lakṣaṇam ācāryeṇa na praṇītam ity āśaṅkām apākurvann āha -- kāryeti /
GSP28durdhpru:4749: ayam abhiprāyaḥ anupalabdhau khalu bahavo vipratipannāḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:4751: kumārilas tu vastvantarasyaikajñānasaṃsargitām anapekṣyaivānyamātrasya jñānam anupalabdhim abhāvapramāṇatayā varṇayati /
GSP28durdhpru:4752: tathā, vivakṣitajñānānādhāratālakṣaṇam ātmano 'pariṇāmaṃ svāpādisādhāraṇam [44b] api tathātvena varṇayati /
GSP28durdhpru:4753: yad āha -- “sātmano 'pariṇāmo vā vijñānaṃ vānyavastuni” iti /[46]
GSP28durdhpru:4755: [46] ŚV abhāvapariccheda 11cdsātmanaḥ pariṇāmo vā vijñānaṃ vākyavastuni /
GSP28durdhpru:4757: kecid arthāntarāpekṣiṇy api dharme svabhāvaṃ hetum adhyavasitāḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:4758: kecit tu vastuno dharmiviśeṣam āśritaṃ svabhāvam iti /
GSP28durdhpru:4760: atra tu kāryatvarūpe na kecid vipratipadyanta iti nāsya lakṣaṇām uktam iti /
GSP28durdhpru:4761: kāryakāraṇabhāvena gamyagamakabhāve sarvathā gamyagamakabhāvaprasaṅga ityādikāyāṃ vipratipattāv api na kāryasya lakṣaṇe viprtipatti /
GSP28durdhpru:4763: sā cānyatra nirākṛtā 'trāpi prājñaiḥ svayam abhyūhyā prājñajanādhikāreṇāsya prārambhād iti //
GSP28durdhpru:4764: samprati trirūpāṇi ca trīṇy evety asahamānaḥ prāha -- nanv iti /
GSP28durdhpru:4767: prakārasya svarūpasya bhedād viśeṣāt bhedo nānātvam /
GSP28durdhpru:4771: tad ayam arthaḥ -- hetuḥ sādhyasiddyarthatvāt sādhyāṅgam,
GSP28durdhpru:4773: ataś ca sādhyopakaraṇasya hetuḥ pradhānasādhyabhedād bhedaḥ,
GSP28durdhpru:4777: vidhipratiṣedhayoś ca parasparaparihāreṇa avasthānāt heyor hetū bhinnau /
GSP28durdhpru:4784: kasmāt ca anyeṣām hetutvam ity āśaṅkya yathā trayāṇām eva hetutvam anyeṣāṃ ca ahetutvaṃ tad ubhayaṃ darśayitum āha --
GSP28durdhpru:4785: svabhāvapratibandhe hi saty artho arthaṃ gamayet II-19
GSP28durdhpru:4787: gamakāv iti vivṛṇvan sādhayata iti sādhanāv iti kartari lyuṭaṃ darśayati /
GSP28durdhpru:4788: atra ca vastunaḥ sādhanāv evety avadhāraṇīyaṃ na tu vastuna eveti /
GSP28durdhpru:4791: pratiṣedhasya hetur evety avadhāraṇīyaṃ na tv ayam eveti pūrvābhyām api sāmarthyāt pratiṣedhasya sādhanāt /
GSP28durdhpru:4792: nanu na dṛśyānupalambhenābhāvaḥ sādhyate tasya pratyakṣasiddhatvāt /
GSP28durdhpru:4796: tarhi vyāpakānupalambhādinā vyāpyādyabhāve sādhye kenābhāvaḥ sādhitaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:4797: tataḥ kim atra pratiṣedhaśabdena pratipattavyam ity āśaṅkyāha pratiṣedha iti /
GSP28durdhpru:4799: tena pratiṣedha ity anena śabdenābhāvo 'bhāvavyavahāraś cokto draṣṭavya ity arthaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:4800: ekasya pratiṣedhena iti mukhyayā vṛttyā saṅgraho 'nyasya pratiṣedhāśrayatayā gauṇyā vṛttyeti bhāvaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:4801: nāstīti jñānaṃ nāstītyabhidhānaṃ niḥśaṅkātra gamanāgamanalakṣaṇā pravṛttir vyavahāraḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:4802: sa ca haṭhāt pravarttayituṃ na śakyata iti tadyogyataiva sādhyeti draṣṭavyam /
GSP28durdhpru:4803: evaṃ tu svabhāvahetāv antarbhāve 'py anupalambhasya tataḥ pṛthakkaraṇaṃ pratipattradhyavasāyavaśād ity avaseyam /
GSP28durdhpru:4806: tat katham idam uttaraṃ pūrvapakṣam iti varttatām ity āśaṅkyāha -- tad ayam iti /
GSP28durdhpru:4807: yasmād idam uttarīkṛtam ācāryeṇa yathāśruti ca pūrvapakṣaṃ nātikrāmati tat tasmād ayam artho vākyasyāyaṃ tātparyārth ity arthaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:4808: etam evārthaṃ hetur ityādinā na tu svata evety antena granthe pratipādayati //
GSP28durdhpru:4809: atha katham anyo 'rtho 'nyam arthaṃ na vyabhicarati yenaite trayo hetavaḥ?
GSP28durdhpru:4810: ya[45a]thā cāmīṣāṃ svasādhyasādhanād gamakatvaṃ tathā 'nyeṣām apy akāryasvabhāvānupalambhātmanāṃ kiṃ na bhavatīti manvānaḥ praśnenopakramate -- kasmād iti /
GSP28durdhpru:4811: kasmād iti sāmānyato hetuṃ pṛcchati punar iti viśeṣataḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:4820: kāraṇe svabhāve vā sādhye svabhāvena pratibandhaḥ kāryasvabhāvayor aviśiṣṭa ity ekena samāsena dvayor api saṃgrahaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:4822: yasmāt svabhāvapratibandhe sati sādhanārthaḥ sādhyārthaṃ gamayet tasmāt trayāṇāṃ gamakatvam anyeṣām agamakatvam /
GSP28durdhpru:4823: kasmāt punaḥ svabhavapratibandha eva sati gamyagamakabhāvo na anyathety āha --
GSP28durdhpru:4828: yo yatra svabhāvena na pratibaddhaḥ tasya tadapratibaddhasya tadavyabhicāraniyamābhāvāt /
GSP28durdhpru:4829: tasyāpratibhandaviṣayasyāvyabhicāraḥ tadavyabhicāraḥ tasya niyamaḥ tadavyabhicāraniyamaḥ tasyābhāvāt /
GSP28durdhpru:4830: tad ayam arthaḥ -- na hi yo yatra svabhāvena na pratibaddhaḥ,
GSP28durdhpru:4831: sa tam apratibandhaviṣayam avaśyam eva na vyabhicāratīti nāsti tayor avyabhicāraniyamaḥ -- avinābhāvaniyamaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:4835: tena “karttṛkaraṇe kṛtā bahulam” [pāṇini 2.1.32] iti sūtram apanīya galecopaka ityādisiddhy artha “sādhanaṃ kṛtā” iti sūtraṃ kṛtam /
GSP28durdhpru:4837: anena ca tṛtīyāsamāsenaiva kāryasvabhāvayoḥ saṃgrahād āvṛttyā ṣāṣṭhīsaptamīsamāsābhyāṃ kāryasvabhāvayoḥ saṃgraha iti yat pūrvair vyākhyātaṃ tad apavyākhyānam iti khyāpitam /
GSP28durdhpru:4839: anena pratibandhaśabdena pratibaddhatvam āyattatvam ucyata iti darśayati /
GSP28durdhpru:4841: pratibaddheti yaḥ svarūpeṇa kvacid āyattas tas tasya svabhās tatra pratibaddha āyatta ity arthābhedena pratibaddhasvabhāvatvam ity artha iti spaṣṭīkṛtam /
GSP28durdhpru:4842: nanu pūrveṣām abhimatasamāsavyudāsena tṛtīyāsamāsaṃ darśayatā kiṃ svid ati yo labdhaḥ?
GSP28durdhpru:4843: kevalam āhopuruṣikā prakāśitety āśaṅkya pūrvaṃ buddhistham eva sphuṭayitum āha -- kāraṇa iti / kasyāsau
GSP28durdhpru:4846: na hi yogyatayā pradīpavat parokṣārthapratipattinimittam iṣṭaṃ liṅgam api tv avyabhicāritvena niścitam /
GSP28durdhpru:4849: tasmāt svabhāvapratibandhe saty artho 'rthaṃ gamayen nānyathety sthitam /
GSP28durdhpru:4851: tad iha sādhyasādhanayoḥ kasya kva pratibandha ity āha --
GSP28durdhpru:4852: sa ca pratibandhaḥ sādhye arthe liṅgasya II-21
GSP28durdhpru:4853: pratibandha ity akāṅkṣāyām āha -- kāryasvabhāvayos tayor eva prakṛtatvāt /
GSP28durdhpru:4855: dvayor api kāryasvabhāvayor atiśaye saṅgrahaḥ svīkāraḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:4857: sādhanalakṣāṇo 'rthaḥ sādhyalakṣaṇam arthaṃ gamayet bodhayatuṃ śaknoti /
GSP28durdhpru:4862: tādātmyatadutpattibhāve ca kāryasvabhāvayor evāntarbhāva iti bhāvaḥ //
GSP28durdhpru:4863: tad ityādinā samāsaṃ pradarśya tadapratibaddhasyeti yojayatā dharmottareṇa mūle tadapatibaddhasyeti pāṭho darśitaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:4865: tatrāpi pāṭhe tadapratibaddhaḥ sādhyāprtibaddhaḥ svabhāvaḥ svarūpaṃ yasya liṅgasyeti vigrahaḥ kāryaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:4869: nanu tad apratibaddhatve 'pi adyatana ādityodayo 'stamayam apratibandhaviṣayaṃ na vyabhicaratīty āśaṅkyāha -- tad ayam artham iti /
GSP28durdhpru:4870: yata evaṃ uktam tat tasmād ayaṃ tātparyārthaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:4874: tasmād ādityasya tasmād astamayayogyataiva sādhyā -- ayam ādityodayo 'stamayayogya udayatvāt /
GSP28durdhpru:4876: sati caivaṃ svabhāvahetutvam asyāyātam iti bhāvaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:4881: etad eva kuta ity āha -- na hīti /
GSP28durdhpru:4884: api tu kin tv vyabhicāritvena sādhyasya prakṛtatvāt sādhyāvinābhāvitvena niścitam /
GSP28durdhpru:4885: niyamābhāve ca kuto 'vyabhicāraniścaya ity asya tātparyārthaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:4887: pratibandhas tu kasmān mṛgyata ity āha -- tata iti /
GSP28durdhpru:4889: anyathā 'vyabhicāra eva na śakyate niścetum ity arthād anena darśitam /
GSP28durdhpru:4890: etāvatā 'pi kathaṃ gamakatvaṃ ity āha -- tata iti tato niścitād avyabhicārāl liṅgasya gamakatve siddhe sādhyasyāpi gamaka(gamya)
GSP28durdhpru:4892: uktam artham upasaṃharann āha -- tasmād iti /
GSP28durdhpru:4897: sa ceti / sa ca svabhāvapratibandho liṅgasya sādhye 'rthe /
GSP28durdhpru:4899: sādhyas tv artho 'parāyattatvāt pratibandhaviṣayo na tu pratibaddha ity arthaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:4900: tatrāyam arthaḥ -- tādātmyāviśeṣe 'pi yat pratibaddhaṃ tad gamakam /
GSP28durdhpru:4902: yasya ca dharmasya yo niyataḥ svabhāvaḥ sa tatpratibaddaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:4904: yasya tu sa cānyaś ca svabhāvaḥ ca pratibandhaviṣayaḥ,
GSP28durdhpru:4911: nanu bhinnayor gamyagamakabhāve liṅgaṃ tadutpattyā parāyattatvāt pratibaddham /
GSP28durdhpru:4916: tataḥ pratibaddhatvaṃ pratibandhaviṣayatvaṃ vā dvayor aviśiṣṭam āyāti /
GSP28durdhpru:4917: tadāśrayaś ca niyataḥ sādhyasādhanabhāvaḥ prasakta ity āha -- tatrāyam artha iti /
GSP28durdhpru:4918: na kevalam arthāntaratva ity api śabdaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:4919: yat pratibaddham iti yat sādhyapratibaddhatayā tadāyattatayā niścitam iti draṣṭavyam /
GSP28durdhpru:4921: nanu tādātmyāviśeṣād ekas tatra pratibandhaviṣayatayā na tu pratibaddhatayety ayam eva vibhāgaḥ kuta ity āha -- yasyeti /
GSP28durdhpru:4922: yad vā tādātmyānubhāvini dvaye kin tatra pratibaddhaṃ yad gamakaṃ kiñ ca pratibandhaviṣayo yad gamyam ity ajānantam praty āha -- ysyeti /
GSP28durdhpru:4924: yasya dharmasya vyāvṛttikalpitasya yo niyataḥ pratiniyataḥ sa eva svabhāvo na tad anyo 'pi /
GSP28durdhpru:4926: tad iti ya iti prathamāntenoktaḥ pratyavamṛṣṭas tasmin pratibaddha iti vigrahaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:4935: prayatnānantaryakatvasya hy anityatvam eva svabhāvo na tu nityatvam api /
GSP28durdhpru:4937: īdṛśasya tāvad iyaṃ gatir anyasya tu kā vārttetyāha -- yasyeti /
GSP28durdhpru:4940: sa ca so 'pi prayatnānantaryākhyo 'nyaś ca saś ca(cā)
GSP28durdhpru:4943: etad eva vyatirekamukheṇa draḍhayati -- na tv iti /
GSP28durdhpru:4955: sa sādhyo 'rtha ātmā svabhāvo yasya tat tadātmā /
GSP28durdhpru:4958: yataḥ sādhyasvabhāvaṃ sādhanaṃ tasmāt tatra svabhāvapratibandha ity arthaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:4959: yadi sādhyasvabhāvaṃ sādhanaṃ sādhyasādhanayor abhedāt pratijñārthaikadeśo hetuḥ syād ity āha -- vastuta iti /
GSP28durdhpru:4964: tato niścayāruddharupāpekṣa eva tayor bhedao yuktaḥ vāstavas tv abheda iti /
GSP28durdhpru:4965: na kevalāt tādātmyād api tu tataḥ sādhyād arthād utpattir liṅgasya -- tadutpatteś ca sādhye 'rthe svabhāvapratibandho liṅgasya /
GSP28durdhpru:4966: syād etat tādātmyaṃ tāvat tayor asti /
GSP28durdhpru:4969: tad apekṣāyām api kim iti prayatnānantarīyakatvam eva gamakam ity āha -- prayatneti /
GSP28durdhpru:4971: yatas tatsvabhāvaṃ niśitam ato 'sto 'smāt tad evāvnityatve pratibaddham ucyata iti śeṣaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:4972: yatas tādātmyāviśeṣe 'pi yatpatibddhatayā niścitaṃ tad eva gamakam itarad gamyaṃ tasmān niyataḥ patiniyataḥ prayatnāntarīyakam eva gamakam,
GSP28durdhpru:4973: anityatva ca gamyam evety evaṃrūpo viṣayo yasya gamyagamakabhāvasya sa tathā /
GSP28durdhpru:4975: nanu ca ya ekasyānyatra pratibandhas tadāyattatvaṃ sa tāvan nāhetukaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:4976: kaś cāsau hetur ity abhipretya praśnayati -- kasmād iti /
GSP28durdhpru:4978: tādātmyād iti maulam uttara vyākhyātum āha -- yata iti /
GSP28durdhpru:4979: tatra sādhye svabhāvena pratibandhaḥ pratibaddhatvaṃ liṅgasyeti śeṣaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:4982: atra ca sādhyasādhanayor aikātmyasya pratutatvāt sādhyalakṣaṇasya pratijñārthasya hetuvamāsaktam /
GSP28durdhpru:4986: kathaṃ tarhi bhedanibandhano gamyagamakabhāva ity āha -- vikalpeti /
GSP28durdhpru:4989: yadi bāhyas tadā tadavastho doṣa ity āha -- yad iti /
GSP28durdhpru:4992: kasmān nimittadvayāt svabhāvapratibandho liṅgasya nānyasmād ity āha --
GSP28durdhpru:4993: atatsvabhāvasya atadutpatteś ca tatra apratibaddhasvabhāvatvāt II-23
GSP28durdhpru:4998: yo yatsvabhāvo yadutpattiś ca na bhavati tasya atatsvabhāvasyātadutpatteś ca /
GSP28durdhpru:4999: tatra atatsvabhāve anutpādake cāpratibaddaḥ svabhāvo 'syeti so 'yam apratibaddhasvabhāvaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:5002: yady atatsvabhāve 'nutpādake ca kaścit pratibaddhasvabhāvo bhaved,
GSP28durdhpru:5008: idaṃ sādhanam idaṃ sādhyam iti sādhyasādhanarūpo bhedo nānātvam ity arthaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:5009: yadi nāma kalpanānirmito bhedas tathāpi kathaṃ gamyagamakabhāva ity āha -- niścayeti /
GSP28durdhpru:5012: yata evaṃ tatas tasyāt tayoḥ sādhyasādhanayor bhedo nānātvaṃ yuktyā saṅgato yuktaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:5014: syān matam -- bhedena kalpitayor na tādātmyaṃ gamyagamakabhāvanibandhanam asti /
GSP28durdhpru:5015: vāstavena ca rūpeṇaikatvān na gamyagamakabhāva iti kathaṃ svabhāvahetor gamakatvam?
GSP28durdhpru:5017: yad darśanadvārāyātāv etau dharmau tathāpratīyamānau tat tāvat paramārthatas tadātmakam ity ekasya dharmasya dharmāntarāvyabhicāraḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:5018: vāstavaṃ tadātmyagataṃ ca yasya gamakatvaṃ sa svabhāvahetur ucyata iti ko virodhaḥ?
GSP28durdhpru:5019: ayaṃ prakaraṇārthaḥ -- na niścayasthe samāropite rūpe samāropitatvenādhyavasīyamāne gamyagamake kin tu svalakṣaṇatvenādhyavasīyamāne /
GSP28durdhpru:5024: tad avadhyavasitabhedanibandhano gamyagamakabhāvas tasya svataś ca tādātmyam iti
