GSP28durdhpru:5025: dvitīyaṃ pratibandhakāraṇaṃ vyākhyātum āha -- na kevalād iti /
GSP28durdhpru:5027: nanu ca samavāyādito 'pi nimittāt pratibandho nāsambhavī /
GSP28durdhpru:5028: tat kathaṃ tādātmyāt tadutpatter eva ca sa ucyate ity abhiprāyavān pṛcchati -- kasmād iti /
GSP28durdhpru:5032: yadi samavāyādir anyaḥ sambandhaḥ pramāṇabādhito na bhavet /
GSP28durdhpru:5034: tat kuto 'sāv asann asya nimittaṃ bhaveti /
GSP28durdhpru:5036: apratibaddhasvabhāvatvād iti mūlasya bhāvapratyayaṃ tyaktvā vigraham āha -- apratibaddha iti /
GSP28durdhpru:5040: kasmāt punar anyato nimittān na bhavatīy āha -- pratibaddheti /
GSP28durdhpru:5042: pratibaddhasvabhāvatvam evānyasyānyatra bhvaviṣyatīy āha -- na ceti /
GSP28durdhpru:5044: anyasya sambandhasyābhāvāt tādātmyatadutpattyabhāve ceti prakaraṇalabhyaṃ kṛtvā na cānyaḥ kścid āyattasvabhāva ity uktam /
GSP28durdhpru:5045: nanu cāsaty api tādātmye tadutpattau cānyatrāsvabhāve 'nutpādake cānyat pratibaddhaṃ yathā -- ātapo vṛkṣacchāyāyām /
GSP28durdhpru:5063: etāvat tūcyate -- yad yenāvinābhūtaṃ dṛśyate tat tatra pratibaddham /
GSP28durdhpru:5065: ata eva trīṇy eva liṅgānīti saṃkhyāniyamo 'py ayuktaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:5069: amīṣāṃ madhye yeṣāṃ pratibandho 'sti teṣāṃ tādātmyatadutpattyor anyataram sambhavād,
GSP28durdhpru:5070: yeṣu ca tad abhāvas teṣām apratibandhād agamakatvāt /
GSP28durdhpru:5071: tathā hi vṛkṣasya chāyāyām ekasāmagryadhīnatayaiva pratibandhaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:5073: chāyā hi pratibhāsamānarūpasaṃsthānavatī śaityādyarthakriyākāriṇī vastv eva,
GSP28durdhpru:5075: sā ca pūrvasmād ālolopādānāt pūrvavṛkṣakṣaṇād vṛkṣakṣaṇena sārdham utpadyate /
GSP28durdhpru:5076: tathā 'rvāgbhāganamanāvanamane api tulāyāḥ parabhāgonnamanāvanamanābhyām eva samaṃ puruṣaprayatnād eva tathāvidhāt tadupādānasaha[47a]kāriṇa utpadyete /
GSP28durdhpru:5084: dṛśyādṛśyasamudāyaś ca yathāyogaṃ sarvatra dharmī karttavyaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:5091: ekasmād eva mahābhūtaviśeṣāt kālavyavahāraviṣayād etad utpādāpekṣiṇas teṣām utpādāt /
GSP28durdhpru:5092: tathā ya eva kṛttikodayahetur mahābhūtaviśeṣaḥ kālasaṃjñitaḥ sa eva katipayakālavyavadhānena rohiṇyudayahetur iti tad darśanād hetos tajjananayogyatādharmo 'numīyate eva /
GSP28durdhpru:5093: tathā pipīlikotsaraṇasya matsyavikārasya ca yo hetuḥ sa eva katipayakālavyavadhānena varṣakaraṇayogyas tataḥ pūrvavad hetudharmānumānam,
GSP28durdhpru:5098: tadā tasmād eva mahābhūtāt kālasaṃjñitāj jalaprasādaḥ / sa
GSP28durdhpru:5103: te ca tādātmyatadupattī svabhāvakāryayor eva iti tābhyām eva vastusiddhiḥ II-24
GSP28durdhpru:5105: yasmāt svabhāve kārye eva ca tādātmyatadutpattī sthite tannibandhanaś ca gamyagamakabhāvas tasmāt tābhyām eva kāryasvabhāvyāṃ vastuno vidheḥ siddhiḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:5106: atha pratiṣedhasiddhir dṛśyānupalambhād api kasmān neṣṭety āha --
GSP28durdhpru:5107: pratiṣedhasiddhir api yathoktā yā eva anupalabdheḥ II-25
GSP28durdhpru:5108: pratiṣedhavyavahārasya siddhir yathoktā yā dṛśyānupalabdhis tata eva bhavati yatas tasmād anyato noktā /
GSP28durdhpru:5111: sati tasmin pratiṣdhye vastuni yasmād dṛśyānupalabdhir na sambhavati tasmād asambhavāt tataḥ pratiṣedhasiddhiḥ //
GSP28durdhpru:5112: ca katipayakālavyavadhānena tadudayanimittam iti pūrvavad hetudharmānumānam /
GSP28durdhpru:5115: sā ca svabhāvabhūtaivānumīyata iti tādātmyam eva nibandhanam /
GSP28durdhpru:5116: ādityodayasya tu prabhāvātiśayavatā yogyādinā vibandhasambhavāt nāsty evāvinābhāvaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:5118: evaṃ tu yuktam -- ayam udetā astamayaśvastanodayayogya iti /
GSP28durdhpru:5124: etāvad ucyate -- asati tādāmye taduptattau vā kasyacit kvacit pratibandhe tādrūpyeṇa ca gamakatve sarvaṃ sarvatra pratibaddhaṃ tadgamakaṃ prasajyeteti
GSP28durdhpru:5125: kāryasvabhāvayor eva tu gamakatvaṃ katham iti bruvataḥ pūrvapakṣavādino 'yam āśayaḥ -- tādātmyatadupattī evānyasya bhaviṣyataḥ,
GSP28durdhpru:5127: kāryasvabhāvayor iti dvayo[r u]ccāraṇe cāyaṃ tasya bhāvaḥ -- bhavadibhar evānuplalambho 'nayor antarbhāvita iti //
GSP28durdhpru:5130: kevalaṃ tad evā ......................................... m ity asyāpy anupalabdheḥ
GSP28durdhpru:5132: atha tata eva kasmād ity āha --
GSP28durdhpru:5133: anyathā ca anupalabdhilakṣaṇaprāpteṣu deśakālasvabhāvaviprakṛṣṭeṣv artheṣv ātmapratyakṣanivṛtter abhāvaniścayābhāvāt II-27
GSP28durdhpru:5135: sati vastuni tasyā adṛśyānupalabdheḥ sambhavād ity anyathāśabdārthaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:5137: kuta etad -- saty api vastuni tasyāḥ sambhava ity āha -- anupalabdhilakṣaṇaprāpteṣv ityādi /
GSP28durdhpru:5142: deśaś ca kālaś ca svabhāvaś ca tair viprakṛṣṭā iti vigrahaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:5144: saty api vastuni tasyā bhāva iṣṭaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:5145: kasmān niścayābhāva ity āha -- teṣu pratpattur ātmano yat pratyakṣam tasya nivṛtteḥ kāraṇāt niścayābhāvaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:5147: tasmāt saty api vastuni ātmaprtyakṣanivṛttilakṣaṇāyā adṛśyānupalabdheḥ sambhavaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:5149: pratiṣedhasambhavād ity abhiprāyeṇa pūrvapakṣapravṛtter adoṣa eṣaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:5150: pratiṣedhaśabdena vyavahāro 'bhipreta iti pratiṣedhavyavahāra iti vivṛtam /
GSP28durdhpru:5153: mūlasāmarthyasthitam abhivyanakti tasmād anyato 'dṛśyasyānupalabdher noktā pratiṣedhasiddhir iti prakṛtena sambandhaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:5154: yady adṛśyānupalabdher na bhavati tadānupalabdhitvāviśeṣe vivakṣitāyāpi mā bhūd ity abhipretyāha tatas tāvad iti /
GSP28durdhpru:5155: tasmād asambhavāt kāraṇāt tata iti tata eva dṛśyānupalabdher iti vivakṣitam itarathā nyasyāpi pratiṣedhasiddhikathanaprasaṅgāt //
GSP28durdhpru:5157: kathaṃ punas tata eveti niyamo labhyate ity abhiprāyavān āha atheti /
GSP28durdhpru:5159: anyathā cety uttaraṃ vyācakṣāṇa ihaiva cchedaṃ darśayati caśabdañ ca yasmādarthe /
GSP28durdhpru:5160: dṛśyānupalabdher uktāt prakārād adṛśyānupalabdher anyaprakāratvam anyathātvaṃ vivakṣitam ācāryasyeti
GSP28durdhpru:5171: ata evābhāvo na sādhyaḥ svabhāvānupalabdheḥ siddhatvāt /
GSP28durdhpru:5172: [50]avidyamāno 'pi ca[51]ghaṭādir ekajñānasaṃsargiṇi bhūtale[52]bhāsamāne samagrasāmagrīko jñāyamāno dṛśtayā[53]sambhāvitatvāt pratyakṣa uktaḥ
GSP28durdhpru:5173: ata ekajñānasaṃsargī[54]dṛśyamāno 'rthas tajjñānaṃ ca pratyakṣanivṛttir ucyate /
GSP28durdhpru:5174: tato hi dṛśyamānād arthāt tadbuddheś ca samagradarśanasāmagrīkatvena pratyakṣatayā sambhāvitasya nivṛttir avasīyate /
GSP28durdhpru:5175: tasmād arthajñāne eva pratyakṣasya ghaṭasyābhāva ucyate /
GSP28durdhpru:5176: na tu nivṛttimātram ihābhāvaḥ nivṛttimātrād dṛśyanivṛttyaniścayāt /
GSP28durdhpru:5179: [50] yathā ca pratipattṛpratyakṣanivṛttr anupalabdhiḥ pradeśas tajjñānaṃ cocyate tathā avidyamāno 'pītyādinā darśayāti -- ṭi-
GSP28durdhpru:5186: mūle tv anyathā cānupalabdhilakṣaṇaprāpteṣv ity ekavākyatayaivārthaḥ saṅgacchate /
GSP28durdhpru:5190: tathā tu na prakrāntaṃ dharmottareṇeti kim atra kurmaḥ?
GSP28durdhpru:5191: kuta etad iti sāmānyenoktvā viśeṣaniṣṭhaṃ karoti saty apīti /
GSP28durdhpru:5192: etac ca vigraha ity antaṃ sugamam /
GSP28durdhpru:5194: saty api vastuni asyānupalabdher bhāva iṣṭaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:5195: anenaitad āha -- nāsmākam atra pramāṇam asti yat saty eva vastuni sā bhavatīti /
GSP28durdhpru:5196: kin tu tasyāṃ satyām api yasmāt pratyayo dolāyate tasmād evam ucyata iti /
GSP28durdhpru:5197: samprati niścayābhāvasyāvadhiṃ prayeṣamāṇa āha kasmāt sakāśād iti /
GSP28durdhpru:5199: nanu yady ayam apādānapraśno na tu hetupraśnas tadā katham idam āha tasya nivṛtteḥ kāraṇān niścayābhāva iti cet / na /
GSP28durdhpru:5201: niścayābhāvasya śabdena nyāyena jāyamānasyaiṣā prakṛtiḥ kāraṇam /
GSP28durdhpru:5202: “janikartuḥ prakṛtiḥ” [Pāṇini 1.4.30] ity anena labdhāpādānasaṃjñakād asmād ity arthasya vivakṣitatvāt /
GSP28durdhpru:5205: etac ca pratiṣedhasiddhir ity etad antaṃ sugamam //
GSP28durdhpru:5206: sampraty anupalabdher anumānajñānahetutvāt prāmāṇyaṃ svabhāvaviśeṣo vyāpāraś cokto 'pi kālapuruṣaviśeṣaparigrahaṇena vaktum athetyādinā praśnapūrvam upakramate /
GSP28durdhpru:5211: kevalam ekajñānasaṃsargiṇi dṛśyamāne ghaṭo yadi bhaved dṛśya eva bhaved iti dṛśyaḥ sambhāvitaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:5214: yadi hi dṛśyas tatra bhaved dṛśyānupalambho na bhavet /
GSP28durdhpru:5215: ato dṛśyānupalambhaniścayād dṛśyābhāvaḥ sāmarthyād avasitaḥ na[57]vyavahṛta iti dṛśyānupalambhena vyavaharttavyaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:5216: tasmād arthānatram ekajñānasaṃsargi dṛśyamānam tajjñānaṃ ca pratyakṣanivṛttiniścayahetutvāt pratyakṣanivṛttir uktaṃ draṣṭavyam /
GSP28durdhpru:5222: nivṛttiśabdenācāryasyānupalabdhir vivakṣiteti darśayati tasya nivṛttir anupalabdhir iti /
GSP28durdhpru:5223: anupalabdhiśabdenāpi vivakṣitakartṛkarmadharmopalabdhiparyudāsenānyad ekajñānasaṃsargi vastu tajjñānaṃ ca vivakṣitam /
GSP28durdhpru:5224: etad eva spaṣṭayati tadabhāvasvabhāveti yāvad iti /
GSP28durdhpru:5225: tasya pratiṣedhyasya ghaṭāder abhāvo viśiṣṭo bhāvas tatsvabhāvā /
GSP28durdhpru:5226: tadabhāvasvabhāvaśabdena yāvān artha ukta tadanupalabdhiśabdenāpīti iti yāvad ity asyārthaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:5228: saiva ca tadabhāvo nānyo 'ta evāsmād eva kāraṇād abhāvo ghaṭāder na sādhyaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:5229: kuto na sādhya iti svabhāvānupalabdher liṅgāt /
GSP28durdhpru:5230: kuto na sādhya ity āha siddhatvāt niścitatvād ghaṭābhāvasyeti prakaraṇāt /
GSP28durdhpru:5231: evaṃ manyate -- tadekajjānasaṃsargi vastu tajjñānaṃ ca ghaṭādyanupalabdhis tadabhāvaś ca /
GSP28durdhpru:5232: tac cendriyajena pratyakṣeṇa svasaṃvedanena ca siddham iti na liṅgād abhāvaḥ sādhyata iti /
GSP28durdhpru:5235: kathaṃ tadanupalabdhir ucyata ity āha avidyamāno 'pi ceti /
GSP28durdhpru:5236: na kevalaṃ vidyamānaḥ pratyakṣa ucyate ity apiśabdaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:5240: jñāyamāno niścīyamāno [ghaṭādir ekajñāna]saṃsargiṇi pra ... tadanupalabdher evety avadhāraṇīyam /
GSP28durdhpru:5242: kasmāt tu dvayaṃ tathocyata ity āha tato hīti /
GSP28durdhpru:5244: yasmād amū eva dṛśyaghaṭādituccharūpanivṛttyavaseyahetū tasmāt karaṇāt /
GSP28durdhpru:5247: etad eva vyatirekamukheṇa draḍhayati na tv iti /
GSP28durdhpru:5249: tasya tathātve ko doṣa ity āha nivṛttimātrād iti /
GSP28durdhpru:5251: iha nivṛttimātrasya prasajyapratiṣedhātmano niścetum aśakyatvān na hetutvaṃ yujyata iti dharmottarasyāśayo nivṛttimātrād dṛśyanivṛttyaniścayād iti bruvataḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:5252: pūrvapakṣavādinā tv evaṃ jñātam nivṛttimātrān nirviśeṣaṇād ayam evaṃ pratiṣedhati /
GSP28durdhpru:5253: tad ahaṃ saviśeṣaṇaṃ nivṛttimātram eva darśayāmīti pramodamāna āha nanu ceti /
GSP28durdhpru:5255: dṛśyānupalambhād ity atrānupalambhaśabdenopalambhābhāvamātraṃ vivakṣitam itarathā pūrvapakṣavādinaḥ prakṛtaṃ hīyeta /
GSP28durdhpru:5258: yathā caikajñānasaṃsargiṇi pratyakṣe ghaṭasya pratyakṣatvam āropitam asato 'pi tathā
GSP28durdhpru:5259: tasminn ekajñānasaṃsargiṇy atīte cāmūḍhasmṛtisaṃskāre varttamāne ca ghaṭasya[58]tattadrūpam[59]āropitam
GSP28durdhpru:5263: tena na[61]ghaṭābhāvaḥ sādhyaḥ api tu abhāvavyavahāra ity uktam /
GSP28durdhpru:5270: na tu nañaḥ paryudāsavṛttyā tadekajñānasaṃsargi vastu,
GSP28durdhpru:5273: kin tv ekajñānasaṃsargiṇi bhūtalādau dṛśyamāne sati dṛśyaḥ sambhāvita āropitaḥ sa pratiṣedhya iti prakaraṇāt /
GSP28durdhpru:5274: tato dṛśyatvasamāropāt dṛśyānupalabdhir dṛśyajñānābhāvas tuccharūpo vyavahartavyamātraṃ niścitā bhavati /
GSP28durdhpru:5275: niścīyatām upalabdhyabhāvo jñeyābhāvas tāvan na niścita iti tanniścayārthaṃ nivṛttimātraṃ vyāpariṣyata ity āha dṛśyeti /
GSP28durdhpru:5285: nanu yadi jñeyābhāvo 'py avasitas tarhi kathaṃ liṅgena sādhyata ity āha na vyavahṛta iti /
GSP28durdhpru:5286: adṛṣṭānām api sattvaśaṅkayā na pratyakṣaṃ vyavahārayituṃ śaknotīti bhāvaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:5287: kena tarhi vyavahriyata ity āha dṛśyānupalambhena liṅgabhūtena /
GSP28durdhpru:5291: jñānam antareṇa yasmād ayaṃ kevalaḥ pradeśas tasmāt ghaṭādir nāstīty adhyavasātum aśakyatvāt;
GSP28durdhpru:5292: tathā viṣayam antareṇa yasmāt kevalapradeśāparokṣīkaraṇaṃ tasmāt tajjñānaṃ nāsti iti niścetum aśakyatvād iti draṣṭavyam /
GSP28durdhpru:5293: pratyakṣasya ghaṭāder nivṛttiniścayahetutvāt pratyakṣanivṛtti[r uktaṃ draśtavyam] /
GSP28durdhpru:5294: nanu ca pratiṣedhyasya ghaṭāder asato 'pi tathāstu pratyakṣatvam /
GSP28durdhpru:5295: yat punas tatra nāsīd eva tasya katham atītatvam;
GSP28durdhpru:5296: yac ca tatra nāsty eva tasya kathaṃ varttamānatvam,
GSP28durdhpru:5297: kathaṃ ca tatrānupalabdher vyāpāra ity āśaṅkām upākurvann āha -- yatheti /
GSP28durdhpru:5298: yena prakāreṇa ghaṭo yadi bhaved dṛśya eva bhaved ity evaṃrūpeṇa /
GSP28durdhpru:5304: tathā tena prakāreṇa yadi tatra pūrvaṃ ghaṭaḥ sthito yadi syāt,
GSP28durdhpru:5306: na copalabhyate ity evam ātmanā ghaṭasyāropāt pratyakṣasya tadānīm asatas tadrūpam atītatvaṃ varttamānatvañ cāropitam āropasiddham itir evaṃ draṣṭavyākāraṃ darśayati /
GSP28durdhpru:5309: amūḍho 'bhraṣṭo darśanāhitaḥ smṛtijananarūpaḥ saṃskāro yasmin ghaṭādau sa tathoktaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:5313: yasmād atīte ghaṭaviviktapradeśadarśane smṛtisaṃskāro mūḍho dṛśyaghaṭānupalambhe dṛśye ca ghaṭe mūḍho bhavati /
GSP28durdhpru:5315: ata eva na ghaṭābhāve nāpi ghaṭānupalambhe mohaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:5317: ata eva varttamānasya ceti caśabdaḥ kṛtaḥ viśeṣaṇarahitasya varttamānasya viśeṣaṇavatātītena samuccayo yathā vijñāyeteti[65]/
GSP28durdhpru:5320: [63] ata eva na ghaṭānupalambhe nāpi ghaṭe mohaḥ -- ACDPHEN. ata eva na ghaṭānupalambhe nāpi ghaṭe mohaḥ -- B
GSP28durdhpru:5323: tad ayam arthaḥ atīto 'nupalambhaḥ sphuṭaḥ[66]smaryamāṇaḥ pramāṇam varttamānaś ca /
GSP28durdhpru:5324: tato `nāsīd iha ghaṭaḥ anupalabdhatvāt' `nāsti anupalabhyamānatvāt' iti śakyaṃ jñātum /
GSP28durdhpru:5325: `na tu na bhaviṣyaty atra ghaṭaḥ anupalapsyamānatvāt' iti[67]śakyaṃ jñātum[68]/
GSP28durdhpru:5326: anāgatāyā anupalabdheḥ sattvasandehād iti kālaviśeṣo 'nupalabdher vyākhyātaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:5331: nanu dṛśyānupalabdhiḥ kasmiṅ kāle pramāṇaṃ kiṃsvabhāvā kiṃvyāpārā ceti tritayaṃ pṛṣṭa ācāryas tatrānena kim ākhyātam ācāryeṇety āśaṅkām apākurvann āha aneneti /
GSP28durdhpru:5339: tadekajñānasaṃsargi vastu tajjñānaṃ ca dvayaṃ svabhāvo rūpaṃ yasyā dṛśyānupalabdheḥ sā tathoktā vyākhyāteti śeṣaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:5341: sādhyas tu prasajyapratiṣedharūpaḥ kiṃ na bhavatīty āha seti /
GSP28durdhpru:5343: sā tathāvidhānupalabdhi .............. uktam ācāryeṇa sābhāvavyavahārapravartanīty anena śabdeneti bhāvaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:5344: dharmottareṇa cāta eva abhāvo na sādhya ity anena /
GSP28durdhpru:5347: anurūpasmaraṇaṃ janayitum anīśāno mūḍha iti vyapadiśyate /
GSP28durdhpru:5350: amūḍhasmṛtisaṃskāragrahaṇaṃ kasmān na varttamānaviśeṣaṇam ity āha varttamāne tv iti /
GSP28durdhpru:5358: abhāvasya vyavahāraḥ nāstīty evam ākāraṃ jñānam śabdaś caivam ākāraḥ niḥśaṅkaṃ gamanāgamanalakṣaṇā[69]ca pravṛttiḥ kāyiko 'bhāvavyavahāraḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:5359: ghaṭābhāve hi jñāte niḥśaṅkaṃ gantum āgantuṃ ca pravartate /
GSP28durdhpru:5370: yady api ca nāsti ghaṭaḥ iti jñānam anupalabdher eva bhavati ayam eva cābhāvaniścayaḥ
GSP28durdhpru:5371: tathāpi yasmāt pratyakṣeṇa kevalaḥ pradeśa upalabdhas tasmāt iha ghaṭo nāstīty evaṃ
GSP28durdhpru:5372: ca[73]pratyakṣavyāpāram anusaraty abhāvaniścayaḥ tasmāt pratyakṣasya kevalapradeśagrahaṇavyāpārānusāryabhāvaniścayaḥ pratyakṣakṛtaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:5375: nanu yathā vikalpena viṣayīkriyamāṇo 'tīto 'nupalambhaḥ pramāṇam ucyate tathā vikalpasyāvyāhataprasaratvād
GSP28durdhpru:5376: anāgato 'py anupalambho vikalpyamānaḥ kiṃ na tathā pramāṇam ity āha tad ayam iti /
GSP28durdhpru:5377: yasmāt kevalapradeśadarśanāhitaḥ saṃskāro 'tīte ghaṭādāv amūḍho gṛhyate,
GSP28durdhpru:5378: vartamāne tu tasmin smṛtisaṃskāre moho na sambhavaty eva tat tasmād ayaṃ tātparyārthaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:5379: anupalambhaniścayahetutvād anupalambhaḥ kevalapradeśādiḥ sphuṭo yathāsau kevalo 'nubhūtas tathā smṛtvā viṣayīkriyamāṇaḥ pramāṇam /
GSP28durdhpru:5380: vartamānaś ca tādṛg anupalambhaḥ sphuṭo 'bhrāntena jñānena gṛhyamāṇa iti draṣṭavyam /
GSP28durdhpru:5382: kuto na śakyate jñātum ity āhānāgatāyā iti /
GSP28durdhpru:5383: tathātvena niścito hi hetur gamako 'nyathā sandigdhāsiddhatā hetudoṣaḥ syād ity abhiprāyaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:5384: pratyakṣanivṛttiśabdena tāvad dṛśyānupalabdheḥ svabhāvo darśito 'mūḍhetyādinā tu kiṃ darśitam ity āha kāleti /
GSP28durdhpru:5386: kālaviśeṣo 'tīto varttamānaś ca vyākhyātaḥ kathito neneti śeṣaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:5387: etac cātīte varttamāne ca kāle 'nupalabdheḥ pramāṇākhyānam asyopalakṣaṇaṃ draṣṭavyam,
GSP28durdhpru:5389: tathā hy āsīd atra vahnir dhūmasyopalabdhatvāt /
GSP28durdhpru:5392: astīha vṛkṣaḥ śiṃśapāyā upalabhyamānatvād ity api bhavaty eva /
GSP28durdhpru:5394: kāyikas tu katham ity āha ghaṭeti /
GSP28durdhpru:5405: pravartanīty asya dvayam etad vivaraṇaṃ spaṣṭārthaṃ sādhanī pravarttiketi pravartayatīti pravartanīti yogyatayoktam /
GSP28durdhpru:5406: sābhāvatritayam abhāvavyavahāraṃ pravartayituṃ yogyā tāvanmātranimittakatvāt tasya /
GSP28durdhpru:5407: saty arthitve puruṣas tān vyavahārān ācaratu mā vā /
GSP28durdhpru:5408: ata evābhāvavyavahārayogyatā pradeśādeḥ sādhyate dṛśyānupalambheneti paramārthaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:5410: kiñ ca / dṛśyānupalambhaniścayakaraṇasāmarthyād eva pūrvoktayā nītyā pratyakṣeṇaivābhāvo niścitaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:5411: kevalam adṛṣṭānām api sattvasambhavāt sattvaśaṅkayā na asattvaṃ[74]vyavaharttum /
GSP28durdhpru:5413: ato dṛśyānupalambho o 'bhāvajñānaṃ kṛtaṃ pravarttayati na tu akṛtaṃ karotīty[76]abhāvaniścayo
GSP28durdhpru:5414: 'nupalambhāt pravṛtto 'pi pratyakṣeṇa kṛto 'nupalambhena pravarttita ukta ity abhāvavyavahārapravarttany anupalabdhiḥ[77] //
GSP28durdhpru:5415: kasmāt punar atīte varttamāna cānupalabdhir gamikety āha
GSP28durdhpru:5422: pravartiny upalabdhiḥ -- PH. pravartiny anupalabdhiḥ -- B.
GSP28durdhpru:5425: anāgatā hy anupalabdhiḥ svayam eva sandigdhasvabhāvā /
GSP28durdhpru:5426: tasyā asiddhāyā nā 'bhāvaniścayo 'pi tv atītavarttamānāyā iti //
GSP28durdhpru:5427: nanu yadi nāstīty evam ākāraṃ jñānam anupalabdher liṅgād bhavati,
GSP28durdhpru:5428: kathaṃ tarhi pratyakṣāvasito 'bhāva ukta ity āha -- yady api ceti nipātasamudāyo yady apiśabdavad viśeṣābhidhānanimittābhyupagame varttate /
GSP28durdhpru:5430: caśabdo vaktavyam etad ity asyārthe tra varttate /
GSP28durdhpru:5431: abhāvaniścayasya tadā sthairyalābhād anupalambhād evety uktaṃ draṣṭavyam /
GSP28durdhpru:5435: yasmāt kevalapradeśagrahaṇalakṣaṇavyāpārānusārī ghaṭo nāstīty abhāvaniścayaḥ tasmāt pratyakṣakṛta ucyata iti śeṣaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:5436: kasya vyāpārānusārīty ākāṅkṣāyām uktam -- pratyakṣasya pramāṇaviśeṣasyeti /
GSP28durdhpru:5437: atha syād -- yady ayaṃ pratyakṣakṛtas tadā pratyakṣapravarttito 'pi /
GSP28durdhpru:5438: tat kiṃ dṛśyānupalambhena kriyata ity āśaṅkyāha -- kiñceti vaktavyāntarasamuccaye /
GSP28durdhpru:5440: kathaṃ? dṛśyasyānupalambha upalambhābhāvas tuccharūpas tanniścayakaraṇasāmarthyād anyathānupapatteḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:5441: pūrvoktayā nītyā yuktyā yadi hi dṛśyas tatra bhavet,
GSP28durdhpru:5444: vyavahārayitum api śaknoty evety āha -- kevalaṃ kin tu na śaknoti vyavahartum ity antarbhūtaṇijārthatvān nirdeśasya vyavahārayitum ity arthaḥ
GSP28durdhpru:5445: kuto na śaknotīty āha -- sattvaśaṅkayeti pratiṣedhyasattvasya svarūpasya sattvaśaṅkayā sandehena hetunā /
GSP28durdhpru:5446: nanv adarśane 'pi kathaṃ sandeha ity āha -- adṛṣṭeti /
GSP28durdhpru:5447: tena pratyakṣeṇādṛṣṭānām api piśācādīnāṃ sattvasya sadbhāvasya sambhavāt sambhāvyamānatvāt nityaṃ śaṅkyamānānupalambhavyabhicāro hy abhāva iti bhāvaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:5448: ataḥ pratyakṣasya tatrāśaktatvāt sāpi kathaṃ vyavahārayatīty āha -- dṛśya iti /
GSP28durdhpru:5450: etad eva vyatirekamukheṇa draḍhayati -- na tv iti /
GSP28durdhpru:5456: sā ca eṣānupalabdhiḥ ekādaśaprakārā -- ekādaśa prakārā asyā[78]ity ekādaśaprakārā /
GSP28durdhpru:5462: sarvatraiva tu dṛśyānupalabdhir aśabdopāttāpi gamyata iti vācakavyāpārabhedād anupalambhaprakārabhedo na tu svarūpabhedād iti yāvat //
GSP28durdhpru:5467: svabhāvānupalabdhir yathā -- nātra dhūma upalabdhilakṣaṇaprāptasyānupalabdher iti II-31
GSP28durdhpru:5468: nupalambhāt pravṛtto 'pi dṛḍhībhūto 'pi pratyakṣeṇa kevalapradeśādivedinā sāmarthyāt
GSP28durdhpru:5469: kṛta utpādito 'nupalambhena dṛśyānupalambhena pravartitaḥ sādhita ukta ācāryeṇābhāvavyavahārapravartanīty
GSP28durdhpru:5472: itir evam uktena krameṇānupalabdhir dṛśyānupalabdhis tasyā eva prakṛtatvāt /
GSP28durdhpru:5473: kasmād ityādi vartamānāyā ity antaṃ sugamam /
GSP28durdhpru:5474: anāgatāyā apy anupalabdher abhāvaniścayaḥ kasmān na bhavatīty āha -- anāgateti /
GSP28durdhpru:5477: ayam eva ca sāmarthyāvasito maulo[rtho 'nāgatā hi] ityādinā dharmottareṇa ....kāṅkṣopaśamārthaṃ purastād uktaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:5478: syād etat -- pratiṣedhasiddhir {NB II 25} ityādinā niścayābhāvād {NB II 27} ity antena
GSP28durdhpru:5479: granthenāsyārthasya gatatvāt tasyā evābhāvaniścayād {NB II 29} ity ayam ācāryīyo
GSP28durdhpru:5482: yato yathātīte 'pi kāle ghaṭādes tatkālavartidṛśyānupalabdher atītāyāḥ smṛtyārūḍhāyā sva(a)
GSP28durdhpru:5483: bhāvaniścayas tathānagate 'pi kāle ghaṭāder abhāvaniścayaḥ kiṃ na bhavatīti kenāpākṛtaṃ yenāyaṃ punaruktaḥ syād iti //
GSP28durdhpru:5488: ekādaśagrahaṇaṃ cācāryasyopalakṣaṇārthaṃ yathā pramāṇavārttike...grahaṇaṃ...... ṣoḍaśarakāreti tu draṣṭavyam /
GSP28durdhpru:5491: katham ayaṃ bheda upapadyetety abhipretya pṛcchati kuta iti /
GSP28durdhpru:5505: apratibaddham anupahataṃ dhūmajananaṃ prati sāmarthyaṃ yeṣāṃ tāny apratibaddhasāmarthyāni na santīti sādhyam /
GSP28durdhpru:5507: prayogabhedād ity ācāryīyam uttaram anūdya prayogaśabdaṃ vyācaṣṭe prayoga iti /
GSP28durdhpru:5511: tatra vyāpāro vyāpattiḥ pravṛttir yadvābhidhā arthaprakāśanaṃ tallakṣaṇo vyāpāras tasya prayogasya bhedād bhidyamānatvād iti tu subodhatvāt dharmottareṇa na vyākhyātam /
GSP28durdhpru:5512: nanu śabdasyaivānupalambhavācakasyānupalambha eva vācyas tat kathaṃ prayogabhedo yenānupalambhasya prakārabheda ucyata ity āha śabdo hīti /
GSP28durdhpru:5515: kvacid viruddhopalambhādau pratiṣedhyāc chītasparśāder arthāntaram agnyādyabhidhatte /
GSP28durdhpru:5516: kvacit vyāpakānupalabdhādau vivakṣitāt śiṃśapādipratiṣedhāt pratiṣedhāntaraṃ vṛkṣādipratiṣedham abhidhatte /
GSP28durdhpru:5517: yady arthāntaravidhir arthāntarapratiṣedhaś ca kriyate tarhi ...................... dyata ity āha -- sarvatreti /
GSP28durdhpru:5520: yathā ca śabdopāttāpi sā pratīyate tathā purastād abhidhāsyate /
GSP28durdhpru:5522: itis tasmādarthe evamarthe...................ata evārthī gatim āśrityoktaṃ na tu śābdīm iti draṣṭavyam //
GSP28durdhpru:5524: tasyānupalabdhiḥ purvoktayā nītyā tadviviktaḥ pradeśas tajjñānaṃ cāvaseyam /
GSP28durdhpru:5529: co [50b] yasmādarthe 'vadhāraṇārthe vā pūrvavad ity asyānantaraṃ draṣṭavyaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:5530: etac ca svabhāvānupalambhasyārthakathanaṃ kṛtam ācāryeṇa na prayogo darśitaḥ,
GSP28durdhpru:5531: asādhanāṅgasya pratijñāyā upādānāt sādhanāṅgasya ca vyāpter apradarśanāt hetoś cānuvādya rūpasya prathamāntasyānirdeśāt /
GSP28durdhpru:5533: prayogaḥ punar īdṛśaḥ -- yad yatropalabdhilakṣaṇaprāptaṃ san nopalabhyate tat sarvaṃ tatrāsadvyavahārayogyam -- yathā -- turaṅgamottamāṅge śaṅgam
GSP28durdhpru:5535: anena sāmānyādinirākaraṇe dṛśyānupalambhaḥ prayoktavya iti darśitam ācāryeṇa tulyanyāyatvād ity avaseyam /
GSP28durdhpru:5537: kāraṇāni ca nāvaśyaṃ kāryavanti bhavantīti kāryādarśanād apratibaddhasāmarthyānām evābhāvaḥ sādhyaḥ[81]na tv anyeṣām /
GSP28durdhpru:5542: kāryānupalabdhiś ca yatra kāraṇam adṛśyam tatra prayujyate /
GSP28durdhpru:5543: dṛśye tu kāraṇe dṛśyānupalabdhir eva gamikā /
GSP28durdhpru:5544: tatra dhavalagṛhoparisthito[82]gṛhāṅgaṇam apaśyann api caturṣu pārśveṣv aṅgaṇabhittiparyantaṃ paśyati /
GSP28durdhpru:5547: yaddeśasthena vahninā janyamāno dhūmas taddeśaḥ syāt /
GSP28durdhpru:5549: tadgṛhāṅgaṇadeśena ca vahninā janyamāno dhūmas taddeśaḥ syāt /
GSP28durdhpru:5551: tadgṛhāṅgaṇadeśaṃ bhittiparikṣiptaṃ bhittiparyantaparikṣiptena cālokātmanā dhūmaviviktenākāśadeśena saha dharmiṇaṃ karoti /
GSP28durdhpru:5554: iha -- nupalambhaḥ kevalapradeśādir abhāvavyavahārayogyatā ca sādhyā dṛśyānupalambhasya tādātmyalakṣaṇa eva pratibandho gamyagamakabhāvanibandhanam iti keṣāñcin matam /
GSP28durdhpru:5555: kecit tu anupalambhābhāvavyavahārayogyatayor gamyagamakabhāve viparyayatādātmyalakṣaṇaḥ pratibandho nimittam iti pratipadire /
GSP28durdhpru:5560: tathā hi upalabdhyavyabhicārāt tādṛśī anupalabdher eva sattā /
GSP28durdhpru:5561: tata upalabdhilakṣaṇaprāptasattve tadupalambhayos tādātmyād evānupalambhāsadvyavahārayor gamyagamakabhāvaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:5562: yadi tu tadviviktapradeśādyupalambharūpasyānupalambhasya tadasadvyavahārayogyatāyāś ca yat tādātmyaṃ tannimittam ucyeta,
GSP28durdhpru:5563: tadā tasya bhūtalāder anupalabdhilakṣaṇaprāptāsadvyavahārayogyatāpy ātmabhūtaiveti piśācādyabhāvavyavahāram apy anupalambhaḥ sādhayet tatpratibandhād iti //
GSP28durdhpru:5569: etad eva vyatirekamukheṇa draḍhayati na tv iti /
GSP28durdhpru:5572: atha paripūrṇayāpi sāmagryā vidhārakasambhavāt pratibandhaḥ sambhāvyate /
GSP28durdhpru:5580: śabdasya kṣaṇikatve sādhye kaścid eva śabdaḥ pratyakṣo 'nyas tu parokṣas tadvad ihāpi /
GSP28durdhpru:5581: yathā cātra dharmī sādhyapratipattyadhikaraṇabhūto dṛśyādṛśyāvayavo darśitas tadvad uttareṣv api prayogeṣu svayaṃ pratipattavyaḥ //
GSP28durdhpru:5585: viśeṣaṇam ity āha apratibaddheti caśabdas tuśabdasyārthe hetau vā /
GSP28durdhpru:5586: kuta etad ity āha anyeṣām iti /
GSP28durdhpru:5588: m aśakyāni, itarathā tādrūpyam eva hīyeta /
GSP28durdhpru:5589: atas tathāvidhāni kāraṇāni kāryāvyabhicārīṇi kāryeṇa vyāpyante /
GSP28durdhpru:5590: tataḥ kāryaṃ nivartamānaṃ kāraṇāni tādṛśāni nivarttayatīti draṣṭavyam /
GSP28durdhpru:5591: iha yady apy anenāntyakṣaṇenedaṃ kāryaṃ kṛtam iti nāvagataṃ tathāpi vastunaḥ kācid avasthā kāryaṃ kurvato pratītaiva yad anantaraṃ kāryam upalabdham
GSP28durdhpru:5594: nanu kāryasya tāvad dṛśyasyātrānupalambho hetur upādātavyaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:5595: tat kim asya sambhavo 'sti yat kāryam eva dṛśyaṃ na tu kāraṇaṃ yena kāryānupalabdhiḥ prayujyata ity āśaṅkya viṣayam asyā darśayitum āha kāryeti
GSP28durdhpru:5596: ko 'sāv evaṃvidho viṣaya ity āha tatreti vākyopakṣepe /
GSP28durdhpru:5597: yadi punar gṛhāṅgaṇaṃ paśyet dṛśyānupalabdhir eva prayuktā syād ity abhiprāyeṇāha gṛhaṅgaṇam apaśyann apīti /
GSP28durdhpru:5604: atrākāśe kiṃ pratyetavyam ity āha yaddeśeti /
GSP28durdhpru:5605: yadā yaddeśe ceti pāṭhas tadā yo deśo 'syeti vigrahaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:5606: yadā tu yaddeśastheneti tadā yaś cāsau deśaś ca tatra tiṣṭhatīti taddeśastha iti /
GSP28durdhpru:5608: etāvatāpi na jñāyate kas tena pratipattrā dharmī kṛta ity āha tadgṛheti /
GSP28durdhpru:5610: aṅgaṇasya prakṛtatvād bhittiḥ tasyaiva tayā parikṣiptaṃ paricchinnaṃ dharmiṇaṃ karotīti sambandhaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:5613: bhitteś ca prānto vācyas tasyāḥ paryanto 'vasānaṃ niṣṭhā tena parikṣiptaṃ paricchinnaṃ tena /
GSP28durdhpru:5620: pratiṣedhasya vyāpyasya yo vyāpako dharmas tasyānupalabdhir udāhriyate --
GSP28durdhpru:5621: sa tathā / katham evaṃvidho dharmīty āha -- vahnyabhāveti /
GSP28durdhpru:5624: ayam arthaḥ -- lokas tāvat tathāvidhadeśe dhūmam anupalabhamānas tāvati deśe tathābhūtavahnyabhāvaṃ pratyeti /
GSP28durdhpru:5625: na caitad evaṃvidhaṃ dharmiṇam antareṇa ghaṭata iti sāmarthyam anyathānupapattis tasmād āyāta upasthitaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:5627: (PV I 6=8) iti bruvataivaṃ dharmīṣṭa eveti bhāvaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:5633: nanu yadi dṛśyādṛśyasamudāyo dharmī ghaṭate tadā kāryasvabhāvahetvor api kim ayaṃ na sambhavatīty āha -- na kevalam iti /
GSP28durdhpru:5635: api tu kin tv anyatrāpi kāryaviśeṣe svabhāvaviśeṣe ca tatra tatra kāryahetor dhūmavākyād agnipauruṣeyatvād asiddhau tathāvidho dharmī suvyakta iti na tatra darśitas tulyatvā(-nyā)
GSP28durdhpru:5637: kathaṃ hetāv apy evaṃvidhasya dharmiṇaḥ sambhava ity [verb. itth--] āha -- śabdasyeti /
GSP28durdhpru:5638: kaścid eva śrūyamāṇaḥ pratyakṣo 'nyas tv aśrūyamāṇaḥ parokṣaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:5640: dṛśyādṛśyātmanā ca śabdena dharmiṇā bhāvyam iti pratipādyajanasaṃśayāropābhyām āyātam /
GSP28durdhpru:5641: na hi pratipādyaḥ śabdasyānityatve saṃśayāno viparyasyati,
GSP28durdhpru:5647: tatas tadanurodhāt pratyakṣāpratyakṣaśabdasamudāyo 'nityatve sādhye dharmī prasahya patitaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:5649: amum eva nyāyam anyatrāpy atidiśann āha -- yathā ceti /
GSP28durdhpru:5650: co 'vadhāraṇe sādhyapratipattyadhikaraṇabhūta iti viśeṣaṇavyājena dharmiṇo lakṣaṇam uktam /
GSP28durdhpru:5652: yatra yasya kāryam upalabdhilakṣaṇaprāptaṃ nopalabhyate tat tu tajjananāpratibaddhasāmarthyaṃ nāsti /
GSP28durdhpru:5655: anena ca kāryānupalambhapradarśanena yaj jalpitaṃ jalpamahodadhinā niḥśabde deśe
GSP28durdhpru:5656: śabdamātrābhāve sādhye kas tadekajñānasaṃsargivastvantaropalambho yena śabdābhāvavyavahāro
GSP28durdhpru:5657: bauddhānāṃ bhaved iti tat pratyuktaṃ draṣṭavyam /
GSP28durdhpru:5664: vyāpakānupalabdhir yathā na atra śiṃśapā vṛkṣābhāvād iti II-33
GSP28durdhpru:5668: iyam apy anupalabdhir vyāpyasya śiṃśapātvasyādṛśyasyābhāve prayujyate /
GSP28durdhpru:5670: tatra yadā pūrvāparāv upaśliṣṭau deśau bhavataḥ,
GSP28durdhpru:5672: draṣṭāpi tasthān vṛkṣān paśyann api śiṃśapādibhedaṃ yo na vivecayati,
GSP28durdhpru:5673: tasya vṛkṣatvaṃ pratyakṣaṃ apratyakṣaṃ tu śiṃśapatvam /
GSP28durdhpru:5674: sa hi nirvṛkṣa ekaśilāghaṭite vṛkṣābhāvaṃ dṛśyatvād dṛśyānupalambhād avasyati /
GSP28durdhpru:5677: svabhāvaviruddhopalabdhir yathā na atra śītasparśo vahner iti II-34
GSP28durdhpru:5682: iyaṃ cānupalabdhas tatra prayoktavyā yatra śītasparśo dṛśyaḥ,
GSP28durdhpru:5685: tādātmyāviśeṣe 'pi yathā kaścid eva dharmī vyāpya itaro vyāpakaś ca tathā prāg eva dharmottareṇa nirṇītam /
GSP28durdhpru:5687: na śiṃśapeti na śiṃśapātvam ity arthaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:5688: vṛkṣasyeti ca dharmiṇā dharmasya vṛkṣatvasya nirdeśaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:5690: tathā ca śiṃśapātvam api dṛśyam eva niṣedhyam iti dṛśyānupalabdhir eva prayogārhaty āha -- iyam apīti /
GSP28durdhpru:5691: na kevalaṃ pūrvikā viśiṣṭe viṣaye kin tv ayam apīty apiśabdaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:5692: śiṃśapātvasyādṛśyasyeti -- yadi syād dṛśyam eva syād iti sambhāvanām ativṛttasyety arthaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:5693: evam uttaratrāpy adṛśyatvam īdṛśyam eva draṣṭavyam /
GSP28durdhpru:5696: tasmād yatra varṇaviśeṣād vahnir dṛśyaḥ śītasparśo dūrasthatvāt[85]sann apy adṛśyaḥ tatrāsyāḥ prayogaḥ //
GSP28durdhpru:5699: viruddhakāryopalabdhir yathā nātra śītasparśo dhūmād iti II-35
GSP28durdhpru:5700: pratiṣedhyena yad viruddhaṃ tatkāryasyopalabdhir gamikā yatheti /
GSP28durdhpru:5705: ko 'sāv evaṃvidho viṣaya ity āha -- tatreti vākyopanyāse /
GSP28durdhpru:5708: dvitīya ekayā śilayā ghaṭate nimitta ekaśilārūpas tūpa iti yāvat /
GSP28durdhpru:5712: bhavaty evaṃ tathāpi katham asyāḥ prayoga ity āha draṣṭāpīti /
GSP28durdhpru:5713: apir avadhāraṇe na vivecayatīty asyānantaraṃ draṣṭavyam (-vyaḥ) /
GSP28durdhpru:5715: bhavatu draṣṭu[s] tāvad dūradeśasthāyitayā śiṃśapāyāvivekas tathāpi yenaiva vṛkṣābhāvaṃ pratipadyate tenaiva śiṃśapābhāvam api kiṃ na pratipadyata ity āha sa hīti /
GSP28durdhpru:5717: kathaṃ dṛśyānupalambhād avasyatīty āha dṛśyatvād vṛkṣatvasyeti prakaraṇāt /
GSP28durdhpru:5718: kutas tarhi śiṃśapātvābhāvam avaitīty āha śiṃśapeti /
GSP28durdhpru:5723: prayogaḥ punar īdṛśaḥ kāryaḥ yatra yasya vyāpakaṃ nāsti na tat tatrāsti /
GSP28durdhpru:5725: nāsti ca vṛkṣatvaṃ śiṃśapātvasya vyāpakam iti /
GSP28durdhpru:5726: anena vyāpakānupalambhasya vyāpyābhāve gamakatvapratipādanena nityānām arthakriyākāritvābhāvaḥ kramayaugapadyayo vyāpakayor abhāvād ityādi darśitaṃ draṣṭavyam //
GSP28durdhpru:5727: pratiṣedhyetyādinā svabhāvaviruddhopalabdhiṃ vyācaṣṭe mūle tūdāhriyata ity adhyāhāra iti darśayann āha udāhriyata iti /
GSP28durdhpru:5728: sukhapratipattyarthaṃ maulaṃ dharmyādipravibhāgaṃ darśayann āha atreti /
GSP28durdhpru:5730: vikalpasya vikalpāntareṇa sahāsthitilakṣaṇasya virodhasya svasantāne siddhatvāt /
GSP28durdhpru:5734: tathā ca karmaṇā siddhasādhanatvam īśvarasādhanānāṃ kāryatvādīnām ityādi darśitam //
GSP28durdhpru:5736: mūlagamikā vivakṣitābhāvapratipādaketi vivakṣitam iti darśayitum āha gamiketi /
GSP28durdhpru:5740: yatra viruddho vahniḥ pratyakṣaḥ tatra viruddhopalabdhir gamikā[86]/
GSP28durdhpru:5742: tatra[88]samastāpavarakasthaṃ śītaṃ nivartayituṃ samarthasyāgner anumāpakaṃ yadā
GSP28durdhpru:5743: viśiṣṭaṃ dhūmakalāpaṃ niryāntam apavarakāt paśyati tadā viśiṣṭād vahner anumitāt
GSP28durdhpru:5745: iha dṛśyamānadvārapradeśasahitaḥ sarvo 'pavarakābhyantaradeśo[90]dharmī sādhyapratipatty anusaraṇāt pūrvavad draṣṭavya iti[91]//
GSP28durdhpru:5753: viruddhavyāptopalabdhir yathā na dhruvabhāvī bhūtasyāpi bhāvasya vināśaḥ hetvantarāpekṣaṇād iti[92]II-36
GSP28durdhpru:5756: pratiṣedhyasya yad viruddhaṃ tena vyāptasya dharmāntarasya upalabdhir udāhartavyā /
GSP28durdhpru:5767: kaḥ punar īdṛśo viṣaya ity āha -- tatreti /
GSP28durdhpru:5770: tat katham iyaṃ gamikety āha samasteti /
GSP28durdhpru:5773: anyatra ca gamyamāno dhūmaḥ katham anyatra śītābhāvaṃ sādhayatīty āha iheti /
GSP28durdhpru:5775: dṛśyamānaś cāsau dvāradeśaś ca tena sahitaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:5777: sādhyasya śītasparśābhāvasya pratipattir avabodhas tasya pratipatter anusaraṇaṃ nirūpaṇaṃ tasmāt /
GSP28durdhpru:5778: pūrvavad iti yathāpūrvaṃ kāryānupalambhe vahnyādyabhāvapratītisāmarthyāyātas tādṛśo dharmī tadvat /
GSP28durdhpru:5779: ayam asya bhāvaḥ śītasparśābhāvapratītir eveyaṃ vimṛśyamāṇāvaśyam evaṃvidhadharmiṇam ākarṣatīti /
GSP28durdhpru:5780: prayogaḥ punar asyā evaṃ karttavyaḥ yatra dhūmaviśeṣas tatra śītasparśābhāvaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:5783: etac cātyantābhyāsāj jhagiti dhūmadarśanāc chītasparśābhāvapratītyudaye viruddhakāryopalambhajam ekam anumānam ācāryeṇoktam iti draṣṭavyam /
GSP28durdhpru:5787: bhūtasya jātasyāpi vinaśvaraḥ svabhāvo nāvaśyaṃbhāvī kim utājātasyeti apiśabdārthaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:5791: hetvantarāpekṣaṇaṃ nāmādhruvabhāvitvena[98]vyāptaṃ yathā vāsasi rāgasya rañjanādihetvantarāpekṣaṇam adhruvabhāvitvena vyāptam[99]/
GSP28durdhpru:5803: tathā[101]ca sati parasparaparihāravator dvayor yadaikaṃ dṛśyate tatra dvitīyasya tādātmyaniṣedhaḥ kāryaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:5805: yata evaṃ[103]tādātmyaniṣedhaḥ kriyate yady ayaṃ dṛśyamāno nityo bhavenn ity arūpa dṛśyeta /
GSP28durdhpru:5808: evaṃ ca pratiṣedhyasya nityatvasya dṛśyamānātmakatvam[104]abhyupagamya pratiṣedhaḥ kṛto bhavati /
GSP28durdhpru:5813: svabhāvānupalabdhirūpā cābhyupetā pūrvācāryair ity āha -- ṭi-
GSP28durdhpru:5817: [105] atha na vastv ekatvavirodho 'nayoḥ paraṃ yo viṣedho dhruvabhāvitvasya vidhīyate sa /
GSP28durdhpru:5818: yady ayā (?) dṛśyatve sati pūrvānupalabdhiṣv iva bhavet tadā nāsyānupalabdheḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:5820: piśācādīnāṃ tu satāṃ kathaṃ niṣedha ity āha -- ṭi-
GSP28durdhpru:5824: tathā hi yatra dhūmas tatra sarvatra vahnir yathā yaskārakuṭyāṃ dhūmaś cātreti kāryaliṅgajam ekam atra niyataprāgbhāvi,
GSP28durdhpru:5825: tadanu yatra vahnir na tatra śītasparśo yathā rasavatīpradeśe vahniś cātreti viruddhopalambhajaṃ dvitīyam iti //
GSP28durdhpru:5828: kim uteti nipātasamudāyaḥ kim punar ity asyārthe varttate /
GSP28durdhpru:5829: nanu kim ajātasyāpi vastuno nāśam avaśyaṃ bhāvinaṃ kecid icchanti yenāpiśabdaḥ samuccayo vyākhyāta iti ?
GSP28durdhpru:5831: ajātasya tāvad aniṣṭatvād eva nāvaśyambhāvī vināśaḥ,
GSP28durdhpru:5833: kevalaṃ kim utājātasyeti vyācakṣāṇena dharmottareṇāyam artho na vyaktīkṛtaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:5834: tatrāpi kim punar ajātasya yasya vināśa eva neṣṭa ity abhiprāyeṇa
GSP28durdhpru:5837: yady ayaṃ ghaṭo[109]dṛśyamānaḥ piśācātmā bhavet piśāco dṛṣṭo bhavet /
GSP28durdhpru:5840: dṛśyātmatvābhyupagamapūrvako dṛśyamāne ghaṭādau vastuni[110]vastuno 'vastuno vā dṛśyasyādṛśyasya ca tātātmyapratiṣedhaḥ[111]/
GSP28durdhpru:5841: tathā ca sati yathā ghaṭasya dṛśyatvam abhyupagamya pratiṣedho dṛśyānupalambhād eva tadvat sarvasya parasparaparihāravato 'nyatra dṛśyamāne niṣedho dṛśyānupalambhād eva /
GSP28durdhpru:5848: yojanīyaḥ / yadvā prāgabhāvasyānāder ajātasyāpi nāśam avaśyambhāvinaṃ kecid icchantīti tadapekṣayā apiśabdaḥ samuccaye /
GSP28durdhpru:5851: prayogaḥ punar īdṛśaḥ karttavyaḥ yadyadavasthāprāptau hetvantaram apekṣate na tad avaśyaṃ tadrūpaṃ bhavati /
GSP28durdhpru:5852: yathā vastraṃ raktarūpatāpattau rāgadravyasaṃyogāpekṣaṃ nāvaśyaṃ raktaṃ bhavati /
GSP28durdhpru:5853: apekṣate ca bhāvo vinaṃṣṭuṃ hetvantaram iti viruddhavyāptopalabdhiprasaṅga eṣaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:5855: svatantrasādhanaṃ tu viruddhavyāptopalambhākhyam evaṃ draṣṭavyam -- yo viruddhadharmasaṃsargavān nāsāv eko yathā dravakaṭhine /
GSP28durdhpru:5858: kiñ cāsya virodhasya sādhakaṃ pramāṇam ity āśaṅkām apakārttum āha iheti /
GSP28durdhpru:5861: yac ca pūrvaṃ dhruvabhāvitvaśabdaṃ vivṛṇvatānena dhruvam avaśyaṃ bhavatīti vivṛtaṃ tac ca vyāhanyeta /
GSP28durdhpru:5862: samprati virodham upapādayati nityānityayor iti / co hetau /
GSP28durdhpru:5863: idānīṃ parasparaparihārasthitalakṣaṇavirodhavyavasthāpakaṃ dṛśyānupalambhaṃ darśayitum āha tathā ceti /
GSP28durdhpru:5864: kathaṃ dṛśyatayābhyupa[ga]tasya niṣedha ity āha yata iti /
GSP28durdhpru:5867: na ca naivaṃ nityarūpavaśyambhāvisvarūpo dṛśyate pratīyate /
GSP28durdhpru:5868: yady apy evaṃ tathāpi dṛśyātmakābhyupagama ity āha evam iti /
GSP28durdhpru:5870: evam anantaroktena krameṇa dṛśyamānasyādṛśyenāvastunānyonyaparihārasthitalakṣaṇavirodhavyavasthāyāṃ tāvad evaṃ dṛśyānupalambha upāyaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:5871: vastunāpy adṛśyena tathātvavyavasthāyām evopāya iti darśayituṃ vastuno 'pītyādinopakramate /
GSP28durdhpru:5876: kāryaviruddhopalabdhir yathā nehāpratibaddhasāmarthyāni śītakāraṇāni santi vahner[112]iti II-37
GSP28durdhpru:5879: pratiṣedhyasya yat kāryaṃ tasya yadivruddhaṃ tasyopalabdher udāharaṇam yatheti /
GSP28durdhpru:5881: apratibaddhaṃ sāmarthyaṃ yeṣāṃ śītakāraṇānāṃ śītajananaṃ prati tāni na santīti[113]sādhyam /
GSP28durdhpru:5885: yatra śītakāraṇāni adṛśyāni śītasparśo 'py adṛśyaḥ tatrāyaṃ hetuḥ prayoktavyaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:5886: dṛśyatve tu śītasparśasya tatkāraṇānāṃ vā kāryānupalabdhir dṛśyānupalabdhir vā gamikā /
GSP28durdhpru:5888: tato yasmin uddeśe[114]sad api śītakaraṇam adṛśyam śītasparśaś ca dūrasthatvāt pratipattur vahnirbhāsvaravarṇatvād dūrād api dṛśyas tatrāyaṃ prayoga iti[115]//
GSP28durdhpru:5893: anye tu avastuno 'dṛśyatvasya siddhatvāt kiṃ tadanuvādena kāryam ?
GSP28durdhpru:5894: tato dvayam apy etad vastvapekṣayā yojyaṃ /
GSP28durdhpru:5897: prakṛtaṃ ca tad eva iti pratipannāḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:5898: bhavaty evaṃ tataḥ kiṃ siddham ity āha -- tathā ca satīti /
GSP28durdhpru:5901: nanu bhavatu dṛśyānupalambhād dṛśyāmāneṅgulyādau sarvasya sumervādes tādātmyaniṣedhas
GSP28durdhpru:5902: tathāpy uktāsvanupalabdhiṣu kutrāyam antarbhavatīty āśaṅkām apakārttum upasaṃhāravyājenātideśam apy āha evam iti /
GSP28durdhpru:5906: atha yadi dṛśyānupalambhād anyatrānyasya dṛśyasyādṛśyasya vā tādātmyaniṣedhaḥ kathaṃ viruddhe(-ddha)
GSP28durdhpru:5910: tadavagatavirodhena tu vyāptaṃ yatra dṛśyate viruddhavyāptopalambhād eva vivakṣitābhāvapratītir iti kim avadyaṃ //
GSP28durdhpru:5913: vahner iti śītanivarttanakṣamād viśiṣṭād iti draṣṭavyaṃ /
GSP28durdhpru:5917: vyāpakaviruddhopalabdhir yathā nātra tuṣārasparśo vahner[116]iti II-38
GSP28durdhpru:5920: pratiṣedhyasya yad vyāpakaṃ tena yad viruddhaṃ tasyopalabdhir udāhartavyā yatheti /
GSP28durdhpru:5924: yatra vyāpyas tuṣārasparśo[118]vyāpakaś ca[119]śītasparśo na dṛśyas tatrāyaṃ hetuḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:5925: tayor dṛśyatve svabhāvasya vyāpakasya cānupalabdhir yataḥ prayoktavyā /
GSP28durdhpru:5927: dūravartinaś ca pratipattus tuṣārasparśaḥ śītasparśaviśeṣaḥ śītamātraṃ ca[121]parokṣam /
GSP28durdhpru:5931: śītaviśeṣasya śītasāmānyena vyāptatvād iti viśiṣṭaviṣaye[122]'syāḥ prayogaḥ //
GSP28durdhpru:5939: kāraṇānupalabdhir yathā nātra dhūmo vahnyabhāvād[123]iti II-39
GSP28durdhpru:5942: pratiṣedhyasya yat kāraṇaṃ tasyānupalabdher udāharaṇaṃ yatheti /
GSP28durdhpru:5944: kīdṛśi viṣaye 'syāḥ prayoga ity āha yatreti /
GSP28durdhpru:5948: kathaṃ punaḥ śītasparśaśītakāraṇe 'dṛśye vahnis tu dṛśyaḥ sambhavati yenāsyāḥ prayogo ghaṭata ity āha yasminn iti /
GSP28durdhpru:5949: uddeśe pradeśe pratipattur dūrasthatvād iti śītasparśaśītakāraṇayor adṛśyatve kāraṇaṃ /
GSP28durdhpru:5951: bhāsvaro bhāsanaśīlo varṇo yasya tadbhāvas tasmāt /
GSP28durdhpru:5954: prayogaḥ punar evaṃ kāryaḥ yatra viśiṣṭo vahnir na tatra śītopajananāpratibaddhaśaktīni śītakāraṇāni /
GSP28durdhpru:5957: etac cābhyāsāj jhagiti vahnidarśanena tathābhūtaśītakāraṇābhāvapratītijanmany ekaṃ kāryaviruddhopalambhajam anumānam uktam ācāryeṇeti draṣṭavyaṃ
GSP28durdhpru:5958: anyathā tu viruddhopalambhakāryānupalambhaje dve ete anumāne /
GSP28durdhpru:5959: tathā hi yatra vahnir na tatra śītasparśa iti svabhāvaviruddhopalambhajam ekam anumānaṃ /
GSP28durdhpru:5960: yatra ca yatkāryaṃ nāsti na tatra tatkāraṇaṃ tajjananāpratibaddhasāmarthyam astīti kāryānupalambhajaṃ dvitīyam iti //
GSP28durdhpru:5964: yatra kāryaṃ sad api adṛśyaṃ[124]bhavati tatrāyaṃ prayogaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:5967: niṣkampāyatasalilapūrite hrade hemantocitabāṣpayodgame virale sandhyātamasi sati sann api tatra dhūmo na dṛśyata iti kāraṇānupalabdhyā pratiṣedhyate[126]/
GSP28durdhpru:5968: vahnis tu yadi tasyāsambhava upari plavamāno bhavet prajvalito[127]rūpaviśeṣād evopalabdho bhavet /
GSP28durdhpru:5970: tatrāpi dahanādhikaraṇam indhanaṃ pratyakṣam iti svarūpeṇa ādhārarūpeṇa vā dṛśya[128]eva vahnir iti tatrāsya[129]prayoga iti[130]/
GSP28durdhpru:5975: [127] bhavej jvalito rūpa- -- APHEN.[bhavej jvalitarūpa- -- E.
GSP28durdhpru:5983: kathaṃ tayor adṛśyatvaṃ vahneś ca dṛśyatvaṃ kathaṃ ca na śītasparśa eva tuṣārasparśa ity āśaṅkātritayam apākurvann āha dūreti /
GSP28durdhpru:5990: eṣa ca vāstavo nivṛttikramaḥ parāmarśadaśāyāṃ darśito na tu tatprayogakālikaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:5991: tathātve hi naikam anumānam idaṃ syāt /
GSP28durdhpru:5995: etena yad yatra niyatasahopalambhaṃ tat tato na bhidyate /
GSP28durdhpru:5999: nanu dvayor api tulyasvajñānajananayogyatārūpatvāt tulyadṛśyatvam iti katham asyāḥ prayoga ity āśaṅkya viṣayam asyā darśayituṃ yatretyādinopakramate
GSP28durdhpru:6000: nanu manomodakopayogymātram etat na punar īdṛśo viṣayo 'sti yatrāgnir eva dṛśyo na dhūma iti kathaṃ pūrvoktātikrama ity āha niṣkampeti /
GSP28durdhpru:6002: nirgataḥ kampaś calanaṃ yasmāt sa tathā sa cāsāv āyato mahān iti tathā /
GSP28durdhpru:6003: sa cāsau salilapūritaś cety evaṃ vigrahaḥ kāryaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:6004: āyatagrahaṇena hradasya mahattvād vāṣpe bhūyas tv amata eva dhūmasya tato bhedenānupalakṣaṇam iti darśayati /
GSP28durdhpru:6011: pratiṣedhyasya yat kāraṇaṃ tasya yad viruddhaṃ tasyopalabdher udāharaṇaṃ yatheti /
GSP28durdhpru:6015: te viśiṣyante[131]tad anyebhyo bhayaśraddhādikṛtebhya iti romaharṣādiviśeṣāḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:6017: dahana eva viśiṣyate tadanyasmād[132]dahanāc chītanivartanasāmarthyeneti dahanaviśeṣaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:6018: kaścid dahanaḥ sann api na śītanivartanakṣamo yathā pradīpaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:6022: yatra śītasparśaḥ sann apy adṛśyo dahanaviśeṣo yasya sa tathoktaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:6024: yatra śītasparśaḥ sann apy adṛśyo romaharṣādiviśeṣāś cādṛśyāḥ,
GSP28durdhpru:6034: tathā tasyodgama ūrdhvaṃ gamanaṃ yasmin yasmād vā sa tathā /
GSP28durdhpru:6035: kālaviśeṣe 'py asyāḥ prayoga iti darśayati virale /
GSP28durdhpru:6036: sandhyākālocitaṃ tamaḥ sandhyātamaḥ tasmin virale mandapracāre /
GSP28durdhpru:6037: kutra ? hrade tathāvidhe ca tamasi sati /
GSP28durdhpru:6039: vahner api tatreyaṃ gatir bhaviṣyatīty āha -- vahnis tv iti /
GSP28durdhpru:6041: ambhasa iti ṣaṣṭhī punaḥ ṣaṣṭy atas arthetyādinā (Pāṇini 2.3.30)
GSP28durdhpru:6052: tamisrāyām eva tu rātrau nirādhārake pradeśe kāraṇānupalabdheḥ prayogaḥ sukaraḥ tatra vahner dṛśyatvād dhūmasya sato 'py adṛśyatvāt /
GSP28durdhpru:6053: anena punar evaṃvidhaṃ viṣayaṃ parityajyānyaṃ viṣayam upapādayatā kim ity ātmāyāsati iti na pratīmaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:6054: evaṃ tu prayogaḥ kāryaḥ -- yatra yasya kāraṇaṃ nāsti na tat tatrāsti /
GSP28durdhpru:6056: nāsti cātra dhūmasya kāraṇaṃ vahnir iti /
GSP28durdhpru:6057: etena yatra yatra vijñānasya kāraṇaṃ vijñānaṃ nāsti na tatra vijñānam upapadyate /
GSP28durdhpru:6059: nāsti ca prāgbhavīyaṃ vijñānaṃ kalalāvasthāyām iti kāraṇānupalabdhiprasaṅgaḥ sucitas tulyanyāyārthaḥ //
GSP28durdhpru:6069: teṣāṃ kāraṇairuddhopalambdhyā 'bhāvaṃ[133] pratipadyata iti tatrāsya prayoga[134] iti //
GSP28durdhpru:6071: [133] bhāvaḥ prati -- PHEN. bhāva prati -- A.
GSP28durdhpru:6073: kāraṇaviruddhakāryopalandhar yathā -- na rosasarṣādiviśeṣayuktapuruṣavānayaṃ pradeśaḥ, dhūmāditi II-41
GSP28durdhpru:6074: pratiṣedhyasya yat kāraṇaṃ tasya yad viruddhaṃ tasya yata kāryaṃ tasyopapabdhir udārarttavyā -- yatheti ayaṃ pradeśa iti[135]dharmī /
GSP28durdhpru:6085: kiṃ śītanivarttanākṣamo 'py asti dahano yena tato viśiṣyata ity āha -- kaścid iti /
GSP28durdhpru:6086: sannihito dahanaviśeṣo yasyeti vigrḥṇan sannihitaś cāsau dahanaviśeṣaś ceti yad anyena vyākhyatuṃ tadapahastayati /
GSP28durdhpru:6087: tadā hi vyadhikaraṇāsiddho hetuḥ syād iti /
GSP28durdhpru:6088: kva punar asyāḥ prayoga ity āha -- yatreti /
GSP28durdhpru:6089: nanu śītasparśaromaharṣaviśeṣāṇām adṛśyatve kathaṃ vahner dṛśyatvam ity āha -- rūpeti /
GSP28durdhpru:6093: eṣa tu prayogo 'bhidhānīyaḥ -- yatra yatkāraṇaviruddham asti na tat tatrāsti /
GSP28durdhpru:6094: yathā śleṣmaviruddhe pitte na ślaiṣmiko vyādhiḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:6096: etad apy atyantābhyāsāñ jhag iti sannihitadahanaviśeṣatvāvagamamātre romaharṣādiviśeṣābhāvapratītyudaye saty ekam ācāryeṇoktaṃ /
GSP28durdhpru:6098: anyathā tu viruddhopalambhakāraṇānupalambhasambhave dve ime anumāne /
GSP28durdhpru:6099: tathā hi -- yatra vahnir na tatra śītasparśa iti viruddhopalambhajam ekam anumānaṃ /
GSP28durdhpru:6100: yatra śītasparśābhāvo na tatra tatkāryaromaharṣādīti kāraṇānupalambhajaṃ dvitīyam iti //
GSP28durdhpru:6103: romaharṣādiviśeṣair yuktaś cāsau puruṣaś ceti karmadhārayaṃ kṛtvā sa vidyate yatra sa tadvān iti śāntabhadrena vyākhyātaṃ /
GSP28durdhpru:6105: yataḥ karmadhārayamattvarthīyād bahuvrīhir eva lāghavena iti vacanād romaharṣādiviśeṣayuktaḥ
GSP28durdhpru:6106: puruṣo yatrety evaṃ viśiṣṭe pradeśe 'vagate kiṃ matvarthīyeneti manyamāno mahāvaiyākaraṇo
GSP28durdhpru:6107: yaṃ dharmottaraḥ prāha -- yogo yuktam iti bhāve niṣṭhā /
GSP28durdhpru:6118: dhūmas tu yādṛśas taddeśe[142]sthitaṃ śītaṃ nivartayituṃ samarthasya vahner anumāpakaḥ sa iha grāhyaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:6120: nāpi romaharṣādiviśeṣanivṛttir[144]avasātuṃ śakyeti na dhūmamātraṃ[145]hetur iti draṣṭavyam iti//
GSP28durdhpru:6131: yasmin valmīke lohitaḥ śālir yasmin grāme gauraḥ kharo yasmin naraṇya iti bahuvrīhiṇā bhavitavyaṃ /
GSP28durdhpru:6132: tataś ca kṛṣṇasarpavān valmīko lohitaśālimān grāmo gaurakharavad araṇyam iti na syāt /
GSP28durdhpru:6133: sādhavaś cāmī prayogas tat katham anenaivaṃ vyākhyātam iti cet /
GSP28durdhpru:6135: yasmāt karmadhārayamatvarthīyād bahuvrīhir lāghavena itīdaṃ vacanaṃ saṃjñāśabdaṃ varjayitvā veditavyaṃ /
GSP28durdhpru:6136: saṃjñāśabdāś caite kṛṣṇasarpalohitaśāligaurakharaśabdā iti sādhūktaṃ yogo yuktam iti /
GSP28durdhpru:6139: sambandhīty anena sambandhaṣaṣṭhīyaṃ samasyata iti darśayati /
GSP28durdhpru:6141: tato vyavacchedakaḥ san puruṣaṃ svasambandhinam upapādayati /
GSP28durdhpru:6142: kadāyaṃ prayogo draṣṭavya ity āha -- trayāṇām iti vahniśītasparśaromaharṣādiviśeṣāṇāṃ /
GSP28durdhpru:6148: kva punas trayāṇām apratyakṣatvaṃ dhūmasya tu pratyakṣatvam ity āha -- tatreti vākyopekṣepe /
GSP28durdhpru:6149: vidyamānā py apratyakṣā yady abhaviṣyan niyatam upālapsyanteti sambhāvanām ativṛttāḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:6151: tato 'yam arthaḥ -- dūrasthatvāt pratipattus te santo 'py apratyakṣā iti /
GSP28durdhpru:6153: etat kāraṇaviruddhakāryarūpaṃ sādhanaṃ pramāṇam ity anumānākhyapramāṇajanakavāt /
GSP28durdhpru:6154: adūrasthatve tu pratipattuḥ prākārādivyavahitoddeśe 'yaṃ prayogo draṣṭavyaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:6155: dhūmaśabdena viśiṣṭo dhūmo vivakṣita iti darśayati -- dhūmas tv iti /
GSP28durdhpru:6157: etad eva vyatirekamukheṇa draḍhayann āha -- dhūmamātreṇeti /
GSP28durdhpru:6162: yady ekaḥ pratiṣedhahetur uktath katham ekādaśā 'bhāvahetava ity āha
GSP28durdhpru:6163: ime sarva kāryānupalabdhyādayo daśānupalabdhiprayogāḥ svabhāvānupalabdhau saṅgraham upayānti II- 42
GSP28durdhpru:6167: tatra kiyatām api grahaṇe prasakta āha -- kāryānupalabdhyādaya iti /
GSP28durdhpru:6168: kāryānupalabdhyādīnām api trayāṇāṃ caturṇāṃ vā grahaṇe prasakta āha[147]-- daśeti /
GSP28durdhpru:6169: tatra[148]daśānām apy udāhṛtamātrāṇāṃ grahaṇaprasaṅge saty āha[149]-- sarva iti /
GSP28durdhpru:6170: etad uktaṃ bhavati aprayuktā[150]api prayuktodāharaṇasadṛśāś ca sarva eveti /
GSP28durdhpru:6171: daśagrahaṇam antareṇa sarvagrahaṇa kriyamāṇe prayuktodāharaṇakārtsnyaṃ gamyeta[151]/
GSP28durdhpru:6174: [146] ime sarve ityādi om. -- HN. ima ityādi -- ABDEP.
GSP28durdhpru:6185: prayogaḥ punar īdṛśo vācyaḥ -- yatra yatkāraṇaviruddhakāryam asti tatra tan nāsti /
GSP28durdhpru:6188: etad apy atyantābhyāsāñ jhag iti dhūmadarśanena romaharṣādiyuktapuruṣavattvābhāvapratītyudaye sati kāraṇaviruddhakāryopalabdhijam ekam anumānam uktam ācāryeṇeti draṣṭavyaṃ /
GSP28durdhpru:6190: tathā hi -- tadeyaṃ paripāṭiḥ -- yatra dhūmas tatrāgnir iti kāryahetujam ekam anumānaṃ /
GSP28durdhpru:6191: yatra vahnir na tatra śītasparśa iti viruddhopalambhajaṃ dvitīyaṃ /
GSP28durdhpru:6192: yatra śītasparśābhāvo na tatra tatkāryaromaharṣādiviśeṣayuktapuruṣabhāva iti kāraṇānupalambhajaṃ tṛtīyam iti /
GSP28durdhpru:6193: ete ca prakārā anupalabdher upalakṣaṇaṃ veditavyāḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:6195: tathā hi vyāpakaviruddhakāryopalabdhir apy asti -- yathātra tuṣārasparśo dhūmād iti /
GSP28durdhpru:6196: kāryaviruddhakāryopalabdhir apy asti -- yathā nāyaṃ nityaḥ kadācitkāryakāritvād iti /
GSP28durdhpru:6200: āsāñ ca yathāsvaṃ yathāyogaṃ prayogāḥ svayam ūhyāḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:6218: kecit tu nehāpratibaddhasāmarthyāni vahnikāraṇāni santi tuṣārasparśād iti kāryaviruddhavyāptopalabdhim icchanti /
GSP28durdhpru:6219: nātra dhūmas tuṣārasparśād iti kāraṇaviruddhavyāptopalabdhim apīti //
GSP28durdhpru:6220: sā ca prayogabhedād ekādaśa prakāreti yad uktaṃ tadasahamānaś codayati yadīti /
GSP28durdhpru:6221: atra [NB II 17, editor] dvau vastusādhanāv ekaḥ pratiṣedhahetur ity anenaikaḥ pratiṣedhahetur ukta iti codayitur āśayaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:6227: anena dravyakārtsnyavṛttaḥ sarvaśabdo gṛhīta iti darśitaṃ /
GSP28durdhpru:6228: tarhi sarvagrahaṇam evāstu kiṃ daśagrahaṇenety āha -- daśeti /
GSP28durdhpru:6230: yo 'tra yoddhāraḥ ityādau sarvaśabdasyopadarśitakārtsnyavṛtasya darśanād uktaṃ /
GSP28durdhpru:6231: yady evaṃ daśagrahaṇe 'py evaṃ kiṃ na syād ity āha -- daśagrahaṇād iti /
GSP28durdhpru:6233: atiricyamānam adhikībhavad gatārthaṃ sad iti yāvat upadarśitatulyāv abodhāya sampadyate /
GSP28durdhpru:6234: syād etat -- ime sarve daśānupalabdhiprayogā ity etāvataiva kriyatāṃ grahaṇaprasaṅgo
GSP28durdhpru:6235: nirākṛta eveti kathaṃ kāryānupalabdhyādigrahaṇam ācāryasya nātiricyate kathaṃ ca
GSP28durdhpru:6236: dharmottarasyaiṣā tātparyārthavyākhyā -- tatkiyatām api prasakta āhety aparyālocitavyākhyānaṃ
GSP28durdhpru:6240: abhimatatvād ādyāṅ kāryānupalabdhyādiprayogān vihāya daśasaṃkhyāpūraṇaṃ kṛtaṃ bhavaty
GSP28durdhpru:6243: na tarhi daśagrahaṇaṃ karttavyam iti cet /
GSP28durdhpru:6247: yadi prayogāntareṣv arthāntaravidhipratiṣedhau kathaṃ tarhi[159]antarbhavanti ity āha pāramparyeṇeti praṇālikayety arthaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:6248: etad uktaṃ bhavati na sākṣād ete prayogā dṛśyānupalabdhim abhidadhati dṛśyānupalabdhyavyabhicāriṇaṃ tv arthāntarasya vidhiṃ niṣedhaṃ vā 'bhidadhati
GSP28durdhpru:6249: tataḥ praṇālikayāmīṣāṃ svabhāvānupalabdhau saṅgraho na sākṣād iti //
GSP28durdhpru:6250: yadi prayogabhedād eṣa bhedaḥ[160]parārthānumāne vaktavya eṣaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:6258: prayogadarśanābhyāsāt svayam apy evaṃ vyavacchedapratītir bhavatīti svārthe 'py anumāne 'syāḥ prayoganirdeśaḥ[162] II-44
GSP28durdhpru:6260: [162] vyavacchedapratītir iti svārthānumāne 'py asyāḥ prabhedanirdeśaḥ -- C.
GSP28durdhpru:6267: vyavacchedasya pratiṣedhasya pratītir bhavatīti[165]itiśabdas tasmād arthe /
GSP28durdhpru:6274: kathaṃ saṅgraham antarbhāvaṃ gacchantīty āha -- tādātmyeneti /
GSP28durdhpru:6275: tasyāḥ svabhāvānupalabdher ātmā tadātmā tasya bhāvas tena svabhāvānupalabdhitvena /
GSP28durdhpru:6276: anupalabdhisvabhāvā ity arthaḥ -- itīdaṃ spaṣṭīkaraṇam api svabhāvānupalabdhismārakatvena tatsvabhāvā iti draṣṭavyaṃ //
GSP28durdhpru:6277: ...r eva kiṃ na śabdākhyā yata iti cet na -- paramparyagrahaṇavyāghātaprasaṅgāt,
GSP28durdhpru:6282: arthāntaravidhipratiṣedhābhyām iti mūle kāraṇatṛtīyād vivacanāntam etad iti darśayann āha -- arthāntareti /
GSP28durdhpru:6289: nanu yady amīṣāṃ dṛśyānupalabdhāv antarbhāvas tadā sākṣāt tadabhidhānaṃ tathātve ca kathaṃ pāramparyeṇety āśaṅkyāha -- etad uktaṃ bhavati /
GSP28durdhpru:6290: yadi nābhidadhati tadā -- na sākṣād iti na karttavyaṃ /
GSP28durdhpru:6292: tad ayam arthaḥ yasmāt svayam apy evam anenopāyena[166]pratipadyate prayogābhyāsāt tasmāt svapratipattāv apy upayujyamānasyāsya prayogabhedasya svārthānumāne nirdeśaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:6293: [167]yat punaḥ parapratipattāv evopayujyate tat parārthānumāna eva vaktavyam iti //
GSP28durdhpru:6297: saṅgrahaś ca katham ity āha -- dṛśyeti /
GSP28durdhpru:6306: kasmāt tatra vācya ity āha śabdeti /
GSP28durdhpru:6309: yady apy evaṃ tathāpi kathaṃ tatra vaktavya ity āha -- śabdaś ceti /
GSP28durdhpru:6311: śāstraparipaṭhitānām iti śāstraparipaṭhitaddvāreṇa parijñātānāṃ svabhāvādyanupalabdhyādivācakānāṃ vākyānām iti draṣṭavyaṃ /
GSP28durdhpru:6317: mūle svayaṃśabda ātmana iti ṣaṣṭyarthe varttamāno gṛhīta ity āśayenāha -- pratipattur ātmana iti /
GSP28durdhpru:6318: svārthānumānaprastāvāt pratipattṛśabdena yas trirūpeṇa liṅgena parokṣam arthaṃ pratipadyate sa gṛhyate /
GSP28durdhpru:6319: apiśabdāt paro 'pi tasmāt pratipadyata iti sambandhanīyaṃ /
GSP28durdhpru:6320: mūle tu na kevalaṃ parasyeti yojanīyaṃ /
GSP28durdhpru:6322: yata itiśabdas tasmādarthe tatas tasmād ayaṃ vakṣamāṇo 'rthaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:6323: tasmāc chabdena yasmāc chabdasyānvayād yasmād ity uktaṃ /
GSP28durdhpru:6324: anena svabhāvānupalabdhyādiprayogalakṣaṇenopāyena pratipadyata ity āśaṅkya pūrvam eva smarayati prayogābhyāsād iti /
GSP28durdhpru:6325: syān matam -- na svayam uccaritaḥ śabdas tatpratipatter nimittaṃ /
GSP28durdhpru:6328: tat kathaṃ piṣṭapeṣaṇakārī śabda upāyatvenocyata iti naitad asti /
GSP28durdhpru:6329: yato liṅgadarśanenānyato vā nimittāt prabuddhavāsano mandapracārārthasmaraṇo 'tyanrābhyastaprayogas
GSP28durdhpru:6330: tathāvidhaprayogam uccāryaivaṃ tattvam avagāhamānas tadarthaṃ pratipadyate -- yathā
GSP28durdhpru:6331: kaścid abhyāsāt sati dharmiṇi dharmāṇāṃ loke cintā pravarttata ity uccāryaivāsyārthaṃ pratipadyate,
GSP28durdhpru:6332: tadvat trirūpākhyānaṃ vākyam uccāryaiva kaścid abhyastaprayogaḥ parokṣam arthaṃ pratipadyate /
GSP28durdhpru:6337: kā kṣatiḥ ? svapratipattiprayojanaṃ satvsārthānumānaṃ tadaiva ca tenānyaḥ pratipadyata iti parapratipattiprayojanaṃ sat parārthānumānaṃ /
GSP28durdhpru:6338: ata evam aśabde 'pi kaścin niyato 'stīty avācāmeti /
GSP28durdhpru:6340: nanu ca kāryānupalabdhyādiṣu kāraṇādinām adṛśyānām eva niṣedhaḥ[168]dṛśyaniṣedhe svabhāvānupalabdhiprayogaprasaṅgāt[169]/
GSP28durdhpru:6342: tat katham eṣāṃ prayogāṇāṃ dṛśyānupalabdhāv antarbhāva ity āha --
GSP28durdhpru:6348: kāraṇādīnām anupalabdhyā ca pratiṣedha uktas teṣām upalabdhilakṣaṇaprāptānām evopalabdhir
GSP28durdhpru:6359: yasmāt sarvatrānupalabdhau[175]yeṣāṃ pratiṣedha uktas teṣām upalabdhilakṣaṇaprāptānāṃ dṛśyānām[176]eva[177]pratiṣedhas tasmād dṛśyānupalabdhāv antarbhāvaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:6366: kuta etad dṛśyānām evety āha svabhāvety ādi /
GSP28durdhpru:6368: yasmāt svabhāvaviruddhādir yeṣāṃ teṣām upalabdhyā kāraṇamādir yeṣāṃ teṣām anupalabdhyā pratiṣedha uktas tasmād dṛśyānām eva pratiṣedha ity arthaḥ
GSP28durdhpru:6369: yadi nāma svabhāvaviruddhādyupalabdhyā kāraṇādyanupalabdhyā[178]ca pratiṣedha uktas tathāpi kathaṃ ḍṛśyānām eva pratiṣedha ity āha upalabdhir ity ādi /
GSP28durdhpru:6371: yasmād ye virodhinaḥ vyāpyavyāpakabhūtāḥ kāryakāraṇabhūtāś ca jñātās teṣām avaśyam evopalabdhiḥ upalabdhipūrvā cānupalabdhir veditavyā jñātavyā[179]/
GSP28durdhpru:6372: upalabdhyanupalabdhī ca dve yeṣāṃ stas te dṛśyā eva /
GSP28durdhpru:6373: tasmāt svabhāvaviruddhādyupalabdhyā kāraṇādyanupalabdhyā copalabdhyanupalabdhimatāṃ viruddhādīnāṃ pratiṣedhaḥ kriyamāṇo dṛśyānām eva kṛto draṣṭavyaḥ
GSP28durdhpru:6377: kecit punar evaṃ vyākaṣate -- svayam ityādinā granthena vārttikakṛtedam uktam --
GSP28durdhpru:6378: svabhāvādīnām anupalabdhyā viruddhādīnāñ copalabdhyā yathāyogam abhāvaṃ tadvyavahāraṃ
GSP28durdhpru:6380: na kevalaṃ prayogābhyāsāt pratipattisamaya eva prayogam uccārayati /
GSP28durdhpru:6381: na tu tato pūrvam avagacchatītarathā pratiniyataśabdoccāraṇaṃ na bhaved iti /
GSP28durdhpru:6382: anenopāyeneti copāya ihopāyas tathāśabdoccāraṇakramas teneti varṇayanti /
GSP28durdhpru:6385: bahuṣu codyeṣu prakrānteṣu parihārasamuccayārthaś cakāro hetvartho bhavati /
GSP28durdhpru:6386: yasmād idaṃ cedaṃ ca samādhānam asti tasmāt tattaccodyam ayuktam iti cakārārthaḥ //
GSP28durdhpru:6387: kasmāt punaḥ pratiṣedhyānāṃ viruddhādīnām upalabdhyanupalabdhī veditavye ity āha
GSP28durdhpru:6393: upalabdhyanupalabdhimadbhayo 'nye 'nupalabdhā eva ye teṣāṃ virodhaś ca kāryakāraṇabhāvaś
GSP28durdhpru:6394: ca kenacit sahābhāvaś ca vyāpyasya vyāpakasyābhāve[181]na sidhyati yasmāt tato virodhakāryakāraṇabhāvābhāvāsiddheḥ[182]kāraṇād
GSP28durdhpru:6399: virodhaś ca[183]kāryakāraṇabhāvaś ca vyāpakābhāve vyāpyābhāvaś ca dṛśyānupalabdher eveti /
GSP28durdhpru:6410: anye punar anyathā vyavasthitāḥ -- svayam apītyādikaṃ nāvirbhūtaprayogam adhikṛtyoktam,
GSP28durdhpru:6412: atra ca sādhv asādhu vā vyākhyānaṃ sādhubhir eva jñātavyam iti /
GSP28durdhpru:6413: syād etat -- yathā prayogabhedaḥ svārthānumāne kathyate tathā ca na kiñcid vācyaṃ parārthānumāne syād ity āśaṅkyāha -- yat punar iti /
GSP28durdhpru:6416: samprati dṛśyānupalabdhāv antarbhāvaṃ sarvānupalabdhīnām asahamāna āha -- nanu ceti /
GSP28durdhpru:6417: tathā ca sati kāraṇādīnām adṛśyānāṃ niṣedhaprakāre sati /
GSP28durdhpru:6418: śiṣṭeṣu pariśiṣṭeṣu abhāva ity abhāvo 'pīti draṣtavyaṃ /
GSP28durdhpru:6419: na tv abhāva eva vyavahārasyāpi sādhanāt /
GSP28durdhpru:6421: kāryakāraṇabhāvādigrahaṇakāle yopalabdhir anupalabdhiś ca pūrvam āsīt tadvatāṃ pratiṣedhaḥ kriyamāṇo dṛśyānām eva kṛto draṣṭavyo jñātavyaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:6422: yathā arthavirodhādigrahaṇakāle 'vaśyaṃbhāvinī dṛśyānupalabdhis tathānantaram eva dharmottareṇa prasādhayiṣyate /
GSP28durdhpru:6423: nanu ca kāraṇādīnāṃ cety anena pra(ca)
GSP28durdhpru:6425: tat kathaṃ hetvarthe vyākhyāyata ity āśaṅkya pūrvaṃ buddhisthaṃ spaṣṭayann āha -- bahuṣv iti /
GSP28durdhpru:6426: evam manyate -- samuccayārthe varttamāna evāyaṃ hetvarthe varttate /
GSP28durdhpru:6434: iha gṛhīte vṛkṣābhāve hi śiśapātvābhāvapratītau [188]pratīto vyāpyavāpakabhāvaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:6437: vyāpyavyāpakabhāvaṃ ca smaratā virodha--kāryakāraṇabhāva--vyāpyavyāpakabhāviviṣayābhāvapratipatti[189] nibandhanaṃ dṛśānupalabdhiḥ smartavyā
GSP28durdhpru:6444: [189] deśakālasvabhāvaviprakṛṣṭāḥ piśācādyayas teṣāṃ piśācādīnāṃ virodhaś ca kenacid agninā saha na sidhyatīti sambandhaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:6445: tathā kāryakāraṇabhāvaś ca piśācādīnāṃ kenacid dhūmena sārdhaṃ na sidhyati / -- ṭi-
GSP28durdhpru:6446: tatra yady api saṃpratitanī[190] nāsti dṛśyānupalabdhir virodhādigrahaṇakāle tv āsīt /
GSP28durdhpru:6448: tataḥ samprati nāsti [191]dṛśyānupalabdhir ity abhāvasādhanatvena dṛśyānupalabdhiprayogād bhidyante kāryānupalabdhyādiprayogāḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:6456: vyāpakasyābhāve 'bhāvaś ca vyāpyasya na siddhyiti (?) yasmāt /
GSP28durdhpru:6457: ayam āśayaḥ -- yadi pūrvaṃ vyāpakābhimatasyābhāve vyāpyābhimatābhāvo niścito bhavet tadā vyāpyavyāpakabhāvaḥ siddhyet,
GSP28durdhpru:6458: tadā ca vyāpakānupalabdhir gamikā syāt, nānyadeti /
GSP28durdhpru:6459: ayam atra prakaraṇārthaḥ -- prabandhena bhavato yadbhāve yasyābhāvas tasya virodhagatir
GSP28durdhpru:6460: yat svabhāvaś ca yenopalabhyate tena saha kāryakāraṇabhāvo 'pi pañcapratyakṣānupalambham adhigamyaḥ,
GSP28durdhpru:6461: vyāpyavyāpakabhāvo pi pratyakṣānupalambhāvaseya iti katham adṛśyasya sidhyantīti /
GSP28durdhpru:6465: tat kathaṃ dṛśyānupalabdhāvitarāsām anupalabdhīnām antarbhāva ity āśaṅkya tathā tatrāntarbhāvas tathā darśayitum āha -- tad iti /
GSP28durdhpru:6466: yasmād anyatra dṛśyatve 'pi viruddhādīnāṃ dṛśyānupalambhe 'ntarbhāvo na ghaṭate,
GSP28durdhpru:6467: sa cācāryeṇoktas tat tasmād ayam arthaḥ -- sarvatra cetyāder vākyasya tātparyārthaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:6468: kathaṃ dṛśyānupalabdher ity ayam amum arthaṃ tāvat prasādhayati -- eketi /
GSP28durdhpru:6470: yady evaṃ vyāpyavyāpakabhāvasya kā gatir ity āha -- vyāpaketi /
GSP28durdhpru:6471: nanu ca vyāpyavyāpakabhāvaniścaye tayor ekatvāt kim abhāvaniścayenety āha -- tatra vyāpyavyāpakabhāvaniścaye karttavye /
GSP28durdhpru:6472: katham abhāvapratītir vyāpyavyāpakabhāvapratīter nimittam ity āha -- iheti /
GSP28durdhpru:6475: kāraṇādiniṣedhena ca yato dṛśyānupalabdhir ākṣiptā tato dṛśyānupalabdher eva[192]kālāntaravṛttāyāḥ svṛtiviṣayabhūtāyā abhāvapratipattiḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:6477: tad anena sarveṇa dṛśyānupalabdhāvantarbhāvo daśānāmanupalabhdhiprayogāṇāṃ pārabpryeṇa darśita iti veditavyam //
GSP28durdhpru:6481: dṛśyānupalabdhis tu kvopayujyata ity āha -- abhāveti /
GSP28durdhpru:6483: nanu yadi nāma virodhādigrahaṇakāle dṛśyānupalabdhir āsīt,
GSP28durdhpru:6485: tat kathaṃ viruddhopalabdhyādīnāṃ tatrāntarbhāva ity āha -- tasmād iti /
GSP28durdhpru:6487: abhāvasiddhiś ca dṛśyānupalabdhes tasmād hetor virodhādikaṃ smarateti viruddhopalambhavyāpakānupalambhādiprayogakāla iti draṣṭavyaṃ /
GSP28durdhpru:6490: tasmāt tat tannāstīty asyāḥ pratīter ayogāt -- ity api draṣṭavyaṃ /
GSP28durdhpru:6491: smarateti ca tadānīṃ virodhāder grahaṇād gṛhītasyaiva vikalpanād uktaṃ /
GSP28durdhpru:6492: kutaḥ punar avaśyasmarttavyā sety āha -- dṛśyeti /
GSP28durdhpru:6493: atha syāt -- prāktanī dṛśyānupalabdhiḥ sadā smaryatām,
GSP28durdhpru:6494: tathāpi katham asau vivakṣitābhāvasiddhāv upayogaṃ bhajate,
GSP28durdhpru:6498: nanu viruddhopalabdhikāraṇādyanupalabdhiprayogaviṣaye sā nāsti tat katham avidyamānā saivābhāvapratīter nibandhanam ity āha -- tatreti vākyopanyāse
GSP28durdhpru:6499: sampratīdānīṃ smaryamāṇā saivābhāvapratīter nibandhanaṃ viruddhādyabhāvajñānasya karaṇaṃ /
GSP28durdhpru:6500: kathaṃ tarhi dṛśyānupalabdher viruddhopalabdhyādīnāṃ bheda ity āha -- tata iti /
GSP28durdhpru:6503: itis tadmād atrābhāvaḥ sādhyate tenābhāvasādhanatvena tato bhidyante viruddhopalabdhyādiprayogaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:6508: nanu svātantryeṇa tvayā tasyā eva prākpravṛttāyā abhāvaniścayo darśitas tatra cānupalabdhīnām antarbhāvaḥ,
GSP28durdhpru:6509: na tv ācāryasyāyam abhipreta ity āśaṅkyācāryasyaivāyam abhipreto 'rtha iti darśayann āha -- tadaneneti /
GSP28durdhpru:6512: ayam atra prakaraṇārthaḥ -- dṛśyānupalambhasyāvaktavyatvena daśānām apy anupalabdhīnāṃ tatrāntarbhāvaḥ,
GSP28durdhpru:6522: viprakṛṣṭaviṣayā punar anupalabdhīḥ pratyakṣānumāṇanivṛttilakṣaṇā saṃśayahetuḥ II-47
GSP28durdhpru:6524: viprakṛṣṭastribhir deśakālasvabhāvaviprakarṣair yasyā viṣayaḥ sā viprakṛṣṭaviṣayeti saṃśayahetuḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:6525: kiṃsvabhāvā sety āha -- pratyakṣānumānanivṛttir lakṣaṇaṃ svabhāvo ysyāḥ sā pratyakṣaṇā /
GSP28durdhpru:6528: na ca śītasya niṣedhe sādhye dūratvād vahner bhāsvararūpopalabdhiḥ śītasparśānupalabdhir yujyate /
GSP28durdhpru:6536: tata eva smaryamāṇāt pramāṇād vivakṣitapratītiprasaṅgāc ca /
GSP28durdhpru:6537: tasmāt sarvatraiva sampratitano dṛśyānupalambho darśanīyas tadbalenaivābhāvaniścayo vācyaḥ,
GSP28durdhpru:6538: na tu prākpravṛttād dṛśyānupalambhāt smṛtyā viṣayīkṛtād abhāvaniścayaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:6540: yady evaṃ kathaṅkāraṃ sa pradarśyatām iti cet /
GSP28durdhpru:6542: dūrād vahne rūpaviśeṣaṃ dṛṣṭvā yatraivaṃvidharūpaviśeṣas tatra tāvad deśavyāpakas tuṣārasparśaviśeṣo 'sti /
GSP28durdhpru:6543: yathā mahānasādau tathāvidham evarūpam ity ānumānikī viśiṣṭoṣṇasparśapratītiḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:6546: sa kvacit pratyakṣātmā kvacid anumānātmeti na śāstravirodho na yuktivirodhaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:6551: kevalam atyantābhyāsāg jhaṭiti tathāpratītyudaye saty ekam anumānam uktaṃ /
GSP28durdhpru:6554: tathā ca vyāpakaviruddhopalabdhyādiṣv aparam anumānam ekaṃ plavamānam avaseyaṃ /
GSP28durdhpru:6555: yayoś ca parasparaparihārasthitalakṣaṇo virodhas tatra dṛśyānupalabdhiḥ sphuṭaiva /
GSP28durdhpru:6556: tena viruddhavyāptopalabdhyādiṣu sampraty eva dṛśyānupalabdhir asti /
GSP28durdhpru:6558: evaṃ vyāpakakāraṇānupalabdhādiṣv akāraṇāvyāpakāder dharmasyaivānupalambhād abhāve (siddhe tata
GSP28durdhpru:6559: eva sāmarthyāt kāryāder abhāvāv asāv itīdānīn tanasyaiva dṛśyānupalambhasyopayogo)
GSP28durdhpru:6561: dṛśyānupalambhasya ca sākṣātkāraṇe vyāpārāt pāryamparyeṇa ca viruddhādyabhāve bhāve vyāpārāt dṛśyānupalabdher bhedena kāraṇānupalabdhyādīnāṃ prayoga iti //
GSP28durdhpru:6569: -- DB; nyāyabinduprakaraṇe dvitīyaḥ paricchedaḥ samāptaḥ // -- E. ***
GSP28durdhpru:6571: kāraṇaḥ vyākaṃ ca nivrttamānaṃ kāryaṃ vyāpyaṃ ca nivarttayet /
GSP28durdhpru:6572: na ca pramāṇaṃ prameyasya kāraṇaṃ nāpi vyāpakam /
GSP28durdhpru:6573: ataḥ praṇāṇayor nivṛttāv api arthasya prameyasya nivṛttir an sidhyati /
GSP28durdhpru:6576: yat punaḥ pramāṇasattayā prameyasattā sidhyati tad yuktam /
GSP28durdhpru:6578: na ca kāraṇam antareṇa kāryam asti /
GSP28durdhpru:6589: sampraty adṛśyānupalabdhim adhikṛtyoktaṃ vyācakṣāṇa āha -- ukteti /
GSP28durdhpru:6590: nanu yadi pratyakṣānumānanivṛttimātrarūpādṛśyānupalabdhir abhāve sādhye saṃśayahetur anaikāntikī tarhi sā tataś ca hetvābhāsāvasara eva vaktavyā
GSP28durdhpru:6593: yato na sā vacanavyaktyānupalabdhilakṣaṇaprāptasyānupalabdhir asadvyavahāre sādhye na pramāṇam,
GSP28durdhpru:6595: na jñānajñeyasvabhāveti yāvad ity ārthaṃ nyāyam āśrityoktaṃ na śābdam iti draṣṭavyaṃ //
GSP28durdhpru:6596: yadi pramāṇanivṛttyā prameyānivṛttis tarhi tatsattayāpi na prameyasattā siddhyed ity āśaṅkya tatropapattiṃ darśayann āha -- yat punar iti /
GSP28durdhpru:6597: nanu kāraṇam apy avaśyaṃ kāryavad bhavati tataś ca sati jñeye jñānenāpy avaśyabhāvyaṃ /
GSP28durdhpru:6598: tac cen nāsti jñeyam api nāsty eva /
GSP28durdhpru:6599: tataḥ siddhyaty evādṛśyasyāpy abhāva ity āśaṅkyāha -- na tv iti /
GSP28durdhpru:6608: svārthaparārthānumānyoḥ svārthaṃ vyākhyāya parārthaṃ vyākhyātukāma āha ---
GSP28durdhpru:6613: trīṇi rūpāṇi --- anvayavyatirekapakṣadharmatvasaṃjñakāni yasya tat trirūpam /
GSP28durdhpru:6624: tat kimarthaṃ saṃprati vacanātmakam anumānam ukta ity āha ---
GSP28durdhpru:6632: tasmin kāraṇe vacane kāryasya anumānasyopacāraḥ samāropaḥ kriyate /
GSP28durdhpru:6637: trirūpaṃ liṅgaṃ jñātam api vaktum aviduṣo bālasya vyutpādanārthaṃ trirūpaliṅgākhyānalakṣaṇaṃ yat parārtham anumānam uktaṃ tad vyākhyātuṃ svārthetyādinā prastauti /
GSP28durdhpru:6638: dvayo rūpyor abhidhānād ekasya gamyamānatvād ākhyāyate prakāśyate 'neneti trirūpaṃ liṅgam iti vivṛtaṃ na tv abhidhīyate 'neneti /
GSP28durdhpru:6639: abhidheyasya gamyamānasya ca prakāśyatvaṃ tulyam iti prakāśyate ity anena dvayoḥ saṅgrahaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:6640: yenārthakrameṇātmanaḥ parokṣārthajñānam utpannaṃ tenaiva krameṇa parasantāne liṅgijñānotpapādayiṣayā
GSP28durdhpru:6641: trirūpasya liṅgasya khyāpakaṃ yad vacanaṃ tatparārtham anumānam iti draṣtavyam //
GSP28durdhpru:6648: na yāvat[206] kiṃcid upacārād anumānaśabdena vaktuṃ śakyaṃ tāvat sarvaṃ vyākhyeyam /
GSP28durdhpru:6649: kin tv anumānaṃ vyākhyātukāmenānumānasvarūpasya[207] vyākhyeyatvān nimittaṃ vyākhyeyam /
GSP28durdhpru:6651: tac ca svayaṃ vā pratītam anumānsya nimittaṃ bhavati,
GSP28durdhpru:6657: tataḥ pratipādakaṃ śabdam avśyaṃ vaktavyaṃ darśayan anumānaśabdenoktavān ācārya iti paramārthaḥ //
GSP28durdhpru:6667: nanu ca trirūpaliṅgābhidhānād avagate sati dharmiṇi liṅgaṃ jñāyate /
GSP28durdhpru:6669: tat kathaṃ `trirūpaliṅgavacanāt tatsmṛtir utpadyate' ity ucyata iti cet /
GSP28durdhpru:6671: gṛhyamāṇam api dhūmādivastu na tāval liṅgaṃ yāvad vahnyādisādhyāvinābhūtatayā na jñāyate /
GSP28durdhpru:6672: tathātvaṃ ca tasya na tadā grāhyam api tu pūrvagṛhītam eva smarttavyam iti sūktaṃ trirūpaliṅgasmṛtir utpadyata iti /
GSP28durdhpru:6674: ayam arthaḥ --- vacanam api trirūpaṃ liṅgaṃ smarayat parokṣārthajñānasya paramparayā kāraṇaṃ bhavad upacārād anumānam ucyata iti /
GSP28durdhpru:6675: athābādhitatvādy api liṅgasya lakṣaṇam ity ācakṣate kecid iti vipratipattidarśanāt tadvyutpādanaṃ yuktam,
GSP28durdhpru:6678: na atrāpy avyāptivyatirekābhyāṃ nigadanto vipratipannā ity asyāpi vyutpādanaṃ nyāyyam /
GSP28durdhpru:6680: yadi paramparayā'numānahetutvena vacanam upacārād anumānam iti vyutpādyate tarhi
GSP28durdhpru:6681: jijñāsāsvāsthyādikam api paramparayā'numānahetutvād anumānaśabdena vaktuṃ śakyam
GSP28durdhpru:6682: iti tad api kiṃ nocyata ity āha --- na yāvad iti /
GSP28durdhpru:6683: nanu svāsthyādikam api nimittam iti tadavastho doṣaḥ / na /
GSP28durdhpru:6684: nimittaṃ vyākyeyam ity avyahitam asādhāraṇaṃ nimittam ākhyeyam ity arthaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:6685: nanu svayaṃ pratītaṃ liṅgam anumānasya nimittam /
GSP28durdhpru:6686: tatkiṃ tadvacanena vyākhyātenety āha --- tac ceti /
GSP28durdhpru:6689: yataḥ pareṇa pratipāditam api tal liṅgam anumānsya nimittaṃ tatas tasmād avaśyaṃ vaktavyaṃ pratipādakaṃ[58a] liṅgapratipādakaṃ vacanaṃ darśayann anmumānśabdenoktavān ācāryaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:6693: dvau vidhau prakārau yasya tad dvividham //
GSP28durdhpru:6709: dṛṣṭāntadharmiṇā saha sādhyadharmiṇaḥ sādṛśyaṃ hetukṛtaṃ sādharmyam ucyate /
GSP28durdhpru:6711: tatra yasya sādhanavākyasya sādharmyam abhidheyaṃ tat sādharmyavat /
GSP28durdhpru:6712: yathā --- yata kṛtakaṃ tad anityaṃ yathā ghaṭaḥ,
GSP28durdhpru:6713: tathā ca kṛtakaḥ śabda ity atra kṛtaktvakṛtaṃ dṛṣṭāntasādhyadharimiṇoḥ sādṛśyam abhidheyam /
GSP28durdhpru:6714: yasya tu vaidharmyam abhidheyaṃ tad vaidharmyavat /
GSP28durdhpru:6715: yathā --- yan nityaṃ tad akṛtakaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ yathākāśam /
GSP28durdhpru:6716: śabdas tu kṛtaka iti kṛtakatvā'kṛtakatvakṛtaṃ[214] śabdākāśayoḥ sādhyadṛṣṭāntadharmiṇor asādṛśyam ihābhidheyam //
GSP28durdhpru:6720: yad anayayoḥ prayogayor abhidheyaṃ bhinnaṃ kathaṃ tarhi trirūpaṃ liṅgam abhinnaṃ prakāśyam ity āha ---
GSP28durdhpru:6723: yat payojanaṃ prakāśayitavyaṃ vastu uddiśyānumāne prayujyete,
GSP28durdhpru:6724: tataḥ prayojanād anayor na bhedaḥ[215] kaścit /
GSP28durdhpru:6727: dvābhyām api trirūpaṃ liṅgaṃ prakāśyate eva /
GSP28durdhpru:6729: tathā ca na tato bhedaḥ kaścit //
GSP28durdhpru:6732: anenaitad āha --- na svāsthyādi pratipannam api parokṣārthapratipādakaṃ yena tad ucyeta /
GSP28durdhpru:6734: svayam aśaktam api tu hetuvacanaṃ parokṣaprakāśanavastusūcakatvād anumānaśabdenoktam iti /
GSP28durdhpru:6735: iti paramārtha evam asyopacārasya paramaḥ prakṛṣṭo 'rthaḥ prayojanam //
GSP28durdhpru:6736: vidhaśabdena ca vigṛhṇato 'bhiprāyaḥ prāg eva pradarśitaḥ //
GSP28durdhpru:6739: abhidheyabhdedo 'pi tarhi na syād ity āha ---
GSP28durdhpru:6743: vācakatvabhedād anyo bhedaḥ prayojanakṛto nāstīty arthaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:6748: anvaye hi kathite vakṣyamāṇena nyānyena vyatirekagatir bhavati /
GSP28durdhpru:6751: na ca yatrābhidheyabhdedas tatra sāmarthyagamyo 'py artho[216] bhidyate /
GSP28durdhpru:6752: yasmāt `pīno devadatto divā na bhuṅkte' `pīno devadatto rātrau bhuṅkte' ity anyor
GSP28durdhpru:6753: vākyayor abhidheyabhdedepi gamyamānam ekam eva[217] tadvad ihābhidheyabhede 'pi gamyamānaṃ vastv ekam eva //
GSP28durdhpru:6756: [217] gamyaṃ divā bhojanābhāvaviśeṣaṃ pīnatvaṃ rātribhojanakāryam ekam eva --- ṭi-
GSP28durdhpru:6757: kena kasya kim kṛtaṃ ca sādharmyaṃ vaidharmyaṃ cety āha --- dṛṣṭānteti /
GSP28durdhpru:6759: asādṛśyaṃ ca hetukṛtam iti hetusadbhāvāsadbhāvadvārakaṃ draṣṭavyam /
GSP28durdhpru:6761: yasya vākyasya sādharmyaṃ sādṛśyam abhibheyam asti /
GSP28durdhpru:6764: yad yad kṛtakam iti vīpsārtho vivakṣitaḥ,
GSP28durdhpru:6766: tathā ca kṛtakaḥ śabda iti pakṣadharmatākathanam idam /
GSP28durdhpru:6768: `kṛtakaś ca śabadaḥ' ity etāvataiva gatārthatvena tathāśabdasya vaiyarthyāt /
GSP28durdhpru:6769: tataḥ `kṛtakaś ca śabdaḥ' ity eva darśanīyaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:6772: yan nityam iti sādhyābhāvānuvādas tad akṛtakam iti sādhanābhāvavidhiḥ //
GSP28durdhpru:6773: abhidheyaṃ bhinnam iti brubato 'yam āśayaḥ --- sādharmyavat prayogasyānvayaḥ pakṣadharmatā cābhidheyā /
GSP28durdhpru:6775: arthaḥ prayojanavācyācāreṇokto nābhidheyavācīti darśayati yad uddiśyeti spaṣṭayan
GSP28durdhpru:6776: prayujyate 'neneti prayojanaṃ sādhanavākyasya pravarttakaṃ liṅgavastūktaṃ na phalaṃ
GSP28durdhpru:6778: prakāśayitavyaṃ rūpatrayayogiliṅgaṃ tac cābhinnaṃ sādhāraṇaṃ dvayor api prayogayoḥ,
GSP28durdhpru:6781: tata iti prayojanasamānādhikaraṇaṃ na hetupadam etat //
GSP28durdhpru:6782: nanv abhidheyam eva prakāśyaṃ ta tkathaṃ prakāśyābheda ityāśaṅkyāha --- etad uktaṃ bhavatīti /
GSP28durdhpru:6786: yadi sādharmyavadvākye 'nvayo 'bhidheyas tarhi kathaṃ vyatirekaḥ prakāśyatāṃ gataḥ?
GSP28durdhpru:6789: tatra sādharmyavat prayogaḥ[218]--- yad upalabdhilakṣaṇaprāptaṃ san na upalabhyate so asadvyavahāraviṣayaḥ siddhaḥ,
GSP28durdhpru:6791: na upalabhyate ca kvacit pradeśaviśeṣa[219]upalabdhilakṣaṇaprāpto ghaṭa[220]ity anupalabdhiprayogaḥ III-8
GSP28durdhpru:6796: tatreti tayoḥ sāhdarmyavaidharmyavator anumānayoḥ sādharmyavat [221]tāvad uhārann anupalabbhim āha --- yad itiyādinā /
GSP28durdhpru:6797: yad upalabdhdilakṣaṇaprāptaṃ --- yad dṛśyaṃ san nopalabhyate ity anena dṛśyānupalambho 'nūdyate /
GSP28durdhpru:6798: so 'sadvyavahāraviṣayaḥ[222] siddhaḥ --- tad asad iti vyavahartavyam ity arthaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:6809: katham anvayaḥ prakāśyatām āpanna ity āha --- anvaya iti /
GSP28durdhpru:6811: vakṣyamāṇena “sādharmyeṇāpi hī” tyādinā pratipādayiṣyamāṇena nyāyena yuktā /
GSP28durdhpru:6812: syān mataṃ --- yayor abhidheyaṃ bhinnaṃ tayoḥ sāmarthyagamyam apy avaśyaṃ bhidyate --- yathā gaṅgāyāṃ ghoṣaḥ,
GSP28durdhpru:6813: kūpe gargakulam ity āśaṅkyāha --- na ceti /
GSP28durdhpru:6817: ekasya vākyasya divā bhojanābhāvo 'bhidheyo 'nyasya rātribhojanam ity anayor vākyayor [58b] abhiddheyabhedo 'sti /
GSP28durdhpru:6818: tasmin saty api yathā bhojanaviśiṣṭaṃ devadattasya pīnatvaṃ pratipādyaṃ na bhidyate
GSP28durdhpru:6823: tathā hi divā bhojananiṣedhavākyasya gamyamānaṃ rātribhojanaṃ rātribhojanavidhānavākyasya tu gamyanānaṃ divā bhojananiṣedhanam,
GSP28durdhpru:6825: vadvākye vyatireko gamyamāno vaidharmyavadvākye cānvayo gamyamānaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:6827: yad anyasya gamyanānaṃ tad itarasyābhidheyam iti saṃkṣepaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:6828: tataḥ katham ucyate vākyayor gamyamānam ekam iti /
GSP28durdhpru:6832: yat tu dvayaṃ pratīyamānatāmātreṇopādhinā vivakṣitaṃ tac ca dṛṣṭāntavākyayor bhojananimittapīnatvalakṣaṇaṃ
GSP28durdhpru:6835: sādharmyam abhidheyaṃ yasya vidyate tad udāhahraṇena darśayann anupalabdhim āha /
GSP28durdhpru:6841: tam eva darśayitum āha --- yathānya iti /
GSP28durdhpru:6844: śaśaviṣāṇaṃ hi na cakṣuṣā viṣayīkṛtam api tu pramāṇe dṛśyānupalambhenāsadvyavahārayogyaṃ vijñātaṃ /
GSP28durdhpru:6847: tata eva pramāṇād anena vākyenābhidhīyamānā[228]vyāptir jñātavyā /
GSP28durdhpru:6853: saṃprati vyāptiṃ kathayitvā dṛśyānupalambhasya pakṣadharmatvaṃ darśayitum āha --- nopalabhyate ceti /
GSP28durdhpru:6854: sa ca dvirāvṛttyā 'nupalabdhim ity atrāpi draṣtasvyaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:6855: tenāyam arthaḥ --- sādharmyavat tāvad udāharann anupalabdhim āha /
GSP28durdhpru:6857: tathā 'nupalabdhiṃ tāvad āha paścāt svabhāvakārye vakṣyatīti /
GSP28durdhpru:6858: nanv ācāryeṇaiva sādharmyavad vaidharmyavac codāhṛtam atreti kim iti dharmottarena --- yathā yat kṛtakam ityādinā sādharmyavad vaidharmyavac codāhṛtaṃ prāg iti cet /
GSP28durdhpru:6861: vaisadṛśyākhyāṃ vaidharmyaṃ ca hetudvārakam eva na tu sāmānyena,
GSP28durdhpru:6862: anyathā pratiyogyapekṣayā 'pi sādharmyaṃ vaidharmyaṃ ca kenacid ākārenāstīti na tan nirākṛtaṃ syād iti darśayituṃ tad udāhṛtam,
GSP28durdhpru:6863: na tv ācāryeṇa nodāhṛtam ity udāhṛtam iti /
GSP28durdhpru:6864: tenātrāpy ācāryīye nidarśane hetukṛtam eva tat pratyetavyaṃ vyavasthitam /
GSP28durdhpru:6865: asadvyavahāraḥ --- asad iti jñānam asad ity abhidhānaṃ niḥśaṅkā ca gamāgamādikā pravṛttiḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:6869: ayam āśayaḥ --- yad anūdyate tad vyāpyam /
GSP28durdhpru:6873: atha dvyavayave sādhanavākye darśitavye vyāptiḥ pakṣadharmatā ca darśanīyā /
GSP28durdhpru:6877: tat kathaṃ pariparṇaṃ sādhanavākyam idaṃ bhaviṣyatīty āśaṅkyāha --- sādhanasyeti / co hetau /
GSP28durdhpru:6878: nanu parokṣārthapratipattau sarvathā 'nupayogī dṛṣṭāntas tat kiṃ tenākhyātenety āha vyāptīti /
GSP28durdhpru:6879: vyāpyavāpakadharmalakṣaṇā [59a] vyāptiḥ sādhyate niścīyate yena pramāṇena tasya viṣayo yatra
GSP28durdhpru:6882: sa eva viśiṣyate 'nyasmād iti viśeṣaḥ ekaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:6886: sa evābhāvavyavahārādhikaraṇaṃ yaḥ pratipattuḥ pratyakṣo nānyaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:6888: yathā cāsato 'pi ghaṭasya samāropitam upalabdhilakṣaṇāprāptatvaṃ tathā vyākhyātam //
GSP28durdhpru:6892: tathā svabhāvahetoḥ prayogaḥ --- yat sat tat sarvam anityam,
GSP28durdhpru:6893: yathā ghaṭādir iti śuddhasya[230] svabhāvahetoḥ prayogaḥ III-9
GSP28durdhpru:6896: tatheti / yathā 'nulabdhes tathā svabhāvahetoḥ sādharmyavān prayoga ity athaḥ / yat sad iti
GSP28durdhpru:6898: sa ca viṣayo dṛṣṭo niścitaḥ sādhyasādhanayor anto 'vasānaṃ yathāyogaṃ niyatatvaniyamaviṣayatvanipuṇo yasminn iti vyutpattyā dṛṣṭāntaśabdo 'bhilapyaḥ
GSP28durdhpru:6900: anenaitad ākūtam --- vyāptisādhakapramāṇasyādhikaraṇatāṃ gacchan dṛṣṭāntaḥ sādhanāvayavasya vyāpteḥ pratipattyaṅgam /
GSP28durdhpru:6904: ata eva vacanasādhanavākyasyāvayavo 'tha ca prayoktavaya iti /
GSP28durdhpru:6906: śaśaviṣāṇādeś ca vyāptisādhakapramāṇādhikaraṇatvena dṛṣṭāntarūpatvād dṛṣṭānta ity artha iti spaṣṭayati /
GSP28durdhpru:6907: nanu dṛṣṭaś cakṣuṣā jñāta iti kiṃ na vyākhyāyate?
GSP28durdhpru:6908: kiṃ punar evaṃ vyākhyāta ity āha--- śaśeti /
GSP28durdhpru:6910: viṣayīkṛtaṃ vijñātam iti cātīte niṣṭhāṃ prayuñjānaḥ prāgbhāvi vyāptigrahaṇaṃ daṛśayati /
GSP28durdhpru:6911: kathaṃ punaḥ śaśaviṣāṇādi dṛṣṭānto yena sā khyāpyata ity āha --- śaśeti /
GSP28durdhpru:6913: dṛśyānupalambha eva tanmātraṃ tannimittaṃ yasya sa tathā /
GSP28durdhpru:6915: kiṃ tat pramāṇaṃ yena tatra pravṛttena dṛśyānupalambhābhāvavyavahārayogyatvayor vyāptiḥ sādhyata iti cet /
GSP28durdhpru:6917: vādanyāyoktena nyāyena buddhivyapadeśābhāvāder asadvyavahārānimittatvena nimittāntarābhāve dṛśyānupalambha evānyanirapekṣo nimittam /
GSP28durdhpru:6918: yac ca yan mātranimittaṃ tatasmin sati bhavati /
GSP28durdhpru:6920: dṛśyānupalambhamātranimittaś cāsadvyavahāra ity anumānaṃ tatra pravṛttaṃ sādhyasādhanayor vyāpitim avasyatīti /
GSP28durdhpru:6921: anena vākyena yad upalabdhilakṣaṇaprāptam ityādinā 'bhidhīyamānā prakāśyamānā /
GSP28durdhpru:6922: tata eva prākpravṛttād anantaroktād anumānātmanaḥ pramāṇād vyāptir jñātavyā /
GSP28durdhpru:6923: etad uktaṃ bhavati tatpramāṇasiddhaiva vyāptir anena vākyena smaryata iti //
GSP28durdhpru:6924: svabhāvetyādinā svabhāvahetoḥ sādharmyavat prayogaṃ vivaritum upakramate /
GSP28durdhpru:6926: tayaiva pratipāditayā sādhanasya sādhyāyattatākhyo yo niyamaḥ sa pratipādito
GSP28durdhpru:6928: sattvam anūdya tat sarvam nityam ity anityatvaṃ vidhīyate /
GSP28durdhpru:6933: anityatvād anyatra nityatve sattvaṃ nāstīty evaṃ sattvam aniytyatve sādhye niyataṃ khyāpitaṃ bhavati /
GSP28durdhpru:6935: yathā ghaṭādir iti [231]vyāptisādhakasya pramāṇasya viṣayakathanam etat /
GSP28durdhpru:6939: nityakramayogapadyābhyām arthakriyāvirodhād iti viparyayabādhakaṃ pramāṇam --- ṭi-
GSP28durdhpru:6942: yad utpattimat tad anityam iti svabhāvabhūtadharmabhedena svabhāvasya prayogaḥ III-10
GSP28durdhpru:6945: utpattimattvam anūdya tad anityam ity anityatvavidhiḥ[235] /
GSP28durdhpru:6946: tathā ca saty utpattimattvam anityatve niyatam ākhyātam /
GSP28durdhpru:6955: [238]anutpannebhyo hi vyāvṛttim āśrityotpanno bhāva[239] ity ucyate /
GSP28durdhpru:6956: saiva vyāvṛttir yadā vyāvṛttyantaranirapekṣā vaktum iṣyate tadā vyatirekinīva nirdiśyate --- bhāvasya utpattir iti /
GSP28durdhpru:6957: yathā ca vyatiriktayevotpattyā viśiṣṭaṃ[240] vastu utpattimad uktam /
GSP28durdhpru:6961: ity eva dharottarasaṃmataḥ pāṭha iti gṛhītas tathāpi atra tenaiva `svahāvaṃ bhūtaḥ'
GSP28durdhpru:6962: ity evṃrūpeṇa gṛhīto 'sti iti vyākhyānurodhād bhāvi --- saṃ- /
GSP28durdhpru:6965: [238] nanu svabhāvabhūtasya kathaṃ bhada ity āha --- ṭi-
GSP28durdhpru:6972: idaṃ vākyaṃ yat sat tad anityam ity ātmakam /
GSP28durdhpru:6973: vyāptisādhakasya pramāṇasyeti yasya kramākramā 'yogo na tasya kvacit sāmarthyaṃ yathākāśakuśeśayasya /
GSP28durdhpru:6974: asti cākṣaṇike sa iti vyāpakānupalambhasambhabasyānumāṇasyeti draṣṭavyam /
GSP28durdhpru:6975: etac ca bahuvācyam anyatra vipañcitam nehāprakṛtatvāt pratanyate /
GSP28durdhpru:6976: kathaṃ punar utpattir bhāvasya viśeṣaṇam ity āḥa --- svabhāvam iti /
GSP28durdhpru:6977: svabhāvaṃ bhūtaḥ prāpta iti karttari niṣṭhā “dvitīyā” [pāṇini 2.1.24.] iti yogavibhāgāt [59b] samāsaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:6983: yat kṛtakaṃ tad anityam ity upādhibhedena III-11
