GSP28durdhpru:6984: yat kṛtakamiti kṛtaktvam anūdya [241]anityatvaṃ vidhīyata iti anityatve niyataṃ kṛtakatam uktam /
GSP28durdhpru:6988: tasya bhdedena bhinnopādhinā viśiṣṭaḥ svabhāvaḥ prayukta ity arthaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:6992: kadācid avyatiriktena viśeṣaṇena viśiṣṭaḥ kadācid vyatiriktena /
GSP28durdhpru:7002: svabhāvabhūtaḥ svabhātmako dharma iti ca paramārthābhiprāyeṇoktam /
GSP28durdhpru:7003: bhedenetīyaṃ tṛtīyā hetāv iti darśayann āha --- bhedam iti /
GSP28durdhpru:7004: vyavahārasiddhaṃ bhedam utpattuḥ sakāśād anyatvaṃ hetūkṛtya nibandhanīkṛtya prayogaḥ saviśeṣaṇasya svabhāvahetor iti prakaraṇāt /
GSP28durdhpru:7005: kalpanayā 'pi kathaṃ bhedo yenotpattyā viśiṣṭam utpattyā viśiṣṭam utpattimad ucyata ity āha --- anutpannebhya iti /
GSP28durdhpru:7007: anutpannebhya ākāśādibhyo vyāvṛttiṃ vyavacchedam āśritya parikalpya /
GSP28durdhpru:7008: yadi vyāvṛttyāśrayeṇotpanno bhāva ucyate tarhi katham utpattir asyeti prayoga ity āha --- saiveti /
GSP28durdhpru:7009: vyāvṛttyantaraṃ mahattvādi tannirapekṣā vaktum iṣyate yadā tadā /
GSP28durdhpru:7010: tena paramārthaḥ svabhāvabhūtenotpattyākhyena dhārmeṇa kalpitaḥ samāropito bhedo 'rthāntaratvaṃ yasya ye(te)
GSP28durdhpru:7011: na avyatiriktena viśeṣaṇena viśiṣṭasya svabhāvahetoḥ prayoga ity arthaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:7013: adhunā tu bhinnaviśeṣaṇa viśiṣṭasyeti bhedas tad āha --- bhinneneti /
GSP28durdhpru:7014: yad vā bhinnena pūrvasymād anyādṛśena saṅketavaśād antarbhāvitena,
GSP28durdhpru:7019: atha kim eko arthaḥ śuddhaḥ kadācid avyatiriktopādhinā viśiṣṭaḥ;
GSP28durdhpru:7020: kadācid vyatiriktaviśeṣaṇaviśiṣṭo dṛṣṭaḥ śiṣṭaiḥ prayujyamāno yenaivam ucyamānaṃ parabhāgaṃ puṣṇātīy āha --- devadatta iti /
GSP28durdhpru:7022: citrā cāsau gauś ceti “gor ataddhitaluki” [pāṇini 5.4.92] iti ṭac,
GSP28durdhpru:7025: cittraguśabdena kṛtakaśabdasya sāmyaṃ nāstīti manvānaḥ para āha --- nanu ceti /
GSP28durdhpru:7027: nanu ca kṛtakaśabde na viśeṣaṇavāciśabdo 'stīti yad uktaṃ tat tadavadastham evety āha --- yady apīti /
GSP28durdhpru:7030: nanu ca citraguśabde vyatirektasya viśeṣaṇasya vācakaś citraśabdo gośabdaś cāsti /
GSP28durdhpru:7031: kṛtakaśabde tu nirviśeṣaṇavācinaḥ śabdasya prayogo 'stīty āśaṅkyāha ---
GSP28durdhpru:7032: apekṣitaparavyāpāro hi bhāvaḥ svabhāvaniṣpattau kṛtaka iti III-12
GSP28durdhpru:7034: pareṣāṃ kāraṇānāṃ vyāpāraḥ svabhāvasya niṣpattau --- niṣptatty artham apekṣitaḥ paravyāpāro yena sa tathoktaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:7036: yasmād apekṣita paravyāpāraḥ kṛtaka ucyate tasmād vyatiriktena viśeṣaṇena viśiṣṭaḥ svabhāva ucyate /
GSP28durdhpru:7037: yady api vyartiriktaṃ viśeṣaṇapadaṃ [243]na prayuktaṃ tathāpi kṛtakaśabdenaiva vyatiriktaṃ [244]viśeṣaṇapadam antarbhāvitam /
GSP28durdhpru:7038: ata eva saṃjñāprakāro 'yaṃ kṛtakaśabdo yasmāt saṃjñāyām ayaṃ kan pratyayo vihitaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:7039: yatra ca viśeṣaṇam antarbhāvyate tatra viśeṣaṇapadaṃ na pryujyate /
GSP28durdhpru:7043: kvacit[245] tu pratīyamānaṃ viśeṣaṇaṃ yathā kṛta ity ukte hetubhir ity etat pratīyate /
GSP28durdhpru:7053: yathā ca kṛtakaśabdo bhinnaviśeṣaṇasvabhāvābhidhāyī evaṃ prayayabhedabheditvam ādir
GSP28durdhpru:7054: yeṣāṃ prayatnānatarīyakatvādīnāṃ te 'pi svabhāvahetoḥ prayogā bhinnaviśeṣaṇasvabhāvābhidhāyino draṣṭāvyāḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:7059: prayayānāṃ kāraṇānāṃ bhedo viśeṣas tena prayayakālābhedena bhettuṃ śīlaṃ yasya sa prayayabhedabhedī śabdas tasya bhāvaḥ prayayabhedabheditvam
GSP28durdhpru:7066: punaḥ kṛtakaśabdenāntarbhāvitam ity āha --- yasmād iti /
GSP28durdhpru:7067: saṃjñāyāṃ nāmni kan pratyayo vihitas tasmād antarbhāvitam iti /
GSP28durdhpru:7068: ata eva saṃjñāyā kano vidhānbād evāyaṃ kṛtakaśabdaḥ saṃjñāprakāraḥ saṃjñāviśeṣaḥ saṃjñāśabda iti yāvāt /
GSP28durdhpru:7069: antarbhāve 'pi kathaṃ viśeṣaṇapadāprayoga ity āha --- yatreti /
GSP28durdhpru:7071: athāvasitasyāpy asti prayogo yathā kṛtaka ity ukte hetuneti pratītāv api hetuśabdaprayoga ity āha --- kvacid iti /
GSP28durdhpru:7075: tad evaṃ tirvidhaḥ svabhāvahetuprayogo[252] darśitaḥ śuddho 'vyatirktaviśeṣaṇo vyatirktaviśeṣaṇaś ca /
GSP28durdhpru:7078: [253]evamarthaṃ caitad ākhyātaṃ --- vācakabhedān mā bhūt kasyacit svabhāvahetāv api prayukte vyāmoha iti //
GSP28durdhpru:7081: [254]sann utpattimān kṛtako vā śabda iti pakṣadharmaupadarśanam [255] III-14
GSP28durdhpru:7084: [255] asmin sūtre na kiṃcit kenacid vyākhyātam
GSP28durdhpru:7085: atha kim ete svabhāvahetavaḥ siddhasambandhe svabhāve sādhye prayoktavyā āhosvid asiddhasambandha ity āśaṅkya siddhasambandhe prayoktavyā iti darśayitum āha ---
GSP28durdhpru:7086: sarva ete sādhanadharmā yathāsvaṃ pramāṇaiḥ siddhasādhanadharmamātrānubandha eva sādhyadharme 'vagantavyāḥ III-15
GSP28durdhpru:7091: ayam asyāśayaḥ --- na kṛtakaśabdena pratipāditasyārthasya anyathānupapattyā hetuvyāpāro
GSP28durdhpru:7092: 'tra pratīyate yenātarāpi viśeṣaṇapadasya [60a] prayogo vaktur icchātaḥ syād vā na
GSP28durdhpru:7093: vā kin tu svotpattāv apekṣitaparavyāpārasyaivārthasyedaṃ nāmeti kuto 'nayoḥ sāmyam iti /
GSP28durdhpru:7094: evaṃ tāvat kaścid viśeṣaṇabhūto 'rtho 'rthāt pratīyamānaḥ svaśabdenocyate na vā vaktur
GSP28durdhpru:7095: icchāvaśād iti pratipādya kaścit punar viśeṣaṇabhūto 'rthaḥ pratīyamāno 'py avaśyaṃ
GSP28durdhpru:7098: svaśabdaḥ svavācako yasya viśeṣaṇarūpasyārthasya sa tathoktaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:7100: prayayabhedaḥ prayayabhedalakṣaṇo 'rtho viśeṣaṇātmā 'vaśyaṃ svavācakena prayayabhedaśabdenābhidhīyate iti prakaraṇāt /
GSP28durdhpru:7102: kasimin sādhye sādhanam idam ity āha --- śabdasyeti /
GSP28durdhpru:7105: svabhāvahetoḥ sādharmyavat prayogamātre darśayitavye kim anekasya svabhāvahetoḥ prayogo darśita ity āśaṅkya phalam asyopadarśayann āha --- evamarthaṃ caitad iti /
GSP28durdhpru:7106: evaṃ vakṣyamāṇako 'rthaḥ prayojanaṃ yasyeti vigrahaḥ kāryaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:7109: evamarthaṃ caitat hetujātam iti kvacit pāṭhas tatra ca jātaṃ vṛndaṃ draṣṭavyam /
GSP28durdhpru:7112: kasyacit pratipattuḥ svabhāvahetāv api prayukte vyāmoho `nāyaṃ svabhāvaḥ' iti viparyayajñānam /
GSP28durdhpru:7113: etad uktaṃ bhavati --- yadi trayāṇām anyatama upādīyate tadā kadācid anyenānyathā prayukte svabhāvahetau śāstroktasvabhāvahetuvācaka[bhinna]tvāt `nāyaṃ svabhāvavācakaḥ' iti vācake
GSP28durdhpru:7119: kena siddha ity āha --- yathāsvaṃ pramāṇair iti[256] /
GSP28durdhpru:7120: yasya sādhyadharmyasya yadātmīyaṃ pramāṇaṃ tenaiva pramāṇena siddha ity arthaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:7121: svabhāvahetūnāṃ ca bahubhedatvāt saṃbandhasādhanāny api pramāṇāni bahūnīti pramāṇair iti bahuvacananirdeśaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:7125: [256] atha nāntarīyatvāniścaye 'pi liṅgasya parokṣārthapratipādakatvaṃ syād ity āha --- ṭi-
GSP28durdhpru:7126: tad ayaṃ paramārthaḥ --- na hetuḥ pradīpavad yogyatayā gamako 'pi tu nāntarīyakatayā viniścitaḥ[257] /
GSP28durdhpru:7127: sādhyāvinābhāvitvaniściyanam eva[258] hi hetoḥ sādhyapratipādanavyāpāro nāyaḥ kaścit /
GSP28durdhpru:7133: sa vyāmoho mā bhūd ity etad arthaṃ trividhaḥ svabhāvahetur uktaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:7135: siddho niścitaḥ sambandhas tādātmyalakṣaṇo yasya tasmin /
GSP28durdhpru:7136: yasya sādhyadharmasya yadātnmīyam iti yena pramāṇena yasya sādhyasya sādhanavyāpa[ka]taṃ niścīyate /
GSP28durdhpru:7140: kiṃ tanniścayenety āha --- tad ayam iti /
GSP28durdhpru:7141: yata evaṃ tat tasmād ayam abhidhāsyamānas tātparyārthaḥ sarva ityāder vākyasya /
GSP28durdhpru:7144: nanu parokṣārthapratipādanavyāpārasamāveśād hetur gamakaḥ tat kiṃ sādhyanāntarīyakatvaniścayenety āha --- sādhyeti /
GSP28durdhpru:7146: sādhyāvinābhāvitvaniścayanam atrāpīdam etat svabhāvam iti niścayaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:7147: tad eva hetoḥ pratipādanavyāpāraḥ parokṣārthapratipādanalakṣaṇo vyāpāraḥ parokṣārthapratipādakatam ity arthaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:7148: yady evam aniścatasambanbhe 'pi sādhyadharme sādhanadharmas tannāntarīyakatayā niścetuṃ śakya iti kiṃ siddhasambandhena sādhyenānusṛtenety āha --- prathamam iti /
GSP28durdhpru:7152: yad darśanadvārāyātāv etau kṛtakatvānityatvavikalpau vyāvṛttiniṣṭhau paramārthatas tasya tādātmyād ity uktaprāyam ity doṣaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:7153: tādātmyāvasāyaḥ kuta iti cet viparyaye vādhakapramāṇavaśāt /
GSP28durdhpru:7154: tata eva tarhi sādhyaṃ siddham iti kiṃ sādhyata iti cet /
GSP28durdhpru:7155: na tato dharmyanavacchedena plavamānākārāyāḥ pratīter apravṛttyaṅgasyodayāt /
GSP28durdhpru:7161: punar anumānakāle[261] sādhanaṃ sādhyanāntarīyakaṃ[262] sāmānyena smartavyam /
GSP28durdhpru:7162: kṛtakatvaṃ nāmāṇityasvabhāvam[263] iti sāmānyena smṛtam arthaṃ[264] punar viśeṣe yojayati --- idam api kṛtakatvaṃ śabde vartamānam anityasvabhāvam[265] eveti /
GSP28durdhpru:7172: tathā ca saty avinābhāvitvajñānam eva parokṣārthapratipādakatvaṃ nāma /
GSP28durdhpru:7173: tena niścitatanmātrānubandhe sādhyadharme sādhyadharmne svabhāvahetavaḥ prayoktavyā nānyatrety uktam //
GSP28durdhpru:7178: yady evaṃ sambandho niścetavyaḥ sādhyasya sādhanena saha /
GSP28durdhpru:7179: sādhanadharmamātrānubandhas tu sādhyasya kasmān niścito mṛgyata ity āha ---
GSP28durdhpru:7185: yo hi sādhayadharmaḥ sādhanadharmamātrānubandhavān sa eva tasya sādhanadharmasy svabhāvo nānyaḥ //
GSP28durdhpru:7187: svabhāva eva tu sādhye kasmād dhetuprayogaḥ?
GSP28durdhpru:7193: tasmāt sa eva sādhyaḥ kartavyaḥ yaḥ sādhanasya svabhāvaḥ syāt /
GSP28durdhpru:7200: yadi sādhyadharmaḥ sādhanasya svabhāvaḥ[274] syāt pratijñārthaikadeśas tarhi hetuḥ syād ity āha ---
GSP28durdhpru:7213: tadātmatāpratītiḥ pravṛttyaṅgam iyam asmād eva liṅgād iti kim avadyam?
GSP28durdhpru:7215: etac coktam api svārthānumāne 'dhikābhidhānārthaṃ punar uktam iheti draṣṭavyam //
GSP28durdhpru:7219: dūrād dhi śākhādimān artho vṛkṣa iti niścīyate na śiṃśapeti /
GSP28durdhpru:7220: atha ca sa eva vṛkṣaḥ saiva śiṃśapā /
GSP28durdhpru:7221: tasmād abhinnam api vastu niścayo bhinnam ādarśayati
GSP28durdhpru:7223: tasmān niścayārūḍharūpāpekṣayā anyat sādhanam anyat sādhyam /
GSP28durdhpru:7226: kasmāt punaḥ sādhanadharmamātranubandhyeva[277] sādhyaḥ svabhāvo nānya ity āha ---
GSP28durdhpru:7233: yo hi yan nānubadhyāti sa[279] tanniṣpattāv aniṣpannaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:7238: aniṣpannasya cakyaṃ bhaved ekasyaivārthasya bhāvābhāvau syātāṃ yugapat /
GSP28durdhpru:7239: na ca viruddhayor bhāvābhāvayor aikyaṃ yujyate,
GSP28durdhpru:7245: kiñ ca paścād utpadyamānaṃ pūrvaniṣpannād bhinnahetukam /
GSP28durdhpru:7247: tato niṣpannāniṣpannyor niruddhadharmasaṃsargātmko bhedo bhedahetuś ca kāraṇabheda iti kuta ekatvam?
GSP28durdhpru:7248: tamāt sādhadharmamātrānubandhy eva sādhyaḥ svabhāvo nāyaḥ //
GSP28durdhpru:7249: mā bhūt paścān niṣpannaḥ pūrvajasya svabhāvaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:7250: sādhyas tu kasmān na bhavatīty āha
GSP28durdhpru:7253: pūrvajena paścān niṣpannasya vyabhicāraḥ parityāgo yas tasya sa bhavāc ca
GSP28durdhpru:7254: nanu kim asya sambhavo 'sti yad uttaikātmana evaikā vyāvṛttir niścīyate netarety āha --- dūrād iti /
GSP28durdhpru:7259: vāstavaṃ vastusvarūpād āgatam asamāropitam ity arthaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:7263: tasmin sati niyamena nopatiṣṭhata iti yāvat /
GSP28durdhpru:7264: kasmāt tatsvabhāvatvam ayuktam ity āha --- yata iti /
GSP28durdhpru:7265: bhavatāṃ bhāvābhāvarūpe tathā 'pi kiṃ tayos tatsvabhāvatvam ity āha --- bhāveti /
GSP28durdhpru:7273: tathā ca siddhasādhanadharmamātrānubandha eva svabhāve svabhāhetavaḥ prayoktavyā iti sthitam //
GSP28durdhpru:7278: asti ca iha dhūma iti III-21
GSP28durdhpru:7284: yatra dhūma iti dhūmam anūdya tatrāgnir ity agner[283] vidhiḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:7289: [284] vyāptir vyāpakasya tatra bhāva evetyādikaḥ --- ṭi-
GSP28durdhpru:7293: iha api siddha eva kāryakāraṇabhāve kāraṇe sādhye[285]kāryahetur vaktavyaḥ III-22
GSP28durdhpru:7296: iha apīti / na kevalaṃ svabhāvahetāv ihāpi kāryahetau[286] /
GSP28durdhpru:7299: yato na yogyatayā hetur gamako 'pi tu nāntarīyakatvād ity uktam //
GSP28durdhpru:7304: evaṃ niruddhadharmasaṃsargātmakabhedaṃ pratipādya tasya hetuṃ kāraṇabhedaṃ pratipādyitum āha --- kiñ ceti nipātasamudāyo vaktavyāntarasamuccaye
GSP28durdhpru:7305: pūrvaniṣpannavastuhetukatve tadaivotpattiprasaṅena paścād upādāyogād iti bhāvo bhinnhetukam iti bruvataḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:7306: bhinnahetukatve 'pi kathaṃ bheda ity āha --- hetubhedeti /
GSP28durdhpru:7313: tasmād ityādinā sādhanadharmamātrānubandhinas tat svabhāvatvaṃ sādhanasvabhāvtvañ copasaṃharati /
GSP28durdhpru:7314: caśabdaḥ sādhya ityasyānantaraṃ tatsvabhāvatvāpekṣayā sādhyatvaṃ samuccinoti /
GSP28durdhpru:7315: tathā ca tanniṣpattāv eva niṣpannsasya tādātmye tanmātrānubandhina eva ca sādhyatve sati //
GSP28durdhpru:7319: vaidharmyavataḥ[288]prayogaḥ --- yat sad upalabdhilakṣaṇaprāptaṃ tad upalabhyata eva,
GSP28durdhpru:7321: na ca evam iha upalabdhilakṣaṇaprāptasya sata upalabdhir ghaṭasya ity anupalabdhiprayogaḥ III-23
GSP28durdhpru:7324: vaidharmyavata[289] iti yat sad upalabdhilakṣaṇaprāptam iti yat sat dṛśya ity astitvānuvādaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:7326: [290]tad anena dṛśyasya sattvaṃ darśanaviṣayatvena vyāptaṃ kathitam,
GSP28durdhpru:7330: tathā ca [291]sādhyanivṛttiḥ sādhananivṛttau niyatatvāt sādhananivṛttyā vyāptā kathitā /
GSP28durdhpru:7331: yadi ca dharmaṇi sādhyadharmo na bhaved [292]hetur api na bhavet /
GSP28durdhpru:7334: ato vyāpakasya sādhanābhāvasyābhāvād[296] vyāpyasya[297] sādhyābhāvasyābhāva iti sādhyagatir[298] bhavati /
GSP28durdhpru:7335: tato vaidharmyaprayoge sādhanābhāve sādhyābhāvo[299] niyato darśanīyaḥ sarvatreti nyāyaḥ //
GSP28durdhpru:7352: tallakṣaṇo 'rthaḥ pratipādyatayā 'bhidheyaḥ prayojanaṃ vā 'sya --- yatra dhūma ityādeḥ prayogasyeti prastāvāt,
GSP28durdhpru:7355: etad eva vyanakti tad iti yata evaṃ tat tasmāt /
GSP28durdhpru:7360: ayam āśayaḥ --- vyāptiḥ khaluḥ pratibandhaḥ sādhyāyattatvam /
GSP28durdhpru:7361: tac cārthāntarasyārthāntare pratibaddhatvaṃ kāryakāraṇabhāvavaśād iti sa eva nimittaṃ tasya,
GSP28durdhpru:7365: kiṃ tatra vyāptisādhakaṃ pramāṇaṃ yad apekṣayā tasya viṣayatvam ity āha --- pratyakṣeti /
GSP28durdhpru:7367: pratyakṣānupalambhānāṃ pratyekaṃ jātyekatvavivakṣayā pratyakṣānupalambhyām ity avaseyam /
GSP28durdhpru:7368: kāryakāraṇbhāvād ātmā niścayārūḍhaḥ svabhāvo yasyeti vigrahaḥ kāryo 'nyathā yuktivirodhaḥ svavacanavirodhaś cā 'sya syāt /
GSP28durdhpru:7370: pakṣadharmasyopasaṃhāro ḍhaukanaṃ tatra sattvapradarśanam ity arthaḥ //
GSP28durdhpru:7373: asaty anityatve na asty eva[300] sattvam utpattimattvaṃ kṛtakatvaṃ vā /
GSP28durdhpru:7374: [301] saṃś ca śabda utpattimān kṛtako vā iti svabhāvahetoḥ prayogaḥ III-24
GSP28durdhpru:7379: ihānityatvasya sādhyasyābhāvo hetor abhāve niyata[302] ucyate /
GSP28durdhpru:7380: tena hetvabhāvena[303] sādhyābhāvo vyāpta[304] uktas triṣv api svabhāvahetuṣu /
GSP28durdhpru:7381: sann utpattimān kṛtako vā śabda iti trayāṇām api pakṣadharmatvapradarśanam /
GSP28durdhpru:7383: tato vyāpyo 'pi sādhyābhāvo nirvartata[306] iti sādhyagatiḥ //
GSP28durdhpru:7393: asaty agnau na bhavaty eva dhūmaḥ[308] /
GSP28durdhpru:7394: atra ca asti dhūma iti kāryahetoḥ prayogaḥ III-25
GSP28durdhpru:7399: [310]asti dhūma atra iti vyāpakasya dhūmābhāsyābhāva uktaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:7406: tat katham etat trirūpaliṅgākhyānam ity āha ---
GSP28durdhpru:7409: dṛṣṭāntadārṣṭāntikayor hetusadbhāvāsadbhāvadvārakaṃ vaidharmyaṃ vidyate pratipādyatayā yasya taṃ darśayitum āha vārtikakāraḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:7410: tathā ceti sādhyanivṛttyanuvādena sādhananivṛttiprakāre satīty arthaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:7411: sādhyanivṛttir abhāvaḥ sādhanasya nivṛttyā 'bhāvena vyāptā ātmaniyatīkṛtā kathitā prakāśitā /
GSP28durdhpru:7412: kuta ity āha --- sādhanasya nivṛttāv abhāve niyatatvād avyabhicāritvāt sādhyanivṛtter iti prakramāt /
GSP28durdhpru:7413: yato yatra sādhyābhāvas tan niyatatvam asya /
GSP28durdhpru:7416: dharmaṇīty anena dharmamātram upadarśayan sarvopasaṃhāravatīṃ vyāptim āha /
GSP28durdhpru:7417: kutaḥ punaḥ sādhyābhāve sādhanābhāva ity āha --- hetvabhāveneti /
GSP28durdhpru:7420: ato vyāpakābhāvāt sādhyābhāvaḥ sadvyavahārayogyatvalakṣaṇo vyāpyo nivarttate / yata evam
GSP28durdhpru:7422: sādharmyeṇa api hi prayoge arthād vaidharmyagatir iti[312] III-26
GSP28durdhpru:7426: sādharmyaṇāpi abhidheyena ukte prayoge kriyamāṇe arthāt[313] sāmarthyāt vaidharyasya vyatirekasya gatir bhavatīti[314] /
GSP28durdhpru:7433: yadi nāma vyatireko 'nvayavatā[316] noktas tathāpi anvyavacanasāmarthyād evāvasīyate //
GSP28durdhpru:7437: asati tasmin sādhyena hetor anvayābhāvāt III-27
GSP28durdhpru:7438: asati tasmin vyatireke[317] buddhyādhyavasite sādhyena hetor anvyasya [318]buddhyādhyavasitasyābhvāt[319] /
GSP28durdhpru:7439: [320]sādhye niyataṃ sādhanam anvayavākyād avasyatā sādhyābhāve sādhanaṃ nāśaṅkanīyam /
GSP28durdhpru:7452: kathaṃ punas atra sādhyaniścayo jāyata ity āha --- iheti svabhāvahetuprayogatraye /
GSP28durdhpru:7453: co yasmāt sādhanābhāsya sattvādinivṛtte abhāvaḥ sattvādividhir uktaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:7461: dhūmābhāvasyābhāvo dhūmasattaiva pratiṣedhapratiṣedhasya vidhirūpatvād evaṃ pūrvatrāpi vijñeyam /
GSP28durdhpru:7464: na kevalaṃ vyatirekeṇābhidheyena yukta ity apiśabdaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:7467: etad iha jñātavyam --- anvayavyatirekaor bhedasya vyāvṛttinibandhanbatvād vastutas
GSP28durdhpru:7468: tādātmyāt svabhāvahetujānumānabalād itarapratītir na tv anyathā 'nupapattilakṣaṇārthāpattir anenocyata iti /
GSP28durdhpru:7476: tatheti / yathā 'nvayavākye tathā 'rthād eva vaidharmyeṇa prayoge 'nvayasyānabhidhīyamānasyāpi gatiḥ //
GSP28durdhpru:7478: asati tasmin sādhyābhāve hetvabhāvasya asiddheḥ III-29
GSP28durdhpru:7479: asati tasmin anvaye buddhigṛhīte [322]sādhyābhāve hetvabhāvasyāsiddher anavasāyāt /
GSP28durdhpru:7480: hetvabhve sādhyābhāvaṃ niyataṃ vyatirekavākyād avasyatā hetusaṃbhave sādhyābhāvo nāśaṅkanīyaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:7481: itarathā hetvabhāve[323] niyato[324] na syāt pratītaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:7494: abhiprāyam ajānānaḥ para āha --- katham iti /
GSP28durdhpru:7496: abhidheyatayā sthita ity āśaṅkām apākṛttum āha --- buddhyeti /
GSP28durdhpru:7497: tādātmyatadutpattinibandhane pratibandhena pratibandhena pratibaddhatvāt sādhanam idaṃ sādhyābhve na bhavaty eveti buddhyā 'dhyavasite viṣayīkṛte 'sati /
GSP28durdhpru:7498: sādhyena hetor anvayasya --- anvīyamānatvasya --- yatra sādhanaṃ tatra sarvatrāvaśyaṃ
GSP28durdhpru:7499: sādhyam ity evaṃrūpasya buddhyā 'dhyavasitasyety etad anvayavākyopasthāpitayā buddhyā
GSP28durdhpru:7502: yadi sādhyābhāve 'pi sādhanaṃ syāt tadā yatraivādaḥ sādhyābhāve 'pi vṛttam iṣyate
GSP28durdhpru:7503: tatraiva tat sādhanam apy asti na ca sādhyam iti kathaṃ yatra yatra sādhanadharmas
GSP28durdhpru:7504: tatra tatra sādhyadharma iti sarvopasaṃhāreṇānvaya uktaḥ syād iti /

GSP28durdhpru:7506: pratiyatā sādhyābhāve sādhanaṃ nāśaṅkanīyaṃ na sandehanīyam /

GSP28durdhpru:7509: astu sādhyābhāve sādhanābhāvāvasāyo vyatirekas tu kathaṃ pratīyata ity āha --- sādhyeti /
GSP28durdhpru:7512: yadi nāmākāśādau sādhyābhāve sādhanābhāvas tathāpi kim iti hetusambhave sādhyasaṃbhava ity āha ---
GSP28durdhpru:7513: na hi svabhāvapratibandhe asaty ekasya nivṛttāv aparasya niyamena nivṛttiḥ III-30
GSP28durdhpru:7514: na hīti / [327]svabhāvena pratibandho yas tasminn asty ekasya sādhayasya nivṛttyā nāparasya sādhanasya niyamena yuktā niyamavatī nivṛttiḥ //

GSP28durdhpru:7757: yasmāt sādharmyavatprayoge api yad upalabdhilakṣaṇaprāptaṃ san na upalabhyate so asadvyavahāraviṣayaḥ[359]/

GSP28durdhpru:7787: iti tadvacanasyāpy avaśyaprayojyatvād avayavatvād avagata( apagataṃ)

GSP28durdhpru:7792: atha kim asya sambhavo 'sti yo nirdiṣṭe hi sādhye sādhane vā 'bhihite nirdaśite codāharaṇe kṛte 'py upanaye nigamite ca sarvāvayavavyāpāre sādhyaṃ na budhyata iti?

GSP28durdhpru:7804: tathā vaidharmyavatprayoge api --- yaḥ sadvyavahāraviṣaya upalabdhilakṣaṇaprāptaḥ,
GSP28durdhpru:7806: na[363]tathā atra tādṛśo ghaṭa upalabhyata ity ukte sāmarthyād eva neha sadvyavahāraviṣaya iti bhavati III-36
GSP28durdhpru:7809: yathā sādharmyavatprayoge tathā vaidharmyavatprayoge 'pi sāmarthyād eva neha savyavahāraviṣayo[364] 'sti ghaṭa iti bhavati /
GSP28durdhpru:7812: sāmarthyaṃ darśayitum āha--- yaḥ sadvyavahāraviṣaya iti vidyamānaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:7813: upalabdhilakṣaṇaprāpta iti dṛśyaḥ ity eṣā sādhyanivṛttiḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:7815: anena ca[366] sādhyanivṛttiḥ sādhananivṛttyā vyāptā darśitā /
GSP28durdhpru:7816: na tatheti --- yathā 'nyo dṛśya upalabhyate na tathātra pradeśe tādṛśa iti dṛśyo ghaṭa upalabhyata iti /
GSP28durdhpru:7817: anena sādhyanivṛtter vyāpikā nivṛttir asatī sādhyadharmiṇi darśitā /
GSP28durdhpru:7818: yadi ca[367] sādhyadharmaḥ sādhyadharmiṇi na syāt sādhanadharmo 'pi na bhavet[368] /
GSP28durdhpru:7825: nyāyabhāṣyaṭīkāvārtikayor viśvarūpodyotakrarāv āhatuḥ “purā viṣayanirūpaṇapūrvakam eva hi karaṇavyāparaṇaṃ dṛṣṭam /
GSP28durdhpru:7831: yato yadi hetuṃ prayuñjānena viṣayaḥ sisādhayiṣito 'rtho nirūpayitavyo buddhau niveśanīya ity abhimatam,
GSP28durdhpru:7833: na hi kaścit sādhyam aniścityaiva parapratipattaye sādhanavākyam abhidhatte /
GSP28durdhpru:7834: atha vacanena karaṇasya hetoḥ sa viṣayo darśayitavya iti matiḥ,
GSP28durdhpru:7836: yadi parasya pratītir anyathā na syāt sarvaṃ śobhetety uttaram iti kiṃ kṣuṇṇakṣodīkaraṇena?
GSP28durdhpru:7839: adhyayanaḥ punā ruciṭīkāyām idam avocat “dharmaviśiṣṭasya dharmiṇo nirdeśaḥ kriyate śrotur āśvāsanārtham /
GSP28durdhpru:7840: na tv ādau dharmaviśiṣṭasya dharmiṇo nirdeśo yuktaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:7845: tato 'vinābhāvaṃ smarati tadanantaraṃ tad evedam iti parāmṛśati /
GSP28durdhpru:7849: na ca svārthe dharmaviśiṣṭasya dharmiṇo darśanam asti /
GSP28durdhpru:7855: ataḥ sāmarthyāt nāsty atra ghaṭa iti pratīter na pakṣānirdeśaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:7856: evaṃ kāryasvabhāvahetvor api sāmarthyāt saṃprayaya iti na [371]pakṣanirdeśaḥ
GSP28durdhpru:7863: kīdṛśaḥ punar arthaḥ pakṣa iti --- anena śabdena niddeśo vaktavyaḥ?ity āha ---
GSP28durdhpru:7864: svarūpeṇaiva svayam iṣṭo[373]'nirākṛtaḥ pakṣa iti[374] III-38
GSP28durdhpru:7870: iṣṭa iti --- nokta evāpi tv iṣṭo 'pīty arthaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:7877: na sādhanavākyāvayavatvād asya lakṣaṇam uktam api tv asādhyaṃ [377]kecit sādhyam,
GSP28durdhpru:7890: svarūpeṇaiva iti sādhyatvena eva iṣṭo[379]na sādhanatvena api III-40
GSP28durdhpru:7894: nanu caivaśabdaḥ kevala eva pratyavamarṣṭavyas tat[380] kimarthaṃ svarūpaśabdena
GSP28durdhpru:7899: kathaṃ cāsau sandgidhārthābhidhāyinaḥ pratijñāvacanād āsthām utpādayatīti samīcīnaṃ nirūpitam /
GSP28durdhpru:7900: āsthā khalu idam eva manye 'rthety abhisampratayayaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:7902: jātau vā sādhanādyabhidhānaṃ na kathaṃ vaiyartham aśnuvītety alaṃ bahunā //
GSP28durdhpru:7903: atra sāmarthyāt svayaṃśabdasya vādineti vivṛtiḥ kṛtā na tu svayamśabdasya vādinety arthaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:7908: padāntarābhihitasyārthasya viśeṣaṃ dyotayati iti padāntareṇa viśeṣyavācinā saha nirdiṣṭaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:7917: yathā śabdasya anityatve sādhye cākṣuṣatvaṃ hetuḥ,
GSP28durdhpru:7919: na punas tad iha sādhyatvena eva iṣṭam[383],
GSP28durdhpru:7924: [385]yatheti / śabdasya anityatve sādhye cākṣuṣatvaṃ hetuḥ śabde asiddhatvāt sādhyam --- ity anena sādhyatveneṣṭam āha /
GSP28durdhpru:7933: svayam ity anena svayaṃśabdaṃ vyākhyeyam upakṣitya tasyārtham āha ---
GSP28durdhpru:7935: vādineti / svayaṃśabdo nipāta ātmana iti [386]ṣaṣṭhyantasyātmaneti ca tṛtīyāntasyātha[387] varttate /
GSP28durdhpru:7939: tato yasya vādina ātmā tṛtīyārthayuktaḥ[389] sa eva[390] tṛtīyārthayukto nirdiṣṭo vādineti /
GSP28durdhpru:7942: [386] nāśaṃ svayam icchatītyādau ātmano nāśam icchatīty arthaḥ --- ṭi-
GSP28durdhpru:7951: yat sādhanatveneṣṭaṃ tat kathaṃ sādhyatvenāpīṣṭaṃ bhavatīty āha --- asiddha[tvā]d iti /
GSP28durdhpru:7953: sādhyatveneṣṭo 'pi yadā sādhanatvenoktas tadā 'pakṣa ity evam artha evaśabda iti samudāyārthaḥ //
GSP28durdhpru:7957: yas tadā --- iti vādakāle sādhanam āha /
GSP28durdhpru:7961: yady evaṃ[393] vādinā iṣṭaḥ sādhyaḥ --- ity uktam /
GSP28durdhpru:7963: anena[394] tadā vādakāle tena vādinā svayaṃ yo dharmaḥ sādhayitum iṣṭaḥ sa eva sādhyo[395] netaro [396]dharma ity uktaṃ bhavati /
GSP28durdhpru:7964: vādino 'niṣṭadharmasādhyatvanivarttanam asya vacanasya phalam iti yāvat //
GSP28durdhpru:7970: atha kasmin saty anyadharmasādhyatvasya sambhavo yannivṛttyarhaṃ [397]tad vaktavyam ity āha ---
GSP28durdhpru:7973: etena yady api kvacic śāstre sthitaḥ sādhanam āha,
GSP28durdhpru:7974: tacchāstrakāreṇa tasmin dharmiṇy anekadharmābhyupagame 'pi yas tadā tena vādinā[398]dharmaḥ svayaṃ sādhayitum
GSP28durdhpru:7978: iha pakṣalakṣaṇe svayaṃśabdo gṛhīta iti śeṣaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:7980: ātmanā iṣṭa ity atra tṛtīyāyāḥ karttari vidhānāt //
GSP28durdhpru:7984: viśeṣaṇaṃ vyavacchedakam etad yastadāsādhanam ahet vacanam /
GSP28durdhpru:7988: ucyatām evaṃ ko doṣa ity āha --- eteneti /
GSP28durdhpru:7991: tat ko 'tiśayo 'nena pratipāditia iti cedayitur āśayaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:7993: anena yas tadā sādhanam āheti viśeṣaṇāvacchinnena svayaṃśabdena /
GSP28durdhpru:7996: tacchāstrakāreṇa tatra yāvad iṣṭaṃ tāvaccettasyasādhyatveneṣṭaṃ tadṣṭam ity eva kṛtaṃ syāt,
GSP28durdhpru:8001: iṣṭaḥ, sa eva sādhyo na itara ity uktaṃ bhavati III-44
GSP28durdhpru:8003: yacchāstraṃ tena vādinā 'bhyuagataṃ tacchāstrakāreṇa tasmin sādhyadharmiṇi anekasya [399]dharmasyābhyupagame sati anyadharamasādhyatvasambhavaḥ
GSP28durdhpru:8004: tathā hi --- śāstraṃ yenābhyupagataṃ [400]tatsiddho dharamaḥ sarva eva tena sādhyaty ity asti vipratipattiḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:8006: anekadharmābhuypagame 'pi sati sa eva sādhye yo vādina iṣṭo nānya iti /
GSP28durdhpru:8011: ato 'napekṣaṇīyatvān na śāstre sthitvā vādaḥ karttavyaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:8013: āhopuruṣikayā tu yady api kvacicchāṣtre sthita iti kiñcicchāstram abhyupagataḥ sādhanam āha,
GSP28durdhpru:8014: tathāpi ya eva tasyeṣṭaḥ sa eva[402] sādhya[403] iti jñāpanāyedam uktam //
GSP28durdhpru:8020: iṣṭa iti yatrārthe vivādena sādhanam upanyastaṃ tasya siddhim icchatā so [404]anukto api vacanena sādhyaḥ III-45
GSP28durdhpru:8023: yatrārtha ātmani viruddho vādaḥprakrāntaḥ --- `nāsti ātmā' --- ity ātmapratiṣedhavāda ātmasattāvādaviruddhaḥ,
GSP28durdhpru:8025: tena vivādena hetunā sādhanam upanyastaṃ tasyātāmārthasya siddhiṃ niścayam icchatā vādinā so 'rthaḥ sādhya ity uktaṃ bhavati iṣṭaśabdena /
GSP28durdhpru:8026: yat tad `ity uktaṃ bhavati' iti grahaṇam ante tad ihāpekṣya vākyaṃ [405]samāpayitavyam /
GSP28durdhpru:8029: yady api parārthānumāna ukta eva sādhyo uktaḥ,
GSP28durdhpru:8034: ity asti vipratipattir nyāyaviruddhā pratipattiḥ keṣāñcit /
GSP28durdhpru:8037: anekadharmābhyupagame 'pi śāstrakārasya tatra dharmiṇy anekadharmopagame saty api /
GSP28durdhpru:8038: vādina ity ātmana iti ṣaṣṭhyantasyārthe vṛttaṃ svayaṃśabdam u[pā]dāya /
GSP28durdhpru:8040: viruddhaḥ parasya cābhipretaviparītārthopasyāpako vādaḥ svaparapakṣayoḥ siddhyasiddhyarthaṃ vacanam /
GSP28durdhpru:8042: ity uktaṃ bhavatīti nātra śrūyate tat katham evaṃ vyākhyāyata ity āha --- yat tad iti /
GSP28durdhpru:8049: [407]tad iti so 'rtho 'dhikaraṇam āśrayo yasya sa tad adhikaraṇo vivādaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:8053: etad ukataṃ bhavati --- yasmād vivādaṃ nirākarttum icchatā vādinā sādhanam upanyastaṃ tasmād yadadhikaraṇaṃ vivādasya tad eva sādhyam /
GSP28durdhpru:8054: yato viruddhaṃ vādam apanetuṃ sādhanam upanyastaṃ tac cet na sādhyaṃ kim idānīṃ [408]jātiniyataṃ kiṃcit sādhyaṃ syād iti //
GSP28durdhpru:8062: yathā parārthāś cakṣurādayaḥ saṃghātatvāc chayanāsanādyaṅgavad iti /
GSP28durdhpru:8064: [411]tena noktamātram eva sādhyam ity uktaṃ bhavati III-47
GSP28durdhpru:8070: cakṣurādir yeṣāṃ śrotrādīnāṃ te[412] cakṣurādaya iti dharmī /
GSP28durdhpru:8074: śayanam āsanaṃ ca te ādī[414] yasya tacchayanādi puruṣopabhogāṅga saṃghātarūpam /
GSP28durdhpru:8075: tadvad atra [415]pramāṇe yad apy ātmārthāś cakṣurādaya ity ātmārthatā noktā [416]anuktāv apy ātmārthatā sādhyā /
GSP28durdhpru:8086: kuta ity āha --- sāmarthyoktatvāt tasya buddhisthasyātmādeḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:8087: etad uktaṃ bhavati --- parārthānumāne ukto 'rthaḥ sādhyaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:8089: prakāśyamānatā ca sākṣād abhidhāvyāpāraviṣayatayā ca sāmarthyamyatayā ca /
GSP28durdhpru:8092: kuta etad iti sāmarthyoktatvam iti hetor āha vārttakakāraḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:8096: tataḥ sāṅkhyena svavādaviruddhaṃ bauddhavāda hetūkṛtya virūddhavādanirākraṇāya svavādapratiṣṭhāpanāya ca sādhanam upanyastam /
GSP28durdhpru:8099: [419] śayanāsanādiṣu hi puruṣopabhogāṅgeṣv ātmārthatvenānvayo[420] na prasiddhaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:8109: cakṣurādaya ityādigrahaṇādivijñānam api[422] parārthaṃ sādhayitum iṣṭam /
GSP28durdhpru:8112: [422] bauddhānāṃ mate paramāṇurūpaṃ jñāṇamataḥ sāṅghātarūpatvam --- ṭi-
GSP28durdhpru:8113: [423]parasyārthakāri vijñānaṃ setsyatīti sāmarthyād ātmārthatvaṃ sidhyate cakṣurādīnām iti matvā parāthagrahaṇaṃ kṛtam /
GSP28durdhpru:8115: api tu prativādino vivādāspadatvād vādinaḥ[425] sādhayitum iṣṭam --- uktam,
GSP28durdhpru:8116: anuktaṃ vā prakaraṇagamyaṃ sādhyam ity uktaṃ bhavati//
GSP28durdhpru:8121: yady api tanmūlo vivādas tathāpi abhidhāvyāpāraviśrāmabhūmir evārthaḥ ṣadhyaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:8123: tathābhūtas tat kathaṃ sādhya ity āśaṅkyāha --- etad uktaṃ bhavatīti /
GSP28durdhpru:8124: yad ātmādi adhirakaṇam āspadaṃ vivādasya --- astīdaṃ nāstīdam ity ātmakasya prarasparaviruddhasya vādasya /
GSP28durdhpru:8127: tad viruddhavādāpanetṛhetūpanyāsaviṣayaṃ ced yadi na sādhyaṃ na jijñāpayiṣitam idānīm
GSP28durdhpru:8128: etasminn abhyupagame kiṃ jātiniyataṃ sādhyatvajātiniyataṃ jātivaśaṃ kiñcid vastu
GSP28durdhpru:8130: kṣepe kimaḥprayogān na kiñcid ity artho 'vatiṣṭhate //
GSP28durdhpru:8134: tena krameṇa yugapad vā saṃhataṃ tad iti saṃhatarūpaṃ vijñānam api krameṇānekarūpam atas tatrāpi saṃhā(ghā)
GSP28durdhpru:8135: tatvaṃ siddhim iti tad apy ādiśabdena saṅgṛhītaṃ dharmi karttavyam /
GSP28durdhpru:8136: ata evānantaram `atrādiśabdād vijñānam api' iti vakṣyate /
GSP28durdhpru:8146: yady ayṃ tasyābhiprāyas tadā ''tmārthā ity eva kiṃ na bravītīty āśaṅkya yenābhiprāyeṇaivam avādīttaṃ darśayitum āha --- śayaneti /
GSP28durdhpru:8149: anirākṛta iti --- etallakṣaṇayoge api yaḥ sādhayitum iṣṭo apy arthaḥ pratyakṣānumānapratītisvavacanair nirākriyate,
GSP28durdhpru:8154: etad iti anantaraprakāntaṃ ya pakṣaṇam utkaṃ sādhyateneṣṭetyādi[427] --- etallakṣaṇena yoge 'pi apy artho na pakṣa iti pradarśanārtham [428]pratipādanāya anirākṛtagraṇaṃ kṛtam /
GSP28durdhpru:8158: kīdṛśo 'rtho na pakṣaḥ sādhaytum iṣṭo 'pīty āha --- yaḥ sādhayitum iṣṭo 'rtho ---
GSP28durdhpru:8159: pratyakṣaṃ cānumānaṃ ca pratītiś ca svavacanaṃ ca --- [429]etair nirākriyate ---
GSP28durdhpru:8166: tatreti / teṣu caturṣu pratakṣādinirārkṛteṣu[431] prakṣanirrākṛtaḥ kīdṛśaḥ? yatheti /
GSP28durdhpru:8167: yathā 'yaṃ pratyakṣanirākṛtas tathā'ye 'pi draṭavyā iti yathāśabdārthaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:8177: tat katham ātmārthatāsiddhir ity āha cakṣurādaya ity atreti /
GSP28durdhpru:8178: tathāpi kutas tatsiddhir ity āha vijñānāc ceti /
GSP28durdhpru:8180: atha vijñānsyāpi dharmitve katham ātmārthatāsiddhir ity āśaṅkya spaṣṭayitum āha --- parasyeti /
GSP28durdhpru:8182: ātmārthatvaṃ siddhyāt cakṣarādīnām ity evaṃ matvā parārthagrahaṇaṃ kṛtaṃ sāṃkhyeneti prastāvāt,
GSP28durdhpru:8185: tat siddhaikaṃ sāmarthyam ity āśaṅkya parasyeti yojyam /
GSP28durdhpru:8188: ādiśabdād vijñāsyāpi tathātve sādhye vijñānaṃ parārthakāri setsyatīti /
GSP28durdhpru:8193: tac ca dvavidham iti darśayann āha --- uktam ityādi /
GSP28durdhpru:8196: kathaṃ tarhi tatsādhyam ity āha --- prakaraṇeti /
GSP28durdhpru:8197: prakaraṇena sādhyopanyāsāśrayatayā prakṛtatvena gamyaṃ prakāśyaṃ sādhyaṃ sādhyam evety uktaṃ bhavati //
GSP28durdhpru:8199: anumānanirākṛto yathā --- nityaḥ śabda iti III-50
GSP28durdhpru:8205: pratītinirākṛto yathā --- acandraḥ śaśī iti III-51
GSP28durdhpru:8206: pratītyā nirākṛtaḥ acandra iti candraśabdavācyo na bhavati śaśīti pratijñātārthaḥ[435] /
GSP28durdhpru:8212: etallakṣaṇayoge 'pīty asyārthakathanam idam etallakṣaṇena yoge 'py artha iti /
GSP28durdhpru:8213: nanu ca pratyakṣādibhir nirākriyate 'pasāryate iti kila matam /
GSP28durdhpru:8215: pasāraṇaṃ pratyakṣādidharmo 'pi tu vastuvyavasthāpanam ity āha --- viparīta iti //
GSP28durdhpru:8216: śrūyate 'neneti śravaṇaṃ śrotrendrayaṃ tena grāhyaḥ upalabdhaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:8220: ayam asyāśayaḥ --- aśrāvaṇaḥ śabdaḥ --- śrotraje [65b] na jñānena nānubhūyata iti
GSP28durdhpru:8221: yaḥ pratijānīte tasya sā pratijñā śravaṇendriyajena pratyakṣeṇa śabdālambanena bādhyate
GSP28durdhpru:8224: yad uddyotakareṇoktam[436]--- `aśrāvaṇaḥ śabda iti pratyakṣaviruddhodāharaṇa varṇayati /
GSP28durdhpru:8235: na hy aśrāvaṇaśabdena śabdākhye viṣaye jñānotpattau śrotrendriyasya vṛtter abhāvo
GSP28durdhpru:8236: 'bhimato yasya vādinas tam prati śabdaviṣayaśravaṇendriyavṛtteḥ pratyakṣaviruddhatvāt
GSP28durdhpru:8238: yenocyate 'tīndriyendriyavavṛttiḥ kathaṃ pratyakṣā yenedam udāharaṇaṃ saṃgaccheteti /
GSP28durdhpru:8239: kin tarhi? yaḥ kaścid vyāmohamāhātmyād yad etac chrotragrāhyaṃ rūpam advayaṃ tan nāstīti pratījānīte taṃ vādiviśeṣaṃ pratīti kathaṃ na pratyakṣaviruddhodāharaṇam idam iti /
GSP28durdhpru:8244: tatrāsati śrāvaṇaśabde sarvasyaiva niṣedhe pratyakṣabādhā śaṅkyeta /
GSP28durdhpru:8245: śrāvaṇaśabdena tu śrutimātragrāhyam eva yadrūpaṃ tanniṣedhe pratyakṣabādhā na tu sāmānyadharmaniṣedha iti khyāpyata iti //
GSP28durdhpru:8248: tena vikalpajñānena[437] pratītirūpeṇa śaśanaś canadraśabdavācyatvaṃ siddham eva /
GSP28durdhpru:8249: tathā hi --- yad vikalpavijñānagrāhyaṃ[438] tac chabdākārasaṃsargayogyam /
GSP28durdhpru:8250: yac chaśadākārasaṃsargayogyaṃ tat sāṅketikena śabdena vaktuṃ śakyam /
GSP28durdhpru:8251: ataḥ praītirūpeṇa vikalpavijñānaviṣayatvena siddhaṃ candraśabdavācyatvam acandratvasya bādhakam /
GSP28durdhpru:8254: tataḥ svabhāvahetusiddhaṃ candraśabdavācyatvam vācyatvasya bādhakaṃ draṭavyam //
GSP28durdhpru:8264: sākṣāt kṛtasyāpy ajātādhyavasāyasya tathāvyavahārābhāvād iti bhāvaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:8265: viṣayiṇā viṣayagato dharma ukta iti sphuṭayate pratītiḥ pratītatvarūpeṇa patītatvam iti /
GSP28durdhpru:8269: tacchabdavācyatā tu katham ity āha --- yad iti /
GSP28durdhpru:8272: kiṃ sādhanasiddhim idaṃ candraśabdavācyatvam ity āha --- svabhāveti /
GSP28durdhpru:8275: evaṃ tu prayogo draṣṭavyaḥ --- yo 'rtho vikalpavijñānaviṣayaḥ sa sāṅketikena śabdena vaktuṃ śakyaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:8278: iha kenacic chabdena kasyacid abhidhātum aśakyatvaṃ vāstave pratiniyatārthaśabdasambandhe sati syāt /
GSP28durdhpru:8280: pāriśeṣyāj jñānātmany ārūḍhasyārthasya śabdasambandhaḥ karttuṃ kasya śakyo yas tena śabdākāreṇa saha naikasmin jñānena saṃsṛjuyate /
GSP28durdhpru:8281: aniyatārthaṃ ca vijñānam iti tadārūḍho 'rthas tadabhidhānākārasaṃsargayogya eva /
GSP28durdhpru:8282: tasmāt tena śabdenābhidhātum aśakyatvam atadākārasaṃsargayogatvena vyāptam /
GSP28durdhpru:8285: tad evaṃ vikalpavijñānaviṣayatvaṃ tadvyāpakavirūddhavyāptatvāt tenāpi viruddhyate /
GSP28durdhpru:8286: tataś ca tadviruddhena śakyatvena vyāpta iti svabhāvahetuḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:8287: tasmād vikalpavijñānaviṣayatvam eva pratītiḥ prasiddhir vyavahāraś cocyate /
GSP28durdhpru:8288: anayā patītyā yat sādhitaṃ śaśinaś candraśabdavācyatvaṃ tat svaviruddhasya tadanabhidheyatvasya bādhakaṃ bahvati /
GSP28durdhpru:8289: tena pratīter vikalpavijñānalakṣaṇāyā jāto dharma iṣṭaśabdābhidheyatvalakṣaṇas tenānabhidheyatvasya bādhanāt pratītibādhocyata iti paramārthaḥ
GSP28durdhpru:8290: yad vā pratītes tathārūpāyā jāta eveṣṭaśabdābhidheyatvalakṣaṇo dharmaḥ pratītiśabdenoktaḥ,
GSP28durdhpru:8295: yathā nānumānaṃ pramāṇam --- ity atra[439] anumānsya prāmāṇyaniṣedhaḥ pratijñārthaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:8296: sa[440] nānumānaṃ pramāṇam --- ity anena svavācakena vākyena bādhyate /
GSP28durdhpru:8297: vākyaṃ hi etat prayujyamānaṃ vaktuḥ [441]śābdapratyayasya sadarthatvam iṣṭaṃ sūcayate /
GSP28durdhpru:8298: tathā hi --- madvākyād yo 'rthasampratyayas tavotpadyate so 'satyārtha iti darśayan vākyam eva noccārayed vaktā,
GSP28durdhpru:8299: vacanārthaś ced astyaḥ pareṇa jñātvyo vacanam apārthakam /
GSP28durdhpru:8300: yo 'pi hi sarvaṃ mithyā bravīmīti[442] vakti so 'py asya vākyasya satyārthatvam ādarśayann eva vākyam uccārayati /
GSP28durdhpru:8302: evaṃ vākyāntarāṇy ātmīyāny asatyārthāni darśitāni bhavanti /
GSP28durdhpru:8305: tataś ca na kiñcid uccāraṇasya phalam iti noccārayet /
GSP28durdhpru:8306: tasmād vākyaprabhavaṃ vākyārthālambanaṃ vijñānaṃ satyārthaṃ darśayann eva vaktā [444]vākyam uccārayati /
GSP28durdhpru:8307: tathā[445] ca sati bāhyavastunāntarīyakaṃ śabdaṃ darśayatā śabdajaṃ vijñānaṃ satyārthaṃ darśayitavyam /
GSP28durdhpru:8308: tato bāhyārthakāryāc chabdād utpannaṃ vijñānaṃ satyārtham ādrśayatā [446]kāryaliṅgajam anumānaṃ pramāṇaṃ śābdaṃ darśitaṃ bhavati /
GSP28durdhpru:8314: [443] `etad eva' ityādi `bhavanti' ity antaṃ sūtratvena mudritam /
GSP28durdhpru:8315: kin tu nāsty etat sūtram --- saṃ-
GSP28durdhpru:8319: pratītimātrād eva sidho yo 'rthaḥ sa iha bādhaka iti darśayitum /
GSP28durdhpru:8324: svaśabdenātmavacanena prakṛtatvāt sādhyasyātmā gṛhyata iti abhiprāyeṇāha --- pratijñārthasyātmīya iti /
GSP28durdhpru:8325: tena nirākṛta iti tadupasthāpi tenānumānaprāṇāṇyena nirākṛta iti draṣṭavyam /
GSP28durdhpru:8326: kathaṃ nirākriyata ity āha --- vākyam iti /
GSP28durdhpru:8327: yasmād etad vākyaṃ prayujyamānaṃ sad vaktuḥ śābdapratyayasya śabdaprabhavasya jñānasya sadarthatvaṃ satyārthvam iṣṭaṃ sūcayati prakāśayati /
GSP28durdhpru:8328: pratyuktam api kathaṃ tathākarotīy āha --- tathā hīti /
GSP28durdhpru:8331: vacanetyādinā tv etad eva vyanakti --- na sarvaṃ vacanaṃ prayujyamānaṃ tathākāri yathā sarvaṃ mithyā bravīmīti vacanam ity āha --- yo 'pīti
GSP28durdhpru:8335: tathāpi katham anumānapramāṇyaṃ vacanenopasthāpyate yenānumānaprāmāṇyapratiṣedhas tadvacanopasthāpitānumānapramāṇyena
GSP28durdhpru:8337: tasmāt `nānumānaṃ pramāṇam' --- iti bruvatā śābdasya pratyayasyāsann artho[447] grāhya utkaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:8338: asadarthatvam eva hy aprāmāṇyam ucyate, nānyat /
GSP28durdhpru:8345: [449] `nānumānaṃ pramāṇaṃ' ity asmāc chabādyo 'tho budhyate tena janito `nānumāna' ityādikaḥ śabdaḥ na pratyeṣyati nāsitko vyabhicārāt --- ṭi-
GSP28durdhpru:8348: tad evaṃ svavacanānumitena sattvenāsattvaṃ[452] bādhyamānaṃ svavacanena bādhitam uktam ity ayam atrārthaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:8351: anye tv āhuḥ --- abhiprāyakāryāc chabdāj jātaṃ jñānam abhiprāyālambanam /
GSP28durdhpru:8354: nirākriyamāṇaḥ svavacananirākṛto bhavatītyāśaṅkyāha --- tathā ca satīti --- śābdajñānasya satyārthatvapratipādanābhiprāyeṇa vākyoccāraṇaprakāre sati /
GSP28durdhpru:8355: bāhyavastunānatarīyakaṃ tadavinābhāvinaṃ darśayatā satyārthaṃ darśayitavyaṃ darśayituṃ yujyate śakyata ity arthaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:8357: bāhyārthakāryād iti sati bhede tadutpattyaiva nāntarīkatvasambhavād iti bhāvaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:8358: śābdam iti prakṛtatvāj jñānaṃ kāryaliṅgajaṃ śabdarūpakāryaliṅgajam iti hetubhāvena viśeṣaṇam anumānaṃ pramāṇaṃ darśitaṃ prakāśitaṃ bhavati /
GSP28durdhpru:8360: nanv anumānasyā'san grāhya iti yujyate vaktum /
GSP28durdhpru:8361: tat kiṃ śābdasya pratyayasyety uktam iti cet /
GSP28durdhpru:8366: yady evam aprāmāṇyam uktam tac ca bādhya[66b]ta iti vaktuṃ yujyate /
GSP28durdhpru:8367: tat kim evam uktam ity āha --- asadarthatvam iti /
GSP28durdhpru:8369: āstām asan grāhyo 'bhitaḥ kim ata ity āha --- śabdeti /
GSP28durdhpru:8371: śabdo 'py atas tathā darśitas tathāpi kim āyātam ity āha --- tathā ceti śabdasya bāhyārthāvinābhāvipradarśanaprakāre sati sann artho 'dhyavaseyo darśitaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:8373: tasya sadarthatvaṇ pradarśyatāṃ bādhā tu katham ity āha --- tata iti /
GSP28durdhpru:8375: sattvaṃ karttṛ pratijñāyamānam asadartham aprāmāṇyalakṣaṇaṃ karmabhūtaṃ patibadhnāti /
GSP28durdhpru:8376: nirākarotīti vaktvye pratibadhnātīti bruvāṇaḥ paramārthato 'syāvāstavatvān na bādhā kin tv etadupasthāpitetarayoḥ parasparapratibandha iti sūcayati
GSP28durdhpru:8386: kiñ ca / yathā --- anumānam anicchan[454] vahnyavyabhicāritvaṃ dhūmasya na pratyeti,
GSP28durdhpru:8397: `api ca' ity ārabhya `śabdaprayogaḥ' ity antaḥ pāṭho nāsti /
GSP28durdhpru:8401: iti catvāraḥ pakṣābhāsā nirākṛtā bhavanti III-53
GSP28durdhpru:8402: evaṃ[459] ca sati --- anirākṛtagrahaṇenāntaroktāś catvāraḥ pakṣavadābhāsanta iti pakṣābhāsā nirastā bhavanti //
GSP28durdhpru:8405: sampati pakṣalakṣaṇapadāni yeṣāṃ vyavacchedakāni teṣāṃ vyavachedena yādṛśaḥ [460]pakṣārtho labhyate taṃ darśayituṃ vyavacchedyān saṃkṣipya darśayati
GSP28durdhpru:8408: nanv anumānaprāmāṇyam asattvaṃ bādhate na tu svavacanaṃ tat kathaṃ svavacananirākṛtodāharaṇam
GSP28durdhpru:8409: idam uktam ity āśaṅkya svavacananirārkṛta ity atra yādṛśo 'rtho vivakṣitas taṃ darśayati tad evam iti /
GSP28durdhpru:8412: svābhiprāyeṇaiva vyākhyāya anye tv ityādinā pūrvavyākhyānaṃ dūṣāyitum āha /
GSP28durdhpru:8414: na vāstavam iti bruvato yadīdaṃ vāstavam anumānaṃ syāt tadānumānanirākṛtodāharaṇānana pṛthag ucyateiti /
GSP28durdhpru:8419: tad avyabhicāritvābhyupagamaḥ pūrvo yasya tathā na bhavati /
GSP28durdhpru:8420: pūrvaṃ bāhyavastupratyāyanāyety anena sāmarthyān na svābhiprāyapratyāyanāyety ukam
GSP28durdhpru:8421: api sphuṭaṃ darśayitum tan na śabdasyābhiprāyāvinābhāvitvābhyupagamapūrvakaḥ śabdapryoga
GSP28durdhpru:8422: ity anena sāmarthyād bāhyavastvavinābhāvitvābhyupagamapūrvaka iti darśitam api sākṣād
GSP28durdhpru:8423: darśayitum api ceti pūrvoktasya vaktavyāntara dyotakasya spaṣṭīkaraṇam /
GSP28durdhpru:8424: yatrāpy asattvapratipādanāya śadaḥ prayujyate tatrāpi vivakṣitasattvaviviktasyānyasattvasya pratipādanād bāhyasattvapratipādanāyety uktam /
GSP28durdhpru:8431: tena eva svarūpeṇābhimato vādina iṣṭo anirākṛtaḥ pakṣa iti pakṣalakṣaṇam anavadyaṃ[462]darśitaṃ bhavati III-54
GSP28durdhpru:8436: siddhasya vipariyeṇa viparītatvena hetunā sādhyo draṣṭavyaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:8439: siddhaś ca viparīto 'siddhasya tasmād asiddhaḥ sādhyaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:8440: asiddho 'pi na sarvo 'pi tu sādhanatvenoktasyāsiddhasyāpi viparyayeṇa /
GSP28durdhpru:8441: svayaṃ vādinā sādhayitum aniṣṭasya asiddhasya viparyayeṇa /
GSP28durdhpru:8446: yaś cāyaṃ pañcabhir vyavacchedyai rahito 'rtha 'siddho[464] 'sādhanaṃ vādinaḥ svayaṃ sādhayitum iṣṭa ukto 'nukto vā pramāṇair anirākṛtaḥ sādhyaḥ,
GSP28durdhpru:8447: sa evāsau svarūpeṇaiva svayam iṣṭo 'nirākṛta etaiḥ padair ukta ity arthaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:8448: yaś cāyaṃ sādhyaḥ sa pakṣa [465]iti ucyate /
GSP28durdhpru:8451: avidyamānam avadyaṃ doṣo yasya tad anavadyam /
GSP28durdhpru:8456: trirūpaliṅgākhyānaṃ parisamāpayya[466] prasaṅgāgataṃ ca pakṣalakṣaṇam abhidhāya hetvābhāsān vaktukāmas teṣāṃ prastāvaṃ racayati trirūpetyādinā---
GSP28durdhpru:8460: tatra trayāṇāṃ rūpāṇām ekasya api rūpasya anuktau sādhanābhāsaḥ III-55
GSP28durdhpru:8461: etad uktaṃ bhavati --- trirūpaliṅgaṃ[467] vaktukāmena sphuṭaṃ tad vaktavyam /
GSP28durdhpru:8466: sarvathā na svābhiprāyasya sattvam asattvaṃ vā pratpādayituṃ śabdaprayogta ity ane[na] hetum /
GSP28durdhpru:8467: yata evaṃ tatas tasmāt pūrvakam eva yan mayā vyākhyātam anavadyam apagatadoṣam //
GSP28durdhpru:8468: iti catvāraḥ pakṣābhāsā nirākṛtā bhavantīti mūlaṃ vyācakṣāṇa āha --- evam iti /
GSP28durdhpru:8470: pakṣa ity ucyate vyakatīkriyata iti vyutpattyeti bhāvaḥ //
GSP28durdhpru:8476: heyajñāne[469] hi tadviviktam upādeyaṃ sujñātaṃ bhavatīti /
GSP28durdhpru:8492: uktāv apy asiddhau sandehe vā pratipādyapratipādakayoḥ III-56
GSP28durdhpru:8493: na kevalam anuktvāv uktāv apy asiddhau sandene vā /
GSP28durdhpru:8496: atha [472]kasyaikasyārūpasyāsiddhau sandehe[473] vā kiṃ saṃjñako hetvābhāsa ity āha ---
GSP28durdhpru:8500: ekasya rūpasya dharmisambandhasya asiddhau sandehe[474]vā asiddho hetvābhāsāḥ III-57
GSP28durdhpru:8503: ity āśaṅky āha --- etad uktaṃ bhavatīti /
GSP28durdhpru:8504: trirūpaliṅgākhyānasya sphuṭābhidhānārthatvaṃ copalakṣaṇaṃ tena vipratipattinirākaraṇārthaṃ ceti draṣṭavyam,
GSP28durdhpru:8512: yasmād ekasya dvayor vā 'nuktau trīṇi paripūrṇaṃ pratipāditāni na bhavanti tasmāt trayāṇām nyūnatety arthaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:8514: vidyamāne 'pi hi rūpatraye dvayor ekasya vā vaktrā 'nabhidhāne sati nyanatāyāḥ sambhavāt /
GSP28durdhpru:8515: tat kathaṃ vaktṛdoṣaḥ sādhanadoṣa ity ucyata iti cet /
GSP28durdhpru:8516: satyam; kevalaṃ nātra sādhanaśabdena liṅgam abhipretam /
GSP28durdhpru:8517: kiṃ tarhi? tatpratipādakaṃ vākyaṃ tasya cāparipūrṇatā doṣo bhavaty eva /
GSP28durdhpru:8518: vaktṛdoṣas tu nimitta[m] paripūrṇatāyā iti kim avadyam?
GSP28durdhpru:8519: evam upalakṣaṇārthatvād asya yathā 'nyatam evāpi rūpeṇā hīnatvān nyūnatā sādhanadoṣas tathā hetūvacanād vādinā nigraho vivakṣita ity apīti //
GSP28durdhpru:8521: ācāryasyas tu pratipādyasya pratipādakasya ca pratipādyaprapādakayoś ceti vyastasamastanirdeśo 'bhipretaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:8526: tasya asiddhau sandehe vā asiddhasasañjñako hetvābhāsaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:8530: na saṃśayasya hetur api tv apratipattihetuḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:8531: na kasycid ataḥ pratipattir iti kṛtvā /
GSP28durdhpru:8534: yathā, anityaḥ śabda iti sādhye cākṣuṣatvam ubhayāsiddham III-58
GSP28durdhpru:8536: [475]anityaḥ śabda ity anityatvaviśiṣṭe śabde sādhye cākṣuṣatvaṃ cakṣurgrāhyatvaṃ śabde [476]dvayor api vādiprativādinor asiddham //
GSP28durdhpru:8540: cetanās tarava iti sādhye sarvatvagapaharaṇe maraṇaṃ[477]prativādyasiddham,
GSP28durdhpru:8546: cetanās tarava iti tarūṇāṃ caitanye sādhye /
GSP28durdhpru:8548: tasya apaharaṇe sati maraṇaṃ digambarair upanyastaṃ pratibādino bauddhasyāsiddham /
GSP28durdhpru:8549: kasmād asiddha ity āha ---vijñānaṃ ca indriyaṃ cāyuś ceti dvadvaḥ[479] /
GSP28durdhpru:8560: ayaṃ hetvābhāsaḥ kīdṛśīṃ pratipattiṃ prasūta ity āha --- asiddhatvād eveti /
GSP28durdhpru:8562: katham etat prāpyata ity āha --- ayañ ceti /
GSP28durdhpru:8564: kasyāścid api pratipatter hetutayā na siddha iti asiddha ukta ity abhiprāyaḥ //
GSP28durdhpru:8569: tasyāpi kārṣṇyasya prāsāde dharmiṇi ubhayor asiddhatvāt,
GSP28durdhpru:8571: nanu vyadhikaraṇam api liṅgaṃ gamakaṃ dṛṣṭam /
GSP28durdhpru:8574: deśa eva hi dharmī avidūrakulālasambandhitvaṃ sādhyam tasya ca dharmiṇaḥ pratygraśarāvasambandhitvaṃ bhrānimaccakrasambandhitvañ ca dharmo bhavaty eva /
GSP28durdhpru:8575: na tv atra kulālasya dharmiṇaḥ sadbhāvaḥ sādhyate,
GSP28durdhpru:8585: sa lakṣaṇaṃ tattvaṃ yasya tat tathoktam /
GSP28durdhpru:8590: yadi nāmaivaṃ tathāpi katham asiddham ity āha --- tasya ca vijñānādinirodhātmakasya [486]taruṣv asambhaāt /
GSP28durdhpru:8592: tataś ca yo vijñānanirodhaṃ taruṣv icchet sa kathaṃ vijñānaṃ necchet /
GSP28durdhpru:8599: kevalaṃ vijñānasattayā [487]vyāptaṃ yat maraṇaṃ tad iha hetuḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:8602: tato[488] yan maraṇaṃ[489] hetus tat taruṣv asiddham /
GSP28durdhpru:8603: yat tu[490] siddhaṃ śoṣātmakaṃ tad ahetuḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:8609: digambaras tu sādhyena [491]vyāptam avyāptaṃ[492] vā maraṇām avivicya maraṇamātraṃ hetum āha /
GSP28durdhpru:8610: tad asya vādino hetubhūtaṃ[493] maraṇaṃ na jñātam /
GSP28durdhpru:8614: yadā tu vādino 'pi jñātaṃ tadā vādino 'py asiddhaṃ syād iti nyāyaḥ //
GSP28durdhpru:8621: anityaḥ śabdaḥ prameyatve sati anabhidheyatvād iti viśeṣaṇaviśiṣṭasya rūpasya tatra dharmiṇi dvayor api vādiprativādinor asiddhatvāt /
GSP28durdhpru:8622: kevalaṃ tatrāsiddho viśeṣaṇaviśiṣṭatayopāttasya rūpasya tathā 'siddhes tathā tathā vyapadiśyata iti //
GSP28durdhpru:8624: diśa evāmvaraṃ yeṣām iti vyuptattyā digambarāḥ kṣapaṇakā ucyante /
GSP28durdhpru:8625: taiḥ kim pramāṇasamadhigatam indriyam ity āha --- rūpādīti /
GSP28durdhpru:8626: satsv anyeṣu kāraṇeṣv avyāpṛte cakṣurādau rūpādijñānam anutpadyamānaṃ svotpattau kāraṇā[67b]ntaram apekṣaṇīyaṃ sūcayati /
GSP28durdhpru:8627: praṇihite tu cakṣurādau jāyamānaṃ tatrasthaṃ tat kim api kāraṇam astīti khyāpayati /
GSP28durdhpru:8632: prasannārthāder api sadbhāvān na golakādir evendriyam iti bhāvaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:8633: kim āyur ity āha --- āyur iti āyuḥśabdenety arthaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:8634: loke vyavaharttari jane prāṇo 'ntaraḥ śarīre rasamaladhātūnāṃ preraṇādihetur ekaḥ san kriyābhedod(-bhedād)
GSP28durdhpru:8635: apānādisamjñāṃ labhata iti tat tad avasthāvivakṣayā praṇā iti bahuvacanam /
GSP28durdhpru:8636: nanv āgame jīvitendriyam āyur ity uktam /
GSP28durdhpru:8637: tat kim evaṃ vyākhyāyata ity āha --- na ceti /
GSP28durdhpru:8642: acetanāḥ sukhādaya iti sādhye utpattimatvaṃ anityatvaṃ[494]vā sāṃkhyasya svayaṃ vādino asiddham III-60
GSP28durdhpru:8645: acetanāḥ sukhādaya iti --- sukham ādir yeṣāṃ duḥkhādīnāṃ te sudhādayaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:8648: ya utpattimanto 'nityā vā te na cetanāḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:8650: tathā cotpattimanto 'nityā vā sukhādyas tasmād acetanāḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:8652: atra cotpattimattvam anityatvaṃ vā paryāyeṇa hetur na yugapat /
GSP28durdhpru:8653: tac ca dvayam api sāṃkhyasya vādino na siddham /
GSP28durdhpru:8655: tena yaḥ parasya siddhaḥ sa hetur vaktayaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:8660: yadi tv anityatvotpattimattvayoḥ [497]pramāṇyaṃ vādino [498]jñātaṃ syād [499]tadā vādino 'pi siddhaṃ syāt /
GSP28durdhpru:8669: tathā svayaṃ tadāśrayaṇasya vā sandehe asiddhaḥ III-61
GSP28durdhpru:8671: tadārayaṇasya [500]veti --- tasya hetor āśrayaṇam --- āśrīyate 'simin hetur ity āśrayaṇaṃ hetor vyatirikta āśrayabhūtaḥ[501] sādhyadharmī kathyate / tatra hi
GSP28durdhpru:8676: vijñānasattayā vyāptaṃ yad iti yasmin maraṇe 'vaśyaṃ prāgāsīd vijñānam,
GSP28durdhpru:8679: digambarasyāpi kathaṃ siddham ity āha --- ajñānād iti /
GSP28durdhpru:8681: anenaitad āha --- yadi tena sādhyavyāptaṃ maraṇaṃ maraṇaśabdamātrasamatāṃ bibhrataḥ śoṣamātrād bhedena vivekitaṃ syāt kevalam ajñānāt tatsiddham ucyata iti /
GSP28durdhpru:8688: sāṃkhyasya saṃkhyayā pañcaviśatitattvānītyanyā vyavaharatīti sāṃkhyo yogarūḍhiś caiṣā,
GSP28durdhpru:8690: nanūtpattimattvaṃ kṛtakatvam vā svasiddham eva tenopanyasanīyam upanyastaṃ ca /
GSP28durdhpru:8691: tat kathaṃ vādyasiddhateti āha --- parārtho hīti /
GSP28durdhpru:8701: yathā bāṣpādibhāvena sandihyamāno bhūtasaṃghāto agnisiddhāv upadiśyamānaḥ[503]sandigdhāsiddhaḥ III-62
GSP28durdhpru:8704: yatheti / bāṣpa ādir yasya sa bāspādiḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:8705: tadbhāvena bāṣpāditvena sadihyāmāno bhūtasaṃghāta iti bhūtānāṃ pṛthivyādīnāṃ saṃghātaḥm samūhaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:8707: etad uktaṃ bhavati --- yadā dhūmo 'pi bāṣpāditvena saṃdigdho bhavati tadā 'siddhaḥ,
GSP28durdhpru:8710: yadā tu saṃdigdhas tadā na gamaka ity asiddhatākhyo doṣaḥ //
GSP28durdhpru:8714: yathā iha nikuñje[505]mayūraḥ kekāyitād iti III-63
GSP28durdhpru:8727: hetoś ca prakṛtatvād hetor iti vivṛṇoti /
GSP28durdhpru:8729: yasyātmanaḥ sandehaḥ sa ātmanā sandihyamāno bhavatīty abhiprāyeṇāha --- ātmanā sandihyamānam iti /
GSP28durdhpru:8731: nanu yady asau paramārthato dhūmas tadā sandehe 'pi kiṃ na gamaka ity āha --- etad uktaṃ bhavatīti /
GSP28durdhpru:8732: kiṃ tad gamakaṃ rūpaṃ yenāniścita ity āha --- vahnīti /
GSP28durdhpru:8734: tadā na gamaka iti bruvataś cāyam āśayo vihnijanyatvasyaiva gamakatvanibandhanasya tadā 'niścitatvāt /
GSP28durdhpru:8735: etena sandigdhaviśeṣaṇāsiddhaḥ sandigdhaviśeṣyāsiddhaś cokto draṣṭavyaḥ [68a] yathā ṣaḍjādisattvasandehe mayūraśabdo 'yam ṣaḍjādimattve sati avarṇātmakatvāt /
GSP28durdhpru:8743: tasya kekāyitasyāpāta [508]āgamanaṃ tasya deśaḥ sa ucyate yasmād deśād āgacchati kekāyitam /
GSP28durdhpru:8744: tasya vibhrame vyāmohe saty ayam āśrayaṇāsiddhaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:8745: nirantareṣṛ bahuṣu nikuñjeṣu satsu yadā kekāyitāpātanikuñje[509] vibhramaḥ --- kim asmān nikujñāt kekāyitamāgatam /
GSP28durdhpru:8756: yathā sarvagata ātmā iti sādhye sarvatropalambhamānaguṇatvam III-65
GSP28durdhpru:8757: yatheti / sarvasimin gataḥ sthitaḥ sarvagato vyāpīti yāvat /
GSP28durdhpru:8759: sarvatradeśa upalabhyamānāḥ sukhaduḥkhecchādveṣādayo guṇā yasyātmanas tasya bhāvas tattvam /
GSP28durdhpru:8763: tataś ca yadi vyāpī na bhavet kathaṃ dākṣiṇāpatha upalabdhāḥ sukhādayo madhyadeśa uplabhyeran /
GSP28durdhpru:8766: kim uta sarvatropalabhyamānaguṇatvaṃ sidhyet tasyety asiddhau[512] hetvābhāsaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:8768: saṃprati tv asiddho dharmy ukta ity ananayor viśeṣaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:8773: ubhayatrāpi viśeṣaṇaviśiṣṭasya rūpasya vādiprativādinor dvayor apy aniścitatvāt kevalaṃ viśeṣaṇasandehena ca viśeṣaṇaviśiṣṭena rūpeṇāsiddha iti tathā vyapadiśyata iti //
GSP28durdhpru:8774: parvatoparibhāgena tiryagnirgateneti ca bhūbhāga iti copalakṣaṇaṃ draṣṭavyam /
GSP28durdhpru:8777: yasmād deśād āgacchatīti vacanavyaktyā cotpannaḥ śabdaś caturdikkaṃ śabdasantānaṃ janayati,
GSP28durdhpru:8778: sa ca jalataraṅganyāyena śrotradeśam āgato gṛhīta iti darśayati //
GSP28durdhpru:8780: “sāmānyavān guṇaḥ saṃyogavibhāgayor anapekṣo na kāraṇaṃ” iti guṇalakṣaṇayogād guṇāḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:8784: tad evam ekasya[513] rūpasya [514]dharmisambaddhasyāsiddhāv asiddho hetvābhāsaḥ //
GSP28durdhpru:8786: [513] sarveṣv api asiddheṣu ekaṃ rūpaṃ pakṣadharmatvam asiddham --- ṭi-
GSP28durdhpru:8788: tathā ekasya rūpasya asapakṣe asattvasya asiddhāv anaikāntiko hetvābhāsaḥ III-66
GSP28durdhpru:8796: ayasmān na sādhyasya na viparyayasya niścayo 'pi tu tadviparītaḥ saṃśayaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:8803: kim uteti nipātaḥ kim punar ity asyārthe varttate //
GSP28durdhpru:8804: āśrayaṇāsiddhadharmyasiddhayoḥ kiyān bheda ity āśaṅkya bhedam upapādayann āha --- pūrvam iti /
GSP28durdhpru:8805: ayam arthaḥ --- pūrvaṃ paramārthato vidyamāno 'pi hetvādhārarūpatayā sandehād aniścita iti tad dharmyasiddha uktaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:8806: samprati tu sarvathtaivāsau dharmitvenāsiddha ucyata iti /
GSP28durdhpru:8809: anyathāsiddhas tv asiddha eva na bhavatīti na tasyāntarbhāvaś cintyate /
GSP28durdhpru:8810: tathā hy anyathāsiddha iti ko arthaḥ?
GSP28durdhpru:8811: kim anyathaiva siddha āhosvit anyathā 'pi siddhaḥ?
GSP28durdhpru:8813: tadā jijñāpayiṣitaviparyayeṇaiva siddha upapanno nānena prakāreṇeti viruddha eva /
GSP28durdhpru:8815: tadaitasmād anyenāpi prakāreṇa siddho 'yam ity ayam api bhaviṣyati /
GSP28durdhpru:8816: na ca sādhyam iti sandigdhavipakṣavyāvṛttir anaikāntika eveti //
GSP28durdhpru:8819: sādhyalakṣaṇaikārthaviṣayatvād antaśca kathāvasānahetutvād ākāṅkṣopaśamahetutvād veti darśayati /
GSP28durdhpru:8820: samastaṃ padam arthañ cāha --- ekānto niścaya iti /
GSP28durdhpru:8824: yasmād dhetor ity apādāne ceyaṃ pañcamī /
GSP28durdhpru:8825: kin tu tadviparīto niścayaviparītaḥ yattador nityam abhisambandhāt sa iti draṣṭavyam /
GSP28durdhpru:8827: yad vā katham anaikāntiko bhavatīty āha --- yasmād iti hetupañcamī /
GSP28durdhpru:8828: aikāntikapratiṣedhenānyaḥ pratipattihetur ukto nañety abhiprāyeṇāha --- saṃśayahetur iti /
GSP28durdhpru:8830: atha vaikāntaniyatatvād eka ity anta iti ca niścayaḥ proktaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:8834: yathā śabdasya anityatvādike dharme sādhye prameyatvādiko dharmaḥ sapakṣavipakṣayoḥ sarvatra ekadeśe vā vartamānaḥ III-67
GSP28durdhpru:8842: śabdasya dharmiṇo 'nityatvādike dharme sādhye prameyatvādiko dharmo 'naikāntikaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:8849: tathā hi --- anityaḥ śabdaḥ prameyatvāt [522]ghaṭavad ākāśavad iti prameyatvṃ sapakṣavipakṣavyāpi /
GSP28durdhpru:8854: vidyudākāśavad [523]ghaṭvac ca --- ity anityatvaṃ sapakṣaikadeśavṛtti --- vidyudādāv asti,
GSP28durdhpru:8861: anityatvāt prayatnānantarīyakaḥ śado ghaṭvad vidyudākāśavac ca --- ity anityatvaṃ vipakṣaikadeśavartti --- vidyudādāv asti nākāśādau /
GSP28durdhpru:8868: ity amūrtatvam ubhayaikadeśavṛtti --- ubhayor ekadeśa ākāśe karmaṇi ca vartate /
GSP28durdhpru:8869: paramāṇau tu sapakṣaikadeśe ghaṭādau ca vipakṣaikadeśe na vartate /
GSP28durdhpru:8882: [68b] “sad akāraṇavan nityam” [vai-sū-4.1.1.] iti nityalakṣaṇayogān nityā iṣṭāḥ paramāṇavaḥ //
GSP28durdhpru:8886: tathā --- asya eva rūpasya sandehe apy anaikāntika eva III-68
GSP28durdhpru:8887: yathā cāsya rūpasyāsiddhāv anaikāntikas tathā asyaiva vipakṣe 'sattvākhyasya[531] rūpasya saṃdehe 'naikāntikaḥ //
GSP28durdhpru:8890: yathā asarvajñaḥ kaścid vivakṣitaḥ puruṣo rāgādimān veti sādhye vaktṛtvādiko dharmaḥ sandigdhavipakṣavyāvṛttikaḥ III-69
GSP28durdhpru:8892: kaśiad vivakṣita iti vaktur abhiprataḥ puruṣo dharmī /
GSP28durdhpru:8893: rāgā ādir yasya dveṣādeḥ sa rāgādiḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:8894: sa yasyāsti sa rāgādimān iti dvitīyaṃ sādhyam /
GSP28durdhpru:8896: tato 'sarvajñatve rāgādimattve vā[533] sādhye prakṛte vakṭrtvaṃ --- vacanaśaktis tadādir yasyonmeṣanimeṣādeḥ sa vaktṛtvādiko dharmo 'naikāntikaḥ
GSP28durdhpru:8900: sandigdhā[534] vipakṣā vyāvṛttir yasya sa tathoktaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:8902: tatra vacanādeḥ sattvam asattvaṃ vā sandigdham /
GSP28durdhpru:8903: ato na jñāyate kiṃ[535] vaktā sarvajña utāsarvajña ity anaikāntikaṃ vaktṛtvam /
GSP28durdhpru:8907: nanu ca sarvajño vaktā nolpalabhyate tat kathaṃ vacanaṃ sarvajñe sandigdham? ata eva
GSP28durdhpru:8908: [536]`sarvajño vaktā na upalabhyate' ity evaṃprakārasya anupalambhasya adṛśyātmaviṣayatvena[537]sandehahetutvāt /
GSP28durdhpru:8909: [538] tato asarvajñaviparyayād vaktṛtvāder vyāvṛttiḥ sandigdhā III-70
GSP28durdhpru:8914: `sarvajño vaktā na upalabhyate' ity evaṃ prakārasya --- [539]evaṃjātīyasyānupalambhasya saṃdehahetutvāt /
GSP28durdhpru:8915: kuta ity āha --- adṛśya[540] ātmā viṣayo yasya tasya bhāvo 'dṛśyātmaviṣayatvaṃ tena sandehahetutvam /
GSP28durdhpru:8921: amum evārthaṃ mūlena saṃsyandayann āha --- sarvajña iti /
GSP28durdhpru:8925: yato 'dṛśyaviśeṣayo 'nupalambhaḥ saṃdehahetur[541] na niścayahetus tato 'sarvajñavipakṣāt sarvajñād vaktṛtvāder vyāvṛttiḥ saṃdigdhā //
GSP28durdhpru:8929: api tu sarvajñatvena saha vaktṛtvasya virodhāt / etan na[543] /
GSP28durdhpru:8933: vaktṛtvasarvajñatvayor virodhābhāvāc ca yaḥ sarvajñaḥ sa vaktā na bhavatīty adarśane 'pi vyatireko na sidhyati, saṃdehāt 71
GSP28durdhpru:8935: virodhābhāvāc ca kāraṇād vyatireko na sidhyati --- iti saṃbandhaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:8936: vyāptimantaṃ vyatirekaṃ darśyati --- yaḥ sarvajñaḥ iti /
GSP28durdhpru:8937: sādhyabhāvarūpaṃ sarvajñatvam anūdya [544] `sa vaktā na bhavati' iti sādhanasya vakṛtvasyābhāvo vidhīyate /
GSP28durdhpru:8938: tena sādhyābhāvaḥ sādhanābhāve niyatatvāt [545]sādhanābhāvena vpyāta ukta iti /
GSP28durdhpru:8939: vyāptimānīdṛśo vyatireko virodhe sati vaktṛtvasarvajñatvayoḥ sidhyet /
GSP28durdhpru:8956: kaḥ punar asau dvividho virodha ity āha ---
GSP28durdhpru:8962: avikalāni samagrāṇi kāraṇāni yasya sa tathoktaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:8963: yasya kāraṇavaikalyād abhāvo na tasya kenacid api virodhagatiḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:8965: nanu ca yasyāpi kāraṇasākalyaṃ tasyāpi nivṛttir aśakyā kenacid api karttum /
GSP28durdhpru:8967: evaṃ tarhi avikalakāraṇasyāpi yatkṛtāt kāraṇavaikalyād abhāvas tena virodhagatiḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:8976: tathā ca sati yo yasya viruddhaḥ sa tasya kiñcit kara eva /
GSP28durdhpru:8977: tathā hi --- śītasparśasya janako bhūtvā śitasparśāntarajananaśaktiṃ pratibadhnan śītasparśasya nivarttako viruddhaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:8978: tasmād dhetuvaikalyakārī viruddho janaka eka nivartty asya /
GSP28durdhpru:8980: tato viruddhayor ekasminn api kṣaṇe sahāvasthānaṃ pariharttavyam /
GSP28durdhpru:8981: dūrasthayor virodhābhāvāc ca nikaṭsthayor eva nivarttyanivarttakabhāvaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:8982: tasmād yo yasya nirvarttakaḥ sa taṃ yadi paraṃ tṛtīye kṣaṇe nivarttayati /
GSP28durdhpru:8986: tṛtīye tv asamarthe nivṛtte taddeśam ākrāmati /
GSP28durdhpru:8991: ālokakṣaṇaṃ janayati tadā ''lokasamīpavarttinam andhakāram asamarthaṃ janayati /
GSP28durdhpru:8993: [554]asamarthe nivṛtte [555]taddeśo jāyata āloka ity evaṃ krameṇā ''lokenāndhakāro 'paneyaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:9002: kim ataḥ siddham ity āha tathā ceti kāraṇavaikalyakāriṇo virodhāvagamaprakāre sati /
GSP28durdhpru:9004: yathā cāsya janakatvaṃ tathānantaram eva vyaktīkariṣyate /
GSP28durdhpru:9005: nanu kiṃ katipayakṣaṇasahitayoḥ paścān nivarttyanivarttakabhāvena virodho 'tha vānyathety āśaṅkyāha saheti /
GSP28durdhpru:9007: na kevalaṃ bahuṣu kṣaṇeṣv ity apiśabdaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:9009: nikaṭāvasthānaṃ tu na pariharttavyam iti buddhistham /
GSP28durdhpru:9011: tayor ekasminn api kṣaṇe sahasthityabhāvāt katham evam aṅgīkriyate ? ata eva /
GSP28durdhpru:9012: na sahasthitayoḥ paścād virodha iti vā kṛtam anena /
GSP28durdhpru:9013: yady evaṃ kvacit pradeśe varttamāna ālokas trilokīvyavasthitāni tamāṃsy anenaiva
GSP28durdhpru:9014: krameṇāpanayed iti na kvacit tamāṃsy avatiṣṭherann ity āha --- nikaṭasthayor iti
GSP28durdhpru:9015: yayor nivarttyanivarttakabhāvo dṛṣṭas tayor nikaṭasthayor eva na tu nikaṭasthayor
GSP28durdhpru:9017: tayor eva kathaṃ tathābhāva ity āśaṅkāyāṃ dūrasthayor iti yojyam /
GSP28durdhpru:9019: yataḥ kiñcitkarasyaiva nivarttakatvaṃtasmād hetoḥ paraṃprakṛṣṭaṃ yathā bhavati /
GSP28durdhpru:9020: etad evopapādayann āha --- prathama iti sanniyatan nikaṭībhavan nivarttaka iti prakaraṇāt /
GSP28durdhpru:9021: asamarthā copādeyakṣaṇanirmāṇe aśaktāvasthā yasyāndhakārakṣaṇasya tasyādhānam utpādanam,
GSP28durdhpru:9027: yadā tv ālokas tatraivāndhakāradeśe janyate tadā yataḥ kṣaṇād andhakāradeśasyālokasya janakaḥ[556] kṣaṇaḥ utpadyate tata evāndhakāro 'ndhakārāntarajananāsamartha[557] utpannaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:9034: ataś ca yasmin kṣaṇe janakas tatas tṛtīye kṣaṇe nivṛtto viruddho yadi śīghraṃ nivarttate /
GSP28durdhpru:9036: yady api ca na santāno nāma vastu tathāpi santānino vastubhūtāḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:9041: vandhyakṣaṇe nivṛtte svarasato niruddhe taddeśaṃ tasyāsamarthakṣaṇasya deśaṃ sthānam ākrāmati,
GSP28durdhpru:9043: iha kaścin nivarttaka āloko yām eva diśam ākrāmati taddigvarttinam eva svaviruddhaṃ gatikrameṇaiva nivarttayati /
GSP28durdhpru:9044: kaścit punar viruddhāvaṣṭabdha eva deśe samutpannamātra evānekadigvarttinaṃ viruddhaṃ jhaṭiti nivarttayati /
GSP28durdhpru:9045: tatra na jñāyate kasya kathaṃ kiñcitkaratayā nivarttakatvam ity āha tatreti vākyopakṣepe /
GSP28durdhpru:9046: deśam abhimataṃ sthānam ākrāmaṃs taddeśo bhavann āloka ity arthaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:9051: tatas tasmāt samīpavarttyāloka iti gatidharmeti draṣṭavyam /
GSP28durdhpru:9053: asamarthe tasminn andhakāre nivṛtte svarasato viruddhe (niruddhe) sati /
GSP28durdhpru:9054: so 'samarthāndhakārakṣaṇadeśo deśo yasya sa tathā jāyate ālokaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:9056: evam anantaroktena krameṇa paripāṭyā gatidharmālokas taddeśākramaṇāya sannipatann asamarthāvasthādhānayogyo bhavati /
GSP28durdhpru:9058: tṛtīye taddeśo jāyata ity anantaroktaḥ kramo vibhajya yojanīyaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:9059: amum eva kramam anyatrādiśann āha --- tatheti /
GSP28durdhpru:9060: yathā ālokāndhakārayor nivarttyanivarttakabhāvas tena prakāreṇa uṣṇasparśena gatidharmeṇa dṛṣṭāntavaśād draṣṭavyam /
GSP28durdhpru:9064: yataḥ kṣaṇād ālokasya janakaḥ kṣaṇa utpadyate /
GSP28durdhpru:9066: andhakāradeśasya nivarttyāndhakārasambandhī deśo yasya sa tathā tata eva tamodeśālokotpādakṣaṇayor ekasāmagryadhīnatām āha /
GSP28durdhpru:9067: yato 'ndhakāradeśālokahetūtpādakasya kṣaṇasya vandhyāndhakārādhāyakatvato hetor avidyamānaṃ sajātīyajanmani sāmarthyaṃ yasyā avasthāyā andhakārasambandhinyāḥ sā tathā /
GSP28durdhpru:9069: atrāpi tṛtīye kṣaṇe paraṃ nivarttakatvam iti darśayann āha ataś ceti /
GSP28durdhpru:9073: kṣanānām / yataḥ satsu dahanakṣaṇeṣu pravṛttā api śītakṣaṇā nivṛttidharmāṇo bhavantīti
GSP28durdhpru:9074: santānayor nivarttyanivarttakatvanimitte ca virodhe sthite sarveṣāṃ paramāṇūnāṃ saty
GSP28durdhpru:9077: gatidharmā cāloko [560]yāṃ diśam ākrāmati [561]taddigvarttino virodhisantānān nivarttayati /
GSP28durdhpru:9079: kāraṇāsāmarthyahetutvakṛtaṃ[563] santānaniṣṭham eva virodhaṃ darśayatā [564]bhavata iti kṛtam /
GSP28durdhpru:9090: tṛtīye tv asamartheṣu nivṛtteṣu taddeśa āloko jāyata iti pratyetavyam /
GSP28durdhpru:9091: tathā śītākrāntadeśamadhyotpannenoṣṇasparśena sthitadharmaṇā tathaiva śītasparśo nivarttanīya ity api draṣṭavyam /
GSP28durdhpru:9096: yaś cāsamarthas tajjanmā so 'pi tajjanyatvād avirodhī /
GSP28durdhpru:9097: ye cānutpattidharmāṇas te 'py asattvāt kathaṃ tair viruddhā ity āśaṅkyāha janyajanakabhāvād iti /
GSP28durdhpru:9099: ayam āśayaḥ --- janyajanakabhāvaviśeṣa evāyaṃ nivarttyanivarttakabhāvaḥ arvāgdarśī ca na kṣaṇayoḥ kāryakāraṇabhāvaṃ vibhāvayituṃ vibhavati /
GSP28durdhpru:9100: api tu santānayos tato 'ndhakārakṣaṇaprabandham ekatvenāvasāya nivarttyaṃ viruddham adhyavasy ālokakṣaṇaprabandhaṃ caikatvenādhimacya tad virodhinam adhimuñcatīti /
GSP28durdhpru:9103: na tarhi paramārthato virodha iti cet /
GSP28durdhpru:9104: kiṃ vai kāryakāraṇabhāvaviśeṣa evaivaṃvidho na vidyate,
GSP28durdhpru:9107: nanu na santānivyatirekeṇa santāno nāmānyaḥ sambhavī /
GSP28durdhpru:9108: tat kathaṃ dvayoḥ santānayor virodha ucyata ity āha yady apīty anumatau /
GSP28durdhpru:9109: yataḥ santānino vastubhūtāḥ santi tato hetor ayaṃ vakṣyamāṇakaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:9120: ye tv āhur na virodho vāstava iti ta idaṃ vaktavyāḥ --- yathā na niṣpanne kārye kaścij janyajanakabhāvo
GSP28durdhpru:9121: yadi yena saha yasyaikadeśāsthitinaṃ bhavati tena tasya sahānavasthānalakṣaṇo virodhas
GSP28durdhpru:9122: tarhi sarva eva paramāṇavaḥ sapratighatvād anyonyadeśaparihāreṇa varttanta iti sarveṣām
GSP28durdhpru:9123: eva paramāṇūnām ayaṃ virodhaḥ kin na vyavasthāpyata ity āśaṅkyāha --- santānayor iti /
GSP28durdhpru:9126: yataḥ satsv api teṣu sarva eva santānena pravahanti tataḥ santānānivarttanaṃ teṣām /
GSP28durdhpru:9127: nanu yady ālokāndhakārayor nivarttyanivarttakabhāvena virodhas tarhi pradīpamallikātalavartty eva varakātmāṇa nivarttī (?)
GSP28durdhpru:9128: andhakāras tatsamīpavarttinālokena kin na nivarttyata ity āśaṅkyāha --- gatidharmeti /
GSP28durdhpru:9131: yato yaddigabhimukhagatir ālokas tadākramyamāṇadigvarttina eva virodhisantānān nivarttayati /
GSP28durdhpru:9137: yā sā dig andhakārākrāntā dṛśyate tatra tasya tajjananāsāmarthyād ity arthaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:9139: ālokena samīpavarttināndhakārāpanayāsambhavād iti katham enaṃ saṃgaccheta /
GSP28durdhpru:9140: ayam atra paramārthaḥ --- dṛśyate tāvat kācid andhakāramātrā nikaṭasthitenāpy ālokenānivarttitā /
GSP28durdhpru:9142: tasmād ālokasyālokāntarajananāsāmarthyam anyatra tu sāmarthaṃ tattvacintakair acintyatvāt pratītyasamutpādasya kalpyata iti /
GSP28durdhpru:9143: ata eva yayor janyajanakabhāvena nivarttyanivarttakabhāvo nāsti tayoḥ pradīpamallikāditalavarttyandhakāratadāsannālokayor virodhaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:9145: ata eva pūrvaṃ dūrasthayor virodhābhāvāc ca nikaṭasthayor eva nivarttyanivarttakabhāvaḥ ity uktam,
GSP28durdhpru:9146: na tu nikaṭasthayor nivarttyanivarttakabhāva eva iti /
GSP28durdhpru:9147: sati nivarttyanivarttakatve nikaṭasthayor eva na tu nikaṭasthayor avaśyaṃ nivarttyanivarttakabhāvaḥ iti ca vyākhyātam eva /
GSP28durdhpru:9148: samprati janyajanakabhāvanibandhanaṃ santānagatam eva ca virodhaṃ svayaṃ pratipāditam ācāryasyāpy abhipretam etad iti darśayann āha kāraṇair iti (kāraṇeti) /
GSP28durdhpru:9149: kāraṇasya nivarttayitavyasya śītasparśāder asāmarthyaṃ sajātīyakṣaṇanirmāṇe 'śaktatvaṃ tatra yad dhetutvaṃ nivarttakasya tatkṛtaṃ tat prayuktam
GSP28durdhpru:9150: ata eva santānaniṣṭhaṃ santāne kṣaṇaprabandhe niṣṭhā vyavasthāpyatayā paryavasānaṃ yasya taṃ darśayatā prakāśayatācāryeṇety arthāt /
GSP28durdhpru:9151: ye punaḥ śāntabhadrādayaḥ “na tāvad ālokāder utpannenāndhakārādinā virodhaḥ,
GSP28durdhpru:9155: tasmān na virodho nāma dviṣṭhaḥ sambandho 'sti /
GSP28durdhpru:9159: iti vyākhyātavantas tān vacanabhaṅgyā nirācikīṛṣur āha ye tv iti /
GSP28durdhpru:9164: tadvat na nivṛtte vastuni kaścit [570]dviṣṭho nāma virodho 'sti /
GSP28durdhpru:9176: [573]śītaś coṣṇaśaś catāv eva sparśau tayor iva /
GSP28durdhpru:9184: parasparasya[576] parihāraḥ parityāgs tena sthitaṃ lakṣaṇaṃ rūpaṃ yayos tadbhāvaḥ paraparaprihārasthitalakṣṇatā tayā[577] /
GSP28durdhpru:9189: iha yasmin paricchidyamāne yad vyavacchidyate tat paricchidyamānam avacchidyamānaparihāreṇa sthitarūpaṃ draṣṭavyam /
GSP28durdhpru:9193: nīlāt tu yad anyad rupaṃ tan nīlābhāvyabhicāri /
GSP28durdhpru:9195: kāraṇapūrvikā kāraṇatvenābhimatapadārthasattāpūrvikā kāryasya kāryatvenābhimatasya vṛttiḥ pravṛttir bhāva iti yāvat /
GSP28durdhpru:9197: yata evam ato hetor vāstavaḥ pāramārthikaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:9199: nanu kiṃ kāryakāraṇabhāvo 'pi dviṣṭhaḥ sambandhaḥ kaścid iṣṭo yenaivam ucyata iti cet / na /
GSP28durdhpru:9201: ihāpi tarhi dahanādinimittaṃ śītasparśāder jananāsāmarthyaṃ vāstavam astu /
GSP28durdhpru:9202: na tu virodhaḥ sambandha iti cet / na /
GSP28durdhpru:9204: asmābhir apīdṛśa eva kāryakāraṇabhāvaviśeṣo virodha ity ucyata iti katham ayam avāstavaḥ syād iti /
GSP28durdhpru:9227: [584] ataḥ; `pratyantare yataḥ iti' iti ṭippaṇaṃ varttate
GSP28durdhpru:9228: nanu sarvam eva vastu sattvarajastamorūpeṇaikam iti katham anyonyarūpaparityāga ity āha iheti /
GSP28durdhpru:9231: avacchidyamānaparihāreṇa vyavacchidyamānaparihāreṇa sthitaṃ vyavasthitaṃ rūpaṃ svarūpaṃ yasya tat tathā /
GSP28durdhpru:9232: kim punar idaṃ prasiddham ity āha nīlam iti /
GSP28durdhpru:9235: tadrūpam eva tādrūpyam tasya pracyutir abhāvo vyavaharttavyaikarūpaḥ prasajyapratiṣedhātmā tuccharūpaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:9239: na tarhi nīlapītayoḥ sa syād ity āha nīlād iti /
GSP28durdhpru:9243: na tu tatparihāreṇa tad vyavasthitam ity āha yatheti /
GSP28durdhpru:9248: evaṃ sati kiṃ vyavasthitam ity āha tathā ceti nīlasya sākṣāt svābhāvaparihāraprakāre tadavyabhicāritvād arthāntaraparihāraprakāre ca sati /
GSP28durdhpru:9253: tarhi kṣaṇikatvam api nīlābhāvāvyabhicāritvān nīlena viruddhyamānaṃ na nīlātmakaṃ syāt /
GSP28durdhpru:9254: tad api nīlābhāvavad eva anyathā kṣaṇikatvaṃ nīlātmataiva syāt /
GSP28durdhpru:9255: tathā ca yāvat kṣaṇikaṃ tāvan nīlam iti kṛtsnā trilokī nīlaiva syād iti manasi nidhāyāha kasya ceti /
GSP28durdhpru:9257: paramukhena praśnaṃ kṛtvā praśnavisarjanam āha ya iti /
GSP28durdhpru:9258: niyatasya pratiniyatasya vastuna ākāraḥ svarūpam iti vigrahītavyam /
GSP28durdhpru:9259: etad eva vyatirekamukheṇāha na tv iti /
GSP28durdhpru:9263: anenaitad āha --- abhāvāvyabhicāritve 'pi niyatākāreṇa tena sama(m a)
GSP28durdhpru:9269: na tv ayam arthaḥ --- niyataḥ pratiniyata
GSP28durdhpru:9274: tato dṛṣṭaṃ kalpitaṃ vā niyataṃ rūpam anyatrāsad ity avasīyate[586] /
GSP28durdhpru:9286: evaṃ hi kṣaṇikatvāder api niyatākāratvaṃ syāt /
GSP28durdhpru:9288: dharmottaro 'pi kṣaṇikatvaṃ hi sarveṣāṃ nīlādīnāṃ svarūpātmakam iti bruvāṇo niyatākāra
GSP28durdhpru:9289: ity atra ṣaṣṭhītatpuruṣam abhivyanakti itarathā kṣaṇikatvasya hi sarvo nīlādiḥ svarūpam
GSP28durdhpru:9291: evañ cā (ca) kṣaṇikasyāpi na nīle 'bhāvāvasāyas tasya sarvanīlādivastvātmakatvenāniyatākāratvāt /
GSP28durdhpru:9292: yena ca kṣaṇikaṃ kalpitaṃ na tena pratiniyatavastvātmaka (kaṃ)
GSP28durdhpru:9293: kalpitam ata eva nīlagrāhi pratyakṣaṃ kṣaṇikatvākṣaṇikatvayor udāsīnaṃ nīlamātre pramāṇam /
GSP28durdhpru:9294: tathā ca nīlasyākṣaṇikatvaparihāreṇāvasthānaṃ kṣaṇikatvasiddheḥ prāṅ niścetum aśakyam iti nyāyabalāt prāptam /
GSP28durdhpru:9295: evañ cāvirodharūpavivecake dharmottare saty api ye kecid dviṣyamānajalpamahodadhiprabhṛtayo
GSP28durdhpru:9298: ] yo niyatākāro na tv aniyatākāraḥ kṣaṇikatvādir iti dharmottarasya grantho na dṛṣṭo na cārthasya samīcīnidhisa (?)
GSP28durdhpru:9302: yathaitat parihriyate tathā viśeṣākhyāna evāsmābhir abhyadhāyīti tata evāpekṣitavyam /
GSP28durdhpru:9305: tarhi bhāvo nābhāvaṃ parihṛtya tiṣṭhet tasyāniyatākāratvād ity āśaṅkamāna āha yady evam iti /
GSP28durdhpru:9309: yāvateti tṛtīyāntapratinirūpako nipāto 'tra yasmād ity asyārtho varttate /
GSP28durdhpru:9311: kalpitagrahaṇenaitad āha nābhāvo nāma kaścit pramāṇasiddho 'sti /
GSP28durdhpru:9312: kevalaṃ kalpikayā buddhyā tathā samāropita iti /
GSP28durdhpru:9313: yata evaṃ tasmād dṛṣṭaṃ pramāṇāvagataṃ kalpitam āgamāśrayeṇānyathā vā samāropitam /
GSP28durdhpru:9315: na nīlādyātmakaṃ sat tatraivāsa[d i]ty avasīyate /
GSP28durdhpru:9316: amum eva nyāyam anyatrādiśann āha evam iti /
GSP28durdhpru:9317: yathābhāvo niyatākāra eva kalpito nāniyatākāra evaṃ nityatvam api sarvakālāvasthāyitvalakṣaṇaṃ niyatākāram eva
GSP28durdhpru:9320: lakṣaṇaṃ rūpaṃ vastūnāṃ prayojanam asyeti kṛṭvā /
GSP28durdhpru:9321: virodhena hy anena vastutattvaṃ vihbaktaṃ vyavasthāpyate /
GSP28durdhpru:9322: ata eva dṛśyamāne rūpe yan niṣidhyate tad dṛśyam evābhyupaghamya niṣidhyate tathā
GSP28durdhpru:9323: hi --- abhāvo 'pi piśāco 'pi yadā pīte niṣeddhum iṣyate tadā dṛśyātmatayā niṣedhya
GSP28durdhpru:9324: iti dṛśyatvam abhyupagamya dṛśyānupalabdher eva niṣedhaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:9325: tathā ca sati rūpe paricchidyamāna ekasmiṃs tadabhāvo dṛśyo vyavacchidyate /
GSP28durdhpru:9329: tād tat kathaṃ vyavacchidyate ity āha --- ṭi-
GSP28durdhpru:9331: akṣaṇikatvaṃ tu sarvasya nīlādeḥ svarūpātmakaṃ sarvasyaivānekakṣaṇasthāyitvāt /
GSP28durdhpru:9334: tathā piśācatvam apy asthisnāyumayasūcīvaktrādirūpasyaiva svarūpaṃ kalpitam iti /
GSP28durdhpru:9337: yad vā niyataḥ pratiniyata ākāraḥ svabhāvo yasya sa tathā niṣedhenāniyatākāraḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:9340: sarveṣāṃ svarūpātmakam iti ca vivaraṇam arthabhedena neyam iti /
GSP28durdhpru:9341: nanu cānenāpi virodhena virodhinoḥ sahāvasthānaṃ niṣidhyate /
GSP28durdhpru:9342: pūrveṇāpi parasparaparihāravasthānaṃ pratipādyata iti katham anyonyānyāntarbhāva ity āśaṅkyāha ekātmatveti /
GSP28durdhpru:9345: katham asya tathātvam ity āha --- yayor iti /
GSP28durdhpru:9347: yata etena virodhena viruddhayor ekātmatvaṃ niṣidhyate ata evāsmād eva kāraṇāt /
GSP28durdhpru:9348: katham īdṛśo virodho bhavatā lākṣaṇikaśabdenābhidhīyate ity āha lakṣaṇam iti /
GSP28durdhpru:9350: prayujyate anena iti vā prayojanaṃ prayojakasya /
GSP28durdhpru:9351: iti kṛtvā evaṃ vyutpādya īdṛśyā vyuttpattyeti yāvat /
GSP28durdhpru:9352: katham etat prayojanam ity āha virodheneti /
GSP28durdhpru:9354: vibhaktam anyena vibhaktaṃ yato 'neneti virodhena nīlāder vibhaktarūpavyavasthāpanād anyena sahaikātmyaṃ niṣidhyate /
GSP28durdhpru:9356: dṛśyamāne rūpe pratīyamāne vastusvarūpe yan niṣidhyate dṛśyamānātmakatvena pratiṣidhyate /
GSP28durdhpru:9357: nanu dṛśye vastuni dṛśyāntarasya dṛśyatvābhyupagamapūrvako niṣedho yukto na tv adṛśyasyety āśaṅkyāha tathā hīti /
GSP28durdhpru:9362: abhāvaḥ piśāco vā tādrūpyeṇāpratibhāsanād ity evaṃ niṣedhād ity abhiprāyaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:9365: atha syāt pratyakṣam evātra nīlasya pītātmatābhāvavyavahāraṃ karoti /
GSP28durdhpru:9367: athoktam etad adṛṣṭānām api sattvasaṃjñayā na śakto vyavahārayitum iti cet / na /
GSP28durdhpru:9371: tataḥ svapracyutivat pracyutimanto 'pi vyavacchinnā iti ye parasparaihārasthitarūpāḥ sarve te 'nena niṣddhaikatvā iti /
GSP28durdhpru:9372: saty api cāsmin virodhe sahāvasthānaṃ syād api /
GSP28durdhpru:9384: sa ca dvividho api virodho vaktṛtvasarvajñatvayor na sambhavati III-76
GSP28durdhpru:9385: ādheyaniṣedhe hy ayaṃ nyāyo na tu dṛśyamānātmatāniṣedha iti /
GSP28durdhpru:9387: kevalam atyantavimūḍham praty etad uktam ity adoṣaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:9388: kim evaṃ sati siddhim ity āha tathā ca tati ekātmyaniṣedhe sarvasya dṛśyātmatayā niṣedhaprakāre sati /
GSP28durdhpru:9389: tadabhāvas tasya paricchidyamānasya svarūpasya nīlāder abhāvas tadabhāvo dṛśyo dṛśyātmakaḥ [71b] san vyavacchidyate tādātmyena niṣidhyate /
GSP28durdhpru:9390: ayaṃ dṛśyātmano nīlo nābhāvaḥ tuccharūpeṇa abhāvarūpeṇāpratibhāsanād iti kṛtvā dṛśyamānarūpātmatayā niṣedhād iti bhāvaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:9391: bhavatu paricchidyamānābhāvasya dṛśyasya vyavacchedas tadavyabhicāriṇas tu niṣedhe kā vārttety āha yac ceti /
GSP28durdhpru:9394: yati tadabhāvavāṃs tādātmyena pratiṣidhyate tarhi kṣaṇikatvam api pūrvokteṇa nyāyena nīlābhāvavad iti tad api tādāmyatayā vyavacchedyaṃ syād ity āha niyatākāram iti /
GSP28durdhpru:9396: yato dvayor apy abhāvatadvator dṛśyamānātmatayā niṣedhād dṛśyayor eva niṣedhas tatas tasmāt svapracyutir iva svābhāva iva vyavacchinnā niṣiddhatādātmyāḥ
GSP28durdhpru:9399: aneneti virodhena niṣiddham ekatvaṃ yeṣām iti vigrahaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:9400: virodhe parasparaparihārasthitātmalakṣaṇe sahaikatra lokapratītisiddhe deśe 'vasthānaṃ sthitiḥ syāt /
GSP28durdhpru:9402: yasmād anena virodhena naikatrāvasthānaṃ niṣiddhyate kin tv ekātmakatvam /
GSP28durdhpru:9404: tataḥ kāraṇād bhinnau nāmabhūtau vyāpārau yayos tau tathoktau /
GSP28durdhpru:9407: kin tu viṣayabhedād apīty āha bhinnaviṣayau ceti /
GSP28durdhpru:9408: na kevalaṃ bhinnavyāpārau bhinnaviṣayāv apīty apiśabdārthaś cakāraḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:9409: bhinnaviṣayatvam eva darśayann āha sakala iti //
GSP28durdhpru:9411: tathāpy anayor anyatara eva virodho vaktṛtvasarvajñatvayor bhaviṣyatīty āha sa ceti /
GSP28durdhpru:9412: co yasmāt so 'yam anantarokto dvividho nāsti /
GSP28durdhpru:9415: sa cāyaṃ dvividho 'pi virodho vaktṛtvaṃ ca sarvajñatvaṃ ca tayor na sambhavati /
GSP28durdhpru:9416: na hy avikalkāraṇāsya sarvajñatvasya vaktṛtvabhāvād abhāvagatiḥ[593] /
GSP28durdhpru:9432: syād etat --- yadi nāsty eva virodho ghaṭapaṭayor iva syād api tayoḥ sahāv asthitadarśanam[596] /
GSP28durdhpru:9438: na ca[598]aviruddhavidher anupalabdhāv apy abhāvagatiḥ III-77
GSP28durdhpru:9441: tatrādyasya tāvad abhāvaṃ na hītyādinā darśayati /
GSP28durdhpru:9443: kuto nābhāvagatir ity āha sarvajñatvaṃ hīti /
GSP28durdhpru:9445: adṛśyasyāpi kiṃ nābhāvagatir ity āha adṛṣṭasyeti /
GSP28durdhpru:9448: anena vaktṛtvena virodhagatir nāsti tasya sarvajñatvasyety arthāt /
GSP28durdhpru:9449: dvitīyasya virodhasya [abhāvaṃ] pratipādayann āha na ceti /
GSP28durdhpru:9453: kuto vaktṛtvaparihāreṇa sarvajñatvaṃ nāvasthitam ity āha teṣām api kāṣṭhādīnāṃ sarvajñatvasya prasaṅgāt prasakteḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:9454: kutas teṣāṃ tathātvaprasaṅga ity āśaṅkya yojanīyaṃ kāṣṭhādaya iti /
GSP28durdhpru:9457: vaktṛtvam eva sarvajñatvaparihāreṇa vyavasthitaṃ bhaviṣyatīty āha nāpīti /
GSP28durdhpru:9460: ihāpi kāṣṭhādayo hi sarvajñatvena parihṛtā iti draṣṭavyam /
GSP28durdhpru:9461: syād etat vaktṛtvasarvajñatvayoḥ parasparaparihārasthitalakṣaṇatvāvirodhe 'pi kā kṣatir yena tanniṣedhaḥ kṛtaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:9462: tathā hy anyonyaparihāreṇāvasthāne 'pi yad vaktṛtvaṃ tat sarvajñatvaṃ mā bhūt,
GSP28durdhpru:9465: tad anantaram evoktam dharmottareṇa saty api cāsmin virodhe sahāvasthānaṃ syād apīti /
GSP28durdhpru:9467: yeṣāṃ hi vaktṛtvasarvajñatvalakṣaṇau dharmiṇo bhinnāv eva dharmau teṣām idaṃ śobhate na tu tathāgatānāṃ dharmadharmiṇor vāstavam abhedam icchatām
GSP28durdhpru:9470: na cāviruddhavidher iti anupalabdhāv apy nāyaṃ viruddhavidhiḥ yady api[599] sahāvasthānānupalambhas tathāpi na tayor virodhaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:9471: yasmān na sahānupalambhamātrād virodho 'pi tu dvayor upalabhyamānayor [600]nivartyanivartakabhāvāvasāyāt /
GSP28durdhpru:9472: tasmād anupalamdhāv api na vaktṛtvavidhe viruddhavidhiḥ[601] /
GSP28durdhpru:9479: yato yadi vacanādi rāgādīnāṃ kāryaṃ syād vacanāde rāgādigatiḥ syāt /
GSP28durdhpru:9485: rāgādīnāṃ vacanādeś ca kāryakāraṇabhāvāsiddheḥ kāraṇān na kāryam /
GSP28durdhpru:9487: mā bhūd rāgādikārya vacanaṃ sahacāri tu bhavati /
GSP28durdhpru:9488: tato rāgādau sahacāriṇi nivṛtte nivarttate[603]vacanam ity āśaṅkyāha ---
GSP28durdhpru:9491: arthāntarasya[604]cākāraṇasya nivṛttau na vacanāder nivṛttiḥ III-79
GSP28durdhpru:9494: arthāntarasya [605]cākāraṇasya nivṛttau sahacāritvadarśanamāteṇa nānyasya vacanāder nivṛttiḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:9501: syāt tadā vaktṛtvasya vaktur abhedāt sarvajñatvasya ca sarvajñād,
GSP28durdhpru:9503: sarvajña eva vā vakteti yuktam anayoḥ parasparaparihārasthitalakṣaṇatābhāvapratipādanam iti /
GSP28durdhpru:9504: yadi nāsty eva virodhaḥ sahānavasthāṇalakṣaṇa iti draṣṭavyam /
GSP28durdhpru:9508: tat kim evam ucyata ity āśaṅkyāha yady apīti /
GSP28durdhpru:9510: ato hetor asmād vaktṛtvād anyasya sarvajñatvasya nābhāvapatipattiḥ //
GSP28durdhpru:9511: yathā vaktṛtvād asarvajñatvagatir nāsti tathā vaktṛtvād rāgādimattvasyāpi gatir nāstīti jijñāpayiṣur āha tatheti /
GSP28durdhpru:9514: yathā sandigdhavipakṣavyāvṛttikasādhanadoṣas tathā prāg evābhihitam iti na punar ucyate //
GSP28durdhpru:9523: tasmād asarvajñarāgādimattvaviparyayāt vipakṣāt sarvajñatvād arāgādimattvāc ca sandigdho
GSP28durdhpru:9525: evam ekaikarūpādisiddhasandehe hetudoṣān ākhyāya dvayor dvayo rūpayor asiddhisandehe hetudoṣān vaktumāma[609] āha ---
GSP28durdhpru:9529: dvayor[610] iti / dvayo rūpayor viparyayasiddhau sattyāṃ viruddhaḥ //
GSP28durdhpru:9541: yathā kṛtakatvaṃ prayatnānantarīyakatvaṃ ca nityatve sādhye viruddho hetvābhāsaḥ III-83
GSP28durdhpru:9543: asapakṣe ca asattvasya viparyayasiddhāv iti[612] sambandhaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:9546: prayatnānantarīyakaśabdena[614] hi prayatnānantaraṃ janma jñānaṃ ca prayatnānantarīyakam ucyate /
GSP28durdhpru:9557: sarvān aikānitikaprārān uktvā viruddhatvākhyaṃ hetudoṣam abhidadhāno vārtikakārasyābhipāryam evam ityādinā darśayati /
GSP28durdhpru:9560: yadi dvāv api svabhāvahetū tadā kiṃ dvayābhidhānena?
GSP28durdhpru:9561: ekenāpi svabhāvahetunā viruddhatvasya darśītatvād ityāśaṅkya samarthanam āha --- kṛṭakatvam iti /
GSP28durdhpru:9563: tat katham anenaivam ucyata ity āha --- prayatneti /
GSP28durdhpru:9565: prayatnasya puruṣavyāpārasyānantaram avyavahitaṃ janma jñānaṃ ca tad viṣayam ucyate /
GSP28durdhpru:9567: etau hetū nityatvae sādhye viruddhau hetvābhāsau //
GSP28durdhpru:9568: kasmāt punar etau viruddhāv ity āha ---
GSP28durdhpru:9570: asapakṣe ca sattvam iti viparyayasiddhiḥ[617] III-84
GSP28durdhpru:9573: anayor iti / sapakṣe hi[618] nitye kṛtakatvaprayatnānantarīyakatvayor asattvam eva niścitam /
GSP28durdhpru:9574: anitye vipakṣe eva sattvaṃ niścitam iti viparyayasiddhiḥ //
GSP28durdhpru:9577: kasmāt punar viparyayasiddhāv apy etau viruddhāv ity āha ---
GSP28durdhpru:9579: etau ca sādhyasya nityatvasya viparyayam --- anityatvaṃ sādhayataḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:9587: ato 'nya iṣṭavighātakṛd ābhyām iti darśayann āha ---
