GSP28durdhpru:9588: [620]nanu ca tṛtīyo api iṣṭavighātakṛd viruddhaḥ III-86
GSP28durdhpru:9591: nanu ca tṛtīyo api viruddha utkaḥ[621]/
GSP28durdhpru:9593: tṛtīyo 'yam iṣṭasya śabdenānuāttasya[622]vighātaṃ karoti viparyayasādhanād iti iṣṭavighātakṛd //
GSP28durdhpru:9598: yathā parārthāś cakṣurādayaḥ saṃghātatvāc chayanāsanādyaṅgavad iti III-87
GSP28durdhpru:9599: nanu prayatnānantarīyaka[tva]śabda upāttas tat kiṃ prayatnānānantarīyakaśabdasyārtha
GSP28durdhpru:9600: ucyate ity āha --- prayatnānatarīyakatvam iti prayatnānantarīyakatvaśabdenāpi tad
GSP28durdhpru:9602: tena śabdena dvayasyābhidhāne kadā svabhāvasyābhidhānaṃ kadā kāryasyety āśaṅkya janmetyādinā vibhajate /
GSP28durdhpru:9603: yato jñānasyāpy abhidhānaṃ tat tasmād iha viruddhodāharaṇaprakrame /
GSP28durdhpru:9604: anupalambhas tv anyor evāntarbhūtatvān na pṛthag upadarśitaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:9605: etayor udāhṛtayor eva so 'pi sujñāna iti bhāva unneyaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:9606: lakṣyate cāyam ācāyasyāśayaḥ --- sapakṣāvṛttau satyāṃ vyāptyā'vyāptyā vā vipakṣavṛtto viruddha eveti darśayitum ubhayopādānam /
GSP28durdhpru:9607: anyathā kṛtakatvamātre pradarśite sapakṣāvṛttau vipakṣavyāpaka eva yaḥ sa viruddho na tu praytnānantarīyakavad yo vipakṣavyāpīti śaṅkā syāt / tathā
GSP28durdhpru:9610: paro 'rthaḥ prayojanaṃ [623]parārthaḥ prayajakaḥ saṃskārya upakarttavyo yeṣām te parārthāḥ --- iti sādhyam /
GSP28durdhpru:9618: yataḥ [626]śayanāsanādayaḥ saṃghātarūpāḥ puruṣasya bhogino bhavanty upakārakā iti parārthā ucyante //
GSP28durdhpru:9626: tadiṣṭāsahatapārārthayaviparyayasādhanād iti asaṃhate viṣaye pārārthyam asaṃhatapārārthyam[627] /
GSP28durdhpru:9627: tasya sākhyasya vādina iṣṭam asaṃhatapārārthya tadiṣṭāsaṃhatapārārtham /
GSP28durdhpru:9631: [627] -rthyam / iṣṭāsaṃhatapārārthyaṃ tasya sāṃkhyasya vādina iṣṭāsaṃhata pārārthyam
GSP28durdhpru:9632: `ātmā asti' iti bruvāṇaḥ sāṃkhyaḥ `kuta etad' iti paryanuyukto bauddhenedam ātmanaḥ siddhaye pramāṇam āha /
GSP28durdhpru:9635: yasmād yo yasyopakārakaḥ sa tasya janakaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:9636: janyamānaś ca yugapat krameṇa vā bhavati[628] saṃhataḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:9641: prayatnānantarīyakatvamātre pradarśite sapakṣāvṛttāv avyāptyaiva yo vipakṣe varttate sa eva viruddho nānya iti śaṅkā syāt,
GSP28durdhpru:9643: yadi tu kāryahetur udāhṛta ity ucyate,
GSP28durdhpru:9645: na ca tasyās tatrāntarbhāvān nodāharaṇam iti yuktam,
GSP28durdhpru:9647: evaṃ dharmottareṇa kathaṃ na vyākhyātam iti na pratīmaḥ //
GSP28durdhpru:9648: arthaśabdaḥ prayojane vṛttas tasya ca prayojayatīti vyutpattyā prayojakaśabdābhilapyatvam ity abhipetya parārthaḥ prayojaka ity uktaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:9649: parasminn arthaḥ prayojanaṃ yeṣām iti gamakatvād vyadhikaraṇabahuvrīhau tu sarvaṃ samañjasaṃ kevalam anena tathā na vyākhyātam iti na vidmaḥ
GSP28durdhpru:9651: kasya tad aṅgam ity ucyata ity āha --- puruṣeti //
GSP28durdhpru:9652: krameṇa yugapad vā 'pi dvedhāpy asaṃhataṃ draṣṭavyam /
GSP28durdhpru:9653: kutaḥ punar asaṃhataviṣayaṃ pārārthyam iṣṭaṃ sāṃkhyāsyākhyata ity āśaṅkyāha ātmeti /
GSP28durdhpru:9655: yac ca tad asaṃhatarūpaṃ sa evātmety abhiprāyeṇoktam asaṃhatasyātmana iti //
GSP28durdhpru:9658: sa[630] iha kasmān na uktaḥ III-89
GSP28durdhpru:9661: sa kasmād vārttikakāreṇa satā tvayā na uktaḥ? itara[631] āha ---
GSP28durdhpru:9667: tat katham uktavipayayasādhanayor evāntabhāva ity āha ---
GSP28durdhpru:9668: na hy ayam ābhyāṃ sādhyaviparyayasādhanatvena bhidyate III-91
GSP28durdhpru:9671: yasmād ayam iṣṭavidhatakṛdābhyāṃ hetubhyāṃ sādhyaviparyayasya[632] sādhanatvena bhidyate /
GSP28durdhpru:9673: uktaviparyayaṃ tu sādhayatu[633] vā mā vā kim uktaviparyayasādhanena /
GSP28durdhpru:9678: nanu coktam eva sādhyaṃ[634] tat kathaṃ sādhyaviparyayasādhanatvenābheda ity āha ---
GSP28durdhpru:9681: na hi iṣṭauktayoḥ sādhyatvena kaścid viśeṣa iti III-92
GSP28durdhpru:9682: na hīti yasmād iṣṭauktayoḥ [635]parasparasmāt sādhyatvena na kaścid viśeṣa bheda iti /
GSP28durdhpru:9686: pravādino hi yaj jijñāsitaṃ tat prakaraṇāpannam /
GSP28durdhpru:9687: yac ca prakaraṇāpannaṃ tat sādhanecchayā viṣayīkṛtaṃ sādhyam iṣṭam uktam uktaṃ vā,
GSP28durdhpru:9690: dvayo rūpayor ekasya asiddhāv aparasya ca sandehe anaikāntikaḥ III-93
GSP28durdhpru:9698: itara iti codakādanyo vārtikakāra ity arthāt /
GSP28durdhpru:9702: tam eva sādhyatenābhedaṃ sādhayann āha --- prativādino hīti /
GSP28durdhpru:9714: yatheti / vigato rāgo yasya sa vītarāgaḥ ity ekaṃ sādhyam /
GSP28durdhpru:9718: svātmany eva sarāge cāsarvajñe ca vipakṣe vaktṛtvaṃ dṛṣṭam /
GSP28durdhpru:9722: sarvajñavītarāgayor viprakarṣād vacanādes tatra sattvam asattvaṃ vā sandigdham III-95
GSP28durdhpru:9723: sapakṣabhūtayoḥ sarvajñavītarāgayor viprakarṣād ity atīndriyatvād vacanāder indriyagamyasyāpi tatra atīndriyayoḥ sarvajñatvavī(jñavī)
GSP28durdhpru:9725: tataś ca na jñāyate kiṃ vaktṛtvāt sarvajña uta nety anaikāntikam iti //
GSP28durdhpru:9726: samprati dvayor eva sandehe 'naikāntikaṃ vaktum āha ---
GSP28durdhpru:9727: anayor eva dvayo rūpayoḥ sandehe anaikāntikaḥ III-96
GSP28durdhpru:9736: yatheti[643] / sahātmanā varttate sātmakam iti sādhyam /
GSP28durdhpru:9742: prāṇāḥ [644]śvāsādaya ādir yasyonmeṣanimeṣādeḥ prāṇidharmasya sa prāṇādiḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:9749: jīvat prāṇān dhārayac ca tac charīraṃ ceti vigrahaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:9750: unmeṣaś cakṣur vikāśa ādir yasya nimeṣādes tasya prāṇidharmasya jīvadharmasya /
GSP28durdhpru:9753: asādhāraṇatvād eva saṃśayahetur iti hetubhāvena viśeṣaṇam //
GSP28durdhpru:9756: saṃśayaviṣayau yāv ākārau tābhyāṃ sarvasya vastunaḥ saṃgrahāt /
GSP28durdhpru:9757: tayoś ca vyāpakayor ākārayor ekatrāpi vṛttyaniścayāt /
GSP28durdhpru:9758: [645]yābhyāṃ hy ākārābhyāṃ sarvaṃ vastu na saṅgṛhyate tayor ākārayo na saṃśayaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:9759: prakārāntarasambhave hi pakṣadharmo dharmiṇam aviyuktaṃ dvayor ekena dharmeṇa darśaytuṃ na śaknuyāt /
GSP28durdhpru:9761: dvayor dharmayor aniyataṃ bhāvaṃ darśayan saṃśayahehuḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:9762: dvayos tv aniyatam api bhāvaṃ darśayitum aśakto[646] 'pratipattihetuḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:9763: niyataṃ tu[647] bhāvaṃ darśayan [648]samyag hetur viruddho vā syāt /
GSP28durdhpru:9764: tasmād [649]yābhyāṃ sarvaṃ vastu saṃgṛhyate tayoḥ[650] saṃśayahetur yadi tayor ekatrāpi sambhāvaniścayo na syāt /
GSP28durdhpru:9765: sadbhāvaniścaye tu yady ekatra niyatasattāniścayo hetur[651] viruddho vā syāt /
GSP28durdhpru:9778: kathaṃ punar ayaṃ saṃśayahetur utpādayituṃ śakyate yāvatā nāsmāt sātmakatvasyānātmakatvasya vā pratipattir jāyate /
GSP28durdhpru:9779: tato 'praitpattir evāsādhāraṇa ity uddyotakaramatam āśaṅkya yatra (yat na)
GSP28durdhpru:9780: hīty uktaṃ vārtikakṛtā tad avatārayitum bhūmikām racayann āha --- pakṣadharmasyeti /
GSP28durdhpru:9782: pakṣasya dharmaya sato dvābhyāṃ kāraṇābhyāṃ nimittābhyām /
GSP28durdhpru:9784: tayor vyāpakayor ākārayoḥ sātmakatvānātmakatvākhyayor viṣayabhūtayo ekatrāpi viṣaye 'niścayāt tasya pakṣādharmasyety arthāt /
GSP28durdhpru:9786: yena tathātvaṃ tayo upavarṇyata ity āha --- yābhyām iti /
GSP28durdhpru:9788: kathaṃ punas tayor ākārayo na saṃśaya ity āha --- prākārāntareti /
GSP28durdhpru:9790: pakṣadharmaḥ san dharmiṇaṃ taṃ pakṣaṃ dvayor ekena dharmeṇa sātmakatvākhyena anātmtvākhyena vā /
GSP28durdhpru:9792: na śaknoti darśayituṃ prakārāntareṇa sambandhasya tasya sambhavāt /
GSP28durdhpru:9793: yata evam ataḥ sa pakṣadharmo na saṃśayahetuḥ syāt /
GSP28durdhpru:9795: atha kathaṃ sātmakatvānātmakatve dvau dharmau darśayann api saṃśayatehtur ucyata ity āha --- dvayor iti /
GSP28durdhpru:9796: darśayann[73a] iti hetau śatur vidhānād aniyatabhāvapradarśanād ity artho boddhavyaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:9797: nanu niyatābhāvam adarśayann apratipattihetur evāyāyaṃ yujyata ity āha --- dvayos tv iti /
GSP28durdhpru:9799: niyatapradarśakasyāpi kiṃ na tathātvam ity āha --- niyatatvaṃ(yataṃ) tv iti /
GSP28durdhpru:9803: viruddho 'pi viparyaye samyaghetur evety ekatra sattāniścaye viruddho vā syād ity uktam /
GSP28durdhpru:9807: na hi[652]sātmakanirātmakābhyām anyo rāśir asti yatrāyaṃ[653]prāṇādir vartate (varteta)III-98
GSP28durdhpru:9825: tābhyāṃ sarvasya vastunaḥ saṃgrahāt kroḍī karaṇāt /
GSP28durdhpru:9826: yatra hy ātmā asti tat sātmakam /
GSP28durdhpru:9832: yadaikatraiva sattāniścayo viruddho vā syād ity uktam,
GSP28durdhpru:9833: yadaikatraiva sattāniścayo nāsti tadā kā vārttety āha --- aniyateti /
GSP28durdhpru:9835: aniyato 'traivāyaṃ varttata ity evaṃ rūpaniyamaśūnyo yaḥ sattāniścayas tasmin sati /
GSP28durdhpru:9839: yadā punaḥ sapakṣe vṛttisandehāniyatasattāniścayas tadā sandhgadhānvayāsiddhavyatirekaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:9840: yadā tu sapakṣāsapakṣayor ekatrāpi sattāniścayo nāsti tadā sapakṣāsapakṣāvṛtter asādhāraṇaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:9842: yataḥ pakṣādharmas yoktābhyāṃ kāraṇābhyāṃ saṃśayahetutvaṃ tatas tasmāt darśayituṃ darśayiṣyāmīti mattvā /
GSP28durdhpru:9844: vastudharmatvaṃ ca prāṇāder avastuni śaśaviṣāṇād āvavṛtteḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:9845: yato rāśyantarābhāvas tasmāt kāraṇād ayaṃ prāṇādimattvākhyo hetuḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:9848: tatrāmunā nahītyādinā mūlena saṃśayaviṣayābhyām ākārābhyāṃ sarvavastusaṃgraha ekaṃ kāraṇam uktam /
GSP28durdhpru:9849: nāpy anayor ityādinā tu tayor ekatrāpi vṛttyaniścayo dvitīyaṃ kāraṇam uktam iti darśayitum āha --- saṃśayeti /
GSP28durdhpru:9855: nāpy anayor sātmakānātmakayor madhya ekatra sātmake 'nātmake[661] vā vṛtter sadbhāvasya niścayo 'sti /
GSP28durdhpru:9856: dvāv api rāśī tyaktvā na varttate prāṇādiḥ,
GSP28durdhpru:9858: tataś cānayor eva varttate[662] ity etāvad eva jñātam /
GSP28durdhpru:9859: viśeṣe tu vṛttiniścayo nāstīy ayam arthaḥ[663] //
GSP28durdhpru:9865: [664]sātmakatvena anātmakatvena vā prasiddhe prāṇāder asiddheḥ[665] III-101
GSP28durdhpru:9869: [666]sātmakatvena anātmakatvena vā viśeṣeṇa yukte prasiddhe niścite vastuni prāṇāder dharmasya[667] sarvavastuvyāpinoḥ prakārayor ekatra niyatasadbhāvasyāsiddher
GSP28durdhpru:9874: tad evam asādhāraṇasya dharamasyānaikāntikatva kāraṇadvayam abhihitam //
GSP28durdhpru:9876: vṛttiḥ pravṛttir arthāt bhāva evāvatiṣṭhata ity abhiprāyeṇāha --- vṛtteḥ sādbhāvasyeti /
GSP28durdhpru:9877: yady evaṃ tayor na varttata ity eva kiṃ na syāt?
GSP28durdhpru:9878: tathā ca kathaṃ saṃśayahetur ity āśaṅkya yādṛśo 'syārtho 'bhipretas taṃ sphuṭayitum āha --- dvāvapīti /
GSP28durdhpru:9879: kuto na varttata ity āha --- vatudharmatvād iti /
GSP28durdhpru:9882: vastunā vā 'vaśyaṃ sātmakenā 'nātmakena vā bhāvyam iti bhāvaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:9888: yad idam anantaroktam etat parimāṇaṃ yasya prameyasya tad etāvad vastutattvaṃ niścitam /
GSP28durdhpru:9889: kutas tarhi nāsya vṛttiniścaya ity āha --- viśeṣe tv iti /
GSP28durdhpru:9896: artho 'bhidheyo yasya “nāpy anayor ekatra vṛttiniścayaḥ” ity asya maulasya vākyasyety arthāt //
GSP28durdhpru:9901: evaṃ ca vyācakṣāṇena [na] maya svātantryeṇa pakṣadharmasyetyādinā
GSP28durdhpru:9903: pakṣadharmaś ca bhavan[668] sarvaḥ sādhāraṇo 'sādhāraṇo va bhavaty anaikāntikaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:9907: tasmāj jīvaccharīrasambandhī prāṇādiḥ sātmakād anātmakāc ca sarvasmād vyāvṛttatvena asiddhes tābhyāṃ[669]na vyatiricyate III-102
GSP28durdhpru:9912: yasmāt tayor ekatrāpi na nivṛttiniścayas tasmāt tābhyāṃ na vyatiricyate /
GSP28durdhpru:9913: vastudharme hi sarvastuvyāpinoḥ prakārayor ekatraniyatasadbhāvo niścataḥ prakārāntarān nivarttete /
GSP28durdhpru:9914: ata evāha[670] --- sātmakād anātmakāc ca sarvasmād vastuno vyāvṛttatvena asiddher iti /
GSP28durdhpru:9915: prāṇādiḥ tāvat kutaścid ghaṭader nivṛtta eva /
GSP28durdhpru:9916: tata etāvad avasātuṃ śakyam --- sātmakād anātmakād vā kiyato nivṛttaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:9926: tasmād ityādinā tu śarīrasambandhitvam asya kasmād ācāryo darśayatītyāśaṅkāṃ nirācikīrṣuḥ pakṣadharmaś ce tyādinopakramate /
GSP28durdhpru:9928: apakṣadharmastvasiddhtvākhyām anyām eva doṣajātim anuśnuta iti bhāvaḥ pakṣadharmatvaṃ pradarśayato vārtikakārasyonneyaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:9932: yasmād apkṣadharmo nānaikāntika upavarṇatenābhipāryeṇa tasmāt kāraṇāt /
GSP28durdhpru:9936: tasmād ity anena yasmādityādkṣiptaṃ darśayann āha --- yasmād iti /
GSP28durdhpru:9937: ekatrāpi na vṛttiniścayas tasya prāṇāder ity arthāt /
GSP28durdhpru:9938: tasmāt kāraṇāt tābhyāṃ sātmakatvānātmakatvābhyāṃ na vyatiricyate na nivarttate,
GSP28durdhpru:9940: tayor ekatra vṛttyaniścaye 'pi kathaṃ tābhyāṃ na vyatiricyata ity āha --- vastv iti /
GSP28durdhpru:9943: tayor dharma ekatraniyataḥ `atraivāyaṃ varttata iti niyamavān' sadbhāvaḥ sattvaṃ yasya sa tathā /
GSP28durdhpru:9947: ekatra vṛttyaniścayāc ca nāyaṃ tathety abhiprāyaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:9954: yady evam anvayo 'stu tayor niśicta ity āha ---
GSP28durdhpru:9964: vastudharmatayā tayor dvayor ektatra[675] vā varttata ity avasitaḥ prāṇādiḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:9965: na tu sātmaka eva nirātmaka eva vā varttata iti kuto 'nvayaniścayaḥ //
GSP28durdhpru:9970: nanu ca prativādino na kiñcit sātmakam asti /
GSP28durdhpru:9971: tato 'sya hetor na sātmake 'nvayo[676] na vyatirka[677] ity anvayavyatirkayor abhāvaniścayaḥ sātmake,
GSP28durdhpru:9976: na api[678]sātmakād anātmakāc ca tasya anvayavyatirekayor abhāvaniścayaḥ III-105
GSP28durdhpru:9979: nanu ghāṭapaṭāder anekasmāt prāṇādinirvarttamāno dṛṣṭas tat kathaṃ tasya vyāvṛttatvenāsiddhir ity āha --- prāṇādir iti /
GSP28durdhpru:9980: tataḥ sarvasmāt sātmakād anātmakāc ca nivṛttyanavasāyāt /
GSP28durdhpru:9981: kutaḥ? sātmakād anātmakāc ca pratibandhāsiddher iti cātra sarvatrābhiprāyaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:9982: nanu kim ucyate na kutaścid iti?
GSP28durdhpru:9985: yady evaṃ jīvaccharīram api bauddhena tathātveneṣṭam iti tasyāpi tathātvaṃ kin na bhavet /
GSP28durdhpru:9986: abhyupagamena ca sātmakānātmake vibhajya hetuṃ kathayatā gamikatvam iti yat kiñcid etat //
GSP28durdhpru:9989: nanu vastudharmeṇa tenāvaśyaṃ kvāpi niyatena bhāvyam /
GSP28durdhpru:9990: tat katham anvayābhāva ity āha --- vastudharmatayeti /
GSP28durdhpru:9994: nirātmake ghaṭādau prāṇāder adarśaṇād iti cet / na /
GSP28durdhpru:9995: tasyaiva [74a] śarīrasya nirātmakatvasambhāvanāyāṃ sarvasmān nirātmakān nirvṛttiniśayābhāvāt /
GSP28durdhpru:9998: nāpi sātmakād vastunaḥ tasya prāṇāder anvayavyatirekayor abhāvaviścayaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:10000: sātmakād anātmakād iti ca pañcamī vyatirekaśabdāpekṣayā draṣṭavyā //
GSP28durdhpru:10005: ekasyānvayasya vyatirekasya vā yo abhāvaniścayaḥ [681]so parasya dvitīyasya bhāvaniścayanāntarīyakaḥ [682]bhāvaniścayasyāvyabhicārī /
GSP28durdhpru:10021: sa eva rūpaṃ yayos tator bhāvas tattvaṃ tasmāt kāraṇāt /
GSP28durdhpru:10024: yasya vyavacchedena yat paricchidyate tat tatparihārṇa vyavasthitam /
GSP28durdhpru:10027: abhāvo hi nīrūpo yādṛśo vikalpena darśitaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:10028: nīrūpatāṃ ca vyavacchidya rūpam ākāravat paricchidyate /
GSP28durdhpru:10033: nanu cetiyādi tasmāt kāraṇād ity etad antaṃ spaṣṭārtha tena na vyākhyāyate /
GSP28durdhpru:10034: anyonyavyavacchedarūpatvam evānvayavyatirekayoḥ katham ity āśṅkyāha --- anvayavyatirekāv iti /
GSP28durdhpru:10036: bhavatāṃ tau tathārūpau kim ata ity āha --- bhāvābhāv iti /
GSP28durdhpru:10038: bhavatv evaṃ tathāpi kathaṃ tayor anonyaparihāreṇāvasthānam ity āha --- yasyeti /
GSP28durdhpru:10039: nanv atra kasya vyavacchedena kiṃ paricchidyate yena tat parihārehaṇa tad vyavatiṣṭhata ity āha --- svābhāveti /
GSP28durdhpru:10044: tasmād yadi nāma sātmakam avastu nirātmakaṃ ca vastu,
GSP28durdhpru:10046: ekatra[687] vastuny ekasya[688] vastuno yugapad bhāvābhāvavirodhāt tayor abhāvaniścayāyogāt[689] /
GSP28durdhpru:10052: na ca prativādyanurodhāt sātmakānātmake vastuno vastusato /
GSP28durdhpru:10058: eta eva kvacid anvayavyatirekayor na bhāvaniścayo [691]nāpy abhāvaniśayaḥ,
GSP28durdhpru:10062: yadi tu kvacid apy[692] anvayavyatirekayor ekasyāpy abhāvaniścayaḥ syāt,
GSP28durdhpru:10063: sa eva dvitīyasya bhāvaniścaya ity anvayavyatirekasandeha eva na syāt /
GSP28durdhpru:10064: yataś ca[693] na kvacid bhāvābhāvaniścayas tata evānvayavyatirekayoḥ sandehaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:10070: paricchidyata ity āha --- tathā ceti nīrūpatāvyavacchedena rūpasya pratiṣṭhatākāravataḥ paricchedaprakāre sati /
GSP28durdhpru:10072: nanu bauddhānāṃ sātmakaṃ nāma nāsty evety avastu /
GSP28durdhpru:10074: tatra vastu[ni] nirātmako[ke] hetor anvayavyatirekayor abhāvaniścayo mā bhūt sātmake tv avastuni sa kathaṃ na syād ity āśaṅkyopasaṃhāravyājenāha tasmād iti /
GSP28durdhpru:10076: kathaṃ na bhāvaniścayas tator ity āśaṅkyopapattim āha --- ekatreti /
GSP28durdhpru:10079: kālabhede kiṃ na yujyate ity āha --- yugapad iti /
GSP28durdhpru:10082: tad eva tu na yujyate iti darśayann āha --- na ceti /
GSP28durdhpru:10084: prakaraṇād iha prativādī bauddhas tad anurodhavaśād iṣṭyaniṣṭivaśāt sātmakam asannirātmakaṃ sad iti yathāyogaṃ yojanīyam /
GSP28durdhpru:10085: evaṃ hy avāstavam anumānaṃ syāt na vastubalapravṛttam iti bhāvaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:10086: yady evaṃ te sadasatī na bhavataḥ kathaṃ nāmety āha --- kin tv iti /
GSP28durdhpru:10093: yata evaṃ tataḥ kāraṇāt sātmakānātmakayoḥ sadasattvayoḥ saṃśayaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:10100: sādhyasya, itarasya ca viruddhasya ataḥ --- sandigdhānvayayatirekān niścayābhāvāt /
GSP28durdhpru:10101: sapakṣavipakṣayor hi sadasattvasandehe na sādhyasya na viruddhasya siddhiḥ[696] /
GSP28durdhpru:10102: na ca sātmakānātmakābhyāṃ[697] paraḥ prakāraḥ saṃbhavati /
GSP28durdhpru:10103: tataḥ prāṇādimattvād dharmiṇi jīvaccarīre saṃśaya ātmabhāvābhāvayor ity anaikāntikaḥ prāṇādir iti //
GSP28durdhpru:10107: astu sasattvasaṃśayo 'nvayavyatirekaniścayas tu kin na bhavatīty āha --- yata iti /
GSP28durdhpru:10108: na bhāvaniścayo nābhāvaniścaya ity ekatra sātmake 'nātamake veti draṣṭavyam /
GSP28durdhpru:10109: sātmake 'nātmake vā prāṇādeḥ sadasattvaniścayābhāvād evānvayavyatirekayoḥ sandeho nānyatheti pratipādayitum āha --- yadi tv iti /
GSP28durdhpru:10113: tasmāt sandehāt anaikāntikaḥ prāṇādimattvākhyo hetur iti prakaraṇāt //
GSP28durdhpru:10118: sapakṣavipakṣayor viṣayabhūtayor hetoḥ sadasattvasandehe na sādhyasyānumitsitasya viruddhasya viparayayasya siddhir niścayaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:10119: viruddho 'pi viparyaye samyaghetur ity abhiprāyeṇedam uktam /
GSP28durdhpru:10120: na cetyādi prāṇādir ity antaṃ sugamam /
GSP28durdhpru:10121: īdṛśa eva cāsādhāraṇo hetuḥ kaiścin naiyāyikair anupalasaṃhārya ity uktam /
GSP28durdhpru:10123: uddyotakaras tu śrāvaṇatvākhye 'sādhāraṇahetāv ācāryadignāgena darśita idam avādīt
GSP28durdhpru:10124: --- “yady etac chrāvaṇatvaṃ nityānityayor dṛṣṭaṃ syāj janayettayoḥ saṃśayam ūrdhvatvam
GSP28durdhpru:10127: tasmān nāyaṃ saṃśayahetur api tv apratipattihetur eva /
GSP28durdhpru:10129: vastunā nityena bhāvyam anityena vā prakārāntarābhāvāt /
GSP28durdhpru:10132: tarhi vastudharmatvāt saṃśayo na śrāvaṇatvād iti /
GSP28durdhpru:10133: ” tulyanyāyatayā 'trāpy asādhāraṇe tad īyam idam īdṛśaṃ carcitam āsajyata eveti “katham ayaṃ saṃśayaṃ saṃśayahetur upapādayitavyaḥ” iti sādhūktam tena /
GSP28durdhpru:10136: na tu tasmād eva vastudharmād ubhayākārasaṃsparśī pratyayo dolāyate na ca yady asyapratipattikāraṇe kāraṇam tata eva sā pratipattiḥ,
GSP28durdhpru:10137: na tu tasmād iti śakyate vaktum /
GSP28durdhpru:10138: tad utpatter agnipratipattir na dhūmād ity asyābhidhānaprasaṅgāt /
GSP28durdhpru:10140: kiñcaivaṃ prameyatvāder api na saṃśayaḥ syāt /
GSP28durdhpru:10141: śakyate hi tatrāpi vaktum ubhayatra darśanāt saṃśayo na prameyatvād iti /
GSP28durdhpru:10142: atha tasya tāvad ubhayatra darśanaṃ tena tasmād ucyate /
GSP28durdhpru:10143: yady evaṃ vastudharmatvam api śrāvaṇatvasyaiveti kathaṃ na tasmād asau /
GSP28durdhpru:10144: api cordhvatvam api yady api sthāṇupuruṣayor api dṛṣṭaṃ tathāpi tāvat tatrāntareṇātraiva bhaviṣyatīti paryanuyoge satīdam eva vācyam --- yad utordhvatvaṃ nāma vastudharmaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:10145: vastunā caivaṃvidhiḥ --- sthāṇunā puruṣeṇa vā 'vaśyaṃ bhāvyam iti /
GSP28durdhpru:10146: tathā ca vastudharmād eva saṃśayo nordhvatvād ity aniṣṭāpādanaṃ --- kena nirākriyetety alaṃ viṣtareṇa /
GSP28durdhpru:10147: sādhansasya siddher yan nāṅgam asiddho viruddho 'naikāntiko hetvābhāsaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:10149: tsmād evaṃvidho hetvābhāsaḥ dvayam aprayojyaḥ paraprayuktaś cāvaśyam udbhāvayitavya iti hetvābhāsavyutpādane vārttikakārasyābhiprāyo boddhavyaḥ
GSP28durdhpru:10150: syād etat --- asamarthaṃ viśeṣaṇo 'samarthaviśeṣyaś cāsti prabhedaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:10152: atra kṛṭakatvaṃ viśeṣyam eva sādhyasiddhau samartham,
GSP28durdhpru:10153: na tu prameyatvaṃ viśeṣaṇam ity asamarthaṃ viśeṣaṇam,
GSP28durdhpru:10154: yatra viśeṣyam eva samratham iti kṛtvā bhavaty asamarthaviśeṣaṇo hetuḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:10156: nityaḥ śabdaḥ kṛtakatve sati prameyatvād iti /
GSP28durdhpru:10157: atra hi kṛtakatvaṃ viśeṣaṇam eva sādhyasiddhau samartham,
GSP28durdhpru:10158: na tu prameyatvaṃ viśeṣyam ity asamarthaṃ viśeṣyam /
GSP28durdhpru:10159: yatra hi viśeṣaṇam [75a] eva samartham iti kṛṭvā bhavaty ayam asarthaviśeṣyo hetuḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:10165: nāpy anaikāntike kṛtakatvaniśiṣṭaprameyatvasya prameyatvaviśiṣṭakṛtakatvasya ca sādhyā 'vyabhicārāt /
GSP28durdhpru:10166: tasmād asiddhatvāder anya evāyaṃ hetudoṣaprakāraḥ prāpta iti /
GSP28durdhpru:10169: yadi hy evam ayaṃ prayukto hetur dviṣyet(ta)
GSP28durdhpru:10172: yāvatā naivam ayaṃ prayukto 'nyatheti sādhyasādhanād iti /
GSP28durdhpru:10173: na tarhy evaṃ vādī nigṛhyata iti cet /
GSP28durdhpru:10177: yathā ca sādhyasiddhyanaṅgasya vacane nigraho 'vaśyam bhāvī,
GSP28durdhpru:10179: tathā vādanyāye 'vādīn nyāyavādīti tatas tad apekṣitavyaḥ tato 'yam artho vaktṛdoṣa eva na hetudoṣaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:10183: na tāvat siddhasādhanaṃ sādhana[m a]siddhatvādyanyatamadoṣadūṣitaṃ sādhyasādhanasāmarthyāpracyuter iti /
GSP28durdhpru:10187: tatrāsāmarthya eva doṣo vārttikakāreṇā 'nantaroktena krameṇa tridhā darśitaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:10189: siddhasādhānaṃ tu vaiyarthyalakṣaṇo 'nya evāyaṃ hetoḥ svagatoḥ svagato doṣa iti kasmād asyāntarbhāvaś cintanīyaḥ?
GSP28durdhpru:10194: yathāyogaṃ paripūrṇasādhanarūpābhidhānād anupayuktānabhidhānāc ca vaktur aduṣṭatvāt /
GSP28durdhpru:10198: trayāṇāṃ rūpāṇām asiddhau[698] sandehe ca[699] hetudoṣānupapādyopasaṃharann āha ---
GSP28durdhpru:10202: [700]evam eṣāṃ trayāṇāṃ rūpāṇām ekaikasya dvayor dvayor vā rūpayor asiddhau sandehe vā[701]yathāyogam asiddhaviruddhānaikāntikās trayo hetvābhāsāḥ
GSP28durdhpru:10207: eṣāṃ madhya ekaikaṃ rūpaṃ [702]yadā 'siddhaṃ sandigdhaṃ vā[703] bhavati,
GSP28durdhpru:10208: dve dve vā[704] 'siddhe saṃdigdhe vā bhavataḥ,
GSP28durdhpru:10209: tadāsiddhaś ca viruddhaś cānaikāntikaś ca te hetvābhāsāḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:10210: yathāyogam iti yasyāsiddhau saṃdehe vā yo hetvābhāso yujyate sa tsyā 'siddheḥ saṃdehāc ca vyavasthāpyata iti yasya yasya yena [705]yena yogo yathāyogam iti //
GSP28durdhpru:10217: sa iha kasmān na uktaḥ III-110
GSP28durdhpru:10218: nanu cā ''cāryeṇa viruddhāvyabhicāry api saṃśayahetur uktaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:10220: yadi vā viruddhaś cāsau sādhanāntarasiddhasya dharmasya viruddhasādhanāt,
GSP28durdhpru:10225: svato '(to) duṣṭs tato vaktṛdoṣo yujyata eveti cet /
GSP28durdhpru:10227: śakyate hi tatrāpy evam abhidhātum --- vaktā 'yam ananurūpe sādhye prayukte viparyayasādhānād viruddhatām anubhavati na tv ayaṃ svato duṣṭo nāmeti /
GSP28durdhpru:10228: vivakṣitārthasādhanāsāmarthyaṃ svato 'stīti kathaṃ na vaiyarthyaṃ tasya doṣa iti cintyatām iti /
GSP28durdhpru:10230: siddhi[ḥ] sādhānaṃ tad aṅgaṃ dharmo yasyārthasya vivādāśrayasya vādaprastāvād hetoḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:10232: tathā yo na bhavati tasyāprastutasyābhidhānād iti kṛtveti sarvam evāvadātam /
GSP28durdhpru:10235: yathā ca teṣāṃ prayatir yathā tad abhajamānam abhidhānaṃ tathā svayuthyavicāra evābhihita iti tata evāpekṣitavya iti //
GSP28durdhpru:10236: trayāṇām ityādi vyavasthāpyata ity etad antaṃ subodham /
GSP28durdhpru:10238: sarvahetvābhāsasaṅgrahaṇārthaṃ yasyeti dviruktaṃ yena [75b] yena doṣena yogaḥ sambandhaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:10241: nanu cetyādīty āhety etad antaṃ sugamam /
GSP28durdhpru:10253: prāmāṇasiddhe hi trairūpye prastute sa eva hetvābhāsaḥ sambhavati yasya pramāṇasiddhaṃ rūpam /
GSP28durdhpru:10254: na ca viruddhāvyabhicāriṇaḥ pramāṇasiddham asti rūpam /
GSP28durdhpru:10263: na hi sambhavo 'sti kāryasvabhāvayor uktalakṣaṇayor anupalambhasya ca[712]viruddhatāyāḥ III-112
GSP28durdhpru:10266: na hīti / yasmān na sambhavo 'sti viruddhatāyāḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:10267: kāryaṃ ca svabhāvaś ca tayor uktalakṣaṇayor iti /
GSP28durdhpru:10274: kamsāt tatra viruddhāvyabhicāriṇo 'sambhava ity āha --- pramāṇeti /
GSP28durdhpru:10276: sa eva hetvābhāso viruddhāvyabhicārāryākhyaḥ sambhvati yasya pramāṇena siddhaṃ rūpaṃ pakṣadharmānvayavyatirekātmakam iti vivakṣitam /
GSP28durdhpru:10277: ayam āśayaḥ --- yadi tad ekena dvābhyām vā rūpābhyāṃ hīnaṃ syāt tad eṣv eva hetvābhāseṣv antarbhavet /
GSP28durdhpru:10278: na tv etad atirikto viruddhāvyabhicārī nāma hetvābhāso bhavet /
GSP28durdhpru:10279: bhavatā tv anena pramāṇasiddhatrairūpyeṇaiva bhāvyam iti /
GSP28durdhpru:10280: astu tasya tathātvam ity āha --- na ceti /
GSP28durdhpru:10282: vyaktam etad ity asminn arthe vā /
GSP28durdhpru:10283: evaṃ bruvataś cāsyāyam abhiprāyaḥ --- vastunaḥ parasparaviruddharūpadvarūpadvayāsambhavād avaśyam anayor ekam asampūrṇāṅgam iti //
GSP28durdhpru:10284: kutaḥ punar anumānviṣaye 'syāsambhavo 'vasīyata ity abhipretya pṛdcchati paraḥ --- kasmād iti
GSP28durdhpru:10289: sa katham ātmavāraṇaṃ vyāpakaṃ ca svabhāvaṃ parityajya bhaved yena viruddhaḥ syāt /
GSP28durdhpru:10305: kva tarhy ācāryadignāgenāyaṃ hetudoṣa ukta ity āha ---
GSP28durdhpru:10306: tasmād avastudarśanabalapravṛttam āgamāśrayam anumānam āśritya tadarthavicāreṣu viruddhāvyabhicārī sādhanadoṣa uktaḥ III-114
GSP28durdhpru:10307: yasmād vastubalapravṛtte 'numāne na sambhavati tasmād āgamāśrayam anumānam āśrityavyabhicāryuktaḥ iti /
GSP28durdhpru:10308: āgamasiddhaṃ hi yasyānumānasya liṅgatairūpyaṃ tasyāgama āśrayaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:10309: nanu cāgam asiddham api trairūpyaṃ pramāṇasiddham ity āha --- avastudarśanabalapravṛttam iti /
GSP28durdhpru:10310: avastuno darśanaṃ vikalpamātram tasya balaṃ sāmarthyam /
GSP28durdhpru:10311: tataḥ pravṛttam --- apramāṇād vikalpamātrād vyasthitaṃ trairūpyam āgamasiddham anumānasya /
GSP28durdhpru:10313: na hītiy atrasthasya hiśabdasyārtho yasmād ity anenoktaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:10315: etad uktaṃ bhavati --- svasādhyāvyabhicāriṇā hi bhavatā kāryeṇa svabhāvena vā bhāvyam /
GSP28durdhpru:10316: na ca vastunas tadatatsvabhāvau sto yena tadatatsvabhāvāvyabhicāriṇau dvau hetū sannipatantau viruddhāvyabhicāriṇau syātām iti /
GSP28durdhpru:10317: yena kāryasvabhāvayoḥ kāraṇavyāpakavidhinā kṛsatadbhāvena viruddhaṃ tatraiva dharmiṇi hetvantarasādhitārthaṃ viruddhasādhanaṃ bhavet /
GSP28durdhpru:10318: yady evam anupalambhe tatsambhaviṣyatīty āha --- anupalambhasyeti /
GSP28durdhpru:10320: yata etad atirikto 'vyabhicārī [na] sammata [ata] evāsmād eva kāraṇāt /
GSP28durdhpru:10322: katham āgamāśrayatvam anumāsyety āha --- āgamasiddham iti /
GSP28durdhpru:10324: sati tasminn āgame 'numānasya pravṛtter asāv āśrayas tasya //
GSP28durdhpru:10326: tat tarhy anumānam [717]āgamasiddhatrairūpyaṃ[718] kvādhikṛtam ity āha ---[719] tad artheti /
GSP28durdhpru:10327: tasyāgamasya yo 'rtho 'tīndiryaḥ pratyakṣāṇumānābhyām aviṣayīkṛtaḥ sāmānyādis tasya vicāreṣu prakrānteṣu āgamāśryam anumānaṃ sambhavati /
GSP28durdhpru:10333: kasmāt punar āgamāśraye 'py[720] anumāne sambhava ity āha ---
GSP28durdhpru:10340: śāstrakṛtāṃ viparītasya vastuviruddhasya svabhāvasya upasaṃhāro ḍhaukanam artheṣu /
GSP28durdhpru:10343: viparyastā hi śāstrakārāḥ[723] santam asantaṃ svabhāvam āropayantīti //
GSP28durdhpru:10347: anyeṣv api puruṣeṣu ka āśvāsa ity āha ---
GSP28durdhpru:10348: na hy asya sambhavo[724]yathā avasthitavastusthitiṣv ātmakāryānupalambheṣu[725] III-116
GSP28durdhpru:10352: na hīti / na hetuṣu kalpanayā hetutvavyavasthā /
GSP28durdhpru:10354: tato yathā avasthitavastusthitiṣv ātmakāryānupalambheṣv asya sambhavo nāsti /
GSP28durdhpru:10355: avasthitaṃ paramārthasadvas tu tadantikrāntā yathāvasthitā [726]vastusthitir vyavasthā[727] yeṣāṃ te yathāvasthitavastusthitayaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:10356: te hi yathā vastu sthitaṃ tathā sthitā[728] /
GSP28durdhpru:10358: [729]tatas teṣu na bhrānter avakāśo 'sti yena viruddhāvyabhicārisambhavaḥ syāt //
GSP28durdhpru:10365: nanu cetyādi viparyastā hīty etad antaṃ sugamam /
GSP28durdhpru:10369: yathāvasthitavastusthatiṣv iti --- asya tātparyārtham āha --- na hetuṣv iti /
GSP28durdhpru:10373: kathaṃ te tathārūpāity āha --- te hīti /
GSP28durdhpru:10376: yatas te yathāvasthitayas tatas teṣv a(ṣu)
GSP28durdhpru:10378: satyāṃ sthitau kiṃ na sambhava ity āha --- tata iti /
GSP28durdhpru:10380: [730]tatra udāharaṇam --- yat[731]sarvadeśāvasthitaiḥ svasambandhibhir yugapad abhisambadhyate tat sarvagatam,
GSP28durdhpru:10382: [732]abhisambadhyate ca[733]sarvadeśāvasthitaiḥ svasambandhibhir yugapat sāmānyam iti III-117
GSP28durdhpru:10388: yat sarvasmin deśāvasthitaiḥ svasambandhibhir yugapad abhisambadhyate [734]iti sarvadeśāvasthitar abhisambadhyamānatvaṃ sāmānyasya anūdya sarvagatatvaṃ vidhīyate /
GSP28durdhpru:10389: tena yugapad abhisambadhyamānatvaṃ sarvagatatve niyataṃ tena vyāptaṃ kathyate /
GSP28durdhpru:10392: iha sāmānyaṃ kaṇādamaharṣiṇā niṣkrayaṃ dṛśyam ekaṃ[735] coktam /
GSP28durdhpru:10393: yugapac ca sarvaiḥ svaiḥ [736]sambandhibhiḥ samavāyena saṃbaddham /
GSP28durdhpru:10394: tatra pailukena kaṇādaśiṣyeṇa vyaktaṣu vyaktarahiteṣu ca
GSP28durdhpru:10399: yatas te kalpanayā na sthāpitās tataḥ kāraṇāt /
GSP28durdhpru:10402: kasyānuvādenātra kasya vidhir ity [76a] āha --- sarveti /
GSP28durdhpru:10405: nanu sarvaiḥ svasambandhibhir yugapadabhisambandho nāma sāmānyasya yugapat sarvasambandhisamavāya eva /
GSP28durdhpru:10407: katham anayor vyāvṛttito 'pi bhedasambandhabhāvato gamyagamakabhāva iti cet /
GSP28durdhpru:10409: nānādeśasthaiḥ svasambandhibhiḥ śāvaleyādibhir yugapad abhisambandho hetuḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:10410: sambandhideśatad antarālavyāpitvaṃ tu sādhyam iti gamyagamakabhāvo na virudhyate /
GSP28durdhpru:10411: sarvasambandhibhir yugapad abhisambadndhaś cāgatvā 'nāgacchadbhir iti draṣṭavyam /
GSP28durdhpru:10413: vyabhicāriprasavabījaṃ dharmadvayayoḥ kim abhyupagataṃ yena tayoḥ sannipātād viruddha(ddhā)
GSP28durdhpru:10417: rūḍhīvaśāc cāyaṃ śabdaḥ kāśyape munau varttate /
GSP28durdhpru:10420: evaṃ tasya hi kāṣṭhāgatā niḥspṛhatā yato 'nyaravo(?)
GSP28durdhpru:10421: svabhojyādikam api parityajya kaṇamātraṃ bhuktvā dhyānādikam ācarati /
GSP28durdhpru:10427: na tu samvāyād ekaṃ trilokyāṃ sāmānyam,
GSP28durdhpru:10431: deśeṣu sāmānyaṃ sthitaṃ sādhayituṃ [737]pramāṇam idaṃ upanyastam yathā ākāśam iti --- vyāptipradarśanaviṣayo dṛṣṭāntaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:10432: ākāśam api hi sarvadeśāvasthitair vṛkṣādibhiḥ svasaṃyogibhir yugapad abhisambadhyamānaṃ sarvagataṃ ca /
GSP28durdhpru:10433: abhisambadhyate ca[738] sarvadeśāvasthitaiḥ svasambandhibhir iti hetoḥ pakṣadharmatvapradarśanam //
GSP28durdhpru:10442: teṣāṃ sarvadeśāvasthitānāṃ dravyāṇāṃ sāmānyasya svabhāvaḥ sa eva tatsambandhisvabhāvamātram /
GSP28durdhpru:10446: taddeśe saṃnihitaḥ svabhāvo yasya tat taddeśasaṃnihitasvabhāvam[740] /
GSP28durdhpru:10448: yasya hi yeṣāṃ sambandhī svabhāvaḥ tanniyamena teṣāṃ deśe sannihitaṃ bhavati /
GSP28durdhpru:10454: caḥ pūrvāpekṣayā samucyaye samavāyena sambandhena sambaddhatvam /
GSP28durdhpru:10459: tenāvivakṣitā ''ntarabhedasya yugapat sarvasambandhamātra hetutvād ākāraśasya dṛṣṭāntarūpatā draṣṭavyā /
GSP28durdhpru:10460: na tu sāmānyasyevāsya sambandhiḥ samavāyena sambandhaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:10473: etac ca tasya bhāva ity ed antaṃ sugamam /
GSP28durdhpru:10475: na tu tad dhitapratyayānte pañcamy asti yāṃ vyācakṣīta /
GSP28durdhpru:10476: ayaṃ tv asyārthaḥ --- yasmād yugapat sarvadeśāvasthitasambandhisambandhaḥ svasattāmātrānubandhini sādhye hetuḥ,
GSP28durdhpru:10480: nanu tatsambandhino 'pi taddeśasannihitasvabhāvataiva kutao yenaivaṃ bhavatīty āha --- yasyeti /
GSP28durdhpru:10493: na hi yo yatra na asti taddeśam ātmanā vyāpnoti iti svabhāvahetuprayogaḥ III-119
GSP28durdhpru:10494: na hīti / yo yatra deśe nāsti sa deśo yasya sa taddeśaḥ taṃ na vyāpnotyātmanā svarūpeṇa /
GSP28durdhpru:10497: [746]tena yatra yat samavetaṃ [747]tat [748]tadātmī na rūpeṇa kroḍīkurvat [749]samavāyirūpadeśe svātmānaṃ niśeśayati /
GSP28durdhpru:10509: hir avadhāraṇe sambandhīty asmāt paro draṣṭavyaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:10510: tad vastu niyamenāvaśyaṃtayā teṣāṃ sambandhīnāṃ deśe sannihitaṃ bhavati /
GSP28durdhpru:10524: yatra tu tasya bhāvas tatteti pāṭhaḥ tatra sarvam avadātam //
GSP28durdhpru:10525: nanu caikadeśastham eva sāmānyaṃ yugapat sarvaiḥ sambandhibhir abhisambantsyate /
GSP28durdhpru:10526: tat kiṃ tasya vyāpārāsambhavenāveditenety āha --- iheti /
GSP28durdhpru:10529: abhinnadeśayor iti lokaprasiddhadeśāpekṣayoktam na tu śāstraprasiddhadeśāpeṣayeti draṣṭavyam /
GSP28durdhpru:10540: tenāyam arthaḥ --- kuṇḍabadaravad yatra dvāv api sambandhinau bhinnadeśau na tayoḥ samavāyaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:10541: yayos tv ekatarasyānyataro deśas tayo samavāya iti /
GSP28durdhpru:10542: evañ ca paṭatantūnāṃ sāmānyatadvatoś ca nāsaṅgraha iti /
GSP28durdhpru:10543: yena kāraṇenābhinnadeśayor eva samvāyas tena prathamavyākhyāne samavāyirūpasya samavāyisvabhāvasya deśa iti /
GSP28durdhpru:10544: dvitīyavyākhāne samavāyirūpam eva samavāyisvabhāva eva deśa iti vigṛhya tasminn iti
GSP28durdhpru:10550: tasmād yad yatra samavetaṃ [752]tat taddravyaṃ vyāpnuvadātmanā taddeśe saṃnnihitaṃ bhavati /
GSP28durdhpru:10553: tad ayam arthaḥ --- taddeśasthavastuvyāpanaṃ taddeśasattayā vyāptam /
GSP28durdhpru:10554: taddeśattā 'bhāve[753] tadvyāpanābhāvād vyāpanalakṣaṇaḥ samavāyasambandho na syāt /
GSP28durdhpru:10561: dvitīyo api prayogaḥ --- yad upalabdhilakṣaṇaprāptaṃ san na upalabhyate na tat tatra asti /
GSP28durdhpru:10564: ayam anupalambhaḥ[755]svabhāvaś ca parasparaviruddhārthasādhanād ekatra saṃśayaṃ janayataḥ III-120
GSP28durdhpru:10569: yad upalabdhilakṣaṇaprāptaṃ viṣayatāṃ prāptaṃ dṛśyam ity arthaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:10570: etena dṛśyānupalabdhim anūdya `na [756]tat tatrāsti' ity asad vyavahāryatvaṃ vihitam[757] /
GSP28durdhpru:10572: tad yathā, kvacid avidyamāno ghaṭaḥ dṛṣṭāntaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:10581: tat kathaṃ sambandhini svātmani niveśanaṃ vyākhyāyata ity āha --- taddeśa iti /
GSP28durdhpru:10582: sa cāsau deśaś ca tatra rūpasya svarūpasya niveśanam upanayanam /
GSP28durdhpru:10587: na ca taddeśasannihitasvabhāvatety āśaṅkyāha --- tad ayam iti /
GSP28durdhpru:10588: yata ātamanā tadvyāpanalakṣaṇena sambandhena tadvyāpyamānadeśasannidhānam ukataṃ tat tasmād ayaṃ tātparyārthaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:10589: sa cāsau deśaś ca tatrasthavastuvyāpanaṃ lokaprasiddhadeṣāpekṣayā tasya deśas taddeśas tatra yā sattā vidyamānatā tayā vyāptam /
GSP28durdhpru:10590: anyathā tu svarūpeṇa vyāpanāsambhavād ity abhiprāyaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:10592: nāsty evāyaṃ sambandha iti [ced āha ---] asti ceti /
GSP28durdhpru:10595: tat tasmād ayaṃ yugapat sarvasambandhyabhisambandhalakṣāṇo hetuḥ svabhāvaḥ //
GSP28durdhpru:10597: pakṣadharmatvaṃ darśayitum āha --- na upalabhyate ceti /
GSP28durdhpru:10599: dṛśyam api kasyāṃcid vyaktau gosāmānyam aśvādiṣu vyakty antareṣu vyaktiśūnye[759] cākāśe [760]nopalabhyate /
GSP28durdhpru:10605: ayam anupalambhaḥ pūrvoktaś ca svabhāvaś [761]parasparasya viruddhau yāv arthau tayoḥ sādhanād tāv [762]ekasmin dharmaṇi saṃśayaṃ janayataḥ
GSP28durdhpru:10606: na hy eko 'rthaḥ parasparaviruddhasvabhāvo bhavitum arhati /
GSP28durdhpru:10607: ekena cātra [763]vyakty antareṣu vyaktiśūnye cākāśe sattvam,
GSP28durdhpru:10615: pūvavad upcārāti piṭharaśabdas tena vyavaharatīti tathoktaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:10620: ayaṃ tu kiṃsaṃjñako hetur ity āha --- ayam iti /
GSP28durdhpru:10623: tāv etau hetū dharmiṇy ekasmin sāmānyākhye /
GSP28durdhpru:10624: saṃśayaṃ prakṛtayoḥ sādhyayor ity arthāt kathaṃ saṃśayaṃ janayata ity āha /
GSP28durdhpru:10625: ekasyaiva tau vivakṣitasarvagatatvāsarvaṃgatatvalakṣaṇau svabhāvau bhaviṣyata ity āha --- na hīti /
GSP28durdhpru:10628: nanu cātra viruddhāv eva dharmāv ekasya sāmānyasya dvābhyām etābhyāṃ siddhyete iti /
GSP28durdhpru:10629: tat kim etad ucyata ity āha --- keneti /
GSP28durdhpru:10632: apareṇeti vyaktyantarāle sāmānyasya sattvam asattvaṃ ca etau hetū kā kṣatir iha --- ity āha --- na ceti /
GSP28durdhpru:10634: sattvam asattvaṃ ca dvayor dvābhyāṃ sādhane kim anupannam ity āśaṅkyāha --- ekasyāpi /
GSP28durdhpru:10635: kālabhede kin naivaṃ sambhāvatīty āśaṅkyāha --- ekadaiveti /
GSP28durdhpru:10636: kasyāpy ekadaivādhikaraṇabhede 'py etad ity āśaṅkyāha --- ekatreti /
GSP28durdhpru:10637: katham ayukatam ity āha --- tayor iti /
GSP28durdhpru:10640: kathaṃ punar āgamāśrayānumānāśrayatvaṃ niruddhāvyabhicāri[ṇī]ty āśaṅkyopasaṃhāravyājena yathā 'nayos tathātvaṃ tathā darśayann āha --- tad iti
GSP28durdhpru:10641: yata evaṃ tattadvadekaṃ sāmānyaṃ kaṇadena uktam,
GSP28durdhpru:10642: tadrūpavicāre taccchiṣyābhām evaṃ prakrāntaṃ tat tasmād āgamasiddhasyāgamapratipāditasyānupalambhenāpi vyaktatyantarālāsattvapratipādanadvāram(dvārā
GSP28durdhpru:10646: viruddhāvyabhicāritvam evānayor upadarśann āha --- yata iti /
GSP28durdhpru:10652: [765]tadāgamasiddhasya sāmāyasya sarvagatatvāsarvagatatvayoḥ sādhyayo etau viruddhāvyabhicāriṇau jātau /
GSP28durdhpru:10657: tataḥ [769]śāstrakāreṇaiva viruddhavyāptatvam apaśyatā viruddhavyāptau dharmāv uktvā[770] viruddhāvyabhicāryavakāśo datta iti /
GSP28durdhpru:10675: nanu ca sādhanāvayavatvād yathā hetava uktās tatprasaṅgena [773]ca hetvābhāsāḥ,
GSP28durdhpru:10677: tathā sādhanāvayavatvād dṛṣṭāntā vaktavyās tatprasaṅgena ca dṛṣṭāntābhāsāḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:10683: anupalambhe 'pi katham asarvagatatvaṃ niścetuṃ śakyata ity āha --- dṛśyatvāt tata ity anuvarttate /
GSP28durdhpru:10687: kevalam anupalambhād anupalambhavyavahārād ity arthavivakṣitatvād adoṣaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:10690: nanu yad śāstrātmakā ''gamakāreṇāsya parasparaviruddhasvabhāvāvahaṃ kiñcid dvayam uktaṃ bhavet,
GSP28durdhpru:10692: yāvatedam eva nāstīty āśaṅkāpanodavyājenopasaṃharann āha --- tata iti /
GSP28durdhpru:10693: [77b] yata evaṃ śāstrakāreṇaivedañ cedañ cābhyupagataṃ tatas tasmāt śāstrakāeṇaiva prakaraṇāt kaṇādena viruddhāvyabhicāriṇo 'vakāśo dattaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:10694: kiṃ kṛtvā tena tadavakāśo datta ity āha --- viruddheti /
GSP28durdhpru:10697: dṛśyatvaviṣayasyānupalambhasya viruddhavyāptatvād dṛśyatvaṃ viruddhavyāptatvād dṛśyatvaṃ viruddhavāptam iti tu draṣṭavyam /
GSP28durdhpru:10698: kathaṃ punas tayor dharamayoḥ parasparaviruddhārthavyāptatvaṃ viduṣā tenaivam ucyeta yena tadavakāśadānaṃ tasya kalpyata ity āha --- viruddhavyāptatvam iti /
GSP28durdhpru:10700: apaśyatā anālocayatā bhrāntyā tāvad abhidhāyeti yāvat /
GSP28durdhpru:10702: tenāyam arthaḥ --- evam uktena prakāreṇoktāḥ kathitā hetvābhāsāḥ,
GSP28durdhpru:10704: sāmprataṃ hetau tadābhāse ca kathite tulyanyāyatayā 'param api svābhāsasahitaṃ kiṃ notam iti
GSP28durdhpru:10707: tāvatā[775]ca arthapratītir iti na pṛthag dṛṣṭānto nāma sādhanāvayavaḥ kaścid /
GSP28durdhpru:10708: tena na asya lakṣaṇaṃ pṛthag ucyate gatārthatvāt III-121
GSP28durdhpru:10716: syād etat --- tāvatā nārthapatītir ity āha --- tāvatā [776]ceti /
GSP28durdhpru:10722: tena na asya dṣṭāntasya lakṣaṇaṃ hetulakṣanāt pṛthag ucyate /
GSP28durdhpru:10726: kathaṃ tarhi hetor vyāptiniścayo yady adṛṭāntako hetur iti cet /
GSP28durdhpru:10728: api tu na hetoḥ pṛthag dṛṣṭānto nāma hetvantarbhūta eva dṛṣṭāntaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:10729: ata evoktaṃ na asya lakṣaṇaṃ pṛthag ucyate [778]iti /
GSP28durdhpru:10730: na tv evam uktam --- nāsya lakṣaṇām ucyata iti[779] /
GSP28durdhpru:10735: atha kathaṃ sādhanāvayavatvaṃ hetūnāṃ yena sādhanāvayatvād yathā hetava uktā ity ucyate?
GSP28durdhpru:10736: tathā hi sādhyate niścīyate sādhyam aneneti sādhanam /
GSP28durdhpru:10738: tadākhyānād eva ca vākyam api sādhanam ucyate /
GSP28durdhpru:10739: na tu vākyāt sādhyasiddhyupayogitayā hetur api tad eva tad vacanam apīti /
GSP28durdhpru:10740: dvedhā 'pi taṃ samudāyam apekṣyāsyāvayavatvaṃ yenaivam ucyate iti / na /
GSP28durdhpru:10747: tatra yathā samudāyāpekṣayā heturūpo 'vayava uktas tadābhāsaś ca tathā sādhanāvayavatvāviśeṣatvād dṛṣṭāntarūpo 'paro 'yam avayavaḥ sapratipakṣaḥ kin nokta iti /
GSP28durdhpru:10748: evañ codayann ayam eva sādhanāvayavatvādyabhidhānam iti /
GSP28durdhpru:10756: sa eva gamayati pratyāyati sādhyam iti kṛtvā ucyate,
GSP28durdhpru:10758: yasmād hetor eva gamakatvaṃ tatas tasmāt tasya hetos trirūpasya vacanaṃ sādhanaṃ sādhanābhidhānaṃ na dṛṣṭāntasyety arthāt /
GSP28durdhpru:10759: tāvatā cārthapratītir iti maulam itiśabdam apekṣya na pṛthag dṛṣṭānto nāma sādhanāvayava iti mūlaṃ vyācaṣṭe na dṛṣṭāta iti /
GSP28durdhpru:10763: hetv antarar bhūtatvaṃ ca vyāptigrāhakapramāṇādhikaraṇatayā hetāv upayogāt /
GSP28durdhpru:10766: yady evaṃ hetūpayogino 'pi lakṣaṇaṃ vaktavyam evety āha --- gatārthatvāt--- gato 'rthaḥ prayojanam abhidheyaṃ vā yasya dṛṣṭāntalakṣaṇasya /
GSP28durdhpru:10770: dṛṣṭāntalakṣāṇaṃ hy acyate dṛṣṭāntapratītir yathā syāt /
GSP28durdhpru:10772: tato dṛṣṭāntalakṣaṇasya yat prayojanam --- dṛṣṭāntapratītis tad gataṃ niṣpannam /
GSP28durdhpru:10780: hetoḥ sapakṣa eva sattvam asapakṣāc ca sarvato vyāvṛttī[783]rūpam uktam abhedena /
GSP28durdhpru:10781: punar viśeṣeṇa[784]kāryasvabhāvayor uktalakṣaṇayor janmatanmātrānubandhau darśanīyāv aktau /
GSP28durdhpru:10784: asaty agnau na kvacid dhūmo yathā mahānasetarayoḥ,
GSP28durdhpru:10787: na hy anyathā sapakṣavipakṣayoḥ sadasattve yathoktaprakāre śakye darśayitum /
GSP28durdhpru:10789: [789]asmiṃś ca arthe darśite darśita eva dṛṣṭānto bhavati /
GSP28durdhpru:10802: sādhāraṇaṃ kāryasvabhāvānupalambhānām etal lakṣaṇām ity arthaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:10810: na ca sāmānyam uktam api śaktyaṃ jñātum /
GSP28durdhpru:10812: ataḥ punar viśeṣeṇa viśeṣavantau janmatanmātrānubandhau darśanīyāvaktau /
GSP28durdhpru:10814: janmni hi [793]jñāte kāryasya sapakṣā eva sattvaṃ vipakṣāc ca sarvasmād vyāvṛttir jñātā
GSP28durdhpru:10822: gatyarthānāṃ jñānārthatvād api gataṃ jñātam ity api coktam //
GSP28durdhpru:10825: tac cet kathitaṃ kiṃ viśeṣalakṣāṇakathanenety āha --- na ce ti /
GSP28durdhpru:10836: vipakṣāc ca sarvasmād vyāvṛttir jñātā bhavati /
GSP28durdhpru:10842: [796] atha sādhanadharmamātrānubandhaḥ sādhyasya tathāpi tādātmyaṃ na syād ity āha --- ṭi-
GSP28durdhpru:10844: tad evaṃ[798] sāmānyalakṣaṇam viśeṣātmakaṃ jñātvyaṃ nānyathā /
GSP28durdhpru:10848: kim ato[799] yadi nāmaiva[800] ity āha --- tac ca[801] sāmānyalakṣāṇaṃ darśayitukāmena viśeṣalakṣaṇaṃ darśayataivam[802],
GSP28durdhpru:10850: yatra dhūmas tatra agniḥ iti kāryahetovyāptir darśitā /
GSP28durdhpru:10860: lakṣaṇaṃ na śakyaṃ jñātum iti pravṛttyupayogitayā na śayam iti mantavyam /
GSP28durdhpru:10861: na tu sāmānyalakṣaṇasya vākyāt pratītir na bhavaty eva /
GSP28durdhpru:10864: nanūkte 'py asmin yadi sāmānyalakṣaṇapratītir nāsti kim anenoktenāpīti /
GSP28durdhpru:10867: nanu svabhāvahetau sādhanasvabhāvatā sādhyasya darśayituṃ yujyate,
GSP28durdhpru:10868: tat kiṃ tanmātrānubandho darśanīya ukta ity āha --- tanmātreti /
GSP28durdhpru:10870: atha tanmātrānubandhe darśite 'pi kathaṃ sāmānyalaṣaṇapratipattir ity āha --- sādhanasyeti /
GSP28durdhpru:10872: anupalabdheś cānayor evāntarbhāvān na pṛthag viśiṣṭalakṣaṇābhidhānam ity avaseyam /
GSP28durdhpru:10873: atha kiṃ hetor anvayavyatirekāv eva lakṣaṇaṃ yenaitad dvayam eva lakṣaṇātayā smaryate /
GSP28durdhpru:10874: na caitat pakṣadharmatāyā api lakṣaṇatvād abhihitatvāc ceti cet /
GSP28durdhpru:10876: kevalaṃ na hetoḥ sarvarūpam iha prakrāntam /
GSP28durdhpru:10877: kin tu yad rūpapradarśanena dṛṣṭāntapradarśanaṃ kṛtaṃ bhavati tatprakṛtam iti /
GSP28durdhpru:10878: yady apy evaṃ yadi nāma sāmāyaviśeṣalakṣaṇā 'bhidhānam ato 'bhidhānāt kiṃ bhavati?
GSP28durdhpru:10883: vyāptipradarśane 'pi kathaṃ dṛṣṭāntākhyānam avataratīty āha --- vyāptiś ceti /
GSP28durdhpru:10886: tathāpi dṛṣṭāntaḥ kathaṃ prakṛto bhavatīty āha --- tata iti /
GSP28durdhpru:10887: dṛṣṭāntam antareṇa tad eva pramāṇaṃ na pravartteta /
GSP28durdhpru:10888: tad apravṛttau ca sāmānyalakṣaṇam eva na jñāyeteti bhāvaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:10890: asaty agnau na bhavaty eva dhūma iti vyatireko darśitaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:10894: yatra kṛtakatvaṃ tatra anityatvam iti svabhāvahetor vyāptir darśitā /
GSP28durdhpru:10895: anityatvābhāve na bhavaty eva kṛtakatvam iti vyatireko darśitaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:10897: prasiddhavāptikasya ca hetoḥ sādhyanivṛttau nivṛttir niyatā[805] darśaṇīyā /
GSP28durdhpru:10903: kasmād evam ity āha --- na hīti /
GSP28durdhpru:10904: yasmād anyathā sāmānyalakṣaṇarūpe sapakṣavipakṣayoḥ sadasattve yathoktaprakāre iti niyate --- sapakṣa eva sattvam,
GSP28durdhpru:10905: vipakṣe 'sattvam eveti niyamo yathoktaprakāraḥ --- te na śakye darśyitum /
GSP28durdhpru:10906: viśeṣalakṣaṇe hi darśite yathoktaprakāre[806] sadasattve darśite bhavataḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:10907: na ca viśeṣalaṣaṇam anyathā śakyaṃ darśayitum /
GSP28durdhpru:10912: anvayapradarśanena sādharmyadṛṣṭāntākhyānam ākhyāya vyatirekoktyā 'pi vaidharmyadṛṣṭāntau kiṃ (dṛṣṭāntoktiṃ)
GSP28durdhpru:10914: vyatirekapradarśaṇe 'pi kathaṃ dṛṣṭātā ''patanam iti āśaṅkyāha --- sa ceti /
GSP28durdhpru:10917: yatra kayościd vyāpyavyāpakabhāvo darśayitavyas tatrās tu dṛṣṭāntopanipātaḥ,
GSP28durdhpru:10920: atrāpi vidhyor viparyayeṇa vyāpyavyāpakabhāvo darśayitavya ity arthaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:10921: etac ca vyatirekākhyānaṃ dṛṣṭāntopadarśanam uddiṣṭaviṣayaṃ prayogam adhikṛtyoktam ity adhigantavyam /
GSP28durdhpru:10922: yatretyādinā svabhāvahetum adhikṛtya dṛṣṭāntasya gatārthatvaṃ darśayitum upakramate /
GSP28durdhpru:10931: yady evaṃ vyatireka [78b] pradarśane kṛṭe dṛṣṭāntenety āha --- prasiddheti /
GSP28durdhpru:10933: tathāpi dṛṣṭānopanipātaḥ katham ity āha --- tad iti /
GSP28durdhpru:10935: sac cāsac ca sadasattī tayor bhāvas te pradarśanakriyāpekṣayā ca dvitīyādvivacanāntam etat /
GSP28durdhpru:10936: yādṛśa ukto yathoktaḥ prakāraḥ svarūpaṃ yayos te tathokte /
GSP28durdhpru:10938: sapakṣāsapakṣasasattvayor uktam eva prakāraṃ spaṣṭayann āha --- sapakṣa iti /
GSP28durdhpru:10941: kathaṃ te na śakye darśayitum ity āha --- viśeṣeti /
GSP28durdhpru:10944: dṛṣṭāntasya tu kim āyātam ity āha --- na ceti /
GSP28durdhpru:10947: dṛṣṭāntasya tu kim ayātam ity āha --- na ceti /
GSP28durdhpru:10949: yad viśeṣalakṣaṇaṃ dṛṣṭāntam antareṇāśakyapradarśanaṃ tat svarūpākhyānam /
GSP28durdhpru:10954: svabhāvaliṅgasya ca svabhāvena sādhyena vyāptir viśeṣalakṣaṇarūpā na śakyā darśayitum /
GSP28durdhpru:10955: yasmāt kāryakāraṇabhās tādātmyaṃ ca mahānase ghaṭe ca jñātavyam,
GSP28durdhpru:10957: vaidharmyadṛṣṭāntas tu prasiddhe tatkāryatve kāraṇābhāve kāryābhāvapratipatty artham[808] /
GSP28durdhpru:10959: kāraṇābhāve kāryābhāvo vastuny avastuni vā bhavati /
GSP28durdhpru:10960: tato vastv astu vā vaidharmyadṛṣṭānta iṣyate /
GSP28durdhpru:10964: tasmād dṛṣṭāntam antareṇa[809] na hetor 'nvayo vyatireko vā[810] śakyo darśayitum ato heturūpākhyānād eva hetor vyāptisādhanasya[811] pramāṇasya darśakaḥ ṣādharmyadṛṣṭāntaḥ/
GSP28durdhpru:10969: prasiddhavyāptikasya sādhyābhāve [812]hetvabhāvapradarśanād vaidharmyadṛṣṭānta upādeya iti ca[813] darśitaṃ bhavati /
GSP28durdhpru:10973: lakṣaṇāsya svarūpam ākhyāyākhyān yathāpradarśanāśakyatvaṃ darśayann āha --- so 'yam iti /
GSP28durdhpru:10974: vaidharmyadṛṣṭāntas tarhi na pradarśanīya ity āha --- vaidharmyeti /
GSP28durdhpru:10976: etac ca yadā vyatirekamukheṇa prayogaḥ kriyate,
GSP28durdhpru:10978: na tv ekasmin prayoge dvayopanyāsaḥ sambhavī /
GSP28durdhpru:10980: yataḥ prasiddhe tatkāryatve kāraṇābhāve kāryabhāvapratipattyarthaṃ darśanīyo vaidharmyadṛṣṭāntas tata eva tasmād eva kāraṇāt /
GSP28durdhpru:10983: yadi hi kasyacid vidhinā kasyacid vidhir darśayitavyaḥ syāt,
GSP28durdhpru:10985: dir asan kathaṃ kasyacid ādhāraḥ syād iti,
GSP28durdhpru:10987: yadā tv ekasya vyāpyasyābhāve aparasya vyāpakasyābhāvo darśayitavyas tadā vyāpakasyā 'bhāve 'vastuni suṣṭhu sambhavati /
GSP28durdhpru:10991: vaidharmyadṛṣṭāntagrahaṇaṃ caitad ekadharmābhāvenāparadharmābhāvopadarśanaviṣayopalakṣaṇaṃ draṣṭavyan anyathā sādharmyadṛṣṭānte tv avaśyaṃ vastu sa āśraya iṣṭa iti syāt /
GSP28durdhpru:10992: tathā ca sati bahvasamañjasaṃ syād iti /
GSP28durdhpru:10993: yataḥ kāraṇābhāvāt kāryābhāvo vastuny avastuni ca bhavati tataḥ kāraṇād vastu mahāhradādi /
GSP28durdhpru:10998: yady evaṃ sādhyasādhakavyāptiprasādhakapramāṇapradarśakatvāt sādharmyadṛṣṭānta evopādeyo na vaidharyadṛṣṭāta ity āha --- prasiddheti /
GSP28durdhpru:10999: vaidharmyadṛṣṭānta upādeya iti yojayitvā kuta upādeya ity āśaṅkāyāṃ prasiddhetyādihetupadaṃ yojyam /
GSP28durdhpru:11002: yad vā pradarśyate 'sminn iti pradarśayatīti vā pradarśano hetvabhāvasya pradarśana iti tathā /
GSP28durdhpru:11005: asmiṃś cārthe darśite darśita eva dṛṣṭāānto bhavati /
GSP28durdhpru:11006: yo 'yam artho vyāptisādhanapramāṇapradarśanaḥ[814] kaścid upādeyo nivṛttipradarśanaś[815]
GSP28durdhpru:11007: ca --- ity asminn arthe [816]darśite darśito dṛṣṭānta [817]ity āha --- etāvanmātraṃ
GSP28durdhpru:11008: rūpaṃ yasya tasya bhāvas tattvam, tasmād iti /
GSP28durdhpru:11012: [821]etac ca heturūpākhyānād evākhyātam iti kiṃ dṛṣṭāntalakṣaṇena?
GSP28durdhpru:11023: etena eva dṛṣṭāntadoṣā api nirastā bhavanti III-123
GSP28durdhpru:11024: etena eva ca heturūpākhyānād dṛṣṭāntatvapradarśanena dṛṣṭāntadoṣā[822] kathitā [823]bhavanti /
GSP28durdhpru:11025: tathāhi --- pūrvoktasiddhaye ya upādīyamāno 'pi[824] dṛṣṭānto na samarthaḥ svakāryaṃ sādhayituṃ sa dṛṣṭāntadoṣa iti sāmyarthyād uktaṃ[825] bhavati
GSP28durdhpru:11031: asmiṃś ce tyādi mūlam anūdya vyācaṣṭe yo 'yam iti /
GSP28durdhpru:11034: prasiddhāyāṃ vyāptau sādhyābhāve [79a] hetor nivṛttipradarśaḥ ity artho draṣṭavyaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:11036: anyad apy asya rūpam astīty āha --- etāvad eveti /
GSP28durdhpru:11037: hir yasmād etat parimāṇam asyeti tathā /
GSP28durdhpru:11039: kiṃ tad rūpam ity āha --- yad uteti /
GSP28durdhpru:11040: nipātasamudāyaś cāyaṃ yad etad ity asyārthe //
GSP28durdhpru:11042: raṇāsāmarthye doṣaḥ sambhavati te kutaścit sāmānyād dṛṣṭāntavadābhāsamānā dṛṣṭāntābhāsā bhavantīti arthaṃ nyāyam āśrityāha --- dṛṣṭāntadoṣā dṛṣṭāntābhāsāḥ kathitā bhavantīti /
GSP28durdhpru:11043: yasmāt te dṛṣṭāntābhāsatve[na] katitā bhavanty ata eva dṣṭāntatvena nirastā bhavatīty ata eva mūlam arthato vyākhyātam ity avagantavyam /
GSP28durdhpru:11045: kathanaṃ kṛṭaṃ bhavati tathā darśayituṃ tathā hītyādinopakramate /
GSP28durdhpru:11048: siddhavyāptikasya ca hetoḥ sādhyābhāve sādhananivṛttipradarśanalakṣaṇaṃ ca sādhayituṃ ya upādīyamāno 'pi na samarthaḥ,
GSP28durdhpru:11057: yathā [826]nityaḥ śabdo iti [827]śabdasya nitytve sādhye 'mūrtatvād iti hetuḥ/
GSP28durdhpru:11058: sādharmyeṇa karmavat paramāṇuvad ghaṭavad ity ete dṛṣṭātā upānyastāḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:11082: asarvajño ayaṃ rāgādimatvād rathyāpuruṣavad iti III-125
GSP28durdhpru:11083: tathā[832] sandigdhaḥ sādhyadharmo yasmin sa sandigdhasādhyadharmaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:11090: dṛṣāntābhāsān ityādi paramāṇūnām ity etad antaṃ sugamam /
GSP28durdhpru:11091: kathaṃ paramāṇavaḥ sādhanavikalā na sādhyavikalā ity āha --- asarveti /
GSP28durdhpru:11095: tatra yadi dravyaparimāṇaṃ mūrttir ity eva tāvad ucyate tadā ''kāśāder api dravyasya paramamahattvanām adheyaṃ parimāṇam astīti mūrttatvaṃ prasajyeta
GSP28durdhpru:11097: tatra paramāṇoḥ paramāṇaṃ bhavaty asarvagatasya dravyasyeti darśayann āha --- asarvagatāś ceti /
GSP28durdhpru:11098: samavāyikāraṇaṃ dravyaṃ guṇavad veti dravyalakṣṇayogād dravyarūpaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:11100: tat punaḥ paramāṇoḥ parimāṇaṃ pārimāṇḍalasaṃjñakaṃ jñātavyam /
GSP28durdhpru:11102: sādhyāvaikalyaṃ darśayann āha --- nityās tv iti /
GSP28durdhpru:11106: atha [vā] ṣaṭpadārthīpratipādakatayā viśiṣyate tad anyasmāc chāstrād iti viśeṣaḥ kāṇādaṃ śāstraṃ vivakṣitam /
GSP28durdhpru:11107: [834]“tad vidanty adhīyate vā” iti vaiśeṣikās tair iṣyanta iti vacanavyaktyā ceṣṭimātram etan na punar atra pramāṇam astīti sūcayati /
GSP28durdhpru:11131: anityaḥ śabdaḥ kṛtakatvād ghaṭavad iti III-126
GSP28durdhpru:11135: yasmin dṛṣṭānte dṛṣṭānte sādhyasādhanayoḥ sambhavamātraṃ dṛśyate,
GSP28durdhpru:11138: apradarśitānvayaś ca --- yasmin dṛṣṭānte vidyamāno 'py anvayo na pradarśito vaktrā so 'pradarśitānvayaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:11140: yo ukteti vaktṛtvam anūdya sa rāgādimān iti rāgādimattvaṃ[837] vihitam /
GSP28durdhpru:11146: tena vaktṛtvarāgādimattvayoḥ sattvamātram iṣṭe puruṣe siddham /
GSP28durdhpru:11157: tata ityādi maraṇadharmatvam ity etad antaṃ sujñānam/
GSP28durdhpru:11158: nanu maraṇadharmatvam apy asya kathaṃ niściṃtaṃ yena hetur eva sandigdha ucyate iti cet /
GSP28durdhpru:11163: yatra tu tan nāsti kevalaṃ sambhavamātraṃ sāhacaryamātraṃ dṛśyata ity abhiprāyaḥ //
GSP28durdhpru:11164: vaktṛtvasya heto rāgādimattve [79b] sādhye pratiniyamaḥ pratiniyatatvam uktam iti śeṣaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:11165: tena sādhyaniyatatvena vyāptir anayor uktā pradarśitā /
GSP28durdhpru:11166: evaṃvidhānuvādavidhyupakarśane tathā pratīter āhatyodayād vyāptir uktety uktam /
GSP28durdhpru:11168: yato dvayor api vādiprativādinor dṛṣṭātatvena saṅgrahaḥ tena hetunā sattvamātraṃ sambhavamātraṃ sāhacaryamātram iti yāvat /
GSP28durdhpru:11169: asti ceṣṭiḥ sahamātropakarśanam adoṣāvaham ity āha --- vyāptis tv iti /
GSP28durdhpru:11175: iha yady api kṛṭaktvena ghaṭasadṛśaḥ śabdas tathāpi nānityatvenāpi sadṛśaḥ pratyetuṃ śakyate[840] 'tiprasaṅgāt[841] /
GSP28durdhpru:11176: yadi tu kṛṭakatvam [842]anityasvabhāvaṃ [843]vijñātaṃ bhavaty [844]evaṃ kṛtakatvād anityatvapratītiḥ syāt /
GSP28durdhpru:11177: tasmād yat kṛtakaṃ tad anityam iti kṛtakatvam anityatve[845] niyatam abhidhāya niyamasādhanāyānvayavākyārthapratipattiviṣayo dṛṣṭānta upādeyaḥ
GSP28durdhpru:11179: anena tv anvayavākyam anuktvaiva dṛṣṭānta upāttaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:11191: nanu ghaṭopadarśanena kṛtakatvena tād ghaṭasadṛśaḥ śabdo darśitaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:11192: tathā cānityatvenāpi sadṛśo darśitas tataś ca vyāptir darśitaivety āha --- iheti /
GSP28durdhpru:11194: kutas tathā pratyetum aśakya ity āha --- atiprasaṅgād iti /
GSP28durdhpru:11199: na tarhi kṛtakatvād anityatvaṃ kadācid api pratyetavyam ity āha --- yadi tv iti /
GSP28durdhpru:11202: vidhānenārthāntaratve sati na nityatvasvabhāvaṃ kṛtakatvaṃ pratītaṃ bhavaty evaṃ tatsvābhāvyena pratipattau kṛtakatvād anityatvapratītiḥ syāt
GSP28durdhpru:11203: yataḥ kṛtakatvasyānityatvasvabhāvāvagamāt tatas tatpratītir nānyathā tasmād hetoḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:11206: anvayavākyārthapratipattiviṣayo 'pi dṛṣṭānto yady apradarśitānvayas tadā so 'pi nirupayogaḥ kim ity upādeya ity āha --- sa ceti /
GSP28durdhpru:11208: anena kathaṃ nāmāyam upātto yenaivam abhidhīyata ity āha --- aneneti /
GSP28durdhpru:11213: athaivam upātto 'pi yady upayujyate tadā kā kṣatir ity āha --- īdṛśaś ceti /
GSP28durdhpru:11215: samānaḥ prakaraṇād ghaṭena sadṛśo dharmo yasyāsau sadharmā /
GSP28durdhpru:11221: athaitat padadarśitāt sādharmyād api yadi sādhyam siddhyate tadā katham ayam anupayukta ity āha --- na ceti /
GSP28durdhpru:11223: evaṃ bruvato 'yaṃ bhāvaḥ --- anena khalu sādharmyaṃ pradarśanīyam /
GSP28durdhpru:11224: kṛtakatvenaiva ca sādharmyaṃ pradarśyāyañ caritārtho bhaviṣyati /
GSP28durdhpru:11225: na ca kṛtakatvena ghaṭasādharmye śabdasyāvagate 'py anityatvenāpi tatsādharmyāvagamo 'vaśyambhāvīti śakyam abhidhātum /
GSP28durdhpru:11227: yataḥ sādharmyamātrān na sādhyasiddhir ataḥ kāraṇāt /
GSP28durdhpru:11228: anvayo 'nvīyamānatvaṃ sādhanasya sādhyena so 'rthaḥ prayojanaṃ [80a] yasya sa tathā na sādharmyamātrapradarśanārtha ity arthāt /
GSP28durdhpru:11229: anenāpy anvayārtha evāyam upātta ity āha --- tadarthaś ceti /
GSP28durdhpru:11233: kim arthas tarhy anenāyam upātta ity āha --- sādharmyeti /
GSP28durdhpru:11238: tato yadi nāma na duṣṭaṃ vastu tathāpi vaktrā duṣṭaṃ darśatam iti duṣtam eva //
GSP28durdhpru:11239: tathā viparītānvayaḥ --- yad anityaṃ tat kṛtakam iti III-127
GSP28durdhpru:11240: tathā viparītānvayo yasmin dṛṣṭāte sa tathoktaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:11241: tam evodārati --- yad anityaṃ tat kṛtakam iti /
GSP28durdhpru:11244: atra tv anityatvaṃ kṛtakatve[847] niyataṃ darśitam /
GSP28durdhpru:11246: [849] tato yādṛśam iha kṛtatvam aniyatam anityatve [850]darśitaṃ tādṛśān nāsty anityatvapratītiḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:11247: tathā hi --- yad anityam ity anityatvam anūdya tat kṛtakam iti kṛtakatvam vihitam /
GSP28durdhpru:11250: tato yathā 'nityatvād aniyatāt prayatnānantarīyakatve na prayatnāntarīyakatvapratīti,
GSP28durdhpru:11257: [849] atra `tataḥ kṛtakatvam anityatve niyatam eva' ity adhikaḥ pāṭho 'sti /
GSP28durdhpru:11259: sādharmyārthaḥ sādharmyapratipādanaprayojana upāttas tasmān nirupayogaḥ sa /
GSP28durdhpru:11263: tat kathaṃ vidyamāne 'pi tasmin tathā 'pradarśanamātreṇāsau dṛṣṭānto duṣyatīty āha --- vaktṛdoṣād iti /
GSP28durdhpru:11271: kim etāvatā tad akaraṇaṃ tasya nāsty eveti sūktaṃ vaktṛdoṣād ayamṇ dṛṣṭāntadoṣa iti /
GSP28durdhpru:11272: viparīto 'nvaya iti vaiparītyena pradarśanād viparīta ukto na tu viparīto 'nvayo 'sty eva /
GSP28durdhpru:11273: kīdṛśo 'viparīto 'nvayo yasmād ayaṃ viparīta ity āha --- kṛtakatvam iti /
GSP28durdhpru:11274: evaṃ pradarśane ko guṇa ity āha --- evam iti /
GSP28durdhpru:11276: atra punaḥ kutra kiṃ niyatam ity āha --- atreti /
GSP28durdhpru:11278: anityatvānuvādena kṛtaktvasya vidhānād vidhīyamānasya vyāpakatayā niyamaviṣayatvād ity abhisandhiḥ kṛtakatvaṃ punaḥ kīdṛśaṃ darśitam ity āha ---[kṛtakatvam iti] /
GSP28durdhpru:11281: nityatvaṃ pratipaśyeta ity āha --- tata iti /
GSP28durdhpru:11282: yata evam anuvādavidhikrame kṛtakatvam anityatvāniyataṃ darśataṃ bhavati,
GSP28durdhpru:11285: pūrvam evaṃ vādinā 'nityatvaṃ kṛtakatve niyataṃ darśitam,
GSP28durdhpru:11286: na kṛtakatvam nityatve ceti pratijñāmātreṇoktam adhunā tu yena prakāreṇa tasyaiva pradarśanam āyātaṃ tathā hītyādinā tad darśayati /
GSP28durdhpru:11289: yady api ca kṛtakatvaṃ vastusthityā 'nityatve niyataṃ [851]tathāpy anityataṃ vaktrā [852]darśitam /
GSP28durdhpru:11298: parārthānumāne ca[855] vaktur api [856]doṣaś cintyata iti //
GSP28durdhpru:11312: vaidharmyeṇa api --- paramāṇuvat karmavat ākāśavad iti sādhyādyavyatirekiṇaḥ III-129
GSP28durdhpru:11313: nityatve śabdasya sādhye hetāv amūttatve [861]paramāṇur vaidharmyadṛṣṭāntaḥ sādhyāvyatirekī /
GSP28durdhpru:11322: tatra yathā 'nityatvāt prayatnānantarīyakatvāpratītis tadvat kṛtakatvād apy anitya[tva]nityatvapratītir bhavitum arhati /
GSP28durdhpru:11323: nanu bhavatu anityatvāt prayatnānantarīyakatvāpratītir vastutas tasya tatrāniyatatvāt kṛtakatvaṃ tu paramārthato niyatam nityatve /
GSP28durdhpru:11324: tat kutas tasmāt tasyāpratītir ity āha --- yady apītyādi /
GSP28durdhpru:11325: evaṃ bruvato 'yaṃ bhāvaḥ --- vastutaś chedanasvabhāvo 'pi paraśur yadācchedakena bhrāntyā 'nyathā vā udvarttya bāhum udyamya dvaidhībhāvārthaṃ dhavādau nipātyate,
GSP28durdhpru:11326: tadā tena svayam aduṣṭenāpi yathā chidā na sampādyate,
GSP28durdhpru:11329: yasmād evaṃ tasmād [80b] hetor vaktur anumāpayitur aparādhād doṣād viparītānvayo 'pi dṛṣṭāntadoṣa iti doṣaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:11330: na kevalam apradārśitānvaya ity āha --- parārtheti /
GSP28durdhpru:11331: na kevalaṃ sādhanasya doṣaś cintyata ity api śabdāt //
GSP28durdhpru:11332: yato 'lpīyo nāsti sa paramāṇuḥ vaidharmyapratipāda [na] viṣayopāttatvān vaidharmyadṛṣṭānta uktaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:11335: sādhyam ādir yeṣām tāni sādhyādīni sādhyasādhanobhayāni /
GSP28durdhpru:11344: yathā asarvajñāḥ kapilādayo anāptā vā avidyamānasarvajñatāptatāliṅgabhūtapramāṇātiśayaśāsanatvād iti /
GSP28durdhpru:11345: atra[863]vaidharmyodāharaṇam --- yaḥ sarvajña āpto vā sa jyotirjñānādikam upadiṣṭavān,
GSP28durdhpru:11361: sarmvajñātā ca āptatā ca tayor liṅgabhūtaḥ pramāṇātiśayo liṅgātmakaḥ pramāṇaviśeṣaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:11362: avidyamānaḥ sarvajñātāptatāliṅgabhūtaḥ pramāṇātiśo yasmin tat tathoktaṃ śāsanam /
GSP28durdhpru:11367: yadi hi kapilādayaḥ sarvajñā āpto vā syus tadā jyotirjñānādikam kamān nopadiṣṭavntaḥ?
GSP28durdhpru:11373: yaḥ sarvajña āpto vā sa jyotirjñānādikaṃ sarvajñatāptatā liṅgabhūtam uapadiṣṭavān /
GSP28durdhpru:11374: yathā ṛṣabho vardhamānaś ca tāv ādī yasya sa ṛṣabhavardhamānādir digambarāṇāṃ
GSP28durdhpru:11375: prakaraṇāt kṣīṇadoṣatvam āptatvakṣaṇamasya vivakṣitam iti tat vā anāptā akṣīṇadoṣā iti vyācaṣṭe /
GSP28durdhpru:11379: nanu teṣām api śāsane liṅgātmakaḥ pramāṇātiśayo 'neko 'sty eva /
GSP28durdhpru:11380: tat kathaṃ hetur ayam asiddho na bhavatīty āha --- pramāṇātiśaya iti /
GSP28durdhpru:11383: tad ayaṃ samudāyārthaḥ --- yasmāt tair jyotirjñānam anyātīndriyajñānaṃ ca svaśāsane nopadiṣṭaṃ tasmāt te na tathārūpā iti /
GSP28durdhpru:11387: tad iha vaidharmyodāharaṇād ṛśabhāder asarvajñatvasyānāptatāyāś ca vyatireko vyāvṛttiḥ saṃdigdhā /
GSP28durdhpru:11388: yato jyotirjñānaṃ copadaiśed asarvajñāś ca bhaved anāptā vā /
GSP28durdhpru:11390: naimattikam etaj jñānaṃ vyabhdicāri na sarvajñatvam anumāpayet //
GSP28durdhpru:11398: sarvajñaś cāptaś cety anena dvayasyāpi sādhyasyābhāvaṃ darśayati /
GSP28durdhpru:11399: yad āha --- akalaṅkaḥ --- “yadi sūkṣme vyavahite vā vastuni buddhir atyantaparokṣe na syāt kathaṃ tarhi jyotirjñānāvisaṃvādaḥ?
GSP28durdhpru:11402: dhīr atyantaparokṣe 'rthe na cet puṃsāṃ kuta punaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:11405: kathaṃ punaḥ saty api jyotirjñānādy uapadeśe vipakṣād ṛṣabhāder asarvajñatvāder vyāvṛttiḥ sandigdhety āha --- yata iti /
GSP28durdhpru:11406: atra sarvajñatāyām aniṣṭāyāṃ satyām api jyotirjñānāy uapdeśe ko virodho 'nupapattiḥ?
GSP28durdhpru:11407: kṣepe kimaḥ prayogān na kaśdcid ity arthaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:11408: athāsarvajñatve tasyaitasmād idaṃ grahoparāgādi bhāvi tataś caivaṃ bhāvīti jñānaṃ kathaṃ vṛttaṃ yena samvādi tathopadiśet /
GSP28durdhpru:11409: tasmāt sarvajña evāsāv iti niścaya ity āśaṅkyāha --- naimittakam etad iti /
GSP28durdhpru:11411: viṣayeṇa ca viṣayiṇo nirdeśānnimittadarśanād āgataṃ naimittakam,
GSP28durdhpru:11412: ata eva tad upadeṣṭuḥ sarajñatā vyabhicaratīti /
GSP28durdhpru:11413: tathā sarvajñatām antareṇāpi bhavatīdānīntanajyotiṣikāṇām ivā'tīndriyoparāgādijñānam ity abhiprāyaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:11414: tathābhūtaṃ jñānaṃ na sarvajñatām anumāpayed anumāpayituṃ śaknoti /
GSP28durdhpru:11415: nanu ca tathābhūtena bhāvivastunā saha kasyacit kāryakāraṇabhāva eva tena kaścid jñātaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:11416: yady [81a] asāv asarvajño bhaved asarvajñaś ca katham upadiśed iti cet / na /
GSP28durdhpru:11420: yena sa evādyas tathā jñānī sarvajñaḥ,
GSP28durdhpru:11421: sa cāsmākam ṛṣabhādir ity apy ucyeta /
GSP28durdhpru:11422: atha vā --- yady asau asarvajñas tadā tasya tathābhūtasya sādhyasādhanabhāvasyāviduṣa
GSP28durdhpru:11423: upadeśād asmād ādīnām atīndriyoparāgādijñānaṃ saṃvādi ca kathaṃ bhaved ity āśaṅky
GSP28durdhpru:11428: etac ca vyabhicāri jñānam upadiśyamānaṃ nopadeṣṭuḥ sarvajñatām anumāpayituṃ kalpyate /
GSP28durdhpru:11429: atha tad eva tasya tathā bhūtasya kāraṇavastunas tat tad bhāvivastu pratikāraṇātvaṃ kathaṃ jānīyāt kathaṃ copadiśed yady asāv asarvajña iti cet /
GSP28durdhpru:11434: na trayīvidā brāhmaṇena grāhyavacanaḥ kaścid[870]vivakṣitaḥ puruṣo rāgādimattvād iti /
GSP28durdhpru:11435: atra vaidharmyodāharaṇam --- ye grāhyavacanā na te rāgādimantaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:11437: gautamādibhyo rāgādimattvasya sādhanadharmasya vyāvṛttiḥ sandigdhā III-131
GSP28durdhpru:11444: ṛksāmayajūṃṣi triṇi trayī tām vetīti[873] trayīvid /
GSP28durdhpru:11445: tena na grāhaṃ vacanaṃ yasyeti sādhyam /
GSP28durdhpru:11450: atra pramāṇe vaidharmyodāharaṇam --- sādhayābhāvaḥ sādhanābhāvena [874]yatra vyāpto darśyate tad vaidharmodāharaṇam /
GSP28durdhpru:11451: grāhyaṃ vacanaṃ yeṣāṃ te grāhyavacanā iti sādhyanivṛttim anūdya na te rāgādimanta iti sādhanābhāvo vihitaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:11452: gautamādayo ādir yeṣāṃ te tathoktā manvādayo dharmaśāstrāṇi smṛtayas teṣāṃ karttāraḥ
GSP28durdhpru:11453: trayīvidā hi brāhmyaṇena grāhyavacanā dharmaśāstrakṛto vītarāgāś ca ta itīha [875]dharmī
GSP28durdhpru:11456: yady api te grāhyavacanās trayīvidas tathāpi [876]kiṃ sarāgā uta vītarāgā iti sandehaḥ //
GSP28durdhpru:11465: atra vaidharmyeṇa udāharaṇam --- yo vītarāgo na tasya parigrahāgrahaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:11467: anādiś ca saṃsāra iti katham etāvanmātreṇa vardhamānāheḥ sarvajñatvasiddhir iti //
GSP28durdhpru:11468: trayo 'vayavā yasyāḥ saṃhater iti trayīty adantāt ṅīp /
GSP28durdhpru:11469: kim atra sādhyā [bhāvā]nuvādena sādhanā bhāo vihito yenaitad vaidharmyodāharaṇaṃ bhavatīty āśaṅkyāha --- sādhyeti /
GSP28durdhpru:11474: dharmitvamātrajijñāpiṣayā dharmivyatirekaviṣaya iti abhidhāya tasyeiva viśeṣaniṣṭhpratipādanecchayā gautamādaya ity uktam /
GSP28durdhpru:11476: nam ity ādivat tasmād vaidharmī dṛṣṭānto gautamādir iti vākyārthaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:11477: tathātvaṃ ca teṣāṃ tathātvenopādānānna tu paramārthata ity avaseyam /
GSP28durdhpru:11478: grāhyavacanatve 'pi teṣāṃ kathaṃ tādrūpyasandeha ity āha --- yady apīti /
GSP28durdhpru:11482: ṛṣabhāder avītarāgatvaparigrahāgrahayogayoḥ sādhyasādhanadharmayoḥ sandigdho vyatirekaḥ III-132
GSP28durdhpru:11490: svīkārād ūrdhvaṃ yad gārdhyaṃ mātsaryaṃ sa āgrahaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:11491: parigrahaś ca āgrahaś ca tābhyāṃ yogāt /
GSP28durdhpru:11492: kapilādayo labhyamānaṃ svīkrvanti svīkṛtaṃ na muñcanti --- iti te rāgādimanto gamyante /
GSP28durdhpru:11493: atra pramāṇe vaidharmyodāharaṇam --- yatra sādhyābhāve sādhanābhāo darśayitavyaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:11495: na tasya parigrahāgrahāv iti sādhanābhāo vihitaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:11497: etasmād ṛṣabhāder dṛṣṭāntād avītarāgatvasya sādhyasya parigrahāgrahayogasya[878] ca sādhanasya [879]nivṛttiḥ sandigdhā /
GSP28durdhpru:11498: ṛṣabhādīnāṃ hi parigrahāgrahayogo 'pi sandigho vītarāgatvaṃ ca /
GSP28durdhpru:11499: yadi nāma tatsiddhānte vītarāgāś ca niṣparigrahāś ca [880]paṭhyante tathāpi sandeha eva //
GSP28durdhpru:11509: [883]vaidharmyeṇa udāharaṇam ---[884]yatra avītarāgatvaṃ na asti[885]na sa vaktā,
GSP28durdhpru:11511: yady apy upalakhaṇḍād ubhayaṃ vyāvṛttaṃ[886]tathā api sarvo vītarāgo na vaktā iti vyāptyā vyatirekāsiddher avyatirekaḥ III-133
GSP28durdhpru:11523: bdasya dvivacanāntasya prayogadarśanādubhayor ity ubhaśabdenārtham āha /
GSP28durdhpru:11525: ti tu viśeṣo 'tra mātsaryam abhipreta āgrahaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:11529: nānyatheti draḍhayitum uktam api smārayann āha --- yatreti /
GSP28durdhpru:11530: ṛṣabhāvīnām ity anena vaidharmyodāharaṇād ṛṣabhāveḥ sādhyasādhanayor vyāvṛttisandehaṃ darśayati /
GSP28durdhpru:11531: nanvasmadāgame tadguṇadvayayoginas te kathitās tatkatham anyos tato vyāvṛttiḥ sagdhyata ity āha --- yadi nāmeti /
GSP28durdhpru:11532: paṭhyata iti ca vacanavyaktyā ca pāṭhamātreṇa teṣāṃ tadguṇayogaḥ siddhaḥ na tu pramāṇeneti darśayati /
GSP28durdhpru:11539: iha vyatirekam āha --- yatra avītarāgatvaṃ nāstīti sādhyābhāvānuvādaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:11540: tatra vakṛtvam api nāsti --- iti sādhanaābhāvavidhiḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:11548: [890]yady apy upalakhaṇḍād ubhayaṃ vyāvṛttaṃ sarāgatvaṃ ca vaktṛtvaṃ ca[891],
GSP28durdhpru:11549: tathā api vyāptyā[892] vyatireko yas tasyā asiddheḥ kāraṇād avyatireko ayam /
GSP28durdhpru:11553: [891] yatra vītarāgatvaṃ tatra vaktṛtvaṃ nāsti --- ṭi-
GSP28durdhpru:11555: kīdṛśī punar vyāptir ity āha --- sarvo vītarāga iti sādhyābhāvānuādaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:11575: yāvateti tṛtīyāntapratirūpako yasmād ity asyāthe varttamāno 'tra gṛhītaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:11581: nanūpalakhaṇḍāttāvad vaidhrmīdṛṣṭāntāntādubhayaṃ nivṛttaṃ darśitaṃ yena tat kim evam ucyata ity āha --- yady apīti /
GSP28durdhpru:11590: itr īdṛśyā vyāpteḥ svarūpaṃ prakāśayati yasmād arthe vā /
GSP28durdhpru:11592: sādhanāṣbhāvena sādhyābhāvanyāyena lakṣaṇā vyāptir īkṛśīty arthaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:11593: īdṛśaṃ vyātpim antaṃ vyatirekaṃ prasādhayitum asarmarto 'yaṃ katham ayaṃ dṛśṭāno treṣṭa ity āha --- asya ceti /
GSP28durdhpru:11596: prasiddhaye niścayārthaṃ dṛṣṭānta upādīyata iti śeṣaḥ,
GSP28durdhpru:11598: na cāyaṃ tathāpradarśanba ity amum arthaṃ prakaraṇagamyaṃ kṛtvā /
GSP28durdhpru:11599: tat tasmāt svakāryakaraṇād duṣṭa ity uktam /
GSP28durdhpru:11607: sa śuddho 'pi svato yadi pareṇāśuddhaḥ khyāpyate sa tāv adyathā prakāśitas tathā na yuktaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:11610: ato vatur aprādhād api parāthānumāne hetur dṛṣṭānto vā duṣṭaḥ syād api /
GSP28durdhpru:11619: dṛṣṭāntas tathāpy ayaṃ kathaṃ duṣṭa ity āha --- tat svakāryeti /
GSP28durdhpru:11623: atha paramārthatas tāvad dṛṣṭānte nahbasi sādhyābhāvo 'py asti,
GSP28durdhpru:11625: tatkatham apradarśitavyatireko dṛṣṭānt duṣṭ ity āha --- iheti /
GSP28durdhpru:11633: yathā prakāśito vyatirekamātravān prakāśito vyāptiśūnyaś ca prakāśitaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:11636: bhāvo vidhīyate dṛṣṭānte pradarśyetaivam asau hetuḥ sādhyasiddhyaṅgavytirekavān siddhyet /
GSP28durdhpru:11638: tatrpadarśanaś ca dṛṣṭānto 'duṣṭo bhaved ity abhiprāyaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:11639: yadi nāma tathā na prakāśitas tathāpi tadupayogī hetur dṛṣṭānto vā tathā kiṃ na pratipadyata ity āha --- prakāśitaś ceti /
GSP28durdhpru:11644: na kevalaṃ vacovyavasthitād doṣād ity apiśabdenāha /
GSP28durdhpru:11645: yady api dṛṣṭānta eva prakṛtas tathāpi hetur apy evaṃvidhaḥ svato 'duṣṭo 'pi vaktṛdoṣād eva duṣyatīti tulyanbyāyatayā prasaṅgana darśitam /
GSP28durdhpru:11646: yad vā yathaivaṃviddho hetur vaktṛdoṣād duṣṭo bhavati tadvad dṛṣṭānto 'pīti dṛṣṭāntārthaṃ hetoḥ vaktraparādhenā(na)
GSP28durdhpru:11648: [82] nanu ca yathā kṛtakatvenākāśavidharmā śabdaḥ pratīyate tathā 'nityatvenāpi tadvidharmā bhaviṣyati tat katham anupayukta ity āha --- na ceti /
GSP28durdhpru:11650: evaṃvadato 'yam āśayaḥ --- yady ekena dharmeṇa vaidharmya(mye)
GSP28durdhpru:11654: sādṛśyād asādṛśyād veti sādharmyavaidharmyadṛṣṭāntapratipāditād iti prakāraṇāt /
GSP28durdhpru:11655: vyatirekavākyenāpi sādhanābhāvenāpi niyamakhyāpanadvārā sādhya eva hetor niyatatvakhyāpanād vyatirekavāyena cety uktam /
GSP28durdhpru:11660: ato vaidharmyadṛṣṭānta ihāsādṛśyamātreṇa[900] sādhaka upanyas taḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:11663: ca na tathopanyas ta iti[901] ayam apradarśitavyatireko vaktur aprādhād dṛṭaḥ //
GSP28durdhpru:11668: viparītavyatireko[902]yathā --- yad akṛtakaṃ tan nityaṃ bhavati iti III-135
GSP28durdhpru:11674: [903] `viparīto' ity ārabhya `tam udāharati' paryantaḥ pāṭho durvekasamīpasthaikasminn ādarśe nāsīd iti vyākhyānurodhāt jñāyate --- saṃ-
GSP28durdhpru:11677: vyatirekavākye ca sādhyābhāvam anūdya sādhanābhāvo vidhātavyaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:11679: kasmād asau vākyadvayenāpy eva vaktavya ity āha --- anyatheti /
GSP28durdhpru:11680: asmād anyena prakāreṇa gamakaḥ parokṣārthaprakāśako noktaḥ syāt /
GSP28durdhpru:11682: dṛśṭāntas tu katham atrādikriyata ity āha --- sa iti /
GSP28durdhpru:11684: dṛṣṭāntena sādharmyavatā vaidharmyavatā ca karaṇena siddho niścito darśayitavyaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:11685: nanv evam api na jñāyate kiṃvyāpāro dṛṣṭānta ihopayujyate ity āśaṅkyopasaṃhāravyāhenāha --- tasmād iti /
GSP28durdhpru:11688: bhidheyaḥ --- uktena prakāreṇa hetoḥ sādhyaniyatatvam --- pradarśyaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:11690: yad vā pradarśyate 'neneti pradarśyate 'sminn iti pradarśanaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:11692: yady evam ayam api vaidharyadṛṣṭāntāntas tathākāryevātropayojyata ity āha --- na ceti /
GSP28durdhpru:11695: vyatirekakhyāpakaṃ sāedhyābhāvānuvādena sādhanābhāvavidhāyakam vākyam ity arthaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:11700: yadi tanmātreṇāpi sādhakas tadā kā kṣatir ity āha --- na ceti /
GSP28durdhpru:11702: vādy uktena dharmeṇa sādhyadharmiṇo 'sādṛśyāvagame dharmāntareṇāpy asādṛśyāvagamo 'vaśyambhāvīti yujyate 'tiprasaṅgād ity abhiprāyaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:11706: yadā ca sādhyaniyato hetur darśayitavyas tadā vyatrirekavākye sādhyābhāvaḥ sādhanābhāve niyato darśayitavyaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:11707: evaṃ hi hetuḥ sādhyaniyato darśitaḥ syāt /
GSP28durdhpru:11708: yadi tu sādhyābhāvaḥ sādhanābhāve niyato nākhyāyate sādhānasattyāyām api sādhyābhāvaḥ sambhāvyeta[906] /
GSP28durdhpru:11709: tahthā ca sādhananaṃ sādhyaniyataṃ na pratīyeta[907] /
GSP28durdhpru:11710: tasmāt sādhyābhāvaḥ sādhanaābhāve niyato vatavyaḥ viparītavyatireke ca sādhanābhāvaḥ sādhyābhāve niyata ucyate /
GSP28durdhpru:11712: tathā hi --- yad akṛtakam iti sādhanābhāvam anūdya tan nityaṃ bhavatīti sādhyabhāvavidhiḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:11718: tathā ca sati akṛtakatvaṃ nityatve sādhyābhāve niyatvaṃ sādhanābhāve /
GSP28durdhpru:11720: tathā ca niparītavyatireko 'pi vaktur aparādhād duṣṭaḥ //
GSP28durdhpru:11721: yady evam asādhakaḥ kathaṃ nāma sādhaka ity āha --- vyatireketi /
GSP28durdhpru:11724: vyaktam etad ity asminn arthe vā /
GSP28durdhpru:11725: anenāpi tathaivopanyas ta ity āha --- na ceti /
GSP28durdhpru:11731: viparīto vaiparīty ena pradarśanād vyatireko yasmin dṛśānte sa tathokta iti --- vyutpattir
GSP28durdhpru:11734: yatra tu pustake viparītavyatireko yathety asya mūlasya vyākhānagrantho 'sti tatra sarvam avadātam /
GSP28durdhpru:11737: yad vaiparītyena darśanādayaṃ viparītavyatireka ucyata ity āha --- yadā ceti /
GSP28durdhpru:11740: yadā yasmin kāle rpatipādanakāla ity arthāt /
GSP28durdhpru:11742: hetoḥ sādhye niyatatvapradarañcāvaśyakāryamanyathā gamako noktañ syād ity abhiprāyaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:11745: kasmāt punar evaṃ darśayitavya ity āha --- evaṃ hīti /
GSP28durdhpru:11748: athānyathāpradarśane 'pi yadi sādhanaṃ sādhyaniyataṃ pratīyate tadā tathāpradarśanenaiva kiṃ prayojanam ity āha --- yadi tv iti /
GSP28durdhpru:11750: tathā ca sādhanasattāyām api sādhyābhāvasmbhāvanāprakāre sati /
GSP28durdhpru:11752: asimin rpayoge kiṃ mānocyata ity āha --- viparīteti /
GSP28durdhpru:11754: tathā hītyādinaitad eva pratipādayati yata evam anuvādavidhis atataḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:11758: na hy ebhir dṛṣṭāntābhāsāir hetoḥ sāmānyalakṣaṇaṃ sapakṣa eva sattvaṃ vipakṣe ca sarvatra asattvam eva niścayena śakyaṃ darśayituṃ viśeṣalakṣaṇaṃ vā /
GSP28durdhpru:11764: ebhiś ca hetoḥ sapakṣa eva sattvaṃ vipakṣe ca sarvatra asattvam eva yat sāmānyalakṣaṇaṃ tat niścayena śakyaṃ darśayitum /
GSP28durdhpru:11765: nanu ca sāmānyalakṣaṇaṃ viśeṣaniṣṭham eva pratipattavyaṃ na savata evety āha --- viśeṣalakṣaṇaṃ vā /
GSP28durdhpru:11766: yadi viśeṣalakṣaṇaṃ pratipādayituṃ śakyeta syād eva sāmānyalakṣaṇapratipattiḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:11767: viśeṣalakṣaṇam eva tu na śakyaem ebhiḥ prapādayitum /
GSP28durdhpru:11768: tasmād arthāpattyā sāmarthyena[909] eṣāṃ nirākraṇaṃ dṛṣṭayam /
GSP28durdhpru:11782: na nityatvaṃ sādhyābhāvalakṣaṇaṃ sādhanābhāve kṛtakatvalakṣaṇasādhanābhāve 'kṛtakatva ity arthāt /
GSP28durdhpru:11783: yata evaṃ tato tehor vyatirekavākyaṃ karttṛ hetuṃ karmabhūtaṃ na sādhyaniyatam āha /
GSP28durdhpru:11784: uktayā nītyā sādhanābhābvaḥ sādhyābhāve niytatvāttam antareṇa na bhavet /
GSP28durdhpru:11785: na tu tayatra sādhyābhāvas tatrāvaśyaṃ sāhdanābhāva iti sādhyam antareṇāpi sādhanaṃ bhavet /
GSP28durdhpru:11786: tataś ca sādhyāniyataṃ sādhanam ity abhiprāyaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:11787: tathā ca sādhyaniyatahetvapradarśanaprakāre sati vaktur evaṃvākyaprayoktuḥ //
GSP28durdhpru:11789: viśeṣaniṣṭham eva prayetavyam iti bruvato 'yaṃ bhāvaḥ --- yadi nāmābhībhiḥ sapakṣa eva sattvaṃ nipakṣe sarcatrāsattvaṃ niśayena śakyate darśayitum,
GSP28durdhpru:11790: tathāpy ete viśeṣalakṣaṇaṃ sānānyalakṣaṇapratipattyaṅgaṃ pratipādayanta upayokṣyanta iti /
GSP28durdhpru:11791: atra viśeṣalakṣaṇaś cety uttaraṃ yadīty ākāraṇāt /
GSP28durdhpru:11794: katham amī duṣṭā yena tathātvena nirākraṇam eṣām ityāśaṅkyopasaṃharan āha --- sādhyeti /
GSP28durdhpru:11797: asāmarthyam eva kathaṃ yenāsāmarthyād [82a] duṣṭā ucyanta ity āha --- svakāryasya hetoḥ sādhyaniyatatvapradarśanalakṣaṇasyākaraṇāt /
GSP28durdhpru:11798: nanu tadakaraṇam evāsāmarthyam utam iti cet /
GSP28durdhpru:11818: ye pūrvaṃ nyūnatādayaḥ sādhanadoṣā uktās teṣām udbhāvanaṃ dūṣaṇam /
GSP28durdhpru:11820: ye pūrvaṃ nyūnatāādayaḥ asiddhaviruddhānaikāntikā uktās teṣām udbhāvakaṃ yadvacanaṃ tad dūṣaṇam /
GSP28durdhpru:11822: tat kathaṃ dūṣaṇam ity āha --- tena nyūnatādivacanena pareṣām iṣṭārthaś ca tasya siddhiḥ niścayas tasyāḥ pratibandhāt /
GSP28durdhpru:11823: nāvaśyaṃ niparyaya sādhanād eva dūṣaṇaṃ viruddhaat /
GSP28durdhpru:11824: api tu parasyābhipretaniścayavibandhān[916] niścayābhāvo bhavati niścayaviparyaya ity asty eva[917] viparyayasiddhir iti /
GSP28durdhpru:11831: api dṛṣṭāntābhāsasyāsādhanāṅgavacanād vādino nigraho ādino nigraho 'sāmarthyopādānānnyāyaprātaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:11832: paropāttāś ca codanīyā iti dṛṣṭāntābhāsavyupādane vārttikakṛto 'bhiprāyaḥ pratyavya iti /
GSP28durdhpru:11833: samprati sudhagrahaṇārtham ukaprabandhasyācāryīyasya pratpāditamavacchindannāha --- iyateti trirūpaliṅgākhyānam ity ādinaitadntena,
GSP28durdhpru:11834: idaṃ parimāṇam asyetītyat teneyatā mahāvākyena sādhanam uktam ācāryeṇeti śeṣaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:11836: tad api tasyaiva sphuṭāvagamārthaṃ tatvaivopayuktam ati manyamānenoktam iyatā sādhanam uktam iti /
GSP28durdhpru:11839: etac ca tad dūṣaṇam ity antaṃ subodham /
GSP28durdhpru:11842: atra tenetyādy uttaraṃ vyācakṣāṇa āha --- tenetyādi /
GSP28durdhpru:11864: tatkathaṃ pareṣtārthasiddhapratibandhakasyāpi nyūnatādivacanasya tathātvam ucyata ity āśaṅkāmapākurvannāha --- nāvaśyaam iti /
GSP28durdhpru:11865: kin tv aparasya sisādhayiṣitārthaniścayavibadhād apy atrārthād draṣṭavyam /
GSP28durdhpru:11866: anyathā 'vaśyaṃ grahaṇamavadhāraṇaṃ viruddhavad ity api duryojaṃ syāt /
GSP28durdhpru:11867: mṛtvā śīrtvā ca tadyojane vaktur akauśalaṃ syād iti /
GSP28durdhpru:11868: yadi tv avaśyaṃ viparyayasādhanatvasyaiva dūṣaṇatvam iti nirvandhas tadā tad apy asya nyūnatādivacanasyāstīti darśayann āha --- niścayeti /
GSP28durdhpru:11871: sādṛśyārthavṛtter api jātiśabdasya darśanāj jātiśabdaḥ sādṛśyavacana ity āha /
GSP28durdhpru:11872: nanu jātiśabdaḥ sādṛśyavacanatvād astv ayam arthaḥ --- jātayaḥ sadṛśā iti /
GSP28durdhpru:11873: kāni punas tāni kena ca sadṛśānīti na jñāyata ity āśaṅkām apārkuvannāha --- uttareti /
GSP28durdhpru:11875: tad ayam arthaḥ --- jātiśabdena jātyuttaram evātra varttikakārasya vivakṣitam iti /
GSP28durdhpru:11876: kathaṃ punar dūṣaṇābhāsānāṃ jāty uttaraśabdavākyatvam ity āśaṅkyāha --- uttareti /
GSP28durdhpru:11878: vivaraṇe 'py uttarasthāne jāyamānatvāj jāyata uttaratvenābhāsanād uttarāṇīti /
GSP28durdhpru:11881: abhūtadoṣodbhāvanāni jātyuttarāṇīti bruvatā vārttikakṛtā bhūtadoṣodbhāvanaṃ tu yad dūṣaṇākhyaṃ tad evottīryate aniṣṭapakṣād anenottārayatim,
GSP28durdhpru:11884: etac ca jāty uttaravyutpādanam ācāyasya hetvābhāsavan na prayogārtham /
GSP28durdhpru:11897: ācāryadharmottaraviracitāyāṃ[927] nyāyāṃ nyāyavinduṭīkāyāṃ tṛtīyaḥ paricchedaḥ samāptaḥ //[928]

GSP28durdhpru:11935: padyante gamyante 'rthā ebhir iti padāni vākyāni teṣāṃ vastupratipādyatayāsti tam abhidheyarūpaṃ .......... śeṣo jñeyaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:11944: evaṃ vidhavidhānena yat puṇyate tad avaśyamamalatayaitattulyaṃ bhavatīti bhāvaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:11949: atha vā jarānirdeśenaiva daṇḍāpūpanyāyena sābhyupāyasyāvabodho nivakṣitaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:11953: yattadoś ca nityam abhisambadhena tacchabdasya labdhatvāt tadavāpyety artho 'vatiṣṭḥate /
GSP28durdhpru:11956: tadvyāpṛtir vyāpāro vyāpriyamāṇatā yasya mama yo 'haṃ tathā /
GSP28durdhpru:11957: na vārśasāviṣaye 'sminn āśīr liṅgā bhūyāsam iti śabdasiddher[naivam]nena vaktavyam tat kim evam avādīd iti cet / na /
GSP28durdhpru:11959: yata evaṃvidhānuṣṭhānajanmanā puṣyātiśayena evambhūtapadaprāptes tato 'pi mamaivaṃvidhakriyasyamānatvād eva ......................... yam etad ity abhiprāyāt sarvam avadātam iti //
GSP28durdhpru:11960: guror jitārer abhigamya dhīdhanaṃ mayā hi ṭīkā vivṛtā paṭīyasī /
GSP28durdhpru:11961: kutūhalenāpi tad atra yujyate nirīkṣaṇaṃ sādhu vivecakānām //
GSP28durdhpru:11962: ajño janasty ajati labdham apīha ratnaṃ kācena tuyam iti calāyateti(m iti cacalamānaso 'pi) /

GSP28durdhpru:12003: 5,8. vinītadevaśāntabhadrau --- samyagjñānetyādivākyena prayojanaprayojanam adhihitam ity anyavākhyāṃ bhaṅgyā dūṣayitum āha --- samyagjñānapūrvikā sarvapuruṣārthasiddhir iti /

GSP28durdhpru:12010: tanmatena tu `sarvam ālambane bhrāntaṃ muktvā tāthāgata jñānam' /
